[\[80b.4\]]pa'am/_rdzas dang /_sngags dang /_sman rnams kyis zhi bar bya bar sla ba ma yin no/_/rgyal po chen po 'di lta ste/_dper na [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyi rgyal po seng ge [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyi tshogs kyi nang du zhugs nas [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]bzung ste/_ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du bya ba byed do/_/[{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]de ni stobs po che'i kha 
[\[80b.5\]]mi bzad pas bzung bas dbang med par 'gyur ro/_/rgyal po chen po de bzhin du 'chi bdag gi gsal shing gis zug ste/_rgyags pa dang ni bral/_mgon ni med/_skyabs ni med/_dpung gnyen ni med/_gshis ni 'jig_/tshigs ni 'bye 'bral/_sha dang khrag ni skams/_lus 
[\[80b.6\]]ni nad kyis gdungs/_skom ni skom/_bzhin ni 'gyur/_rkang lag ni g.yo ba/_las ni mi nus/_mthu ni med/_kha chu dang /_snabs dang /_gcin dang /_ngan skyugs kyis ni lus la gos/_mig dang /_rna ba dang /_sna dang /_lce dang /_lus dang /_yid kyi dbang 
[\[80b.7\]]po dag ni 'gags/_skyigs bu ni 'byung /_sgra ngar ngar po ni 'thon/_sman pas ni bor/_sman dang /_kha zas dang /_bza' ba dang /_thug pa thams cad kyis ni gles la bor te/_'gro ba gzhan dag tu 'gro bar mal gyi tha ma la ni nyal/_thog ma med pa'i skye ba dang /_rga ba 
[\[81a\]]
[\[81a.1\]]dang /_na ba dang /_'chi ba'i 'khor ba'i rgyud du ni nub/_srog ni cung zad cig las gshin rje'i mis ni 'jigs skrag_/byur gyi dbang du ni song /_dbugs rgyu ba ni chad/_kha dang sna ni gdangs/_so ni gtsigs/_sbyin pa sbyin no zhes de skad gsol ba ni 'debs/_
[\[81a.2\]]las kyi srid pa nas yang srid pa la ni 'jug_/gcig pu gnyis su med cing grogs ni med/_'jig rten 'di ni 'dor/_'jig rten pha rol du ni 'gro/_/skyas chen po ni 'degs/_mun pa chen por ni zhugs/_g.yang sa chen por ni lhung /_khrod stug por ni 'jug_/dgon pa chen por ni 'gro/_
[\[81a.3\]]rgya mtsho chen pos ni khyer/_las kyi rlung gis ni bdas/_sa tshugs med pa'i phyogs su ni 'gro/_g.yul ngo chen por ni 'jug_/gdon chen pos ni zin/_nam mkha' la ni 'chel/_pha ma dang /_phu nu dang /_sring mo dang /_bu dang bu mos ni bskor/_dbugs ni 'chad/_nor bgo 
[\[81a.4\]]bsha' bya zhes ni zer/_kyi hud ma/_kyi hud pha/_kyi hud bu zhes ni zer/_skra ni zhig ste/_sbyin pa dang /_dka' thub dang /_chos 'ba' zhig grogs su gyur pa na/_chos ma gtogs par skyabs gzhan med/_mgon gzhan med/_gnas gzhan med/_dpung gnyen gzhan med do/_/
[\[81a.5\]]rgyal po chen po de'i tshe de'i dus na chos ni gling dang /_gnas dang /_mgon dang /_rton par 'gyur ro/_/rgyal po chen po 'di lta ste dper na grang bas nyen pa la me dang /_mes rab tu gdungs par gyur pa la me gsod pa dang /_tsha bas nyen pa la bsil ba dang /_'gron po ngal ba la ni grib 
[\[81a.6\]]ma dang /_rlung bsil ba dang /_skom pa la chu bsil ba dang /_lam du zhugs pa la bzhon pa dang /_nyal ba la mal 'jam po dang /_skom pa la chu grang mo dang /_shin tu bkres pa la zas bzang po dang /_mya ngan gyis non pa la dbugs 'byin pa dang /_gdungs pa la sim 
[\[81a.7\]]par byed pa dang /_dgon par lam stor ba la lam mtshon pa dang /_nad kyis btab pa la sman pa dang /_sman dang /_nad g.yog byed pa dang /_chus khyer ba la gzings dang /_'dam du bying ba la 'jus dang /_rgal dka' ba la zam pa dang /_nyam nga ba la 'bab 
[\[81b\]]
[\[81b.1\]]stegs dang /_mun khung na sgron ma dang /_rgya mtsho chen po la gru dang /_lhags pas nyen pa la rlung med pa'i gnas dang /_yul gzhan du song ba la lam rgyags dang /_dbul po la nor dang /_byed par 'dod pa la grogs dang /_gcad par 'dod pa la lag cha dang /_gzhig par 'dod pa 
[\[81b.2\]]la rdo rje dang /_g.yul ngor zhugs pa la go cha dang /_'jigs pa la stobs dang ldan pa'i grogs dang /_'thab pa la dpung gnyen dang /_dog pa la go 'byed pa dang /_mu ge la nor dang ldan pa dag mgon dang /_skyabs dang /_gnas dang /_rten du gyur pa de bzhin du rgyal po chen po 
[\[81b.3\]]'chi bdag gi gsal shing gis zug ste/_rgyags pa dang ni bral/_mgon ni med/_skyabs ni med/_dpung gnyen ni med/_gshis ni 'jig_/tshigs ni 'bye 'bral/_sha dang khrag ni skams/_lus ni nad kyis gdungs/_skom ni skom/_bzhin ni 'gyur/_rkang lag ni 
[\[81b.4\]]g.yo ba/_las ni mi nus/_mthu ni med/_kha chu dang /_gcin dang /_ngan skyugs kyis ni lus la gos/_mig dang /_rna ba dang /_sna dang /_lce dang /_lus dang /_yid kyi dbang po dag ni 'gags/_skyigs bu ni 'byung /_sgra ngar ngar po ni 'thon/_sman pas ni bor/_
[\[81b.5\]]sman dang /_kha zas dang /_bza' ba dang /_zas dang /_thug pa thams cad kyis ni gles la bor te/_'gro ba gzhan du 'gro bar mal gyi tha ma la ni nyal/_thog ma med pa'i skye ba dang /_rga ba dang /_na ba dang /_'chi ba'i 'khor ba'i rgyud du ni nub/_srog ni cung zad 
[\[81b.6\]]cig las/_gshin rje'i mis ni 'jigs skrag_/byur gyi dbang du ni song /_dbugs rgyu ba ni 'chad/_kha dang sna ni gdangs/_so ni gtsigs/_sbyin pa sbyin no zhes de skad gsol ba ni 'debs/_las kyis srid pa nas yang srid pa la ni 'jug_/gcig pu 
[\[81b.7\]]gnyis su med cing grogs ni med/_'jig rten 'di ni 'dor/_'jig rten pha rol du ni 'gro_/skyas chen po ni 'degs/_mun pa chen por ni zhugs/_g.yang sa chen por ni lhung /_khrod stug por ni 'jug_/dgon pa chen por ni 'gro/_rgya mtsho chen pos ni 
[\[82a\]]
[\[82a.1\]]khyer/_las kyi rlung gis ni bdas/_sa tshugs med pa'i phyogs su ni 'gro ba na/_chos ma gtogs par mgon gzhan med/_skyabs gzhan med/_dpung gnyen gzhan med do/_/rgyal po chen po chos ni de'i tshe de'i dus na gling chen po dang /_gnas dang /_mgon dang /_
[\[82a.2\]]skyabs dang /_dpung gnyen dang /_rton par 'gyur ro/_/rgyal po chen po de'i tshe 'di snyam du sems te/_kyi hud gang du 'gro bar 'gyur/_phyogs gang du 'gro bar 'gyur/_gang du yongs su 'dzin par byed par 'gyur/_bdag gi mar ni su zhig 'gyur snyam pa las/_des 
[\[82a.3\]]sems can dmyal bar skye bar mthong bar gyur na/_'di lta ste/_mnar med pa dang /_tsha ba dang /_rab tu tsha ba la sogs pa'i sems can dmyal ba rnams su lo mang po/_lo brgya phrag mang po/_lo stong phrag mang por sdug bsngal chen po/_sdug bsngal mi bzad pa/_drag po/_rtsub 
[\[82a.4\]]pa/_yid du mi 'ong ba'i tshor ba myong ste/_ji srid du sems can dmyal ba myong bar 'gyur ba'i sdig pa mi dge ba'i las yong thams cad du zad cing byang bar ma gyur pa/_de srid du 'chi ba'i dus byed par mi 'gyur ro/_/de dud 'gro'i skye gnas su skye bar mthong bar gyur na 'di lta ste/_rgya mtsho 
[\[82a.5\]]chen po'i nang du nya rlon dang /_nya rlon mid la sogs pa srog chags gcig gis gcig gsod pa dang /_'tshe ba dang /_dbang med par skye'o/_/bdag [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]kyi nang du skye bar mi 'gyur ram snyam na 'di lta ste/_lo mang po dang /_lo brgya phrag mang po dang /_lo stong phrag mang 
[\[82a.6\]]por chu'i sgra yang mi thos na mthong ba lta ci smos par 'gyur ro/_/rgyal po chen po de lta bas na khyod kyis mi rtag par blta zhing zad pa dang dengs par blta bar bya ste 'chi bas 'jigs skrag par bya'o/_/chos kyis rgyal srid gyis shig_/chos ma yin pas ni mi bya'o/_/khyod chos dang 'thun par 
[\[82a.7\]]gyis shig_/chos ma yin pa dang 'thun par ni mi bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rgyal po chen po khyod kyi lus 'di 'di ltar legs par yongs su bsrungs legs par yongs su btsas pa yang 'chi ba'i dus byed par 'gyur ro/_/yon tan thams cad dang ldan zhing shin tu yun ring por 
[\[82b\]]
[\[82b.1\]]bza' ba dang /_bca' ba dang /_myang ba dang /_ngoms par 'gyur ba/_bsod pa gtsang ma mang pos tshim par byas te bskyed bskyed pa yang tha ma'i mal na 'dug pa'i tshe sman pas bor zhing /_sman dang /_kha zas dang /_bza' ba dang /_thug pas kyang gles la bor nas/_bkres pa dang /_
[\[82b.2\]]skom pas nyen cing yid mi bde bar 'chi ba'i dus byed par 'gyur ro/_/rgyal po chen po 'di ltar khyod kyis lus bkrus shing bskus te/_bdug pas bsgos/_me tog gi dri zhim po bsgos kyang gdon mi za bar dus su rang bzhin gyis lhan cig skyes pa'i dri nga ba 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/
[\[82b.3\]]rgyal po chen po 'di ltar yul ka shi ka'i ras dang /_mon dar dang /_du gu la'i ras dang /_dar dang /_'dab ma dang /_bal gos dang /_sa ras la sogs pa'i gos kyi bye brag gis g.yogs kyang tha ma'i mal na 'dug pa'i tshe snum rnam pa mang po dang /_chus reg cing 
[\[82b.4\]]gos dri ma can gyon cing 'chi ba'i dus byed par 'gyur ro/_/rgyal po chen po de ltar khyod khyim na bud med kyi nang na 'dug btsun mo'i 'khor gyi nang na 'dug ste/_bud med kyi tshogs kyis bskor cing /_gar dang /_glu dang /_rol mo'i sil snyan byed/_pheg rdob pa dang /_
[\[82b.5\]]pi bang dang /_gling bu len/_rnga brdung zhing yid bde bar rtse dga' ste/_dga' mgur spyod pa yang 'chi bas 'jigs skrag nas shin tu yid mi bde zhing 'chi ba'i dus byed par 'gyur ro/_/rgyal po chen po de ltar khyod khyim gyi nang na spos dri zhim po'i bsku bas ni bskus/_
[\[82b.6\]]gtan pa ni bcug_/skar khung ni legs par bcad/_byug pa mang pos ni byugs/_'bru mar dri zhim po dang ldan pa'i mar me ni 'bar/_dar gyi lda ldi mang po ni bres/_me tog dri zhim po'i sil ma mang pos ni chal par bkang /_pog por nas ni bdugs/_khri'i rtsa ba 
[\[82b.7\]]gser dang /_dngul dang /_bai dUr+ya las ni byas/_pa ti ka dang /_dri'u rngog gi stan dang /_stan nang tshangs can dang /_za 'og gi stan dang /_yul ka ling ka pa'i stan dang /_steng du gding ba dang /_de'i steng du gding bas ni bkab/_g.yas g.yon du dar dmar po'i sngas 
[\[83a\]]
[\[83a.1\]]ni bzhag pa'i khri la nyal ba yang bya rog dang /_bya rgod dang /_wa dang /_ro dang /_sha dang /_rus pa dang /_skra dang /_khrag dang /_zhag dang /_chu ser dang /_rnag gi gnas mchog tu 'jigs su rung ba'i dur sa chen por bor nas/_lus g.yo ba med cing sa la nyal du 
[\[83a.2\]]gdon mi za'o/_/rgyal po chen po 'di ltar yang khyod glang po che'i bya la kha'am/_rta'i rgyab bam/_shing rta la zhon te/_dung dang /_rnga dang /_rdza rnga dang /_khar rnga dang /_rol mo sil snyan gyi bye brag len pa dang /_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan dang /_rnam 
[\[83a.3\]]par rgyal ba'i ba dan ni bsgreng /_bsil yab nor bu'i yu ba can dang /_rnga yab dang /_shing ta la las byas pa ni g.yob cing /_glang po che dang /_rta pa dang /_dpung bu chung du ma ni phyi bzhin 'brang /_rgyal bu dang /_bram zes bslab pa phog pa'i blon po dang /_mdun na 'don dang /_skye 
[\[83a.4\]]bo thal mo sbyar ba brgya stong du mas ni phyag bya zhing rgyal bar spyon cig_/rgyal bar spyon cig ces snyan par rjod de phyir 'byung ba yang ring po mi thogs par g.yo ba med cing mal du shi nas mi bzhis bteg ste/_pha dang /_ma dang /_phu nu dang /_sring mo dang /_chung ma dang /_bu pho dang /_bu mo dang /_bran pho dang /_bran 
[\[83a.5\]]mo dang /_las byed pa dang /_zho shas 'tsho ba dang /_tshal za dang /_blon po dang /_grong khyer ba'i skye bo dag mya ngan gyi dbang du song ste/_lag pa btegs nas brang rdung zhing mchog tu snying rje bar kyi hud bu/_kyi hud mgon po/_kyi hud pho bo/_kyi hud jo bo zhes ngu zhing zhabs 
[\[83a.6\]]'bring ba dang /_grong khyer ba'i skye bo dag gis 'jigs pa dang bcas par mthong ste/_grong khyer gyi lho phyogs kyi sgor phyung nas sa'i 'og tu bcug gam/_'brog dgon par sa'i 'og tu bcug kyang rung /_bya rog dang /_bya rgod dang /_wa la sogs pas zos shing rus pa de dag 
[\[83a.7\]]mes bsregs sam/_chur skyur ram/_sa'i 'og tu bcug kyang rlung dang /_nyi ma dang /_char pas phye mar byas te/_phyogs phyogs su 'thor zhing /_de nyid du rul bar 'gyur ro/_/rgyal po chen po de ltar sems can thams cad kyi lus kyang 'di bzhin du 'gyur ro/_/rgyal 
[\[83b\]]
[\[83b.1\]]po chen po 'du byed thams cad ni de ltar mi rtag pa/_de ltar mi brtan pa/_de ltar yid brtan du mi rung ba/_de ltar 'gyur ba'i chos can te/_yun thung ba/_mi gnas pa/_g.yo ba/_'gul ba/_skad cig pa/_mthar sdig pa zad pa dang /_dengs pa'i sgo/_mthar 'gyes pa/_
[\[83b.2\]]'jigs pa dang bcas pa/_gnod pa dang bcas pa/_mya ngan dang 'khrug pa mang ba/_'drul ba/_'brul ba/_'chad pa/_'bye ba/_'thor ba/_rnam par 'jig pa'i chos can no/_/rgyal po chen po de lta bas na mi rtag par blta zhing zad pa dang /_dengs pa'i sgor blta bar bya ste/_
[\[83b.3\]]'dod chags kyis ma chags pa dang /_zhe sdang gis mi sdang ba dang /_gti mug gis ma rmongs pa dang /_rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug gi bde ba la ma chags pa dang /_'dod pa'i bde ba dang /_'dod pa'i longs spyod kyi bde ba la ma chags pa dang /_mi rtag par lta ba dang /_bag yod pa dang /_
[\[83b.4\]]ma chags pa dang /_mi brkam pa dang /_ma zhen pa dang /_ma mos pa dang /_srog snyems pa med par 'chi bas 'jigs skrag par bya'o/_/chos kho nas rgyal srid gyis shig_/chos ma yin pas ni mi bya'o/_/khyod chos dang 'thun par gyis shig_/chos ma yin pa dang 'thun par 
[\[83b.5\]]ni mi bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rgyal po chen po 'dod pa'i rnyed pa dang /_rab tu rnyed pa dang /_sogs pa dang /_kun tu sogs pa dang /_sten pas 'dod pa dag gis ngoms par nga mi smra ste/_gang dag 'phags pa'i shes rab kyis ngoms par 'gyur ba de dag ni ngoms 
[\[83b.6\]]so/_/rgyal po chen po 'di lta ste/_ma rig pa'i rkyen gyis 'du byed rnams/_'du byed kyi rkyen gyis rnam par shes pa/_rnam par shes pa'i rkyen gyis ming dang gzugs/_ming dang gzugs kyi rkyen gyis skye mched drug_/skye mched drug gi rkyen gyis reg pa/_reg pa'i rkyen 
[\[83b.7\]]gyis tshor ba/_tshor ba'i rkyen gyis sred pa/_sred pa'i rkyen gyis len pa/_len pa'i rkyen gyis srid pa/_srid pa'i rkyen gyis skye ba/_skye ba'i rkyen gyis rga shi dang /_mya ngan dang /_smre sngags 'don pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_yid mi bde ba dang /_'khrug pa rnams 'byung bar 
[\[84a\]]
[\[84a.1\]]'gyur te/_de ltar sdug bsngal gyi phung po chen po 'ba' zhig 'di yang 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/de la ma rig pa 'gags pas 'du byed 'gag_/'du byed 'gags pas rnam par shes pa 'gag_/rnam par shes pa 'gags pas ming dang gzugs 'gag_/ming 
[\[84a.2\]]dang gzugs 'gags pas skye mched drug 'gag_/skye mched drug 'gags pas reg pa 'gag_/reg pa 'gags pas tshor ba 'gag_/tshor ba 'gags pas sred pa 'gag_/sred pa 'gags pas len pa 'gag_/len pa 'gags pas srid pa 'gag_/srid pa 'gags pas skye ba 
[\[84a.3\]]'gag_/skye ba 'gags pas rga shi dang /_mya ngan dang /_smre sngags 'don pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_yid mi bde ba dang /_'khrug pa rnams 'gag par 'gyur te/_de ltar sdug bsngal gyi phung po chen po 'ba' zhig 'di yang 'gag par 'gyur ro/_/rgyal po chen po 
[\[84a.4\]]de lta bas na/_'dod chags kyis ma chags pa dang /_zhe sdang gis mi sdang ba dang /_gti mug gis ma rmongs pa dang /_rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug dang /_dbang gi dregs pa med par chos kho nas rgyal srid gyis shig_/chos ma yin pas ni mi bya'o/_/khyod chos dang 'thun par gyis 
[\[84a.5\]]shig_/chos ma yin pa dang 'thun par ni mi bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rgyal po chen po 'dod pa rnams kyi rnyed pa dang /_rab tu rnyed pa dang /_ngoms par mi 'gyur ba'i bar dung smra ste/_rab tu ngoms par mi 'gyur ro/_/zhes nga smra'o/_/gang dag 'phags pa'i shes rab kyis ngoms 
[\[84a.6\]]par gyur pa de dag ni ngoms so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to/_/mi nyid 'di ni 'gro bar 'gyur/_/'chi bdag rab tu mi bzad 'ong /_/khyod kyi tshe 'di mi brtan gyis/_/rgyal po bag med ma byed cig_/nor ni gtang gi lus ni 
[\[84a.7\]]bsrung bar bya/_/yan lag gtang gi srog ni bsrung bar bya/_/nor dang yan lag rnams dang de bzhin srog_/thams cad gtang gi 'dir ni chos bsrung ngo /_/chos spyod pa ni chos la srung bar byed/_/dper na dbyar dus gdugs chen bsrung ba bzhin/_/chos spyod pa yi phan yon 'di 
[\[84b\]]
[\[84b.1\]]yin te/_/chos spyod pa ni ngan 'gror mi 'gro'o/_/chos ma yin pa spyod cing bag med pa/_/'di nas shi 'phos ngan 'gro mi bzad 'gro/_/gang du gnas na 'chi bas mi tshugs pa/_/sa phyogs de ni yod pa ma yin te/_/bar snang ma yin rgya mtsho'i nang ma yin/_/ri yi phug tu zhugs 
[\[84b.2\]]kyang mi phan no/_/'chi bas 'jigs pa chen po de dag ni/_/phung po 'jig cing srog 'gag shes gyis la/_/'chi med thob par khyod ni mos par gyis/_/mya ngan 'das thob phyin chad 'chi mi 'gyur/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_yul ko sa la'i 
[\[84b.3\]]rgyal po gsal rgyal dang /_srog chags brgyad khri bzhi stong po de dag dang /_lha dang /_mi dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/_/'phags pa rgyal po la gdams 
[\[84b.4\]]pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/_rdzogs so//_//rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang /_shI len+d+ra bo d+hi dang /_zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te/_skad gsar chad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa//_//
[\[84b.5\]{D222}]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_Ar+ya ma hA b+he rI hA ra ka pa ri brta nA ma ma hA ya na sU tra/_bod skad du/_'phags pa rnga bo che chen po'i le'u zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/_bam po dang po/_sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di 
[\[84b.6\]]skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po stong nyis brgya lnga bcu dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/_byang chub sems dpa' brgya stong mang po dag dang thabs cig go/_/lha dang /_klu 
[\[84b.7\]]dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za mang po dang yang thabs cig go/_/dge bsnyen dang /_dge bsnyen ma brgya stong mang po dang yang thabs cig go/_/mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang /_lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin dang /_'jig rten skyong ba bzhi dag dang yang thabs cig go/_/'di 
[\[85a\]]
[\[85a.1\]]lta ste/_phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams nas 'dus pa'i dge slong dang /_dge slong ma dang /_dge bsnyen dang /_dge bsnyen ma byang chub sems dpa' du ma dang yang thabs cig go/_/de na de bzhin gshegs pa chos ston pa ni 'di lta ste/_'khor bzhi po rnams kyi 
[\[85a.2\]]nang du 'di lta bu'i chos kyi gtam/_srid yod bde dang sdug bsngal te/_/zad dang gtan yod ma yin no/_/de ltas bde sdug spangs pa'i phyir/_/mya ngan 'das pa mchog tu bde/_/zhes ston par mdzad do/_/'dir smras pa/_ci'i phyir bcom ldan 'das la de bzhin gshegs 
[\[85a.3\]]pa dge slong lnga brgya tsam dang thabs cig tu bzhugs so zhes bya ba de'i gtan tshigs brjod par bya ste/_ci'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'khor mang po dang /_'khor mang po'i gtso bo dang ldan pa/_'khor rtag tu mi phyed 
[\[85a.4\]]pa/_rmad du byung ba'i chos dang cho 'phrul mang po mnga' ba'o zhes sgra grags/_gal te de lta na ni 'khor lnga brgyar mi zad na/_bcom ldan 'das 'khor bye ba can du 'gyur ro/_/yang 'dir smras pa/_'dul ba thams cad la mnga' sgyur ba'i stobs mnga' bas mnyan yod na de bzhin 
[\[85a.5\]]gshegs pa dge slong lnga brgya dang thabs cig tu bzhugs so/_/zhes tshig tu gsungs pa/_ci dper na mas bu khur du thogs te rang gi yul nas yul gzhan du 'gro ba na rang gi bu spro bsring ba'i phyir bu grong 'di nye'o zhes bya ba'i tshig smra ba de bzhin du/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'gro 
[\[85a.6\]]ba rjes su srung ba rnams dge slong lnga brgya tsam dang thabs cig go zhes bya ba yin nam zhe na/_de dag la smras pa/_dge slong dag chos kyi gtam 'di ni lan gsum du bzlas pa yin te/_de bas na dge slong lnga brgya tsam zhes bya ba de dag ni skyes bu'i gtso bo rnams yin par rig par bya ste/_don 
[\[85a.7\]]gzhan ni ma yin no/_/dper na khyu mchog re re la yang ba lang gi tshogs yod pa bzhin du skyes bu'i gtso bo la yang slob ma lnga brgya yod de/_re re la yang slob ma lnga brgya lnga brgya yod do/_/de lta bas na nyan thos chen po lnga brgya tsam zhes bya ste/_'di lta ste/_'od srung chen po dang /_
[\[85b\]]
[\[85b.1\]]de bzhin du kun dga' bo la sogs pa nyan thos chen po lnga brgya tsam po thams cad kyang dgra bcom pa zag pa zad pa/_nyon mongs pa med pa/_dbang du gyur pa/_glang po chen po/_cang shes pa/_sems shin tu rnam par grol ba/_shes rab shin tu rnam par grol ba/_bya ba byas pa/_
[\[85b.2\]]byed pa byas pa/_khur bor ba/_bdag gi don rjes su thob pa/_srid par kun tu sbyor ba yongs su zad pa/_yang dag pa'i shes pas sems shin tu rnam par grol ba/_sems kyi dbang thams cad kyi dam pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rjes su thob pa/_mi slob pa rnams dang /_slob pa rgyun du 
[\[85b.3\]]zhugs pa dang /_lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la gnas pa la sogs pa dpag tu med pa rnams dang zag pa zad pa'i chos can gyi dge slong gi tshogs du ma dag dang /_yon tan brgya stong dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po grangs med cing 
[\[85b.4\]]dpag tu med pa/_phyogs bcu nas lhags pa gang yin pa de dag gi tshad kyang 'jam dpal ma gtogs pa rtsis mkhan nam/_rtsis mkhan gyi slob mas kyang bgrang bar mi nus shing nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas rnams kyis kyang mi nus pa la/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 
[\[85b.5\]]mthu chen thob pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang /_'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa la sogs pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs tshad med grangs med pa 
[\[85b.6\]]dper na shing chen po snad pa'i shing shun rnams 'byung ba de bzhin du sa chen po 'di shun pa bzhin du brtul ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshad med cing grangs med pa gang yin pa de dag gi tshad kyang rtsis mkhan nam/_rtsis mkhan gyi sna chen po la gtogs pa rnams kyis kyang 
[\[85b.7\]]brjod par mi nus pa lhags pa rnams dang /_sring mo'i tshogs dge slong ma des ma la sogs pa dang /[ {]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]'dzin gyi ma sa ga dang /_btsun mo phreng ldan ma la sogs te/_dge bsnyen ma du ma dang /_khyim bdag bzang sbyin la sogs pa dge bsnyen du ma dag ste/_bcom 
[\[86a\]]
[\[86a.1\]]ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'khor mang po de dag thams cad kyi gung la bzhugs nas bcom ldan 'das chos kyi sgo ston to/_/de nas de'i tshe yul ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal rang gi mal nas langs te bsams pa/_bdag bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'gro bar 
[\[86a.2\]]bya'o snyam nas de nas de rang gi mal nas langs pa dang rgyal po gshegs so zhes rnga bo che chen po dag ni rdung /_dung dag ni 'bud/_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan mang po bsgreng ba dag ni nam mkha' la nyi ma'i 'od bzhin du kun du snang ngo /_/bcom ldan 'das ni mkhyen bzhin du rmed pa 
[\[86a.3\]]yin pas de nas de na bcom ldan 'das kyis kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo rnga bo che chen po dag gi sgra dang /_dung dag gi sgra grag pa 'di ci zhig_/kun dga' bos gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das sa skyong ba'i rgyal po gsal rgyal dam pa 'dir mchis te/_de'i 
[\[86a.4\]]rnga bo che dag brdungs pa'i sgra chen po 'byin pa lags so/_/bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo ci'i phyir rnga bo che'i sgra 'byin/_gsol pa/_rgyal po shAkya'i mgon po blta zhing mchi ba des rang gi dpung la bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'deng gis chos shig ces go bar bgyid pa 
[\[86a.5\]]lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo khyod kyis kyang chos kyi rnga bo che brdungs la chos kyi dung bus shig dang /_ngas de nas rnga bo che chen po zhes bya ba'i chos kyi mdo bshad do/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das bdag gi rnga bo che chen po zhes bgyi ba'i 
[\[86a.6\]]mdo sngon nam yang ma thos lags na rnga bo che chen po zhes bgyi ba'i chos de ci lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo ci khyod kyis shes par 'gyur snyama'am/_re zhig phyogs bcu nas lhags pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di dag 
[\[86a.7\]]thams cad kyis kyang 'di ltar rnga bo che chen po'i mdo yig 'bru bzhi tsam yang mi shes na/_khyod kyis lta sngon ma thos pa ji ltar shes/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das chos 'di de ltar rnyed dka' ba ni ngo mtshar che lags so/_/de bzhin gshegs pas bka' stsal pa/_kun 
[\[86b\]]
[\[86b.1\]]dga' bo mdo 'di ni shin tu rnyed par dka' ste/_kun dga' bo rnga bo che chen po'i mdo chen po 'di ni 'di lta ste dper na/_'jig rten na me tog u dum ba ra rnyed pa bzhin no/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ci lags/_'di sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyi chos nyid ma 
[\[86b.2\]]lags sam/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_'di ni 'das pa dang /_ma byon pa dang /_da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi yang chos nyid yin no/_/gsol pa/_gal te 'di sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyi chos nyid lags na 
[\[86b.3\]]ci'i slad du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dang de dag tu ma bshad cing rab tu ma bstan la/_ci'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi mchog 'di dag 'dir mchis lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_
[\[86b.4\]]kun dga' bo dper na 'di na dge slong dgon pa pa 'ga' zhig_/ri bo'am/_'bab chu'i 'gram 'am/_phug cig na 'dug 'dug pa las nam nangs nas grong ngam/_grong khyer zhig tu bsod snyoms kyi phyir song na des sbrul lam/_khyi'am/_mi shi ba'i ro'am/_shi 
[\[86b.5\]]ba'i ro gang yang rung ba mthong ngo /_/des de mthong nas e ma'o kyi hud e ma'o kyi hud bdag kyang yun ring por 'khor bar 'khor ba na/_'di lta bu'i gnas skabs dag nyams su myong bar gyur pas da srid pa ni tha chad yin no zhes bya bar gyur to/_/de nas de dus gzhan zhig na snying 
[\[86b.6\]]dga' bar 'gyur ba'i chos 'ga' zhig gis yid bde ba dang /_de nas yang mi sems pa las yang des ro mthong ste/_de mthong ba na de yid byung bar gyur nas de phyir zhing grong khyer ram/_ri 'or ram/_lung pa'i mdor rgyu zhing /_de de ltar rgyu ba na shi nas zhag gcig lon 
[\[86b.7\]]pa'am/_shi nas zhag gnyis lon pa'am zhes bya ba nas/_mi ro mthong na zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du ste/_de mthong ba kho nas 'bras bu'i mchog dgra bcom pa mngon sum du byed pa de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan dag na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams sdug 
[\[87a\]]
[\[87a.1\]]bsngal gyi gtam yang mi gsung /_mi rtag pa'i gtam yang mi gsung /_bdag med pa dang /_mi gtsang ba'i gtam yang mi gsung ngo /_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ni de dag gi chos nyid yin te/_de na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ji snyed bzhugs pa de dag gis 
[\[87a.2\]]dgos pa'i don du ni rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing dag na 'khod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la 'di skad ces rigs kyi bu dag re zhig sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams sems can rnams kyi don du zhing gi snyigs ma snyigs ma lnga can gyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 
[\[87a.3\]]'di 'dra bar 'byung ba ni dka' ba mdzad pa yin te/_de lta bas na rigs kyi bu dag khyod kyis kyang de ltar bslab par bya'o zhes rab tu 'jog par mdzad/_'doms par mdzad do/_/de nas de dag lta 'dod cing phyag byed par 'dod par 'gyur te/_de dag lta 'dod cing phyag byed par 
[\[87a.4\]]'dod pa na de dag gis de rnams nye bar bstan pas de'i phyir de dag mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir 'ong bar 'gyur zhing 'ongs nas kha cig ni sa dang po thob par 'gyur/_kha cig gis ni sa bdun pa dang /_brgyad pa dang /_dgu pa dang /_bcu pa'i bar dag kyang thob par 'gyur 
[\[87a.5\]]ro/_/kun dga' bo de lta bas na rnga bo che chen po zhes bya ba'i mdo 'di ni shin tu rnyed par dka' ba yin te/_phyogs bcu nas lhags pa'i 'khor 'di dag thams cad nyan par 'dod pa yang de'i phyir ro/_/kun dga' bos gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das legs so/_/thams cad lhags pa 
[\[87a.6\]]legs so lhags pa legs so/_/'di dag thams cad kyis shin tu rnyed par dka' ba'i mdo 'di 'dra ba thob par gyur cig_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo thams cad kyi thun mong ltar mdo 'di thun mong ma yin pas lhags pa legs so zhes tshig tu ma brjod 
[\[87a.7\]]cig_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du thams cad lhags pa legs so/_/lhags pa legs sa zhes mi bgyi ba lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo mdo 'di ni zab cing rtogs par dka' ba/_yid ches shing dad par dka' ba/_
[\[87b\]]
[\[87b.1\]]sangs rgyas kyi gsang ba yin te/_kun dga' bo de'i phyir 'ongs pa dang ma 'ongs pa thams cad la lhags pa legs so lhags pa legs so zhes tshig tu ma brjod cig_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ci lags/_yul ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal g.yul 'gyed pa'i dus su rnga bo 
[\[87b.2\]]che'i sgra 'byin pa dang /_khar dkrol rdebs pa de'i tshe dpung gi tshogs thams cad kyi ma lags sam/_ci lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo rnga bo che de nyid gang gi tshe yul ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal pha rol gyi dpung dang lhan cig g.yul 'gyed pa 
[\[87b.3\]]de'i dus su ji tsam na rnga bo che'i sgra byung ba de'i tshe sems can mang po dag ni thos nas dga' bar mi 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_sems can sdar ma'i rigs can gzhan dag ni sgra de thos na de nyid kyis de dag 'chi ba'am/_'chi ba la thug pa'i sdug bsngal skye bar 'gyur ro/_/kun 
[\[87b.4\]]dga' bo de'i phyir rnga bo che chen po zhes bya ba'i mdo 'di ni kun dga' bo khyod kyis kyang mi shes so/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kun dga' bo chos kyi sgo'i mdo 'di la ni nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa can rnams yid ches par mi 'gyur ro/_/kun dga' bo de lta bas na rgyu des 
[\[87b.5\]]na gang gi tshe yul ko sa la'i rgyal po g.yul 'gyed pa'i dus su rgyal po rnga bo che'i sgra 'byin pa ji lta ba de bzhin du rnga bo che chen po'i mdo 'di yang sangs rgyas kyi gsang ba yin te/_sangs rgyas pa'i dus su gsung bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas de na bcom ldan 'das kyis gnas brtan 'od srung chen po 
[\[87b.6\]]la bos te/_bos nas 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/'od srung ci dge slong 'di dag dad pa can tshul dang 'thun pa/_mthu dang ldan pa yin nam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de'i don ci lags/_bka' stsal pa/_'od srung sems can sbun pa lta bu ma yin pa de dag rnga 
[\[87b.7\]]bo che chen po zhes bya ba'i mdo 'di nyan par 'gyur ro/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de'i slad du gnas brtan maud gal gyi bu chen po yang rang la smod par bgyid cing /_bcom ldan 'das ji ltar bdag kyang gal te de 'dra ba'i dge slong dag mchis na de dag gi nang du mchis pa ma 
[\[88a\]]
[\[88a.1\]]lags na de bzhin gshegs pa bzhugs pa lta ci smos te/_dge slong tshul khrims 'chal pa dang /_tshul khrims dang mi ldan pa gang lags pa de dag ni ma mchis lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das 'khor 'di thams cad ni tshul khrims bsrung ba/_tshul dang 'thun pa 
[\[88a.2\]]lags te/_'khor gyi dkyil 'khor na de dag ni tsan dan gyi snying po 'dra ba sha stag lags so/_/bka' stsal pa/_'od srung 'khor 'di thams cad tshul khrims bsrungs pa/_tshul dang 'thun pa yin yang ci dgongs pa'i tshig la mkhas pa yin nam/_gsol pa/_
[\[88a.3\]]bcom ldan 'das dgongs pa'i tshig ces bgyi ba ci lags/_bka' stsal pa/_'od srung dgongs pa'i tshig ces bya ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bya ba da ltar 'di las de bzhin gshegs pa rtag pa/_brtan pa/_zhi ba/_ther zug pa/_
[\[88a.4\]]yongs su mya ngan las 'das kyang nyams par mi 'gyur ba zhes bya ba ste/_mdo 'di ni dgongs pa'i tshig ces bya'o/_/'od srung mi 'thun pa'i mdo dag pa 'od gsal ba 'di ni sems can dman pa rnams kyis rgyu dang gtan tshigs brgya stong gis rig par bya dgos so/_/'od 
[\[88a.5\]]srung de lta bas na yang khyod kyis re zhig 'khor 'di rtogs shig_/de nas de'i tshe gnas brtan 'od srung chen pos sems can lhags pa 'di dag ci 'dra ba zhig yin par bltas so/_/de nas skad cig de nyid la rgya chen po ma yin pa'i sems can rnams dang /_nyan thos dang /_
[\[88a.6\]]rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa can rnams dang /_byang chub sems dpa' theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa gang yin pa de dag thams cad rang rang la smod par byed de/_dper na gyad kyi tshogs chen por rgyal po'i gyad stong thub pa zhig stan las langs te/_'di na kho bo dang lhan cig 'gyed par 
[\[88a.7\]]'os pa'i rgol phod pa gang yin pa de su yod ces dril bsgrags pa dang /_de nas de na rgol bar ma 'os pa'i sems can gang yin pa de dag thams cad ni bdag cag gsod par 'gyur gyis 'di dang lhan cig bdag cag 'gyed par mi nus so zhes rang gis rang la smad nas cang mi smra bar 
[\[88b\]]
[\[88b.1\]]'gyur ro/_/de nas gal te des der gyad kyi zla 'ga' yang ma rnyed na de de na dpa' bo gyad zla med du gyur cing ru mtshon 'dzugs pa de bzhin du de na rgyal po ma yin pa'i sems can nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa can rnams dang /_theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems 
[\[88b.2\]]dpa' gang yin pa rnams kyang bdag cag ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams yongs su mya ngan las 'das bzhin du yang nga ni rtag pa brtan pa zhi ba ther zug pa yin no zhes ston pa 'di ni rtogs par mi nus so zhes 'dor bar byed do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de dag ni yun ring por ston pa nyid 
[\[88b.3\]]kyi lta ba nyams par byed pa'i lta ba bsgoms pa'i bdag nyid yin pa'i phyir te/_dman pa'i sems can rnams kyis mdo dag pa 'di thos nas dong ngo /_/phyogs bcu de dang de dag nas lhags pa'i nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa can dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa la 
[\[88b.4\]]gsar du zhugs pa gang dang gang dag yin pa de dang de dag dang lhan cig tu gang dang gang dag lhags pa de dag las kyang bcu'i cha'i cha dang /_brgya'i cha'i cha dang /_stong gi cha'i cha dang /_brgya stong gi cha'i cha dang /_bye ba'i cha'i cha dang /_grangs med pa'i cha'i cha gang yin pa dag 
[\[88b.5\]]'dus par gyur to/_/de la tsan dan gyi snying po 'dra ba sbun pa lta bu ma yin pa'i dge bsnyen ci 'dra ba dag 'dug par gyur ce na/_bslab pa'i gzhi lnga dang ldan pa dang /_bslab pa'i gzhi brgyad dang ldan pa dang /_gsum 'don pa dang /_bcu bzhi'i dang /[ {]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga'i zhes bya ba 
[\[88b.6\]]nas zla ba phyed kyi dang /_tshes brgyad kyi dang /_cho 'phrul gyi zla ba phyed kyi bar gyi yan lag brgyad legs par blangs pa sbyin pa dang /_snyan par smra ba dang /_don spyod pa dang /_don 'thun pa can gal te mu ge lo bcu'am/_bcu gnyis sam/_gzhan yang lo mang po 
[\[88b.7\]]byung yang bdag gis bza' ba'am/_bldag pa'am/_zas sam/_btung ba rang gi skal ba de las bdag gis pha dang ma gnyis la phyed phyed/_dge slong rnams la phyed 'bul zhing bdag gis dge slong rnams la mchod yon gyi sbyin pa dor bar mi bya'o snyam pa ste/_rigs 
[\[89a\]]
[\[89a.1\]]kyi bu de'i dus ngan pa la rtag par skal ba gang yin pa de ji tsam zhig yod par 'gyur zhe na/_skyes bu dpa' bo de'i zla ba phyed kyis za ma gcig cig 'byung ste/_des za ma gcig po yang dge slong rnams la byin nas bsod nams mi zad pa'i skal ba can du 'gyur ro/_/skyes 
[\[89a.2\]]bus de ltar byin nas 'jig rten du/_/skyes bu dam par 'gyur bas legs 'dod mis/_/'di na bdag nyid bag med ci bya ste/_/de bas bstan la bag byed mchog yin no/_/nor ni dgra dang chom rkun sogs mang dang /_/rgyal po chu dang me dang mdza' bshes dang /_/nye du mi mdzad 
[\[89a.3\]]bgo skal spyod mang gis/_/sdig pa spyad pa yis ni zad par 'gyur/_/rang dang rang gi longs spyod dag la yang /_/spyod par byed pa skyes bu rnams kyi nor/_/spyad pa nyid dang gnod pa gzhan gyis kyang /_/zad par mi 'gyur shes bya dam chos phyir/_/'di zad byas mchog pha rol zad mi 
[\[89a.4\]]'gyur/_/'jig rten 'dir 'phel 'jig rten pha rol du/_/zad par mi 'gyur kha dog mthur bcas byed/_/mthong na thams cad dga' zhing rnyed pa dang /_/mdog dang grags pa rab tu gsal bar 'gyur/_/de yi phyugs rnams zad par mi 'gyur zhing /_/de yi bran pho bran mo las byed dang /_/
[\[89a.5\]]las kyi mtha' rnams nyams par mi 'gyur te/_/de la thab mo rtsod dang 'gyed med cing /_/de ni nam yang gnod sems med mchog thob/_/sbyin la dga' ba'i skye bo 'jig rten du/_/de la sogs pa'i yon tan 'thob 'gyur bas/_/de lta bas na rtag tu chos 'dod pa/_/sangs rgyas rnams 
[\[89a.6\]]dang lhan cig phrad par 'gyur/_/lus dang srog la mi blta lhug par gtong /_/mi yi mi mchog de ni lag rkyong yin/_/sems can kun la rjes su snying brtse bas/_/bu bzhin mthong na sdug cing rig par ldan/_/bsam gtan bag yod thos pas dpag tu med/_/khyim na gnas 
[\[89a.7\]]pa'i shes rab can gyis ni/_/rtag tu de ltar bya dgos de dag gi_/dpe ni de 'dra mang du yod pa yin/_/yang de'i tshe na dge bsnyen ma ci 'dra ba dag cig 'dug ce na/_ji tsam khwa ma langs pa de tsam nas rang gis phyags ma blangs te/_rang gi nyen kor 'phyag cing ba'i lci ba'i byug pas sa 
[\[89b\]]
[\[89b.1\]]gzhi byugs pas/_sa rgyan gyis mdzes par byed pa'i legs par bya ba byed pa yin/_des der bsod snyoms pa rab tu mang po 'ongs par shes na rang gi lag gis bza' ba dang /_btung ba gya nom pa legs par rgyun tu stobs par byed cing de dag dang bdag grong rdal lam/_grong khyer ram/_
[\[89b.2\]]grong dag tu yang phrad cing 'grogs par gyur cig_/bdag nam yang yul mtha' 'khob tu skye ba dang /_dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang skol bar dus ston bzhi byed par ma gyur cig_/bdag sbyin pa dang /_tshul khrims spyad pa dang /_nyan pa dang /_bdag chos kyi gtam la rtag tu 
[\[89b.3\]]spyod par gyur cig ces de lta bu'i yon tan phun sum tshogs pa'i sring mo dge bsnyen ma yid rnam par dag pa ste/_de lta bu ni dge bsnyen ma'i yon tan dag yin no/_/de la dge slong dang dge slong ma ci 'dra ba dag cig ce na/_dul ba/_zhi ba/_bag tsha ba med pa/_zag pa zad pa/_
[\[89b.4\]]tha ma'i lus 'dzin pa/_tsan dan gyi snying po 'dra ba'i 'khor dag go/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ci 'dra ba dag cig ce na/_thams cad kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos 'dod pa/_thams cad kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po'i mdo sde 'dzin pa/_
[\[89b.5\]]thams cad kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po phan pa ston pa/_thams cad kyang sangs rgyas rtag pa nyid 'dod pa/_thams cad kyang dgongs pa'i tshig la byang ba/_thams cad kyang nges pa'i don gyi mdo sde ston pa/_sran thub pa/_thams cad kyang tshul khrims 'chal pa rnams 
[\[89b.6\]]tshar gcod cing phan 'dogs par zhugs pa des pa rnams la mchog tu gus pa/_theg pa chen po la dad pa chen po thob pa/_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la ya mtshan du mi 'dzin pa/_'di lta bu'i mdo sde rgya chen po mchog bor nas mdo sde gzhan mi sgrogs pa'i shes rab can/_
[\[89b.7\]]gang du sangs rgyas rtag pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po yod do zhes bstan pa gzhan yang sgrogs shing mi spong ba/_brtan pa/_'jig tshogs la lta bas stong pa stong pa ma yin gyi/_'dus byas thams cad rang bzhin gyis stong pa/_ther zug mchog gi gzhi de 'dod pa de lta bu la sogs pa'i yon 
[\[90a\]]
[\[90a.1\]]tan la brten pa dag ste/_yon tan lhag ma ni bsam gyis mi khyab bo/_/'od srung de lta bas na khyod kyis lan gnyis lan gsum du yang 'khor sol cig_/de nas gnas brtan 'od srung chen pos lan gnyis lan gsum gyi bar du yang bltas shing brtags te bsal 
[\[90a.2\]]na sbun pa lta bu'i skyes bu lhag ma'i 'khor dag yod par 'gyur ro/_/yang lan gsum gyi bar du bsal bas bsal ba na skyes bu sbun pa lta bu ma yin pa sha stag tu gyur to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yang gnas brtan 'od srung chen po la bka' stsal pa/_'od srung da 'khor 'di dag 
[\[90a.3\]]dag pa snying por gyur pa yin mod/_yang bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_'od srung 'khor 'di legs par sbyangs pa legs so legs so/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ji ltar 'khor yongs su sbyangs pa lags/_ston ka'i zla ba nya ba la rnam par dag pa bzhin no/_/
[\[90a.4\]]'od srung 'di lta ste dper na/_rtsis mkhan nam/_rtsis mkhan gyi slob mas/_sngon gyi sdom pas bsdams pa la 'god pa'i chas phrin lhag ma gang yin pa de 'dug pa ji lta ba de bzhin du 'khor lhags pa gang yin pa 'di dag thams cad ces bya ba nas grangs med pa dpag tu med pa zhes 
[\[90a.5\]]bya ba'i bar snga ma bzhin no/_/'od srung de dag las bye ba brgya stong gi cha'i cha gang dag yin pa ni mi mchog bag tsha ba med pa'i 'khor 'dug pa 'di dag yin gyis 'od srung da yang khyod kyis 'khor rnams la grogs po dag ci khyed cag rnga bo che chen po zhes bya ba'i mdo chen po yangs pa theg pa 
[\[90a.6\]]gcig pa 'di lta ste/_theg pa chen po dad par dka' ba/_yid ches par dka' ba 'di mnyan par nus sam zhes dris shig_/'od srung de bzhin du khyod kyis lan gnyis lan gsum du yang 'khor rnams la dris shig_/bcom ldan 'das legs so zhes gsol nas/_
[\[90a.7\]]de nas gnas brtan 'od srung chen po stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la spyi bos phyag 'tshal nas langs te lan gsum du bskor ba byas nas 'khor mang po de la smras pa/_shes ldan dag 
[\[90b\]]
[\[90b.1\]]ci rnga bo che chen po zhes bya ba'i mdo nyan pa'i 'os yin nam/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i theg pa chen po gcig pa 'di lta ste/_theg pa chen po nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yul las 'das pa de khyod la ston par 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du gnas brtan 'od srung chen 
[\[90b.2\]]pos lan gnyis lan gsum du yang skul ba bskul ba dang /_de rnams kyis smras pa/_btsun pa 'od srung bdag cag dam pa'i chos mnyan pa'i ched du mchis lags pas nyan par 'tshal gyis/_btsun pa 'od srung de bzhin gshegs pas bdag cag la thugs brtse bas nye 
[\[90b.3\]]bar bzung ste/_mdo chen po de legs par bsgrags pa mdzad du gsol/_'od srung chen pos smras pa/_ji ltar yid ches par 'gyur/_de dag gis smras pa/_btsun pa 'od srung dper na skyes bu btsas nas lo nyi shu lon pa zhig la bu lo brgya lon pa dag yod do zhes 
[\[90b.4\]]smras pa la gal te de bzhin gshegs pa de kho na bzhin du gsung na/_bdag cag gis kyang de bzhin du yid ches par bgyi lags na btsun pa 'od srung dam pa'i chos mnyan pa lta smos kyang ci 'tshal/_de ci'i slad du zhe na/_de bzhin gshegs pa ni ci gsung ba de bzhin du mdzad 
[\[90b.5\]]pa/_de bzhin gshegs pa ni kun nas spyan mnga' ba/_de bzhin gshegs pa ni sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis gzigs pa yin no/_/btsun pa 'od srung gzhan yang bdag cag ni de bzhin gshegs pas mkhyen to/_/smras pa/_shes ldan dag khyed cag ni rnga bo che chen po'i mdo chen 
[\[90b.6\]]po mnyan pa dang /_bklag pa dang /_gzung ba dang /_bstan pa'i 'os yin no/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_'od srung 'di ni ji ltar skyes bu btsas nas lo nyi shu lon pa'i bu lo brgya lon pa dag ltar rnga bo che chen po'i mdo 'di yang de dang 'dra'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de 
[\[90b.7\]]bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das bzhin du da dung du gnas so zhes bya ba dang /_bdag yod pa ma yin zhing bdag gi yod pa ma yin pa dag la yang bdag ces bya bas so/_/de dag gis gsol pa/_de ni bcom ldan 'das kho nas mkhyen pas bcom ldan 'das kyis ji skad 
[\[91a\]]
[\[91a.1\]]gsungs pa de bzhin du gzung bar bgyi lags so/_/'od srung gis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pas da ni rnga bo che chen po'i mdo chen po bshad du gsol/_bcom ldan 'das kyis chos kyi rnga bo che brdung du gsol/_bcom ldan 'das kyis 
[\[91a.2\]]chos kyi dung bud du gsol/_bka' stsal pa/_'od srung legs so legs so/_/'od srung da ni khyod rnga bo che chen po'i mdo chen po 'di nyon cig_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis mnyan par bgyi lags so/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das gal te bdag gi spyod 
[\[91a.3\]]yul du ma gyur kyang de bzhin gshegs pas bdag rnga bo che chen po'i slad du bdag la gus par mdzad lags pas so/_/yang gsol pa/_ji ltar lags zhe na bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la 'di skad ces 'od srung khyod nga dang lhan cig 'dug gis tshur shog ces gsungs te/_
[\[91a.4\]]bcom ldan 'das bdag ni don de'i slad du bgyis pa gzo bar bgyis pa tshor bar 'tshal lo/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_'od srung legs so legs so/_/ngas kyang don 'di'i phyir gsungs so/_/'od srung dper na rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis glang po che dang /_
[\[91a.5\]]rta dang /_dmag mi rnams kha zas dang /_bza' ba dang /_btung ba dang /_bldag pa la sogs pas gsor 'jug go/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_gang gi tshe bdag rnga bo che dang /_rdza rnga dang /_dung gi sgra shin tu chen po 'byin pa dang /_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba 
[\[91a.6\]]dan dag bsgreng ba dang /_gang gi tshe pha rol gyi dpung gi tshogs chen po nye bar gnas par gyur pa de'i tshe/_bdag gis gsor bcug pa'i phan yon rjes su dran nas pha rol gyi dmag tshogs dang lhan cig g.yul 'gyed par 'gyur zhing de'i tshe sems can rnams la yang phan pa 
[\[91a.7\]]byed par 'gyur/_bdag gi bka' la yang phan pa byed par 'gyur ro snyam ste/_de dag kyang de bzhin du 'gyur ro/_/'od srung de bzhin du nga yongs su mya ngan las 'das na yang khyod kyis rnga bo che chen po'i mdo 'di 'byin par 'gyur ro zhes ngas khyod la stan gyi phyed 
[\[91b\]]
[\[91b.1\]]bstabs pa yin gyis nges pa kho nar de bzhin du gyis shig_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das bdag ni khyod kyi thugs las skyes pa'i sras kyi thu bor gzhag pa'i rigs lags so/_/bka' stsal pa/_'od srung dper na ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal rang gi bu rnams la 
[\[91b.2\]]'di dag ni ma 'ongs pa'i dus na bdag gi rigs 'tshob par 'gyur ro zhes bstan bcos sna tshogs dang /_bzo'i gnas rnams la sbyong bar byed pa de bzhin du 'od srung khyod kyang nga 'das nas mdo 'di 'byin par 'gyur ro/_/'od srung dper na ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal rgyal po mang 
[\[91b.3\]]pos bsngos nas de rnams dang lhan cig g.yul 'gyed pa de dang de'i dus kyi dmag mi glang po che ba dang /_rta pa dang /_dpung bu chung gang dag yin pa las go cha bzang po bgos shing rnga bo che chen po dang /_dung gi sgra thos na mi dngang mi skrag cing bred par mi 'gyur ba gang yin pa de dag la ni 
[\[91b.4\]]rgyal pos bza' ba dang /_bca' ba dang /_zas dang /_skom dang /_gos dang /_rgyan dang /_lhab lhub dang /_chas dag sbyin par byed do/_/de las gzhan pa g.yul ngor zhugs nas g.yul 'gyed pa'i dmag mi gang yin pa de dag la ni gser dang /_nor bu dang /_mu tig 
[\[91b.5\]]la sogs pa dang /_grong rdal dang /_yul rnams sbyin par byed do/_/de na skyes bu dpa' bo sde dang bcas par phyir mi ldog pa/_glang po che ba dang /_rta pa dang /_shing rta pa dang ldan pas dgra'i dpung pham par byed pa gang yin pa de dag ni rgyal po rang gis rig par byas nas rgyal tshab tu 
[\[91b.6\]]dbang bskur ba'i cod pan bcing bar byed do/_/'od srung de bzhin du nga'i nyan thos dge slong dang /_dge slong ma dang /_dge bsnyen dang /_dge bsnyen ma la bslab pa legs par ji ltar bcas pa la legs par bslabs pa gang yin pa de dag dang /_so sor thar pa'i sdom pas bsdams pa 
[\[91b.7\]]dang /_'dul ba'i cho ga dang /_spyod yul la gnas pa de dag la ni de bzhin gshegs pas lha dang mi'i bde ba sbyin par mdzad do/_/de las gzhan pas phung po'i bdud dang /_nyon mongs pa'i bdud dang /_'chi bdag gi bdud dang /_lha'i bu'i bdud pham par byed pa gang yin pa de 
[\[92a\]]
[\[92a.1\]]dag la ni de bzhin gshegs pas 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi'i rnam par grol ba'i cod pan 'ching bar mdzad do/_/de las gzhan pa'i rgya chen po la lhag par mos pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po'i che ba'i bdag nyid rtag pa dang /_brtan pa dang /_zhi ba dang /_ther zug pa 
[\[92a.2\]]'dod pa'i sems can gang yin pa de dag la ni de bzhin gshegs pas rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes theg pa chen po dbang bskur ba'i cod pan 'ching bar mdzad do/_/'od srung de bzhin du khyod kyang de ring theg pa chen po'i dbang bskur ba'i cod pan bcings te/_
[\[92a.3\]]sangs rgyas brgya stong phrag mang po'i spyan snga nas rnga bo che chen po'i mdo 'di 'byin par 'gyur ro/_/de lta bas na 'od srung khyod kyis kyang da ni nga 'das nas mdo 'di 'byung ba'i rigs so/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das re zhig bdag gis rig par lta rngo mi thogs kyang bcom ldan 'das re 
[\[92a.4\]]zhig de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das sam bzhugs kyang bdag gis phyung nas bstan par bgyi lags so/_/bka' stsal pa/_'od srung legs so/_/da ni de bzhin gshegs pas rnga bo che chen po zhes bya ba'i mdo chen po bshad pa brtsam mo/_/de nas nam mkha' 
[\[92a.5\]]las lha'i tshogs dang /_'brug gi tshogs kyis legs so zhes bya ba byin te/_'od srung legs so legs so/_/sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba'i phyir da ni lha rnams dang /_'brug gi tshogs rnams kyang me tog gi char 'bebs shing bdud rtsi'i chus gang ba'i phye 
[\[92a.6\]]ma'i char gyi rgyun chen po yang 'bebs so/_/'od srung khyod bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal dang thugs las skyes pa ste de bzhin gshegs pa'i sras kyi thu bor 'os so/_/de nas lha'i tshogs dang /_'brug gi tshogs kyis skad 'thun par tshigs su bcad pa 'di smras so/_/
[\[92a.7\]]mnyan yod grong khyer dag tu rnga chen dang /_/shin tu rnga chen dung rnams sgrogs pa na/_/mgon po chos kyi rje yis rgyal byed kyi/_/tshal du chos kyi rnga chen sgrogs par mdzad/_/'od srung khyod kyis chos rnga brdung bar gyis/_/chos kyi rgyal po dag gis gsungs pa'i mdo/_/zhu 
[\[92b\]]
[\[92b.1\]]ba'i dbyig gus chos rnga che brdungs na/_/lha'i lhas chos mang the tsom gcod par mdzad/_/rnga bo che chen po'i mdo chen po las 'od srung 'ongs pa zhes bya ba'i le'u'o//_//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gnas brtan 'od srung chen po la 'di skad ces bka' 
[\[92b.2\]]stsal to/_/'od srung ngas sngar mdo 'di las gong nas gong du dge slong yangs pa la dad pa'i yid can zhes bya ba zhig yod ces bshad pa dge slong de'i ming /_dge slong ngam/_dge slong ma'am/_dge bsnyen nam/_dge bsnyen ma'am/_sems can gang dag gis thos pa'i sems can 
[\[92b.3\]]de dag thams cad kyi 'dod chags dang /_zhe sdang dang /_gti mug gi zug rngu rnams dbyung bar 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'od srung 'di lta ste dper na/_ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal la 'tsho byed kyi bu sman mchog ces bya ba yod de/_de gang gi tshe rgyal po gsal rgyal 
[\[92b.4\]]pha rol gyi dmag tshogs dang lhan cig g.yul 'gyed par 'gyur la de nas rgyal pos g.yul shom pa na sman pa sman mchog bkug ste/_bkug nas 'di skad ces/_kye sman pa sman gang gis sems can gang dang gang dag zug rngus zug par gyur pa'i sems can de dang de dag ji lta 
[\[92b.5\]]ji ltar zug rngu dbyung bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i sman da sbyor la myur du khyer te shog shig_/de nas sman pa sman mchog des sman gyi rgyal po dug sman rtol pa zhes bya ba khyer nas rgyal po chen po g.yul ngor 'jug pa'i rnga bo che la sman des byugs shing bdugs te brdungs so/_/byugs shing bdugs 
[\[92b.6\]]te brdungs ma thag tu sems can zug rngus zug par gyur pa gang dag yin pa de dag gis sgra de dpag tshad dam/_dpag tshad gnyis su thos nas thos pa tsam gyis sems can de dang de dag thams cad kyi zug rngu rnams dbyung bar 'gyur/_zug rngu rnams bsal bar 'gyur ro/_/'od srung de 
[\[92b.7\]]bzhin du dge slong yangs pa la dad pa'i yid can de'i ming thos pa'i sems can gang dag yin pa de dag thams cad kyi 'dod chags dang /_zhe sdang dang /_gti mug gi zug rngu rnams dbyung bar 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_des nga'i bstan pa la mdo 'di phyung zhing rgyas par byas te/_de 
[\[93a\]]
[\[93a.1\]]bas na chos dang ldan pa mngon sum du byas pa de'i mthu'o/_/'od srung ltos/_re zhig rgyal po'i rnga bo che sems med pa phal pa de yang sems dang bcas pas sman gyis byugs shing bdugs te brdungs ma thag tu sems can rnams la phan pa skyed par byed na/_byang chub 
[\[93a.2\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yangs pa la dad pa'i yid can gyi ming thos pas sems can rnams kyi nyon mongs pa rnam pa gsum 'bral bar 'gyur ba lta smos kyang ci dgos/_gal te de ltar re zhig byang chub sems dpa'i ming thos pas sems can rnams kyi 'dod chags 
[\[93a.3\]]dang /_zhe sdang dang /_gti mug gi zug rngu rnams 'bral bar 'gyur na/_bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la phyag 'tshal lo zhes sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi mtshan brjod pa'am/_yon tan yongs su bsgrags pa lta smos kyang ci dgos/_gal te de ltar bcom 
[\[93a.4\]]ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i mtshan tsam gyis sems can rnams kyi 'dod chags dang /_zhe sdang dang /_gti mug gi zug rngu rnams 'bral bar 'gyur na sems can la phan pa ston pa zhig gis rnga bo che chen po'i mdo 'di las 'gres sam/_tshigs su bcad pa'am/_tshig 'ga' 
[\[93a.5\]]tsama'am/_ming tsam bstan pa'am/_le'u ston na sems can rnams kyi 'dod chags dang /_zhe sdang dang /_gti mug gi zug rngu rnams 'bral bar 'gyur ba lta smos kyang ci dgos/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_ngas dge slong dag tshul khrims dang ldan pa'i sems kyi smon lam 'grub 
[\[93a.6\]]bo zhes bshad de/_sngon smon lam legs par sbyang ba byas pa'i phyir ro/_/'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyi chos nyid yin te/_'di lta ste/_rnga bo che chen po'i mdo chen pos ma byas pa/_ma byung ba/_ma 'gags pa'o/_/'od srung khyod kyang de lta bas 
[\[93a.7\]]na ma 'ongs pa'i dus na nga dang 'dra bar 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_khyod kyi yang ming thos pa'i dge slong ngam/_/dge slong ma'am/_dge bsnyen nam/_dge bsnyen ma gang yin pa de dag dang /_sems can de dag thams cad kyi 'dod chags dang /_zhe sdang dang /_gti mug 
[\[93b\]]
[\[93b.1\]]gi zug rngu rnams 'bral bar 'gyur ro/_/de'i phyir 'od srung khyod kyang mdo 'di zhus nas yun ring por 'jig rten du 'byin par 'gyur ro/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das gal te de lta lags na rnga bo che chen po'i mdo chen po de las phyogs 'ga' tsam zhig bdag la legs par bshad 
[\[93b.2\]]du gsol/_/'od srung dus la bab kyis khyod nga la phyogs 'ga' zhig zhus shig_/'od srung gis legs so zhes gsol nas zhu ba 'di zhus so/_/bcom ldan 'das/_gang na srid yod srid pa der sdug bsngal/_/gang na srid med sdug bsngal med pa yi/_/mya ngan 
[\[93b.3\]]'das pa de ni mchog tu bde/_/bde sdug spang phyir mya ngan 'das mchog 'gyur/_/srid pa yod na bde dang sdug bsngal te/_/srid pa med na bde dang sdug bsngal med/_/de'i phyir mya ngan 'das thob 'dod pa yis/_/rigs kyi bu yis srid 'dod yongs su gcad/_/ces bka' 
[\[93b.4\]]stsal pa 'di'i don ci lags/_'dir tshigs su bcad pas legs par bka' stsal pa/_sred pa thams cad mi rtag mi brtan la/_/thams cad du yang snying po med pas na/_/srid pa gang yin de ni sdug bsngal te/_/gang la srid med de na sdug bsngal med/_/srid pa 
[\[93b.5\]]yod pa min na sdug bsngal med/_/'di na srid yod sdug bsngal 'gyur bas na/_/srid la mngon par dga' bar mi bya zhing /_/srid pa rnams la yid brtan 'gro mi bya/_/bcom ldan srid dang srid pa med pa dang /_/bde dang sdug bsngal 'gyur ba yod par ston/_/de skad ces gsungs 
[\[93b.6\]]nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gnas brtan 'od srung chen po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/'od srung de ltar tshig gi don 'di ni brtan pa'i tshig gi don yin pas re zhig 'od srung khyod kyis mi shes so/_/sems can ni phal cher srid pa gcod par mi byed de/_sems can 
[\[93b.7\]]rnams ni 'du byed skud pas brgyus/_/srid med mya ngan 'das pa mchog tu bde/_/'od srung gis gsol pa/_gang gis mya ngan 'das thob pa/_/mya ngan 'das pa de mi gnas/_/de la bde ba ming tsam ste/_/mis ni myong bar 'gyur ma mchis/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' 
[\[94a\]]
[\[94a.1\]]stsal pa/_thar pa brtan pa ming tsam min/_/yod dang med dang ther zug ga gzhi/_/de lta bas na 'di ni nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yul ma yin zhing spyod yul ma yin no/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ji ltar gzugs kyang lags 
[\[94a.2\]]la ther zug kyang lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_'od srung dper na lho phyogs kyi yul skye bo'i bcom brlag ces bya ba nas sems can gzhan 'ga' zhig 'ongs par gyur la/_mi de la mi 'ga' zhig gis khyod gang nas 'dir 'ongs zhes dris pa dang /_de nas 
[\[94a.3\]]des smras pa/_kho bo ni lho phyogs kyi bcom brlag nas 'ongs so/_/mis yang smras pa/_de yul gyi phyogs gang na yod/_de nas mi des mdzub mos lho phyogs kyi lam gyi nam mkha' bstan na/_'od srung mi des mi de la ji ga yid ches par 'gyur ram/_de ci'i phyir zhe 
[\[94a.4\]]na/_song na de mthong bar 'gyur ro/_/'od srung de bzhin du khyod kyis ma mthong bar dad pas yid ches par gyis shig//_//'phags pa rnga bo che chen po'i le'u bam po gnyis pa/_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di bka' stsal to/_/
[\[94a.5\]]ji ltar mkha' la mdzub mos ston pa ltar/_/de bzhin thar pa ming tsam gyis bstan to/_/ji ltar lho phyogs bcom brlag mi bzhin du/_/de bzhin nga nyid brten pa med nas byon/_/'od srung 'di la'ang don mthong na/_/rgyu ni dgos pa yod med de/_/mngon sum ma gyur 
[\[94a.6\]]don la ni/_/rgyu dang rkyen kyang de bzhin no/_/'od srung de lta bas na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyu du mas thar pa'i tshig gi don nye bar ston par mdzad do/_/bka' stsal pa/_'od srung rgyu zhes bya ba ci yin par 'dod/_gsol pa/_rgyu ni byed rgyu zhes bgyi ba lags 
[\[94a.7\]]so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rkyen ces bya ba gang gi tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]yin/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das rkyen ces bgyi ba de ni rten lags so/_/bka' stsal pa/_'od srung rigs pa'i dpe dang /_rgyu dang nye bar sbyar ba dang /_byed rgyu rnams kyis 
[\[94b\]]
[\[94b.1\]]de ji lta bu yin pa de kho na de bzhin du gsal bar ston cig_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das dper na pha dang ma gnyis 'dus pa las bu 'byung bar 'gyur te/_de la ma ni rgyu lags so/_/pha ni rkyen lags te/_de lta bas na pha dang ma gnyis ni bu'i rgyu dang rkyen lags so/_/de bzhin 
[\[94b.2\]]du rgyu dang rkyen gyis chos skye bar 'gyur te/_'di ni grub pa zhes bgyi'o/_/grub pa zhes bya ba ci yin/_grub pa zhes bgyi ba ni 'jig rten gyi grags pa lags so/_/'jig rten zhes bya ba ci yin/_'od srung gis gsol pa/_sems can dang ldan pas btags pa gang 
[\[94b.3\]]lags pa'o/_/sems can zhes bya ba ci yin/_sems can zhes bgyi ba ni chos kyi brdar btags pa lags so/_/chos zhes bya ba ci yin/_gsol pa/_chos ma lags pa'i chos dang /_chos kyi chos so/_/chos de dag kyang rnam pa gnyis su bstan to/_/rnam 
[\[94b.4\]]pa gnyis gang lags zhe na/_'dus byas dang /_'dus ma byas dang /_gzugs can dang /_gzugs can ma lags pa ste/_de las mu gsum pa ni ma mchis pa lags so/_/de la chos zhes bya ba ji lta bu yin/_gsol pa/_chos zhes bgyi ba ni gzugs ma 
[\[94b.5\]]mchis pa lags so/_/bka' stsal pa/_chos ma yin pa ji lta bu yin/_chos ma lags pa zhes bgyi ba de yang gzugs ma mchis pa lags so/_/bka' stsal pa/_gal te chos dang chos ma yin pa gzugs med cing mtshan ma med pa yin na de la chos ni gang /_chos ma 
[\[94b.6\]]yin pa ni gang /_gsol pa/_chos zhes bgyi ba ni mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bgyi ba lags so/_/chos ma lags pa zhes bgyi ba ni sred pa zhes bgyi ba lags so/_/bka' stsal pa/_gal te de ltar chos dang chos ma yin pa gzugs med cing mtshan nyid med pa 
[\[94b.7\]]yin na sangs rgyas rnams kyis ji ltar ci zhig mtshan ma gang gis 'di ni chos yin no zhes rnam par mkhyen par 'gyur/_gsol pa/_sems can rnams 'khor bar skyes nas dge ba'i bsod nams dang /_dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam pa sna tshogs la bsten pa na de'i tshul 'di dang /_
[\[95a\]]
[\[95a.1\]]de de ltar chos mngon du yang dag par spyad pas dge ba'i mtshan nyid thams cad kun du skye bar 'gyur ba ste/_de ltar chos mngon du yang dag par spyod pa gang lags pa de lta bu'i sems can de dag ni chos lags so/_/sems can rnams 'khor bar skyes nas bsod 
[\[95a.2\]]nams ma lags pa/_sdig pa'i las rnam pa sna tshogs kun du spyod cing chos ma lags pa kun spyod pa/_de kho na la sdig pa mi dge ba'i mtshan nyid de dag thams cad skye bar 'gyur te/_de ltar chos ma lags pa kun du spyod pa gang lags pa de lta bu'i sems can de ni chos ma 
[\[95a.3\]]lags pa lags so/_/de la sems can zhes bgyi ba ni nang gi sa'i khams dang /_chu'i khams dang /_me'i khams dang /_rlung gi khams te/_khams bzhis yang dag par bsdus shing btags pa dang /_mig dang /_rna ba dang /_sna dang /_lce dang /_lus dang /_yid 
[\[95a.4\]]kyi skye mched drug dang /_dbang po lnga dang /_tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_sems pa dang /_sems dang /_yid kyi rnam par shes pa ste/_de ltar srid pa'i yan lag bcu gsum gyi bar ni chos thams cad ces bgyi ba lags so/_/bka' stsal pa/_'od srung de dag 
[\[95a.5\]]kho na la sems can gyi chos zhes bya na/_de la sems can zhes bya ba'i chos gang yin zhe na/_gsol pa/_de la sems can zhes bgyi bar btags pa'i chos 'ga' yang ma mchis lags so/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das dper na ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal 
[\[95a.6\]]gyi rnga bo che zhes bgyi ba gang lags pa de'i rnga bo che zhes bgyi ba de gang lags/_bka' stsal pa/_'od srung rnga bo che gang yin pa de nyid rnga bo che yin par shes par bya ste/_rnga bo che zhes bya ba ni pags pa dang /_dbyig gu dang /_shing leb dang /_chos 'di gsum tshogs pa gang yin 
[\[95a.7\]]pa'i chos de dag la rnga bo che zhes bya'o/_/gsol pa/_de la brdung ba'i mi la rnga bo che zhes bgyi ba lags sam/_bka' stsal pa/_mi med par yang rnga bo che rlung gis bskyod pa na sgra 'byung ngo /_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ci lags/_rnga bo che zhes bgyi ba chos sam/_'on 
[\[95b\]]
[\[95b.1\]]te chos ma lags pa lags/_bka' stsal pa/_rnga bo che zhes bya ba 'di ni chos kyang ma yin/_chos ma yin pa yang ma yin no/_/gsol pa/_de ci zhes bgyi/_bka' stsal pa/_chos gang zhig chos gang dang yang lhan cig ldan pa ma yin zhing /_chos ma yin pa dang yang ma yin 
[\[95b.2\]]pa 'di lung du ma bstan pa'i chos zhes bya'o/_/gsol pa/_gal te lung du ma bstan pa'i chos shig mchis na des na 'jig rten na chos gsum mchis par 'gyur ro/_/bka' stsal pa/_lung du ma bstan pa zhes bya ba gang yin pa de ni ji ltar skyes pa yang ma yin/_bud med 
[\[95b.3\]]kyang ma yin pa ltar ma ning zhes bya'o/_/dper na ji lta bu lags/_bka' stsal pa/_'od srung khyod kyis 'di ni pha dang ma 'dus pa'i bu yin no zhes smras pa/_gal te pha dang ma 'bras bu med par gyur na kha cig 'di skad ces/_ma dang pha ni rgyu dang rkyen ma yin no zhes smra bar 'gyur 
[\[95b.4\]]ro/_/yang bka' stsal pa/_sems can sa bon gyi dngos po med pa gang yin pa de dag ni 'bras bu med pas/_de dag ni rtag tu ma ning zhes bya bar shes par bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'od srung dper na ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gang gi tshe pha rol gyi dmag tshogs dang lhan cig 
[\[95b.5\]]lhag par nyam nga bar gyur pa na brgya la ji zhig ltar gyur pa de'i tshe/_de'i drung du dbang thang gis 'tsho ba dag de dang lhan cig rjes su mi 'brang zhing sgrol bar mi byed pa gang yin pa de dag bud med dang 'dra bar blta bar bya'o/_/gsol pa/_ci'i slad du/_bka' stsal pa/_rgyal 
[\[95b.6\]]po rnams ni zho shas 'tsho ba'i mi rnams kyi rang bzhin brtags nas gsor 'jug go/_/rgyu des na sa bon med pa'i sems can de dag pha dang mar mi 'gyur bas sems can de dag rtag par ma ning yin par blta bar bya'o/_/yang bka' stsal pa/_dge ba'i chos dang /_mi dge ba'i 
[\[95b.7\]]chos dang /_lung du ma bstan pa'i chos te/_dge ba'i chos ni tshor ba bde ba yin no/_/mi dge ba'i chos ni tshor ba sdug bsngal ba yin no/_/lung du ma bstan pa'i chos ni tshor ba bde ba yang ma yin/_sdug bsngal ba yang ma yin pa yin te sems can rnams ni chos 'di gsum 
[\[96a\]]
[\[96a.1\]]gyis rtag tu reg par 'gyur ro/_/de la tshor ba bde ba zhes bya ba ni lha dang mi rnams kyi 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga yin no/_/tshor ba sdug bsngal ba zhes bya ba ni sems can dmyal ba pa dang /_dud 'gro'i skye gnas pa dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]kyi 'jig rten gyi yin no/_/tshor ba bde ba yang 
[\[96a.2\]]ma yin/_sdug bsngal ba yang ma yin pa ni ji ltar 'brum bu phra mo dang /_shu ba yin te de la 'brum bu phra mo dang /_shu bas nyon mongs pa'i sems can rnams ni lung du ma bstan pa yin nam/_'od srung gis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so/_/bka' stsal pa/_ci'i 
[\[96a.3\]]phyir/_gsol pa/_bde ba las sdug bsngal 'byung zhing sdug bsngal las kyang sdug bsngal 'byung bas 'di gnyis ka lung du ma bstan pa lags so/_/bka' stsal pa/_ci kha zas las nad 'byung ngam/_gsol pa/_gang gi tshe 'tshal ba de'i tshe bde ba zhes bgyi ba lags 
[\[96a.4\]]so/_/gang gi tshe nad du gyur pa de'i tshe sdug bsngal zhes bgyi ba lags te/_de la shu ba gang lags pa de ni lung du ma bstan pa zhes bgyi lags so/_/bka' stsal pa/_gal te de lta bas na bde ba dang sdug bsngal ba yang lung du ma bstan pa zhes bya la pha dang ma dang bu yang lung du ma bstan 
[\[96a.5\]]par 'gyur ro/_/gsol pa/_de ni ma lags so/_/bka' stsal pa/_'o na ji lta bu yin/_gsol pa/_ji ltar 'du shes med 'du shes med min la sogs pa'i lha ther zug gi gzhi zhes mi bgyi ba lta bu'i chos dge ba 'di yang de dang 'dra lags so/_/bka' stsal pa/_'od 
[\[96a.6\]]srung khyod kyis tshor ba dang /_'du shes la sems can no zhes smras pa/_des na 'du shes med 'du shes med min la sogs pa'i lha dag sems can ma yin par 'gyur ro/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de rnams la yang 'du byed kyi ngo bo mchis lags so/_/bka' stsal 
[\[96a.7\]]pa/_'o na tshor ba dang 'du shes ma gtogs pa'i chos 'di dag la sems can zhe'am/_'on te kha cig de lta bu'i sems can dag yod do zhes zer na/_des na 'di ltar sems can ma yin pa'i chos dang ldan pa dag sems can du 'gyur ro/_/ci'i slad du/_sems can gzugs 
[\[96b\]]
[\[96b.1\]]can yin nam 'on te gzugs can ma yin/_gsol pa/_gzugs can yang ma lags/_gzugs can ma lags pa yang ma lags mod kyi chos de dag dang ldan pa ni sems can zhes bgyi lags so/_/bka' stsal pa/_gal te de ltar na sems can ma yin pa'i chos dang ldan 
[\[96b.2\]]pa de dag sems can du skye bar 'gyur ba'i gzugs med pa zhes bya'o/_/ji ste de ltar gyur na 'jig rten du chos rnam pa gnyis po gzugs can dang gzugs can ma yin pa de 'byung bar 'gyur te/_chos gzugs can dang /_chos ma yin pa gzugs can no/_/thar pa chos 
[\[96b.3\]]dang lhan cig gam/_'on te chos ma lags pa dang lhan cig lags/_gzugs ma mchis pa'i lha la yang thar pa mchis pa lags sam/_bka' stsal pa/_de ni ma yin te/_chos 'dus byas dang /_'dus ma byas pa yod pas/_de'i phyir gzugs med pa'i lha 
[\[96b.4\]]de dag kyang 'dus byas kyi nang du bgrang bar 'gyur gyi thar pa ni 'dus ma byas yin no/_/gsol pa/_des na gzugs ma mchis pa'i lha rnams kyang gzugs dang ldan par 'gyur lags so/_/'od srung ji ltar 'dus byas thams cad gzugs can yin pa dang /_'dus ma 
[\[96b.5\]]byas gzugs can ma yin par smros shig gsal bar smros shig_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das gzugs ma mchis pa'i lha rnams gzugs dang ldan no zhes bgyi ba'i gzugs sangs rgyas kyi yul du 'gyur ba lags grang /_bdag cag gi yul du ni mi 'gyur 
[\[96b.6\]]lags so/_/bka' stsal pa/_'od srung legs so legs so/_/de bzhin du thar par gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyang nga'i yul yin te/_de rnams kyang gzugs can yin la thar pa de yang gzugs can yin no/_/yang bka' stsal pa/_'od 
[\[96b.7\]]srung ci khyod kyis gzugs med pa'i lha rnams kyi lha'i gnas dang byed pa yang dag par shes sam/_yang bka' stsal pa/_'od srung ci khyod kyis gzugs can gyi lha rnams gzugs med pa zhes bya ba'i nang du bgrang ngam/_ci na bdag cag gi yul ma lags so zhes zer/_
[\[97a\]]
[\[97a.1\]]yang bka' stsal pa/_thar pa brnyes pa'i sangs rgyas blo shin tu rnam par dag pa rnams kyang de kho na bzhin du gzugs zhes bya bar gsal bar yang dag par ltos shig_/'od srung gis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das gal te de ltar na thar pa thob pa gnas pa'i phyir 
[\[97a.2\]]yang bde ba dang /_sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur lags so/_/bka' stsal pa/_sems can nad pa zhig sman bcud kyis len 'thungs nas nad dang bral bar gyur na ci yang nad bu can du 'gyur ram/_gal te 'ga' zhig mchis na nges par 'gyur lags so/_/bka' stsal pa/_
[\[97a.3\]]gal te las med kyang 'gyur ram/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so/_/bka' stsal pa/_'od srung bde ba dang sdug bsngal spangs pa de nyid thar pa yin te/_nad ni bde ba dang sdug bsngal lta bu yin la mi lta bur ni mya ngan las 'das pa thob par blta'o/_/gsol pa/_
[\[97a.4\]]bcom ldan 'das ci lags/_bde ba dang sdug bsngal spangs pa zhes bgyi ba las ma mchis pas nad zad pa thob pa lags sam/_bka' stsal pa/_thar pa thob pa ni 'jig rten gyi bde ba dang sdug bsngal gyi las gang yin pa de dang bral zhing zad pa bzhin no/_/bcom ldan 
[\[97a.5\]]'das de ci'i slad du yang 'gum par mi 'gyur lags/_bka' stsal pa/_nam mkha' nam mkha' lta bu'o zhes bya ba rgya mtsho chen po nam mkha' lta bu'o zhes pa/_ci nam mkha' dpe med pa rgya mtsho chen po lta bu yin nam/_de bzhin du thar pa ni dpe med pa yin no/_/ji ltar 
[\[97a.6\]]gzugs med pa'i lha rnams kyi gzugs yod kyang dga' ba de dang de lta bus gnas pa mi shes pa de bzhin du nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi thar pa yang btags pa med do/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das nam mkha' yang mi rtag pa lags so/_/bka' stsal pa/_
[\[97a.7\]]dper na ji lta bu ji ltar rgyal po gsal rgyal gyi khang [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]ngang pa ltar dkar ba brtsigs pa de'i tshe nam mkha' nyams pa de ni nam mkha' zhig pa zhes bgyi'o/_/gsol pa/_/chos gzugs med pa ji ltar 'jig_/gzugs med pa'i lha rnams kyang ji ltar 
[\[97b\]]
[\[97b.1\]]'jig lags/_bka' stsal pa/_gzugs med pa'i lha gang dag yin pa de dag sems can zhes bgyi bar bgrang ngam ci/_bcom ldan 'das nam mkha' sems ma mchis pa sems dang bcas pa ji ltar 'gyur lags/_bka' stsal pa/_nam mkha' la rten pa'i khang pa'am/_ri 
[\[97b.2\]]gang dang gang dag yin pa zhig kyang nam mkha' mi 'jig pa ltar mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings kyi 'gro ba thams cad la khyab pa yang de dang 'dra'o/_/rten nam mkha' mi 'jig pa ltar byed pa po dang /_tshor ba po yang de dang 'dra lags sam/_bka' stsal pa/_'od srung mya ngan 
[\[97b.3\]]las 'das pa'i dus na/_sems can rnams kyi las dang /_nyon mongs pa'i chos yod pa gang yin pa 'jig par 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das sems can thams cad dang /_chos thams cad ma mchis pa ji lta bu lags/_rnga bo che'i tshogs pa ji lta ba bzhin no/_/yang 
[\[97b.4\]]gsol pa/_ji ltar gdugs kyi 'od dang /_nor bu'i 'od gnyis po de las 'jig rten na zhugs zhes bgyi ba de bzhin du mi rnams las bdag gir bya ba zhes bgyi na bcom ldan 'das chos gcig po 'di gang gi rnam par smin pa lags/_bka' stsal pa/_'od srung khyod kyis mi 
[\[97b.5\]]shes sam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'tshal lags so/_/bka' stsal pa/_zla ba byung ba smros shig_/bcom ldan 'das zla ba ni sems can rnams kyi rnam par smin pa las skyes pa'i chos ma lags so/_/bka' stsal pa/_gal te de lta na dpe brjod dgos te/_
[\[97b.6\]]ci ste nor bu dang /_zla ba dang /_nyi ma dang /_me sems can gyis ma byas kyi/_tshogs pas byas pa yin na/_steng gi lha rnams kyis phyag bya ba'i nyi ma dang /_zla ba de dag ci sems can ma yin nam/_bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyang yongs su mya ngan las 
[\[97b.7\]]'das kyi bar du sems can zhes bgyi bas de dag kyang sems can gyi grangs su bgrang ba lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de ni sems can ma yin no/_/de ci'i slad du lags/_sems can grong pa'i bshes gnyen can phal pa ma yin pa yang sems can 
[\[98a\]]
[\[98a.1\]]rnams dang mnyam par mi rtsi bas/_sangs rgyas ni rnam par smin pa las skyes pa'i chos kyi rgyu 'thun pa ste/_sangs rgyas ni yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa yin la/_sems can yang rnam par smin pa las skyes pa'i chos kyi rgyu 'thun pa yin no/_/'od srung gang 
[\[98a.2\]]gi tshe sems can thams cad zad par gyur pa de'i tshe/_gal te me byung nas 'jig pa'am/_'byung bar 'gyur ba de smros shig_/bcom ldan 'das ma 'tshal lags so/_/ngas sngar khyod kyis mi shes so zhes gsungs so/_/bcom ldan 'das skye ba dang /_rga 
[\[98a.3\]]ba dang /_na ba dang /_'chi ba gang nas mchis/_gang du mchi lags/_bka' stsal pa/_rnga bo che'i sgra gang nas 'ongs/_gang du 'gro/_bcom ldan 'das tshogs pa las lags so/_/bka' stsal pa/_ji lta bu yin/_ji ltar chos thams cad ma bgyis pa/_
[\[98a.4\]]byed pa po ma mchis pa/_byed pa po dang bral ba ltar rnga bo che'i sgra yang de dang 'dra lags so/_/bka' stsal pa/_de ni ma yin te/_rnga bo che la ni byed pa po yod dam/_bcom ldan 'das ma mchis lags so/_/bka' stsal pa/_de bzhin du mya ngan las 'das 
[\[98a.5\]]pa ther zug gi gzhi thob pa'i sems can de dag su zhig byed de byed pa po med do/_/sems can rnams rang gi bdag nyid kyis bdag byed de/_ji lta zhe na/_sems can gyis gal te bsod nams byed na ni sangs rgyas yin la/_'on te mi byed na ni sems can yin no/_/
[\[98a.6\]]sems can thog ma sus bgyis lags/_bka' stsal pa/_'du shes med 'du shes med min gyi lha la sogs pa gzugs med pa'i lha rnams kyang sus byas/_gson por yang ji ltar gnas/_bcom ldan 'das las kyis ni gnas lags na de dag gi las dang de 
[\[98a.7\]]bzhin du khyim bdag tshong dpon dang tshul yang 'tshal bar ni rngo mi thogs lags so/_/shin tu gnas pa nyid du su zhig byed/_gsol pa/_las kyis bgyid do/_/las las ni chos du ma skye ste/_dge ba las kyang chos du ma skye'o/_/de la dge ba las skye ba'i chos ni gang 
[\[98b\]]
[\[98b.1\]]dag lags/_mi dge bas skye ba ni gang dag lags/_bka' stsal pa/_las las ni srid pa skye'o/_/dge ba'i las las ni thar pa skye'o/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ma skyes pa'i gnas dge ba la ji ltar skye bar 'gyur lags/_bka' stsal pa/_gzhan ma 
[\[98b.2\]]yin pa de bzhin nyid las so/_/gal te sangs rgyas dge ba las skye ba lags na/_mi skye ba'i gnas ji ltar 'thob lags/_bka' stsal pa/_legs par spyad pa'i las kyis so/_/de sus bslabs lags/_bka' stsal pa/_thog ma med pa'i dus kyi 
[\[98b.3\]]sangs rgyas rnams kyis bslabs so/_/thog ma ma mchis pa'i dus thams cad su zhig gis mngon par sprul cing bslabs lags/_bka' stsal pa/_thog ma med pa'i ni nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis shes pa'am/_bsam par mi nus so/_/
[\[98b.4\]]gal te 'jig rten du shA ri'i bu lta bur mang du thos par gyur pa'i mi 'ga' zhig byung ste/_des 'di ltar sangs rgyas rnams kyi sangs rgyas 'byung ba'i dang po gang yin zhes dus ring po mtha' yas par rtag tu bsams kyang shes pa'am bsam par mi nus kyi de'i bar skabs su mya ngan 
[\[98b.5\]]las 'da' bar 'gyur ba kho nar zad do/_/yang bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_maud gal gyi bu chen po lta bu dag phyi ma'i mtha' yas par rtag tu rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis song yang sangs rgyas rnams kyi sangs rgyas 'byung ba dang /_zhing blta ba rtogs par mi nus te/_byang 
[\[98b.6\]]chub sems dpa' byams pa la sogs pa sa bcu thob pa rnams kyis kyang de bzhin no/_/nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis kyang de bzhin no/_/yang bka' stsal pa/_sangs rgyas 'byung ba ji lta ba de bzhin du sems can 'byung ba yang de kho na bzhin du shes par gyis 
[\[98b.7\]]shig_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du byed pa po dang /_tshor ba po yang mchis pa ma lags sam/_bka' stsal pa/_'od srung byed pa po dang /_tshor ba po ni rgyu yin no/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten 'di la bas pa mchis sam/_'on te ma mchis/_
[\[99a\]]
[\[99a.1\]]bka' stsal pa/_'jig rten la ni nam yang /_ji ltar yang /_lan 'ga' yang zad pa med do/_/yang bka' stsal pa/_'od srung khyod la dpe bstan par bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das ji lta bu lags/_bka' stsal pa/_'od srung 
[\[99a.2\]]dper na/_rgya mtsho zad mi shes pa la/_mi 'ga' zhig gis skra'i rtse mos bcus na/_ba lang gi rmig rjes tsam du 'gyur ram mi 'gyur/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de 'gyur lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_'od 
[\[99a.3\]]srung 'das pa'i dus/_bskal pa grangs med pa'i ches grangs med pa/_bskal pa yangs shing ches yangs pa zhig byung ba/_de'i tshe de'i dus na/_'jig rten du yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sgra gcan zhes bya ba zhig byung ste/_de nas bcom 
[\[99a.4\]]ldan 'das des/_grong khyer chen po 'di nyid du chos bshad pa de'i tshe/_li ts+tsha bI gzhon nu 'jig rten thams cad kyis mthong na dga' ba zhes bya ba 'di/_chos kyi rgyal po chos dang ldan pa/_'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por gyur to/_/de nas rgyal po de/_
[\[99a.5\]]de bzhin gshegs pa de'i drung du song nas/_des 'byor pa chen po dang /_klu'i bskor ba byas nas/_btsun mo dang lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das la mchod de/_tshig 'di dag gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das/_bdag nam zhig na byang 
[\[99a.6\]]chub sems dpar 'gyur lags/_de'i tshe/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rgyal po chen po/_'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por gyur pa gang yin pa de ni/_byang chub sems dpa' las gzhan du mi 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir 
[\[99a.7\]]zhe na/_dbang po dang /_tshangs pa la ni 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po nyid yod pa ma yin pas/_de las gzhan du mi 'gyur ro/_/rgyal po chen po/_dge bsnyen du gyur pa gang dang gang yin pa de dang de dag ni/_dbang po dang tshangs par 'gyur 
[\[99b\]]
[\[99b.1\]]ro/_/dbang po nyid dang /_tshangs pa nyid kyi rgyal po mang po du ma byas nas/_de'i 'og tu/_chos kyi rgyal po/_chos dang ldan pa/_/'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur te/_khyod kyis dbang po nyid dang /_tshangs pa nyid/_gang gA'i klung gi bye ma dang mnyam par byas nas/_
[\[99b.2\]]de'i 'og tu khyod kyis/_'khor los sgyur ba 'di nyid thob pa yin no/_/de nas yang /_rgyal po des/_yang bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/_bcom ldan 'das/_dbang po nyid dang /_tshangs pa nyid ji lta bu lags/_de'i tshe/_bcom ldan 'das des 
[\[99b.3\]]bka' stsal pa/_dbang po dang /_tshangs pa la sogs pa ji snyed yod pa khyod dang 'dra bar/_cod pan thogs pa de dag thams cad ni/_khyod kyi drung na jis kyang mdzes pa ma yin te/_dper na/_sangs rgyas kyi sku'i mdun na nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub 
[\[99b.4\]]sems dpa' thams cad/_lam mer ma yin/_thal ler ma yin/_lhag ger ma yin pa bzhin no/_/de bzhin du/_rgyal po chen po khyod deng /_sangs rgyas kyi sku'i kha dog dang 'dra bar khong du chud par bya na/_'od srung /_khyod 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal 
[\[99b.5\]]po'i dpe/_mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang /_brgya byin kau shi ka las blang bar sems pa lta smos kyang ci dgos/_'od srung de nas/_gling bzhi pa'i dbang phyug_/'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po des/_yang bcom ldan 'das de la zhus pa/_bcom ldan 
[\[99b.6\]]'das ci lags/_bdag 'jig rten du sangs rgyas su 'gyur lags sam/_de'i tshe/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das des/_bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu/_khyod dus ring mo'i yang /_shin tu dus ring mo zhig na sangs rgyas thob par 'gyur 
[\[99b.7\]]ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rgyal po chen po/_gal te/_khyod rang gi bsod nams spangs shing /_gcig tu bor nas brtsams te/_phal pa'i 'du shes su byas nas/_de'i tshe/_skra'i rtse mos rgya mtsho chen po 'di bcus te/_ba lang gi rmig 
[\[100a\]]
[\[100a.1\]]rjes tsam du byed na/_de'i tshe/_'jig rten du yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mar me mdzad ces bya ba 'byung bar 'gyur te/_der rgyal po sa'i dbang phyug ces bya ba zhig 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/de'i tshe/_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[100a.2\]]mar me mdzad des/_rgyal po chen po khyod/_ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/_shAkya'i skyes mchog gau ta ma zhes bya bar 'gyur ro/_/zhes bya bar lung ston par 'gyur ro/_/de'i tshe/_'jig rten du sreg pa'i bskal pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/khyod kyis deng 
[\[100a.3\]]nas bzung ste/_rgya mtsho chen po/_ba lang gi rmig rjes tsam du byed na/_de'i tshe/_lo brgya phrag mang po dang /_bar gyi bskal pa brgya phrag mang po dang /_bskal pa stong phrag mang po dag 'das nas/_sreg pa'i bskal pa mang po dang /_sangs rgyas rnams 'byung 
[\[100a.4\]]bar 'gyur te/_sangs rgyas de dag la mnyes par byed/_mchod par byed pas/_rgya mtsho chen po/_ba lang gi rmig rjes tsam du byed par 'gyur ro/_/'od srung 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po des/_rtag tu skra'i rtse mos rgya mtsho chen po de/_ji ltar zad par byed ce 
[\[100a.5\]]na/_de ltar/_la lar brgya byin dang /_tshangs pa dang /_'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po nyid kyi/_shin tu bde ba/_yang dang yang du 'dod na/_rgya mtsho chen po de/_rim pa 'dis zad par byed do/_/de nas/_sreg pa'i bskal pa de dag kyang tshar phyin/_sangs 
[\[100a.6\]]rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag kyang /_yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'og tu/_de'i tshe/_brgya lam na res 'ga' zhig_/sangs rgyas mkhan po mar me mdzad ces bya ba 'byung bar 'gyur te/_de na bcom ldan 'das/_mar me mdzad des/_rgyal po sa'i dbang 
[\[100a.7\]]phyug de la/_rgyal po chen po khyod/_sangs rgyas su 'gyur ro zhes lung ston to/_/de'i tshe/_rgyal po chen po khyod/_rgyal po de'i bu gzhon nu thu bor gyur nas/_de dang lhan cig sangs rgyas su lung bstan pa thob par 'gyur ro/_/de nas de bzhin gshegs 
[\[100b\]]
[\[100b.1\]]pa des/_ched du brjod pa 'di/_ched du brjod par 'gyur te/_rgyal po chen po khyod kyi bus/_rgya mtsho chen po de ltar zad par byas nas/_da ltar khyod kyi bur gyur pas/_khyod kyi bu ni rgyal po phal pa'i rang bzhin ma yin/_mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa'am/_
[\[100b.2\]]lha'i rgyal po brgya byin nam/_chos kyi rgyal po chos dang ldan pa/_'khor los sgyur ba zhig yin no/_/khyod kyi bu ni brtson 'grus chen por 'gyur te/_sa'i dbang phyug de ltar byang chub ni rnyed dka'o zhes/_dpe ched du brjod pa 'di blangs pa yin no/_/sa'i dbang 
[\[100b.3\]]phyug khyod kyi bu 'di/_bud med stong phrag drug cu nor bu dang /_rna cha gdub 'khor gyi phreng ba can dang /_lha'i bu mo sgeg mo lta bu'i bud med dag_/mchil ma'i thal ba bzhin bor nas/_e ma'o/_'dod pa rnams ni mi rtag go zhes grags pas/_
[\[100b.4\]]lha'i bu mo sgeg mo lta bu'i bud med de dag ni/_mchil ma'i thal ba bzhin du rtogs so/_/e ma'o/_'dod pa rnams ni ther zug ma yin pa/_mi brtan pa/_mi rtag go zhes grags pas/_bdag ni khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung ba sla'o zhes de ltar 
[\[100b.5\]]rab tu 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa des/_gzhon nu de la gang gi tshe/_'jig rten gyi khams/_mi mjed 'dir/_mgon po shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba 'byung ba de'i tshe/_rgyal po chen po khyod/_li ts+tsha bI gzhon nu/_'jig rten 
[\[100b.6\]]thams cad kyis/_mthong na dga' ba zhes bya bar 'gyur te/_de nas 'jig rten gyi khams der/_mgon po yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'og tu bstan pa nub pa'i dus kyi tshe/_lo brgyad cu lon pa na/_dge slong blo 'chang zhes bya bar gyur nas/_rang gi 
[\[100b.7\]]srog la yang mi lta bar byas te/_mdo 'di 'byin par 'gyur ro/_/de nas lo brgya lon pa'i 'og tu shi nas/_'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur ro/_/de'i tshe/_khyod kyis rdzu 'phrul chen po mang du 'byin par 'gyur zhing /_sa brgyad pa la 
[\[101a\]]
[\[101a.1\]]gnas te/_lus gcig ni bde ba can na 'dug_/lus gcig ni sprul te/_dga' ldan du bzhag nas/_mgon po mi pham pa la mdo 'di 'dri bar 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan to/_/de nas rgyal po sa'i dbang phyug de/_rang gi bu lung bstan pa thos nas/_
[\[101a.2\]]bdag gi bu sangs rgyas su lung bstan to zhes/_dbang po thams cad tshim par gyur to/_/de nas gzhon nu de/_lhag par yang dam bcas pa la brtan par byed do/_/'od srung gis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das/_de nas rgya mtsho chen po yang /_thigs pa 
[\[101a.3\]]thigs pa nas phri na/_bas pa mchis lags so/_/bka' stsal pa/_ji lta bu yin/_bcom ldan 'das/_dper na tshangs pa lam gyis 'tsho ba 'ga' zhig gis/_kAR+ShA pa Na dag bgrangs te/_bum par sbas pa las/_de nas/_de'i bu dus nas 'gron bu dag 
[\[101a.4\]]stsal to/_/de nas de 'gron bu 'di nyung ngo zhes 'tshal bar 'gyur zhing /_de nas/_de dag thams cad bas par gyur pa de bzhin du/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/_rgya mtsho chen po las/_chu'i thigs pa gcig phri ba yang /_yang dag par 
[\[101a.5\]]'tshal la/_de bzhin du/_chab kyi lhag ma yang dag par 'tshal lags na/_bcom ldan 'das/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams/_sems can gyi phung po zad par mkhyen par mi 'gyur ba/_lta smos kyang ci 'tshal/_bcom ldan 'das/_sems can 
[\[101a.6\]]gyi phung po ni bas pa ma mchis te/_de yang /_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis ma 'tshal gyi/_'di ltar/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis ni mkhyen lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_'od srung legs so legs 
[\[101a.7\]]so/_/de de bzhin te/_sems can gyi phung po la zad pa med do/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das/_sems can gang dag yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa de dag la bas pa mchis sam/_'on te ma mchis/_bka' stsal pa/_sems can la 
[\[101b\]]
[\[101b.1\]]zad pa med do/_/bcom ldan 'das/_sems can bas pa ma mchis pa ji lta bu lags/_bka' stsal pa/_gal te zad pa yod na des na 'grib pa nyid yin la/_'phel ba nyid yin na/_mdo 'di'i dgos pa chen por 'gyur bas/_sngar mdo 'dir tshigs
