[\[121a.3\]]na dga' ba mkhas pa ji ltar rgyal po gsal rgyal 'gro ba la phan pa'i don du g.yul ngor rnga bo che sgra 'byin pa de bzhin du rnga bo che chen po'i mdo 'di bsgrags pa na 'gro ba la dkon mchog gsum gyi bsngags pa'i sgra brjod pa'i tshul gyis sangs rgyas kyi gsung ba 'di lta ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa rtag pa/_
[\[121a.4\]]brtan pa/_zhi ba/_ther zug pa'o zhes sangs rgyas kyi gsang ba 'di sgrogs so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yang 'od srung chen po la bka' stsal pa/_'od srung khyod kyis gang gi tshe bdud bstan par mi nus pa de'i tshe 'od srung khyod kyis rnga bo che chen po'i mdo 'di nyon la nga 'das nas lo bzhi bcu'i bar du ji ltar da ltar 
[\[121a.5\]]gnas pa bzhin du dam pa'i chos zung shig_/chos chen po'i rnga bo che rdungs shig_/chos chen po'i rnga bo che dang /_dung sgrogs shig_/de'i 'og tu lo brgyad cu na dam pa'i chos rab tu rnam par 'jig par 'gyur ba de'i tshe de'i dus su gzhon nu 'jig rten thams cad kyis mthong na dga' bas de'i tshe thog mar bdud 
[\[121a.6\]]kyis bsgyur ba'i sems can skra dang kha spu bregs pa dag gnas pa dang /_de'i tshe gzhon nus sdig can 'khor dang bcas pa/_gzugs dang bcas pa bcing ba lngas bcings nas ri bo bzhin du ston par 'gyur zhing rnga bo che chen po'i mdo las gsungs pa'i chos chen po sgrogs par 'gyur/_chos chen po'i rnga bo che 
[\[121a.7\]]rdung bar 'gyur/_chos chen po'i dung 'bud par 'gyur/_chos kyi mchod sbyin byed par 'gyur/_chos kyi rgyal mtshan 'dzugs par 'gyur ro/_/gsol pa/_nam zhig na lags/_bka' stsal pa/_gang gi tshe lo brgyad cu na bstan pa nyams par 'gyur ba de'i tshe na'o/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das bdag 
[\[121b\]]
[\[121b.1\]]cag gis lta lags na da ltar mngon sum du mdzad du gsol/_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gzhon nu la bka' stsal pa/_myur du bdud ston cig_/de nas gzhon nus bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de logs su gdong phyogs nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bdud sdig can mchis 
[\[121b.2\]]pa'o ni lags te/_'o ni 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan nas mchis nas byang chub sems dpa'i bzhin du dge slong gi gzugs su mchis pa la gzigs zhes mdzub mos bstan to/_/thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor gyis kyang bdud de bcing ba lngas bcings par mthong ngo /_/de nas bdud kyis smras pa/_/
[\[121b.3\]]gzhon nu bdag mdo sde 'di la lan gnyis su bar chad mi byed do zhes tshig de lan gsum du smras pa dang /_gzhon nus smras pa/_ji ltar yid ches par 'gyur/_bdud kyis smras pa/_'di ltar yid ches par gyis shig_/sbyor ba ji snyed kyis bdud kyi cha byad du byas nas sems can rnams dad pa bsgyur ba'i 
[\[121b.4\]]sbyor ba de thams cad bstan par bya'o/_/gzhon nu bdag gis rgyun du zhugs pa la sogs pa 'bras bu bzhi'i bar gyis yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa yang ston/_stong pa chen po nyid sgoms shig pa yang smra/_sems can du lta ba yang smra/_sems 
[\[121b.5\]]can du lta ba yang 'dod par byed de/_'di ltar sems can yod do zhes kyang smra'o/_/bdag ni bdag gi lus nam mkha' la 'bar ba yang ston/_du bar 'thul ba dang /_me tog gi char chen po 'bebs pa yang ston cing gang ngas stong pa chen po zhes bshad pa de thams cad ni zhi ba yin la/_gang ngas sems can 
[\[121b.6\]]yod do zhes bshad pa de dag thams cad ni stong pa yin gyis stong pa chen po ni de ltar gyis shig_/sems can yod do zhes bya ba ni de ltar shes par gyis shig ces kyang smra'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag bdud sdig can de lta bu byed nus pa la 
[\[121b.7\]]ltos/_sangs rgyas yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i bar 'di yang sten par byed na/_dge slong dag bdud kyis de ltar byas na sems can rnams ji ltar yid ches par mi 'gyur/_dge slong dag de lta bas na su yang yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba ni 'di lta bu'i tshig gnyis smra ba na/_de ni bdud yin par blta'o/_
[\[122a\]]
[\[122a.1\]]gang dag de skad du snga phyir tshig gnyis smras nas yongs su mya ngan las 'da' na/_de ni nga'i nyan thos ma yin par blta'o/_/dge slong dag de lta bas na chos rnam par 'phrul pas kyang ma yin/_'bras bu bzhis kyang ma yin/_bsam gtan gyis kyang ma yin/_mngon par shes pa'i rtse bas kyang 
[\[122a.2\]]ma yin te/_de dag ni de'i phyogs yin par de dag la yid ches par mi bya'o/_/gang dag ji ltar yang rung ba de skad du snga phyir tshig gnyis smras nas de'i 'og tu yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba de dag ni bdud kyis sprul pa yin par blta'o/_/'od srung nga yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas lo bdun brgya'i bar 
[\[122a.3\]]du nga'i nyan thos rnams yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur te de dag ni 'di lta bu'i tshig gnyis po nyon mongs pa gang yin pa de ni stong pa'o/_/zhi ba gang yin pa de ni mya ngan las 'das pa'o zhes smra zhing mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ro/_/de phyin cad ni nyan thos sam/_byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[122a.4\]]yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar mi 'gyur te/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar sangs rgyas kyis byin gyis brlabs pa'i phyir ro/_/yang de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de'i tshe mi rnams stong pa nyid la chad pa dang rtag par lta zhing spyod de/_rung ba ma yin pa dang 'dren mar 'gyur ro/_/de lta bas na de dag stong pa chen po nyid la rung 
[\[122a.5\]]ba ma yin pa chad pa dang /_rtag pas 'grib pa nyid dang /_'phel ba nyid du smra zhing de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po'i gtam bstan pa na smod pas sangs rgyas rtag pa nyid kyi gtam spong bar 'gyur te/_de nyid kyis yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar mi 'gyur ro/_/gang dag 'di ltar bdud kyi mya ngan las 'das pa'i 
[\[122a.6\]]'bras bus yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ba de dag thams cad ni bdud kyis sprul pa yin par rig par bya'o/_/mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ba gang dag yin pa de dag kyang phal cher bdud kyis sprul pa yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jig rten 
[\[122a.7\]]thams cad kyis mthong na dga' ba la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs la bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu dag nga yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas khyed kyis phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus na dam pa'i chos 'byin par su 'gyur/_'od srung chen po legs so/_/nga 'das nas dam pa'i chos 'byin par 'gyur 
[\[122b\]]
[\[122b.1\]]ram zhes lan gsum gyi bar du spro ba bskyed kyang spro bar mi byed do/_/de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu dag de bzhin gshegs pa la khyad du gsod par ma sems shig_/nga la gang dag phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus na dam pa'i chos 'dzin par 'gyur ba'i slob ma mang du yod de gong 
[\[122b.2\]]du mdo 'di las gsungs pa bzang skyong dang /_phug sbas la sogs pa lnga brgya po de dag gi phyi ma shos gang yin pa de yin par 'gyur ro/_/'od srung de yang gang zhe na lid tsa bI gzhon nu 'jig rten thams cad kyis mthong na dga' ba 'di nyid yin te/_phyi ma'i dus na lho phyogs kyi mkhas par gyur nas chos kyi 
[\[122b.3\]]rnga bo che chen po rdung bar 'gyur/_chos kyi dung 'bud par 'gyur ro/_/de nas gzhon nus bdud bkrol te/_bstan nas chos ji lta ba de bzhin du mna' bsgags te/_de'i 'og tu gtad do/_/de nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor des gzhon nu la smras pa/_gzhon nu khyod bcom ldan 'das kyis lung bstan pa yin 
[\[122b.4\]]gyis phan pa ston pa chos kyi rnga bo che rdungs shig_/rnga bo che chen po'i mdo smros shig_/chos kyi dung bus shig ces tshig tu smras so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yang 'od srung chen po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/'od srung khyod ni zhing srung ba lta bur ma nus te/_zhing srung bzhin du thabs la mkhas pa'i 
[\[122b.5\]]gzhon nus mdo 'di thams cad mnyan nas lus la thogs te/_'jig rten du mngon sum du 'byin par 'gyur ro/_/de ni ngas sa bdun pa la bzhag ste mi phal pa zhig tu byin gyis brlabs nas gang gi tshe lo brgyad cu pa la bstan pa nyams par 'gyur ba de'i tshe lho phyogs su yul mu run du zhes bya ba na chu bo'i 
[\[122b.6\]]'gram la rten pa'i grong khyer dmag gis mi tshugs pa zhes bya ba dang /_nye ba'i grong phreng ba chen po zhes bya bar ka yo ri zhes bya ba'i rigs rgyud der skyes nas nga'i ming 'chang ba'i dge slong zhig tu gyur te/_zhing srung ba'i thabs mkhas pas nga'i dge sbyong g.yel ba rnams kyi nang du rab tu byung nas de dag 
[\[122b.7\]]bsdu ba'i dngos pos bsdus te/_mdo 'di rnyed nas lus la bcangs te/_dge 'dun dag par byas nas dang po rung ba ma yin pa'i gzhi chen po yongs su spangs te chos chen po sgrogs par 'gyur/_rnga bo che chen po'i mdo las gsungs pa'i chos kyi dung dang /_chos kyi rgyal mtshan sgrogs par 'gyur ro/_/
[\[123a\]]
[\[123a.1\]]gnyis pa theg pa chen po'i mdo stong pa nyid kyi gtam smra bar 'gyur ro/_/gsum pa sems can gyi khams rtag pa'i gtam dang /_rnga bo che chen po'i mdo'i gtam smra bar 'gyur ro/_/chos chen po'i rnga bo che rdung bar 'gyur/_chos chen po'i dung 'bud par 'gyur/_chos kyi rgyal mtshan 
[\[123a.2\]]'dzugs par 'gyur/_nga'i mngon sum du go gyon par 'gyur ro/_/phyis mdo 'di thos nas na tshod chen por 'gyur te/_lo brgyar mdo 'di'i gtam smra zhing chos kyi char 'bebs par 'gyur ro/_/lo brgya 'das pa'i 'og tu de lho phyogs der lho phyogs kyi mi rnams kyi nang du rnam par 'phrul pa chen pos rnam par 
[\[123a.3\]]'phrul zhing yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa ston par 'gyur ro/_/rgyu des na zhing srung ba'i thabs mkhas pa bzhin no/_/'od srung da ltar bzang skyong dang /_phug sbas la sogs pa'i tshig gi skyes bus phal pa'i bzhin te 'dzin mi nus pa'i snyom las can du gyur to/_/de ni skyes bu phal pa khro ba smod par byed pa de 'dra ba 
[\[123a.4\]]rnams kyi nang du rnam par 'phrul ba chen pos yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ro/_/gsol pa/_ji ltar lags/_bka' stsal pa/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams ji lta ba de ltar ro/_/gsol pa/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams ji lta bu lags/_bka' stsal pa/_chos kyi rnam par 'phrul pas ma yin/_
[\[123a.5\]]'bras bu bzhi thob pas ma yin te/_de dag ni sa 'pho ba dang /_sangs rgyas dang bcas pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro bas so/_/der yang gdul ba'i sems can dag yod na sems can de 'dra ba de dag gi nang du bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa 'di byon pa la ltos zhes smra zhing de bzhin gshegs pa ni rtag pa/_
[\[123a.6\]]brtan pa/_zhi ba/_ther zug pa yin pa de lta bu de la ltos shig_/ngas brtan pa dang bde ba bstan pa bshad pa ni de lta bu yin par shes par gyis shig ces lung bstan par 'gyur ro/_/de nas phyogs bcu nas nam mkha' las sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis so so'i zhal de la ston cing 'di skad ces de ni 
[\[123a.7\]]de lta yin no zhes gsung bar 'gyur/_'jig rten thams cad kyang de'i chos bstan pa la legs par bstan to zhes yid ches par 'gyur ro/_/de nas bar skabs der nga'i ming 'chang ba'i dge slong de 'di skad ces kye ma gal te bdag la rdzu 'phrul gyi mthu zhig yod na ya mtshan can thams cad bdag gis 
[\[123b\]]
[\[123b.1\]]gdul ba zhig na zhes smra bar 'gyur zhing bdag nyid shin tu phal pa yin no snyam du sems par 'gyur ro/_/de gang gi tshe nga la slob pa de'i tshe bdag nyid kyis shes par 'gyur te/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs ni de 'dra'o/_/'od srung dper na re zhig dga' bo rang nyid kyis 'bras bu thob par mi 
[\[123b.2\]]shes te/_'di sa bcu thob pa yin yang bdag gis ni 'bras bu ma thob bo snyam du bdag nyid kyis shes so/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_nga'i byin gyi rlabs kyis gyur na sa bdun pa dang /_sa brgyad pa la gnas pa ci smos/_rab 'byor gzhan yang dper na de bzhin gshegs pas yungs kar gyi 'bru'i nang du phyogs 
[\[123b.3\]]bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can rab tu mang po gang dag yin pa de dag bcug na sems can gcig la yang dog pa'am/_nyam nga ba'am/_gnod par 'gyur ba med cing phan tshun yang bdag cag gang du khrid pa dang /_khyer ba dang /_bcug pa yang mi shes la bya ba de yang rab tu spyod do/_/de bzhin du ji 
[\[123b.4\]]ltar ngas mkhyen pa de ltar khyod kyis kyang shes la gzhan gyis kyang shes so/_/kha cig gis ni mi shes te de yang rang kho nas mi shes so/_/yang gal te de ltar sangs rgyas mthu dang ldan pa lags na nyid ji lta ba bzhin du ci'i slad du sems can thams cad byin gyis mi brlab lags/_rab 'byor re zhig 
[\[123b.5\]]sbyor ba mkhan gyis chu'i bum pa kha ma bcad pa yang mi 'bo bar byed na/_ci'i phyir sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sems can rnams byin gyis rlob par mi mdzad/_'od srung gzhan yang re zhig 'byung po'i sbyor ba mkhan gyis chu'i bum pa yang 'gul bar byed na/_ci'i phyir sangs rgyas bcom ldan 
[\[123b.6\]]'das byang chub sems dpa' rnams la ji ltar rang gis mi shes pa de ltar byin gyis rlob par mi mdzad/_ci de ltar mdzad dam mi mdzad/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das mdzad lags te sa bcu thob pa rnams la'ang mdzad lags so/_/gsol pa/_byang chub sems dpa' yon tan du dang ldan na de bzhin 
[\[123b.7\]]gshegs pa rtag pa mi phyed pa'i sku mngon sum du mthong bar 'gyur/_rnam par 'phrul pa chen pos rnam par 'phrul zhing dus bgyid par 'gyur/_bka' stsal pa/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yon tan brgyad dang ldan na de bzhin gshegs pa rtag pa mi phyed pa'i sku mngon du mthong 
[\[124a\]]
[\[124a.1\]]bar 'gyur/_rnam par 'phrul pa chen pos rnam par 'phrul zhing dus byed par 'gyur te/_brgyad gang zhe na/_mdo 'di bshad pa na mi skyo ba dang /_theg pa gsum gyis mi skye zhing gtam rnam pa gsum la skrag pa med pa dang /_gdul ba'i sems can rnams mi spong ba dang /_dge 
[\[124a.2\]]'dun bye ba 'thun zhing gcig tu gyur par yang dag par spro ba dang /_bud med dang /_ma ning dang /_dge slong dang /_dge slong ma dang kun tu 'dris par mi byed pa dang /_rgyal po dang /_dbang phyug dang lhan cig kun tu 'dris pa spong ba dang /_bsam gtan dang /_spong ba la mngon par dga' ba dang /_mi 
[\[124a.3\]]gtsang ba dang /_bdag med pa'i 'du shes te brgyad po de dag go/_/gzhan yang rgyu bzhis 'gyur te/_bzhi gang zhe na/_bdag gis chos nges par bzung ba ni shin tu legs par byas so snyam pa dang /_bdag nyid bdag gi skyabs yin no zhes de ltar sems pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa rtag pa/_brtan 
[\[124a.4\]]pa/_zhi ba/_ther zug pa'o zhes bya bar the tshom med pa ni bdag gis rnyed pa legs par rnyed do snyam pa dang /_nyin mtshan rtag tu de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan 'di lta bu rjes su dran par byed na de bzhin gshegs pa rtag pa mi phyed pa'i sku mngon sum du mthong bar 'gyur/_rnam par 'phrul pa chen 
[\[124a.5\]]pos rnam par 'phrul zhing dus byed par 'gyur ro/_/'od srung ngas de lta bu'i rigs kyi bu dang /_rigs kyi bu mo rnams la chos kyi sku bstan par bya'o/_/de grong rdal lam/_grong khyer ram/_tshong rdal gang na 'dug kyang rung ste/_der ngas de dag la bstan nas 'di skad ces rigs kyi bu dag de bzhin 
[\[124a.6\]]gshegs pa nga ni rtag pa yin no zhes gsungs so/_/deng phyin chad su zhig mdo sde 'di 'chang ba dang /_klog pa dang /_'don pa dang /_gzhan la yang sgrogs par byed cing 'di skad ces de bzhin gshegs pa ni rtag pa/_brtan pa/_zhi ba ther zug pa'o/_/zhes smra zhing shes par byed pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[124a.7\]]ni rtag tu bzhugs so zhes bdag nyid kyi bsam pa thag pa dang /_ngan g.yo med pa dang /_bcos ma ma yin pa dang /_sgyu med pas de ltar shes par byed pa bsam pa thag pa phun sum tshogs pa de la ni ngas bdag nyid mngon sum du bstan par bya'o/_/'od srung khyod dad par gyis shig_/yid ches 
[\[124b\]]
[\[124b.1\]]par gyis shig_/'od srung gal te de ltar chos rnams la mi spyod na des nga mthong bar ji ltar 'gyur/_rnam par 'phrul pa chen pos rnam par 'phrul par ji ltar 'gyur ngas yang nyan thos kyi theg pa 'dir dge slong dag chos gcig rab tu spongs shig dang /_lan cig phyir mi 'ong bar 'gyur bar 
[\[124b.2\]]nga gnya' phod do zhes gsungs so/_/dge slong dag de bzhin du 'dir yang spyod pa'i yon tan dang ldan pa na khyed la lha chen po rnams bkur sti byed par 'gyur ro zhes gsungs pas khyed lus la song ba'i dran pas zang zing tshol zhing ma 'dug shig_/'od srung nga'i ming 'chang ba'i dge slong de ni rtag 
[\[124b.3\]]tu dge 'dun yongs su dag par byed par 'gyur ro/_/'od srung gis gsol pa/_ji ltar bgyid lags/_bka' stsal pa/_zhing srung ba bzhin du thabs mkhas pas de dag khwa'i tshogs ji ltar ji srid du kun tu bsdu ba'i dus yin pa de srid du gso bar 'gyur ro/_/de'i tshe bzang skyong dang phug 
[\[124b.4\]]sbas la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' lnga brgya yang de'i tshe nga ni sngon gyi zhing srung bzhin du phyi ma'i dus na nga'i dam pa'i chos 'byin par nges par gyur to/_/nga'i ming 'dzin pa'i dge slong des kyang ji srid du kun tu bsdu ba'i dus yin pa de srid du g.yel ba'i tshogs nye bar bsdus te/_bkur sti dang /_ri 
[\[124b.5\]]mo dang /_glegs bam dang /_zang zing gi sbyin pa dang /_ba lang gi tshogs dang /_zas kyi sbyin pas yid dga' bar gyur pa dang /_de'i 'og tu tshar gcad pa'i dus shes nas tshar gcod par 'gyur ro/_/gal te tshar gcad pa'i phan btags pa'i mi 'dug na spyod pa ma yin pa la gnas pa gang dang gang yin 
[\[124b.6\]]pa de dang de dag ni ji ltar mda' dug gis reg pas ma reg pa yang 'bags pa bzhin du 'gyur bas tshar bcad nas spang bar sems so/_/de nas des 'di snyam du bsams nas dge slong tshul khrims dang ldan pa gzhan dag tshul khrims nyams par gyur na mi rung ngo zhes 'di dag ni chos ma yin pa ston pa 
[\[124b.7\]]dang /_spyod pa ma yin pa la zhugs pa yin pas de dag dang lhan cig thal mo sbyor ba'i las kyang mi byed/_de dag dang lhan cig gso sbyong gi las dang /_smra ba dang /_kun tu smra bar yang mi byed de/_ji ltar rgyal po la snying rings pas gzhan dag ma rungs par byed pa ltar de yang de dang 'dra'o/_/des 
[\[125a\]]
[\[125a.1\]]de ltar byas nas lo brgyar chos kyi char phab/_chos chen po'i rnga bo che brdungs/_chos kyi dung bus/_chos kyi mchod sbyin byas/_chos kyi rgyal mtshan btsugs nas rnam par 'phrul pa chen pos dus byed par 'gyur ro/_/de nas phyis sangs rgyas su 'gyur te/_sangs rgyas stong 
[\[125a.2\]]yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas bskal pa drug cu rtsa gnyis 'das nas rang sangs rgyas 'bum yongs su mya ngan las 'das shing gzhan yang mgon po brgyad yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas de'i 'og tu nga'i ming 'chang ba'i dge slong 'jig rten thams cad kyis mthong na dga' ba 
[\[125a.3\]]'di sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten 'di nyid du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ye shes 'byung gnas 'od ces bya bar 'gyur ro/_/de'i tshe gang gis rgyal po'i bu mo lnga dkar gyis dri ba lan btab pa de ni phyis re zhig 'jig rten du sangs rgyas 
[\[125a.4\]]su 'gyur la/_rgyal po'i gzhon nu ma lnga dkar ni sngar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'jig rten gsum gyi mgon por 'gyur te/_gzhon nu rgyas par lung bstan pa ni phyis bya'o/_/'od srung ltos/_'od srung skye bo phal pas sangs rgyas 'di 
[\[125a.5\]]lta bu nyid legs par rnyed par ji ga nus sam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so/_/bde bar gshegs pa de ni ma lags so/_/re zhig de bzhin gshegs pa ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing gcig tu gcig kho na sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad de/_gnyis pa gang yin 
[\[125a.6\]]pa dang /_gsum pa gang yin pa de dag kyang de bzhin no/_/dper na yungs 'bru'i nang du 'jig rten gyi khams mang po bcug la de dag de nyid na rgyu yang bdag cag gang du khyer ba'am/_bcug pa yang mi shes la gzhan dag ni ji ltar shes pa de ltar byed pa de bzhin du nga yang sems 
[\[125a.7\]]can gzhan dag gis ni shes la/_gzhan dag gis ni mi shes so/_/'jig rten gyi khams gcig po 'di nyid na shAkya thub pa dang /_'di nyid na mi 'pham pa dang /_'jig rten gyi khams 'di nyid sreg pa'i bskal pa byung na mi tshig pa dang /_'di nyid na bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri 'di la 
[\[125b\]]
[\[125b.1\]]dman pa'i bstan pa ston pa 'di lta bu'i ngo mtshar yod na/_'jig rten thams cad kyis mthong na dga' ba dge slong phal pa'i ngo bo lta bur byin gyis brlabs pa gang yin pa lta ngo mtshar ci che/_'od srung khyod kyis rigs gang du de skye ba len pa de dag kyang byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[125b.2\]]yin par de ltar shes par gyis shig_/'od srung bdag cag gi rigs su 'di lta bu skyes so zhes rigs la dga' ba dang /_yid du 'ong ba'i rang bzhin gyis de la rim gro byed pa gang yin pa de dag thams cad ngas mngags pa yin par khyod kyis de ltar shes par bya ste/_de dag kyang byang chub 
[\[125b.3\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yin no/_/rnga bo che chen po'i mdo 'di bsgrags pa sgrogs pa na bdag nyid chen po de'i phyogs 'dzin pa'i 'khor bzhi po dge slong dang /_dge slong ma dang /_dge bsnyen dang /_dge bsnyen ma gzhan gang dag yin pa de dag thams cad kyang sngar gong du mdo 'di 
[\[125b.4\]]las 'jig rten thams cad kyis mthong na dga' bas zhus pa'i tshogs kyi le'ur lung bstan to/_/mdo 'di la mchod pa byed pa'i skyes pa dang /_bud med gang yin pa de dag thams cad kyang gdon mi za bar rang rang gi mchod pa dang ming 'thun pa'i sangs rgyas su 'gyur ro/_/'od srung rnga bo che 
[\[125b.5\]]chen po'i mdo 'di ni nga'i ming 'chang ba'i dge slong 'di dang gnyis kyis chos chen po'i rnga bo che rdung bar 'gyur gyi gsum pa ni med do/_/yang bka' stsal pa/_'od srung 'das pa'i dus na nga grong khyer chen po yangs pa can du rgyal po dga' sde zhes bya bar gyur pa de'i tshe/_yangs pa can gyi grong khyer chen 
[\[125b.6\]]po ni de na gling bzhi pa'i tshad tsam du gyur to/_/'dzam bu'i gling ni mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi tshad tsam la de bzhin du gling bzhi dang /_de bzhin du stong gsum gyi stong chen po yang de ltar bsgre bar bya'o/_/de na nga'i tshe ni bsam gyis mi khyab ste/_de ltar nga 'khor los sgyur ba nyid byed pa na de'i 
[\[125b.7\]]tshe grangs med pa'i sbyin pa byin/_bsod nams bsags/_tshul khrims bsrungs/_'phags pa dag bsten to/_/skyes pa'am/_bud med gang zhig rnga bo che chen po'i mdo bsgrags pa thos nas lan 'ga' mchod pa byed pa'am/_dpyas gdags pa'am/_bsting ba'am/_ji lta bus 'gro yang 
[\[126a\]]
[\[126a.1\]]rung ba'i sems gcig tsam skyed par sems pa des bsags pa'i bsod nams gang yin pa'i bsod nams de la ni ngas byas pa'i bsod nams gong ma de thams cad kyis dpe'i dper yang mi phod do/_/dper na rig pa'i rgyal po bram ze gzi ldan zhes bya ba zhig yod 
[\[126a.2\]]de/_rig pa de lan gcig bklags na zla ba bzhir sdang ba thams cad las bsrung ba byas par 'gyur ro/_/'od srung ltos/_re zhig rig pa phal pa de'i mthu yang 'di yin na/_mdo 'di lan cig bklags te tshe mthar thug gi bar du bgegs med par bsrung ba thams cad byas par 
[\[126a.3\]]ci'i phyir mi 'gyur/_de lta bas na gang su yang rung ba dag gis mdo 'di la mchod pa byas par gyur na/_de ni sems can de dag thams cad kyi bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi rgyur 'gyur zhing 'di nas bzung ste byang chub la thug pa'i bar du mdo 'di rnyed par 'gyur ro/_/de nas 
[\[126a.4\]]'khor thams cad kyis legs so zhes bya ba gsol te/_dbyangs kyis mgrin 'thun par tshig gsol pa/_kye ma'o bcom ldan 'das gzhon nu 'di khyod kyi mtshan 'chang ba'i dge slong du gyur nas gang gi tshe dus las 'das par gyur pa de'i tshe/_g.yang gzhi can gyi phug na gnas pa'i lha 
[\[126a.5\]]mgon ma mchis par 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_'di ltar 'di ni khyod 'das nas lho phyogs su mchis te dus bgyid par 'gyur lags so/_/bka' stsal pa/_de mi 'ong na nga nyid der song ste bdag nyid bstan par bya zhing yul der thog ma kho nar mdo 'di bskul bar bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_
[\[126a.6\]]ji srid du mdo 'di de'i lag tu son par ma gyur pa de srid du de ldog pa'i sems skyed par 'gyur ro/_/yang na de nyid du gdul ba'i dbang la brten te/_nga tshogs chen pos mdun gyis byas nas de'i mdun na 'dug par bya ste/_des nga ma mthong na de nyid du ldog par 'gyur zhing der de'i dus byed 
[\[126a.7\]]par yang ston par 'gyur ro/_/yang na ci 'dod pa bzhin du byed cing de gdul ba gang na yod pa der dus byed par 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pa nga'i slob ma sa bcu thob pa kun dga' bo yang rnam par 'phrul pa chen pos der 'gro bar 'gyur ro/_/brgya byin gyi bu mngon mchod ces bya ba lo 
[\[126b\]]
[\[126b.1\]]nyung zad cig gis theg pa chen po la lhag pa'i bsam pa phun sum tshogs te gcig pu zla med par lha dang mi dang /_lha ma yin rnams kyi nang du theg pa chen po'i mdo 'di 'dzin par 'gyur ro/_/de lta bas na thar pa'i rgyu bstan pa de nyid de'i sangs rgyas nyid du lung bstan pa dang /_theg pa chen po 
[\[126b.2\]]rnam par gtan la 'bebs pa'i dge slong du lung bstan pa yin no/_/de ni de nyid kyi slob mar gyur nas de nyid kyi ming 'dzin par 'gyur ro/_/de nas de lta bu dag byung nas lo lnga lon pa dang /_de'i 'og tu phan pa ston pa'i dge ba'i mig nyam chung bar 'gyur ro/_/de rnams dus bdun gyi bar du 
[\[126b.3\]]gyur nas bar skabs der byang chub sems dpa' dam pa de dag ma gtogs par skyes pa'am/_bud med kyang rung sems can phal pa 'ga' yang med do/_/de nas 'khor de thams cad kyis mgrin gcig tu yang tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/_/kye ma 'jig rten kun mthong dga'/_/brtan po dge 
[\[126b.4\]]slong gzugs gyur nas/_/ring zhig bstan pa 'byin byed cing /_/chos kyi rnga chen rdung bar 'gyur/_/de ni mya ngan yongs 'das nas/_/de 'og 'jig rten stongs par 'gyur/_/chos smra de ni 'das gyur nas/_/de 'dra gzhan ni 'ga' mi 'byung /_/de 'dra'i dge slong rnyed dka' ste/_/rim gyis snang ba nyams par 'gyur/_/
[\[126b.5\]]'di ltar de ni lho phyogs su/_/'byung ba'i tha ma gcig yin no/_/dam pa'i chos de nub pa'i dus su chos smra ba de 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_'od srung dang dga' bo dang /_bzang skyong la sogs pa 'khor mang po de dag thams cad dang /_phyogs 
[\[126b.6\]]bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams nas 'dus pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad yi rangs te/_de dag byang chub thob par bya ba'i phyir/_de bzhin gshegs pa rtag pa nyid kyi chos 'dom par gyur to/_/'phags pa theg pa chen po'i mdo rnga bo che chen po zhes bya ba'i le'u 
[\[126b.7\]]rdzogs so//_//rgya gar gyi mkhan po bid+yA ka ra pra b+ha ba dang /_lo tsA ba ban de dpal gyi lhun pos bsgyur/_zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ban de dpal brtsegs kyis zhus te gtan la phab pa//_//
[\[127a\]]
[\[127a.1\]{D223}]rgya gar skad du/_Ar+ya trA ya s+t+ri d+sha t+pa ri brta nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/_bod skad du/_'phags pa sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i le'u zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/_bam po dang po/_sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal 
[\[127a.2\]]lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha'i nang na shing yongs 'du'i drung na/_ar mo ni ga lta bu'i rdo leb la bzhugs te/_sku bskrun pa'i yum la thugs brtse ba'i phyir dge slong brgyad stong gi dge slong gi dge 'dun chen 
[\[127a.3\]]po thams cad kyang dgra bcom pa/_zag pa zad pa/_rdzu 'phrul che ba/_dbang che bar grags pa/_mthu chen po sha stag dang /_byang chub sems dpa' bdun khri nyis stong thams cad kyang byang chub sems dpa' mngon par shes pas mngon par shes pa/_bzod pa thob pa/_spobs pa thogs pa 
[\[127a.4\]]med pa phal cher 'jig rten gyi khams tha dad pa nas 'dus pa sha stag dang thabs cig tu dbyar gnas par zhal gyis bzhes nas/_de nas bcom ldan 'das 'khor 'bum phrag du mas yongs su bskor cing mdun gyis bltas te chos ston to/_/de nas de'i tshe lha'i bu zla ba zhes 
[\[127a.5\]]bya ba dang /_zla mchog ces bya ba gnyis 'khor de nyid kyi nang du 'dus par gyur te 'dug go/_/de nas lha'i bu zla ba stan las langs te/_bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal 
[\[127a.6\]]mo sbyar ba btud nas/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/gal te zhus nas zhu ba lung bstan pa'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la skabs phye na/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la 
[\[127a.7\]]bdag phyogs 'ga' zhig zhu'o/_/de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i bu zla ba la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/zla ba khyod su'i don du de bzhin gshegs pa la zhu bar 'dod/_de nas bcom ldan 'das la lha'i bu zla bas tshigs su bcad de 
[\[127b\]]
[\[127b.1\]]gsol pa/_gang dag bdag la sman dang sems can gzhan la sman slad zhugs/_/sems can kun la snying rje snying brtse legs par bskyed nas ni/_/byang chub rdul bral bdud rtsi 'tshal zhing don du bsgrub bgyi ba/_/shAkya seng ge bdag ni de dag don du zhu ba zhu/_/gang 
[\[127b.2\]]dag ma zhum sems kyis bskal pa bye bar spyod bgyid cing /_/sdug bsngal spong la 'gro ba thams cad kyang ni grol bar bgyid/_/gang dag sems can kun la sems snyoms sbyor ba snyoms par bgyid/_/bdag ni mi 'dren de dag don du rgyal la zhu ba lags/_/gang dag 
[\[127b.3\]]sangs rgyas mtshan mchog sum cu rtsa gnyis rtags rnams kyis/_/sku spras rdul dang bral ba bsod nams zhing chen mthong gyur nas/_/yon tan rgya mtsho gang chen mtsho rnams de dag 'dod bgyid pa/_/gzi brjid chen po de dag don du bdag ni zhu ba lags/_/gang dag 
[\[127b.4\]]rtag tu skyes bu khyu mchog ye shes ma gtogs par/_/gzhan du blo gros mi skyed gzhan du sems par mi bgyid dang /_/gang dag nyan thos rang rgyal dag tu blo gros mi skyed pa/_/rtsal rab brtan pa de dag don du bdag ni zhu ba lags/_/gang dag rnyed dang ma rnyed grags dang 
[\[127b.5\]]ma grags mnyam par sems/_/smad dang bsngags dang bde dang sdug bsngal dag gis skyo mi 'gyur/_/'jig rten chos rnams zil gyis mnan te gnas shing bskyod ma mchis/_/'jigs dang bral ba de dag don du bdag ni zhu ba lags/_/gang dag bdag phangs 
[\[127b.6\]]mtshungs 'drar gzhan dag la yang phangs par 'dzin/_/srid pa gsum na tha dad 'byed pa ma mchis sbyor ba mnyam/_/gang dag byams par sems shing tshul 'chos tha ba skyon ma mchis/_/skye bo de dag rnams kyi don du bdag ni zhu ba lags/_/gang dag rtag tu sbyin dang tshul 
[\[127b.7\]]khrims dag cing rnam dag spyod/_/bdag nyid spong bar bgyid kyi tshul khrims phung po gtong mi bgyid/_/gang dag rtag tu lus dang ngag dang yid rnams legs par bsdams/_/bdag ni dri med de dag don du rgyal la zhu ba lags/_/gang dag bzod pa smra zhing legs par 
[\[128a\]]
[\[128a.1\]]bsdams pa'i shes dang ldan/_/sdug bsngal dang ni bsad dang bcing dang brdeg pa rnams kyang bzod/_/kun gyis dkrugs kyang khro ba dang ni tha ba skyed par mi bgyid pa/_/nges par bgyis pa de dag don du bdag ni zhu ba lags/_/gang dag mthu dang brtson 
[\[128a.2\]]'grus stobs gnas dam pa'i don dang ldan/_/'jig rten don gyi slad du rgyu zhing bdag gi phyir ma lags/_/dkar po'i spyod pa rnams kyis mi ngoms rgya mtsho'i chab dang 'dra/_/yon tan rgya mtsho de dag don du rgyal la zhu ba lags/_/gang dag rnam par rtog pa sna tshogs shas 
[\[128a.3\]]cher mi 'jug pa/_/gang dag nyon mongs sna tshogs pham bgyis 'phags pa'i ye shes ldan/_/gang dag bsam gtan mngon shes rnam rtsen rdzu 'phrul rkang par ldan/_/bsam gtan gnas pa de dag don du bdag ni zhu ba lags/_/gang dag shes rab pha rol son cing ye shes 
[\[128a.4\]]mtha' yas ldan/_/rtog dang kun rtog bral zhing spros pa ma mchis zhi bar gyur/_/gang gis chos 'di dben zhing ya ma brlar yang rtogs 'gyur ba/_/gang zag chen po de dag don du bdag ni zhu ba lags/_/gang dag rdzu 'phrul shes la mkhas shing shin tu rab zhi spyod/_/zhing 
[\[128a.5\]]rnams khrag khrig mchi la zhing du 'dzin pa'ang ma mchis dang /_/sangs rgyas khrag khrig phyag 'tshal sangs rgyas 'dzin pa'ang ma mchis pa/_/mthong na dga' ba de dag don du rgyal la zhu ba lags/_/gang dag nyon mongs bdud dang bral zhing phung po'i bdud bcom dang /_/gang dag 
[\[128a.6\]]'chi bdag bdud dang bral zhing lha yi bdud bcom dang /_/gang dag bdud kun nges bcom nas ni byang chub reg gyur pa/_/mun dang bral ba de dag don du bdag ni zhu ba lags/_/gang dag nags dang tshal du bcas pa'i sa gzhi bskyod nas kyang /_/byang chub rdul med sangs rgyas 
[\[128a.7\]]ye shes mchog ni 'tshang rgya dang /_/gang dag sems gcig la ni shes pa ci mchis 'byung 'gyur ba/_/rdo rje lta bu de dag don du bdag ni zhu ba lags/_/gang dag ye shes kun mkhas gzi brjid chen pos gzi bskyed dang /_/gang dag rtag tu sangs rgyas gdung phyir chos spyod rab tu 
[\[128b\]]
[\[128b.1\]]brten/_/gang dag 'dren pa dang ni dge 'dun mkhas rnams dgyes dgur spyod/_/de dag don du srid gsum dag na bdag ni zhu ba lags/_/bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mngon par shes pa chen po dang ye shes kyi khyad par dam pa'i 
[\[128b.2\]]pha rol tu son pa rnams lags/_bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i thabs la mkhas pas yongs su bsngo ba shes pa dang ldan pa rnams lags/_bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 
[\[128b.3\]]chos thams cad tshul gcig pa dang /_ro gcig pa dang /_'jug pa gcig pa dang /_bstan pa gcig pa shes pa rjes su 'thob pa rnams lags/_bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zab mo'i tshul khrims can bag mchis par spyod pa dang /_
[\[128b.4\]]bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba rnams lags/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i bu zla ba la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/zla ba legs so legs so/_/zla ba khyod kyis go cha chen po 
[\[128b.5\]]bgos pa rnams dang /_'gron pa phal po che sgrol bar 'dod pa rnams dang /_chos kyi sgron ma chen po sbar bar 'dod pa rnams dang /_chos kyi gru chen po sgrol bar 'dod pa rnams dang /_chos kyi 'khor lo chen po bskor bar 'dod pa rnams dang /_chos kyi rnga bo che chen po rdung 
[\[128b.6\]]bar 'dod pa rnams dang /_chos kyi rnga chen po rdung bar 'dod pa rnams dang /_chos kyi rgyal mtshan chen po bsgreng bar 'dod pa rnams dang /_chos kyi tog chen po gzung bar 'dod pa rnams dang /_shes rab kyi snang ba chen po bya bar 'dod pa rnams dang /_ye shes chen po'i rjes su 
[\[128b.7\]]'gro bar 'dod pa rnams dang /_ye shes chen po yongs su rdzogs par byed 'dod pa de dag dang /_de lta bur yon tan tshad med pa dang ldan pa'i sems can de dag gi don du de bzhin gshegs pa la zhu bar byed pa khyod legs so/_/lha'i bu de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la tshul 
[\[129a\]]
[\[129a.1\]]bzhin yid la byos shig dang /_ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams mngon par shes pa chen po dang ye shes kyi khyad par dam pa'i pha rol tu son pa yin pa dang /_ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams bsam gyis mi 
[\[129a.2\]]khyab pa'i thabs la mkhas pas yongs su bsngo ba shes pa dang ldan pa yin pa dang /_ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams chos thams cad tshul gcig pa dang /_ro gcig pa dang /_'jug pa gcig pa dang /_bshad pa gcig pa shes pa rjes su 
[\[129a.3\]]'thob pa yin pa dang /_ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams zab mo'i tshul khrims can bag yod par spyod pa dang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba yin par ngas khyod la bstan to/_/bcom ldan 
[\[129a.4\]]'das de ltar 'tshal lo zhes gsol to/_/lha'i bu zla bas bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi dang ldan na mngon par shes pa chen po dang ye 
[\[129a.5\]]shes kyi khyad par dam pa'i pha rol tu son pa yin te/_bzhi gang zhe na/_lha'i bu dag 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni chos thams cad shes pa la yang mkhas la chos thams cad la yang mngon par zhen pa med do/_/de ni chos thams cad nam mkha' 
[\[129a.6\]]dang mnyam par rig pa dang /_shes pa dang /_thob pa dang /_mngon sum du gyur pa yang yin la chos thams cad kyang chos nyid dang 'thun par sbyor te/_chos kyi dbyings la ma gtogs par chos gzhan ci yang yang dag par mi mthong ngo /_/lha'i bu de la chos thams cad tshul 
[\[129a.7\]]gcig pa gang zhe na/_sngon gyi mtha' thams cad ji ltar stong pa de kho na bzhin du phyi ma'i mtha' yang stong la da ltar byung ba gang yin pa de yang ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/_lha'i bu de ltar na dus gsum stong pa nyid la rnam par mi rtog pa gang yin pa de ni ji lta ba bzhin 
[\[129b\]]
[\[129b.1\]]zhes bya'o/_/de la byed pa dang /_shes pa dang /_ston pa dang /_'dogs pa dang /_'grel pa dang /_rnam par 'byed pa dang /_gsal bar byed pa dang /_'chad pa 'di ni mkhas pa zhes bya'o/_/de la ji ltar chos thams cad la mngon par zhen pa med ce na/_lha'i bu chos 
[\[129b.2\]]thams cad ni bdag nyid kyi kun nas slong bas kun nas bslang ba ste/_des chos thams cad dran pa nye bar gzhag pas kun nas bslang bar rig nas bdag la mngon par zhen pa med do/_/de bdag la mngon par zhen pa med pas chos gzhan rnams slong bar mi byed do/_/chos gang yang 
[\[129b.3\]]mi shes shing ma bslangs pas na/_de la mngon par zhen par mi nus so/_/de mngon par zhen pa med pas na chos rnam par gzhag par yang byed la chos gang la yang mngon par zhen par mi 'gyur ro/_/lha'i bu de la ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos thams cad 
[\[129b.4\]]nam mkha' dang 'dra bar shes zhe na/_lha'i bu khams gsum pa ni sems tsam du zad la sems de yang gzugs med pa/_bstan du med par/_thogs pa med pa/_rnam par rig par byed pa ma yin pa/_sgyu ma lta bu ste/_sems de yang sems kyi chos nyid kyis yongs su btsal 
[\[129b.5\]]kyang mi rnyed do/_/sems gang gis sems yongs su btsal ba'i sems de yang mi rnyed do/_/de sems mi dmigs pas chos thams cad mi dmigs so/_/chos thams cad mi dmigs pas chos gang yang mtshan ma'am rdzas su yang dag par mi mthong ste/_chos thams 
[\[129b.6\]]cad la chags par mi 'gyur ro/_/chos thams cad yongs su ma grub pa'i phyir nam mkha' dang 'dra bar shes so/_/lha'i bu dper na nam mkha' ma skyes shing yongs su ma grub pa de bzhin du des chos thams cad shes so/_/ji ltar nam mkha' zhes bya ba de yang dben pa de bzhin du chos 
[\[129b.7\]]thams cad kyang ming tsam du zad de de dag kyang dben pa'o/_/ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' chos nyid dang 'thun par sbyor zhe na/_lha'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos 'di la so so yang dag par bslabs na/_chos 'di dag thams cad gcig gis gcig 
[\[130a\]]
[\[130a.1\]]mi shes shing mi mthong ste/_mig gis kyang rna ba mi shes shing mi mthong la/_rna bas kyang mig mi shes shing mi mthong ngo /_/snas kyang lce mi shes shing mi mthong la/_lces kyang sna mi shes shing mi mthong ngo /_/lus kyis kyang yid mi shes shing mi mthong la/_yid 
[\[130a.2\]]kyis kyang lus mi shes shing mi mthong ngo /_/chos 'di dag thams cad ni bems po/_spyod pa med pa/_byed pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'o/_/des de chos kyi dbyings dang 'dra bar shes te/_de lta bu'i shes rab dang ldan pa de ni yul drug las chos gang snang bar gyur pa na/_de 'di snyam du sems 
[\[130a.3\]]te/_'di la ni gang phyi rol rig par byed pa'i nang gi chos gang yang med do/_/'di la ni gang nang rig par byed pa'i phyi rol gyi chos gang yang med do snyam mo/_/des de ltar shes shing de ltar mthong bas chos gang gi yang skye ba'am/_'gag pa'am/_gnas pa yang dag par mi 
[\[130a.4\]]mthong ngo /_/lha'i bu gang la skye ba yang med/_'gag pa yang med/_gnas pa yang med pa de ni chos kyi dbyings so/_/lha'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ni 'di snyam du sems te/_chos thams cad ni gnas pa ste/_gtan du mi skye bar gnas pa'i phyir ro snyam mo/_/
[\[130a.5\]]de de ltar chos thams cad la yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du so sor rtog pa dang ldan pas na/_chos nyid la ma gtogs pa'i chos gang yang mi mthong la/_chos thams cad kyang chos nyid dang 'thun par sbyor te/_lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi 
[\[130a.6\]]po de dag dang ldan na mngon par shes pa chen po dang ye shes kyi khyad par dam pa'i pha rol tu son pa yin no/_/lha'i bu de la mngon par shes pa gang zhe na/_lha'i bu mngon par shes pa zhes bya ba ni chos thams cad la gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog pa'i shes pa gang yin pa'o/_/lha'i bu 
[\[130a.7\]]ye shes zhes bya ba ni chos thams cad la gnyis su mi 'byed pa gang yin pa'o/_/lha'i bu gnyis su med pa zhes bya ba ni gang la mig dang gzugs 'dogs par mi byed/_rna ba dang sgra 'dogs par mi byed/_sna dang dri 'dogs par mi byed/_lce dang ro 'dogs par mi byed/_
[\[130b\]]
[\[130b.1\]]lus dang reg bya 'dogs par mi byed/_yid dang chos 'dogs par mi byed pa'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' ye shes de lta bu dang ldan pa ni mngon par shes pa lnga 'thob par 'gyur te/_de yang bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du smon lam yongs su rdzogs nas 'thob par 'gyur ro/_/lha'i 
[\[130b.2\]]bu byang chub sems dpa' ye shes de lta bu dang ldan pa ni lha'i mig gis phyogs bcur sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag dpag tu med pa dag mthong ngo /_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa gang dag 
[\[130b.3\]]bzhugs pa de dag kyang mthong ngo /_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis chos bstan pa gang dag yin pa de dag kyang lha'i rna ba'i khams kyis thams cad thos so/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na sems can rnams kyi bsam pa dang spyod pa tha ma dang /_'bring dang /_rab gang 
[\[130b.4\]]dag yin pa de dag thams cad kyang rab tu shes so/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag thams cad du yang skad cig de la 'gro'o/_/de bdag nyid kyis sngon gyi gnas shes pa mngon sum du byed pa las kyang brtsams nas chos ston par byed de lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 
[\[130b.5\]]ye shes de lta bu dang ldan pa ni thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma thob par yang sems can rnams la sangs rgyas kyi bya bas nye bar gnas pa yin te/_sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyang myur du yongs su rdzogs nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang 
[\[130b.6\]]rgya bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to/_/thabs shes pa la mkhas shing gsal ba ni/_/mngon shes chen po yongs su rdzogs par byed/_/rtag tu chos kun nam mkha' lta bur shes/_/de ni zab mo'i tshul khrims 
[\[130b.7\]]ldan pa yin/_/chos rnams thams cad ji bzhin shes pa yi/_/mkhas pa mngon par zhen par mi byed de/_/rtag tu chos kun nam mkha' lta bu dang /_/rtag tu stong pa'i bdag med shes pa yin/_/chos dang chos kyi dbyings la 'thun par sbyor/_/chos kyi dbyings la ma 
[\[131a\]]
[\[131a.1\]]gtogs mthong ba med/_/gang gis de mthong de yang lhag par mthong /_/de ltar mngon par brtson pas mngon shes 'thob/_/sngon gyi chos rnams ji ltar stong pa bzhin/_/ma 'ongs pa rnams de bzhin stong pa dang /_/des ni da ltar byung ba'ang de bzhin mthong /_/
[\[131a.2\]]de dag sngan chad ji bzhin brjod pa yin/_/chos rnams thams cad rtag tu dus gsum stong /_/mkhas pa mi rtog rnam par rtog mi byed/_/mi rtog rnam par rtog par mi byed na/_/ji bzhin mthong ba la ni 'jigs pa med/_/de nyid shes ldan mkhas la gsal ba ste/_/chos 
[\[131a.3\]]kyang ston la chos kyi 'du shes med/_/rlom sems med pa la ni rten pa'ang med/_/rten pa med pa la ni g.yo ba'ang med/_/chos 'di thams cad bdag las byung ba ste/_/de ni bdag med rang bzhin bdag med de/_/chos 'di thams cad bdag med rtogs nas kyang /_/mkhas pa 
[\[131a.4\]]chos gzhan kun nas slong mi byed/_/ma skyes gang yin de ni 'byung mi 'gyur/_/de ni de la mngon par zhen pa med/_/rnam par gzhag pas chos kun ston par byed/_/chos rnams ston kyang bdag la sems pa med/_/srid gsum thams cad sems las 'grub par 'gyur/_/
[\[131a.5\]]sems de nyid kyang rtag tu bstan du med/_/gzugs med lung du ma bstan sgyu ma 'dra/_/mkhas pa de ni sems kyi chos nyid tshol/_/de ni sems kyi chos nyid tshol ba na/_/sems dang sems kyi chos nyid mthong ba med/_/sems de sems gang gis ni tshol byed pa/_/sems de yang ni 
[\[131a.6\]]rang bzhin mthong ba med/_/de ni chos rnams kun gyis mi gos te/_/de yi mtshan ma 'dod chags 'jug pa med/_/de ni chos kun ma grub shes nas kyang /_/de yis rtag tu nam mkha' lta bur shes/_/ji ltar nam mkha' skyes par ma gyur pa/_/de bzhin de yis chos rnams thams 
[\[131a.7\]]cad shes/_/snying po med pa'i nam mkha' ming gis byas/_/chos rnams stong pa ming gis rnam par brjod/_/nams kyang rna bas mig ni mthong ba med/_/rna ba yis ni nams kyang mig mi mthong /_/snas kyang lce min lces kyang sna ma yin/_/de dag gcig la gcig ni mthong ba med/_
[\[131b\]]
[\[131b.1\]]lus kyis nams kyang yid ni mthong mi 'gyur/_/yid kyis nams kyang lus ni mthong ba med/_/'di dag phan tshun 'dogs par mi byed de/_/de phyir 'di dag rtag tu dben pa yin/_/spyod med byed pa med la bems po ste/_/chos kyi dbyings la rtag tu mtshungs shing mnyam/_/nang yang phyi 
[\[131b.2\]]rol dag gis mi shes la/_/phyi rol dag kyang nang gis mi shes so/_/de phyir chos rnams 'di dag rab shes pa/_/rtag tu de yi shes pa mtha' yang yas/_/phyogs bcur sangs rgyas bye ba nyan thos bcas/_/mthong du zin kyang rtog par mi byed do/_/shes rab mtha' yas tshul 
[\[131b.3\]]khrims rab dag pa/_/de dag chos rnams ston pa gang yin pa/_/legs par gsungs pa de dag thams cad thos/_/bzung nas kyang ni yang dag 'dzin par byed/_/des ni sems can kun gyi sems kyang shes/_/rdzu 'phrul gyis ni zhing rnams bye bar 'gro/_/bskal pa bye ba 
[\[131b.4\]]bsam gyis mi khyab pa/_/gang gA'i bye snyed sngon gyi gnas kyang dran/_/de phyir mngon shes lnga po 'di bsgoms na/_/bde gshegs ye shes dang yang nye bar 'gyur/_/mkhas de rtag tu sangs rgyas bya bas gnas/_/byang chub ma thob par yang don byed 'gyur/_/gang zhig 
[\[131b.5\]]'di 'dra'i chos bstan thos nas kyang /_/dga' ba rgya chen gtso bo skye 'gyur ba/_/de la bdud kyis tshugs par mi 'gyur te/_/myur du byang chub mchog tu rdzogs 'tshang rgya/_/lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi dang ldan na/_bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i thabs 
[\[131b.6\]]shes pa la mkhas pa yin par rig par bya'o/_/bzhi gang zhe na/_lha'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni thabs la mkhas pa yin te/_de ji lta ji ltar bdag nyid sdug bsngal ba dang /_yid mi bde ba dang /_'khrug pa rnams kyis gnod par gyur par mthong ba de 
[\[131b.7\]]lta de ltar sems can rnams kyi sdug bsngal zhi bar bya ba'i phyir brtson 'grus rtsom ste/_des sems can thams cad kyang byang chub kyi sems la nges par 'dogs la chos thams cad kyang byang chub kyi sems la nges par 'dogs so/_/de sems can thams cad kyi dus gsum du 
[\[132a\]]
[\[132a.1\]]yang dag par bsgrubs pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po la yang rjes su yi rang bar byed la sangs rgyas thams cad kyis dus gsum du yang dag par bsgrubs pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po la yang rjes su yi rang bar byed de/_dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can de dag thams 
[\[132a.2\]]cad nyid la 'dor zhing yongs su gtong bar byed de/_gang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su mi sngo ba'i sems skyed pa ci yang med la sems la ma gtogs pa'i byang chub kyang yang dag par ma mthong ngo /_/byang chub kyi mtshan nyid gang yin pa sems kyi mtshan nyid kyang de 
[\[132a.3\]]yin par shes nas 'dri bar byed do/_/sems dang byang chub la yang mngon par zhen pa med la thabs shes pas dge ba'i rtsa ba yang rnam par 'phel bar byed do/_/des chos kyi dbyings kyang rnam par dag par yang dag par mi mthong la/_bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i chos 
[\[132a.4\]]rnams rtogs pas dge ba'i rtsa ba yang dag par sgrub pa la yang chog mi shes so/_/sems kyi las dang /_dge ba'i sems la yang mchog du 'dzin pa yang med do/_/de sbyin pa yang sbyin par byed la de la yang rnam par mi rtog go/_/tshul khrims kyang srung la de la 
[\[132a.5\]]mchog tu 'dzin pa yang med do/_/bzod pa yang sgom la de la yang mi gnas so/_/brtson 'grus kyang rtsom la de la yang dben par shes so/_/bsam gtan la yang snyoms par 'jug la de la yang mi rten to/_/shes rab la yang spyod la de la yang kun tu mi spyod 
[\[132a.6\]]do/_/sems can rnams kyang yongs su smin par byed la de yang mi dmigs par spyod do/_/zhing yang yongs su dag par byed la phan gdags pa'i tshul gyis byed do/_/ye shes kyang yongs su tshol la de yang yongs su tshol ba med pa'i tshul gyis byed do/_/chos kyang ston la de 
[\[132a.7\]]yang brjod du med pa'i tshul gyis byed de/_lha'i bu de ltar spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni dge ba'i rtsa ba ji tsam du chung ba yang tshad med par byed do/_/lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ji ltar dge ba'i rtsa ba ji tsam du chung ba yang tshad med 
[\[132b\]]
[\[132b.1\]]par byed ce na/_lha'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni chos thams cad la tshad med pa'i 'du shes skyed par byed de/_gang la mur thug pa yod pa de lta bu'i chos ni gang yang med do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_lha'i bu chos thams cad ni stong pa dang /_mtshan ma 
[\[132b.2\]]med pa dang /_smon pa med pa yin la stong pa gang yin pa de ni tshad med pa'i phyir ro/_/tshad med par byas pa'i sems kyis chos kyi phyir sbyin pa ji tsam du chung ba yang thabs la mkhas pas tshad med par byed do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_gang du byang chub kyi sems de yongs su bsngo ba'i byang 
[\[132b.3\]]chub de tshad med pa'i phyir ro/_/des tshad med pa'i spyod pas 'di lta ste/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi byang chub tshad med pa'i chos nyid rtogs par 'gyur ro/_/lha'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sems can gyi spyod pa la 'jug ste/_de thabs 
[\[132b.4\]]la mkhas pas chos ji lta bu la mos pa'i sems can rnams la de lta bu'i mos pas gnas te/_sbyin pa'am/_rab tu sbyin pa'am/_chos bstan pas gnas so/_/lha'i bu gzhan yang sbyin pa'i sgo nas de'i rang bzhin du gnas te/_tshul khrims kyi rang bzhin du ma yin/_bzod pa'i 
[\[132b.5\]]rang bzhin du ma yin/_brtson 'grus kyi rang bzhin du ma yin/_bsam gtan gyi rang bzhin du ma yin/_shes rab kyi rang bzhin du ma yin mod kyi/_'on kyang sbyin pa yang sbyin par byed cing tshul khrims kyang srung la des kyang rlom sems su mi byed do/_/tshul khrims dang ldan zhing 
[\[132b.6\]]bzod pa yang phun sum tshogs la/_gzhan dag gis byas pa dang ma byas pa rnams kyang bzod do/_/dkar po'i spyod pa thams cad la yang brtson 'grus rtsom la bsam gtan la yang bsam gtan byed cing /_shes rab kyis lhag par mthong ba la yang mkhas so/_/lha'i bu gzhan yang byang 
[\[132b.7\]]chub sems dpa' thabs shes pa la mkhas pa ni nyan thos rnams dang lhan cig 'khod na yang de dag la 'dod par yang mi byed la de'i snying po gang yin pa des kyang nye bar 'tsho bar byed do/_/rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub kyi theg pa bdag dang lhan cig 'khod na yang de dag la 'dod par yang mi byed 
[\[133a\]]
[\[133a.1\]]la/_de'i snying po gang yin pa des kyang nye bar 'tsho bar byed de/_lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i thabs shes pa la mkhas pa yin no/_/de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag 
[\[133a.2\]]bka' stsal to/_/bdag nyid dang ni gzhan dag gi/_/gnyi ga'i sdug bsngal rab shes nas/_/bdag gi sdug bsngal zhi byed cing /_/gzhan gyi sdug bsngal kun zhi byed/_/sems can thams cad byang chub sems/_/sems de la ni 'dogs par byed/_/sems la 
[\[133a.3\]]chos rnams thams cad kyang /_/don gcig tu ni 'dogs par byed/_/sems can kun gyi bsod nams gang /_/dus gsum gyis ni bsdus rnams dang /_/sangs rgyas kun gyi bsod nams gang /_/de dag kun gyi rjes yi rang /_/dge ba de dag thams cad kyang /_/sems 
[\[133a.4\]]can kun la sbyin par byed/_/sangs rgyas kyi ni ye shes phyir/_/lhag pa'i bsam pas 'jug par byed/_/sems ni skyes pa thams cad kyang /_/byang chub tu ni yongs su bsngo/_/chos nyid ma gtogs sems gzhan nam/_/byang chub dag kyang mthong ba med/_/de ni sems 
[\[133a.5\]]dang byang chub kyang /_/rnam pa gnyis su mi mthong ste/_/byang chub de yi mtshan nyid gang /_/sems kyang de yi mtshan nyid yin/_/mnyam pa nyid kyis chos rnams mnyam/_/de ni gnas pa yong med de/_/mdzangs pa thabs la mkhas pa ni/_/dkar po'i chos kyis rgyas 
[\[133a.6\]]par 'gyur/_/dbyings de la ni 'phel ba med/_/chos kyi dbyings ni bsam mi khyab/_/sangs rgyas chos rnams tshol ba la/_/rtag tu chog par 'dzin pa med/_/bdag ni dkar pos rgyas so snyam/_/de ni sems kyis bsam mi byed/_/de ni gang du bsngo ba yi/_/byang chub 
[\[133a.7\]]de la'ang mchog mi 'dzin/_/sbyin pa'i mi rtog sbyin par byed/_/rlom sems med par tshul khrims srung /_/rtag tu bzod pa sgom byed la/_/sems can la yang gnas pa med/_/sems dang lus ni dben pa yis/_/rtag tu brtson 'grus rtsom par byed/_/rten med bsam 
[\[133b\]]
[\[133b.1\]]gtan phun sum tshogs/_/shes rab kyi ni pha rol son/_/sems can rnams kyang smin byed la/_/de ni dmigs pas gnas pa med/_/zhing yang yongs su sbyong byed la/_/lhag par 'dzin pa'ang yod ma yin/_/de ni sangs rgyas ye shes tshol/_/yi ge rnams 
[\[133b.2\]]la'ang chags pa med/_/de ltar spyod pa de la ni/_/byang chub rnyed par dka' ba med/_/tshad med bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i/_/stong pa nyid dang mtshan med dang /_/smon pa med la mos na ni/_/de la tshad kyang med par 'gyur/_/mos pa ji bzhin gzud phyir sems can la/_/
[\[133b.3\]]sbyin pa spyod kyang de bzhin gnas pa med/_/sbyin pa'ang sbyin byed yang na len par byed/_/de dang 'thun par chos kyang spyod par byed/_/sbyin pa byas kyang de la chags pa med/_/tshul khrims mchog min bzod la chags pa med/_/brtson 'grus mchog min bsam gtan chags pa 
[\[133b.4\]]med/_/shes rab ye shes la ni ser sna med/_/sbyin pa sbyin yang de ni tshul khrims spyod/_/bzod pa sgom yang rtag tu brtson 'grus ldan/_/bsam gtan gyis ni rtag tu gnas pa med/_/sbyin byed de ni shes pas nges par 'byung /_/rang sangs rgyas dang nyan thos de dag dang /_/rtag 
[\[133b.5\]]tu gnas kyang byang chub sems dpa' ni/_/rtag tu snying po ci yod 'tsho byed kyang /_/'jigs med de dag la ni 'dod pa med/_/chos 'di dag gis gnas pa rdzogs pa yi/_/byang chub sems dpa' smad du med pa rnams/_/thabs kyi shes pa bsam gyis mi khyab ste/_/de dag 
[\[133b.6\]]sbyin pa chung ngu'ang mtha' yas 'gyur/_/lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na chos thams cad tshul gcig pa dang /_ro gcig pa dang /_'jug pa gcig pa dang /_bstan pa gcig par rab tu shes so/_/bzhi gang zhe na/_lha'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[133b.7\]]ni chos kyi dbyings ma 'dres pa'i shes pa la mkhas pa dang /_chos thams cad stong pa'i rjes su 'gro ba dang /_chos gang la yang sgro 'dogs par mi byed de/_bdag tu sgro 'dogs pa'am/_gzhan du sgro 'dogs par mi byed pa dang /_dben pa'i tshul gyis chos thams 
[\[134a\]]
[\[134a.1\]]cad khong du chud pa ste/_lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na chos thams cad tshul gcig pa dang /_ro gcig pa dang /_'jug pa gcig pa dang /_bstan pa gcig par rab tu shes so/_/des de ltar shes pas 'jig rten pa dang /_
[\[134a.2\]]'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos rnams kyis rnam pa gnyis su mi 'jug ste/_kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa dang /_kha na ma tho ba med pa rnams dang /_zag pa dang bcas pa dang /_zag pa med pa rnams dang /_'dus byas dang /_'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams kyis rnam pa gnyis su 
[\[134a.3\]]mi 'jug go/_/des ni chos gang la yang mchog gam/_tha mar yang dag par mi mthong ngo /_/so so'i skye bo'i chos rnams dang /_dgra bcom pa'i chos rnams tha dad par yang dag par mi mthong ste/_so so'i skye bo'i chos rnams kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de nyid dgra bcom pa'i 
[\[134a.4\]]chos rnams kyi rang bzhin yin no/_/dbrir yang med la bsnan du yang med do/_/tshul gcig pa yang shes te/_'di lta ste dben pa'i tshul lo/_/chos thams cad kyi rab du dbye ba yang ston la chos kyi dbyings chad par yang yang dag par mi mthong ngo /_/bzod pa gcig pa 
[\[134a.5\]]dang yang ldan te/_'di lta ste/_stong pa nyid kyi bzod pa'o/_/stong pa nyid dang bzod pa yang rnam pa gnyis su mi 'byed do/_/'jug pa gcig gis chos thams cad la 'jug ste/_'di lta ste/_mi skye ba'i 'jug pas so/_/lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' de ni bla na med pa yang 
[\[134a.6\]]dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub dang nye ba yin te/_de 'di snyam du bdag nye bar gyur tam/_'on te nye bar ma gyur cig gu snyam du yang mi sems so/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_des tshul gcig pa las sems can rnams kyang gzhan la byang chub kyang gzhan par yang dag par mi 
[\[134a.7\]]mthong ba'i phyir ro/_/gzhan yang 'di la sems can mi dmigs pa gang yin pa de nyid byang chub yin no/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis don de nyid thugs su chud nas yang rgyas par dpyad de/_de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to/_/chos kyi dbyings ni 'byed 
[\[134b\]]
[\[134b.1\]]par mi byed de/_/chos kyi dbyings la yang dag dmigs pa med/_/chos dbyings ji bzhin chos kun de dang 'dra/_/'dzin pa med cing rdzas kyang ci yang med/_/chos kun stong pa nyid kyi rjes su 'gro/_/nang dang phyi rol 'dus byas gang yin pa'i/_/chos kun ya ma brla ste byed pa 
[\[134b.2\]]med/_/chos rnams thams cad tshul gcig yin par shes/_/chos rnams gang la'ang sgro ni 'dogs mi byed/_/bdag gam gzhan la'ang rten par mi byed de/_/bdag dang bdag gi snyam pa bsal byas pa/_/de la nams kyang tha dad dbye ba med/_/dben pa spyod cing rab 
[\[134b.3\]]tu dben la gus/_/chos kun stong pa nyid du lta bar byed/_/de ni chos rnams kun la lta ba na/_/dben pa la yang rtog par mi byed do/_/'jig rten 'jig rten 'das pa'i chos bstan la/_/de ni shas cher gnyis su mi 'jug ste/_/kha na ma tho kha na ma tho med/_/zag bcas 
[\[134b.4\]]zag med chos la de mi rlom/_/'dus byas rnams dang 'dus ma byas rnams la/_/gnyis su mi 'byed rtag tu gcig par lta/_/so so'i skye bo'am dgra bcom gang yin pa/_/phan gdags 'os su gyur pa'i chos ma mthong /_/so so'i skye bo'i rang bzhin gang bstan pa/_/de 
[\[134b.5\]]dag nyid ni dgra bcom chos rnams yin/_/dbrir yang med la bsnan du'ang ci yang med/_/dben pa'i sgo nas tshul gcig khong du chud/_/de ni chos kun rab dbye shes mod kyi/_/chos kyi dbyings la 'byed par yong mi byed/_/chos 'di thams cad stong pa ma gtogs pa/_/bzod 
[\[134b.6\]]pa'ang gzhan la 'dod pa'ang gzhan ma yin/_/stong pa nyid la mi rlom som nyi med/_/'di dag skye med rang bzhin 'byung ba med/_/des ni 'jug pa gcig par thams cad shes/_/de ltar spyod pa de la byang chub sla/_/byang chub mtshungs med la ni nye bar gyur/_/bdag dang byang chub 
[\[134b.7\]]la yang sems dpa' med/_/chos rnams 'di dag thams cad bdag mi dmigs/_/des ni dmigs su med par byang chub rtogs/_/lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi dang ldan na zab mo'i tshul khrims can bag yod par gnas pa zhes bya'o/_/bzhi gang zhe na/_
[\[135a\]]
[\[135a.1\]]lha'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni 'di snyam du sems te/_tshul khrims zhes bya ba 'di gang yin snyam mo/_/de de ltar tshul bzhin du sa sor rtog pa na 'di snyam du sems te/_lus kyis legs par spyod pa dang /_ngag gis legs 
[\[135a.2\]]par spyod pa dang /_yid kyis legs par spyod pa gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims zhes bya ba yin no snyam mo/_/de 'di snyam du sems te de la lus kyis legs par spyod pa gang zhe na/_lus kyis srog gcod pa'am/_ma byin par len pa'am/_'dod pa la log par g.yem 
[\[135a.3\]]pa'i las ma byas pa gang yin pa de ni lus kyi legs par spyod pa yin no/_/de la ngag gis legs par spyod pa gang zhe na/_ngag gis rdzun du smra ba'am/_phra ma'am/_ngag rtsub po'am/_tshig kyal pa'i las ma byas pa gang yin pa de ni ngag gi legs par spyod pa yin no/_/de la 
[\[135a.4\]]yid kyis legs par spyod pa gang zhe na/_yid kyis brnab sems sam/_gnod sems sam/_log par lta ba'i las ma byas pa gang yin pa de ni yid kyi legs par spyod pa yin no snyam mo/_/de de ltar tshul bzhin du sa sor rtog pa na de 'di snyam du sems te/_lus sam/_
[\[135a.5\]]ngag gam/_yid kyis las byas pa gang yin pa de ni sngon po zhes bya ba'am/_ser po zhes bya ba'am/_dmar po zhes bya ba'am/_dkar po zhes bya ba'am/_btsod ka'am/_shel gyi kha dog lta bu zhes bya bar gdags par mi nus la/_de ni mig gis rnam par shes par 
[\[135a.6\]]bya ba'am/_rna bas rnam par shes par bya ba'am/_snas rnam par shes par bya ba'am/_lces rnam par shes par bya ba'am/_lus kyis rnam par shes par bya ba'am/_yid kyis rnam par shes par bya ba ma yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar de ni ma skyes pa dang /_ma 
[\[135a.7\]]bskyed pa dang /_ma bskrun pa dang /_ma bkag pa'i phyir ro/_/gang ma skyes pa dang /_ma bskyed pa dang /_ma bskrun pa dang /_ma bkag pa de ni chos gang gis kyang rnam par shes par bya ba ma yin pa'i phyir ro snyam mo/_/de 'di snyam du sems te/_gang 'dus ma byas pa de ni 
[\[135b\]]
[\[135b.1\]]tshul khrims yin te/_de la ni gdags pa ci yang med do/_/gang gdags su med pa de la ni bdag gis kyang mngon par zhen par byar med do snyam ste/_de de ltar spyod pa na tshul khrims de yang dag par mi mthong ngo /_/gang du tshul khrims de yongs su bsngos pa de yang yang dag par ma mthong ste/_
[\[135b.2\]]de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' zab mo'i tshul khrims can zhes bya'o/_/lha'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni 'jig tshogs la lta ba yongs su shes pa'i shes pa dang ldan pa yin te/_lta ba gang gis tshul khrims dang ldan pa'am/_tshul khrims 'chal pa zhes spros 
[\[135b.3\]]par 'gyur ba'i 'jig tshogs la lta ba slong bar mi byed do/_/lha'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni zab mo'i tshul la zhugs pa yin te/_de ni lus dang ngag gi spyod pa dang /_spyod yul shes bzhin du spyod pas tshul khrims dang ldan pa zhes bya'o/_/de yang 
[\[135b.4\]]bdag la dmigs pa dang /_gzhan la dmigs pas spyod par mi byed de/_des na zab mo'i tshul khrims can zhes bya'o/_/lha'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni tshul khrims ma nyams pa dang /_tshul khrims ma zhig pa yin no/_/lha'i bu ji ltar na byang 
[\[135b.5\]]chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims ma nyams pa dang /_tshul khrims ma zhig pa yin zhe na/_lha'i bu bdag la dmigs pa ni tshul khrims la dmigs par 'gyur ro/_/lha'i bu gang bdag la mi dmigs pa de ni tshul khrims la mi dmigs so/_/gang tshul khrims la 
[\[135b.6\]]mi dmigs pa de ni tshul khrims nyams par mi byed cing /_de ni tshul khrims 'jig par mi byed do/_/ci'i phyir nyams par mi byed/_'jig par mi byed ce na/_de ni gzhan las chos thams cad shes pa yin te/_gang gzhan las 'gyur ba de la ni bdag kyang med/_bdag gi ba yang 
[\[135b.7\]]med do/_/gang la bdag med pa de la ni 'jig par 'gyur ba ci yang med de/_lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na zab mo'i tshul khrims can bag yod par gnas pa zhes bya'o/_/de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad 
[\[136a\]]
[\[136a.1\]]pa 'di dag bka' stsal to/_/lus dag ngag dag yid kyang dag pa gang /_/de ni rtag tu dag par spyod pa ste/_/rtag tu legs par bsdams shing gnas pa de/_/byang chub sems dpa' tshul khrims ldan zhes bya/_/las lam bcu po rab dge 'di dag rnams/_/
[\[136a.2\]]byang chub sems dpa' mkhas pa gang srung zhing /_/lus dang ngag dang yid kyis gang byas pa/_/de ni mkhas rnams tshul khrims yin zhes brjod/_/ma byas ma bskyed ma skyes gang yin pa/_/de la bsngags pa med cing gnas pa'ang med/_/gang la bsngags pa med cing gnas 
[\[136a.3\]]pa'ang med/_/de la nams kyang gdags pa rnyed mi 'gyur/_/rtag tu tshul khrims ma nyams ma zhig gang /_/de ni mig gis shes par mi nus la/_/rna bas mi shes sna dang lces ma yin/_/lus dang yid kyis rnam par mi shes so/_/dbang po drug gis mi shes gang yin pa/_/de la gnas 
[\[136a.4\]]par bya bar mi nus te/_/de nyid tshul khrims yongs su dag par mthong /_/nams kyang tshul khrims dmigs te gnas pa med/_/de ni tshul khrims tsam des rlom pa med/_/de ni bdag tu 'du shes khrims mi srung /_/tshul khrims srung yang tshul khrims 'du shes med/_/dran 
[\[136a.5\]]ldan zab mo'i tshul khrims ldan pa yin/_/'jig tshogs lta ba rnam par bsal byas pa/_/de la lta bar byas pa 'byung mi 'gyur/_/gang la lta med lta ba'i gnas med pa/_/de ni tshul khrims tshul khrims 'chal mi rlom/_/zab mo'i chos kyi tshul la zhugs pa ste/_/de 
[\[136a.6\]]yi cho ga brtags pa ma mchis la/_/shin tu shes bzhin ldan zhing legs par gsungs/_/tshul khrims sgo nas gzhan gyis brnyas mi 'gyur/_/bdag tu dmigs pas tshul khrims dmigs par 'gyur/_/gang la bdag med de la tshul khrims med/_/bdag gam 
[\[136a.7\]]yang na tshul khrims rlom pa de/_/mtha' zhes bya ste gnyi ga 'jigs ma yin/_/bdag med smra ba tshul khrims rlom pa med/_/bdag med smra ba tshul khrims rten pa med/_/bdag med smra la tshul khrims rlom pa med/_/bdag med smra la tshul khrims sems dpa' med/_/
[\[136b\]]
[\[136b.1\]]tshul khrims ma nyams tshul khrims ma rmongs pa/_/bdag ni tshul khrims ldan zhes bdag mi rlom/_/gang la bdag dang tshul khrims 'du shes med/_/de 'dra 'di ni zab pa zhes kyang brjod/_/gang gi tshul khrims de 'drar 'jigs med pa/_/de la nams kyang 'chal pa'i khrims 
[\[136b.2\]]mi 'byung /_/chos kun dmigs su med pa gang yin pa/_/de 'dra'i tshul khrims 'phags pa rnams kyis bsngags/_/byis pa gang dag bdag tu lta la gnas/_/tshul khrims srung zhing bdag ni khrims ldan snyam/_/tshul khrims bde ba ma lus zad gyur nas/_/de dag ngan 
[\[136b.3\]]'gro gsum las thar mi 'gyur/_/gang dag bdag tu lta ba mtha' dag bsal/_/de dag 'dir ni bdag dang bdag gi med/_/bdag tu lta med gang de tshul khrims ldan/_/de la phyin chad log par lhung 'jigs med/_/gang zhig tshul khrims rnam pa 'di 'drar shes/_/de la 
[\[136b.4\]]'chal pa'i tshul khrims lta mi nus/_/bdag dang de bzhin rnam gsum mi mthong na/_/tshul khrims tshul khrims 'chal lta ci zhig smos/_/de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das la lha'i bu zla bas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas bcom ldan 
[\[136b.5\]]'das rnams kyi bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub de ji tsam du zab pa ni ngo mtshar lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar mi gnas pa dang /_len pa ma mchis pas chos ji lta ba bzhin du gnas la/_rnam par rtog pa thams 
[\[136b.6\]]cad yang dag par chad pa dang /_bdag tu 'du shes pa dang bral ba dang /_bskal pa grangs ma mchis par yang spyod pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su ma rdzogs kyi bar du nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yang mi ltung la bar ma dor rnam par byang bar yang mi 'gyur ba yang ngo 
[\[136b.7\]]mtshar che lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos du dang ldan na chos zab mo rnams la yang spyod la/_yang dag pa'i mtha' yang mngon sum du mi bgyid lags/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i bu zla ba la 'di skad 
[\[137a\]]
[\[137a.1\]]ces bka' stsal to/_/lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi dang ldan na chos zab mo rnams la yang spyod la/_yang dag pa'i mtha' yang mngon sum du mi byed do/_/bzhi gang zhe na/_lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni thams cad 
[\[137a.2\]]mkhyen pa'i ye shes bsgrub pa'i phyir dam bcas pa la brtan pas snying po la gnas pa dang /_sems can thams cad yongs su mi gtong bar gnas pa'i phyir zhum pa med pa'i brtson 'grus dang ldan pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi gdung rgyun mi 'chad pa la zhugs pa'i phyir snying rje chen po dang ldan 
[\[137a.3\]]pa dang /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad yongs su bsngo ba la mkhas pa'i phyir thabs la mkhas pa ste/_lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na chos zab mo rnams la'ang spyod la/_bar ma dor yang dag pa'i mtha' mngon sum du'ang mi byed do/_/de nas 
[\[137a.4\]]de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to/_/mkhas pa rtag tu yi dam bcas la brtan/_/sngon chad yi dam bcas pa spong mi byed/_/dpa' bo thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes phyir/_/theg pa gzhan la 'dod pa skyed mi byed/_/rtag tu bag dang ldan zhing 
[\[137a.5\]]brtson 'grus rtsom/_/zhum pa med pa'i sems kyis rtag tu spyod/_/de yis sems can gang yang btang ba med/_/de yi sems ni sems can kun la snyoms/_/'jig rten 'di dag kun la snying brtse bas/_/sdug bsngal bzod cing sems kyang zhum pa med/_/ci nas sangs rgyas gdung ni mi 'chad 
[\[137a.6\]]pa/_/de phyir dkon mchog mang po 'byung bar byed/_/mkhas rnams thabs shes pa la legs par bslabs/_/le lo med par dge ba yongs su bsngo/_/'khor ba'i chu bo la ni phan phyir brtse/_/bar ma dor ni zag rnams zad mi byed/_/byang chub sems dpa' 'jigs med gang dag gis/_/
[\[137a.7\]]chos rnams 'di dag legs par bsdus par gyur/_/de dag zab mo'i chos rnams spyod pa ste/_/nams kyang yang dag mtha' la reg mi 'gyur/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la lha'i bu zla bas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen 
[\[137b\]]
[\[137b.1\]]po zab mo la spyod pa lags/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i bu zla ba la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/lha'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni so so'i skye bo'i chos bstan pa'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su bsgrub pa yang yongs su tshol bar 
[\[137b.2\]]mi byed la/_so so'i skye bo'i chos rnams bsal bar yang mi byed de/_sangs rgyas kyi chos kyang rnam par dag par mi mthong ste/_so so'i skye bo'i chos ma gtogs par sangs rgyas kyi chos 'thob pa yongs su mi tshol lo/_/so so'i skye bo'i chos rnams kyang gzhan la sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams 
[\[137b.3\]]kyang gzhan no zhes de ltar mi spyod do/_/so so'i skye bo'i chos rnams ni chung la sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ni rgya che'o zhes de ltar mi spyod do/_/so so'i skye bo'i chos rnams ni zag pa dang bcas pa yin la sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ni zag pa med pa'o zhes de ltar mi spyod do/_/gzhan yang de 'di 
[\[137b.4\]]snyam du sems te/_so so'i skye bo'i chos gang dag yin pa de rnams dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos gang dag yin pa rnams ni shes pa'am/_mthong ba'am/_nye bar brtag par mi nus so/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar de dag ni stong pa yin la stong pa nyid la ni shes pa'am/_mthong ba'am/_
[\[137b.5\]]nye bar rtog pa med de/_'di lta ste/_rang bzhin gyis bems po yin pa'i phyir ro snyam mo/_/lha'i bu 'di ltar chos rnams kyi chos nyid dang /_chos kyi ngo bo nyid dang /_chos gnas pa nyid dang /_chos ji lta ba bzhin pa gang yin pa de la ni gnyis po gang gis so so'i skye bo zhes bya ba'am/_
[\[137b.6\]]nyan thos zhes bya ba'am/_rang sangs rgyas zhes bya ba'am/_yang dag par rdzogs par sangs rgyas zhes bya bar gnyis su dbye ba'i gnyis po ci yang med do/_/lha'i bu zab mo la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la ni gang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma yin pa de lta bu'i chos gang 
[\[137b.7\]]yang med do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_lha'i bu chos rnams kyi chos smra bar bya ba gang yin pa de ni smrar med pa'o/_/smrar med pa gang yin pa de ni brjod du med pa'o/_/brjod du med pa gang yin pa de la ni yod pa med do/_/gang la yod pa med pa de la ni 'byung ba med do/_/gang la 'byung ba med pa de 
[\[138a\]]
[\[138a.1\]]la dngos po'i rnam par rig pa med do/_/lha'i bu chos thams cad ni dngos po med pa yang yin te/_gang na chos thams cad kyi bgrang ba de las grol ba ni sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams yin te/_lha'i bu de bas na rnam grangs 'dis kyang chos thams cad rnam par mi rtog pa'i 
[\[138a.2\]]spyod pa'i tshul gyis sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams yin no zhes de ltar rig par bya'o/_/gang rnam par rtog pa la spyod pa de dag la ni gnyis su 'jug pa'i rnam par shes pa 'byung ba yod do/_/de dag ni rnam par shes pa'i spyod yul la spyod pa'o/_/gang dag sangs rgyas kyi chos zag 
[\[138a.3\]]pa med pa gang dag yin pa de dag la yang rtog la/_de dag la brtags nas kyang zag pa rnams slong bar byed pa de dag gis ni chos kyi dbyings la kun nas nyon mongs pa'am/_rnam par byang ba med par mi shes so/_/chos rnams thams cad kyi rang bzhin shes pa gang yin 
[\[138a.4\]]pa de dag ni chos gang la yang kun nas nyon mongs pa'i chos sam/_rnam par byang ba'i chos su 'dzin pa yang med na/_kun nas nyon mongs pa'i chos sam/_rnam par byang ba'i chos su dmigs pa lta ga la yod de/_de ni gnas med do/_/lha'i bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[138a.5\]]sems dpa' chen po zab mo la spyod pa yin te/_gang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma yin pa'i chos gang yang med par mthong la/_gang gis mthong ba de yang lhag par mthong ba dang /_ji ltar mi mthong ba de lta bur mthong ste/_de ltar mthong ba'i byang chub sems dpa' ni bdud dam bdud kyi 
[\[138a.6\]]ris kyi lha rnams kyis mi tshugs so/_/de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das la lha'i bu zla bas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar 'di lta bu'i chos rnams la yang nye bar rtogs la skye ba yang rtsom par bgyid do/_/
[\[138a.7\]]skye ba dang /_'gum pa dang /_gum nas kyang skye bar 'gyur ba ni ngo mtshar lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_lha'i bu dper na sgyu ma mkhan gyis sprul pa ni 'ong ba dang /_'gro ba dang /_'dug pa dang /_nyal ba dang /_smra bar yang byed la/_de yang rnam par mi rtog pa de bzhin du/_
[\[138b\]]
[\[138b.1\]]lha'i bu gang gis chos thams cad sgyu ma lta bur shes pa de ni 'gro ba dang skye ba thams cad kyang ston la de yang rnam par mi rtog go/_/lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' ni skye ba dang /_'byung ba yang rlom sems su mi byed la sngon gyi byin gyi rlabs kyis skye bar 'gyur ro/_/de skad ces bka' 
[\[138b.2\]]stsal pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das la lha'i bu zla bas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis gang 'di skad du byang chub sems dpa' ni skye ba dang /_'byung ba yang rlom sems su mi byed ces bka' stsal pa de la bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ni lha mo sgyu 'phrul las 'khrungs 
[\[138b.3\]]te/_sku bskrun pa'i yum la thugs brtse ba'i slad du sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi nang du dbyar gnas par zhal gyis bzhes na/_ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pas rlom sems su mi mdzad lags/_bka' stsal pa/_lha'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa ni lha mo sgyu 'phrul las ma skyes 
[\[138b.4\]]so/_/gsol pa/_'o na de bzhin gshegs pa gang las 'khrungs lags/_bka' stsal pa/_lha'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las skyes te/_lha'i bu gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams skyed pa'i yum yin 
[\[138b.5\]]no zhes smra ba ni yang dag par smra ba yin no/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni 'das pa dang /_ma 'ongs pa dang /_da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams skyed pa'i yum yin no zhes smra ba ni yang dag par smra ba yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_lha'i bu skyes bu chen po'i mtshan 
[\[138b.6\]]sum cu rtsa gnyis ni lha mo sgyu 'phrul las skyes pa ma yin gyi/_lha'i bu skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslabs pas mngon par grub pa yin no/_/lha'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu po 'di dag ni lha mo sgyu 'phrul las skyes pa ma yin 
[\[138b.7\]]gyi/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslabs pas mngon par grub pa yin no/_/lha'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i mi 'jigs pa bzhi po 'di dag ni lha mo sgyu 'phrul las skyes pa ma yin no/_/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad dang byams pa chen po 
[\[139a\]]
[\[139a.1\]]dang /_snying rje chen po dang /_dga' ba chen po dang /_btang snyoms chen po dang /_spyi gtsug bltar mi mthong ba dang /_gshegs pa don yod pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi spyan dang /_sangs rgyas kyi ye shes dang /_sangs rgyas kyi so so yang dag par rig pa dang /_pha rol gyi sems shes pa dang /_
[\[139a.2\]]lha'i bu mdor bsdu na gang dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa dang de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya ba'i grangs su 'gro ba'i sangs rgyas kyi chos de lta bu gang dag yin pa de dag ni lha mo sgyu 'phrul las skyes pa ma yin te/_lha'i bu de ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos dpag tu 
[\[139a.3\]]med pa gang dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya ba'i grangs su 'gro ba de lta bu de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad cing /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslabs pas mngon par grub pa yin te/_lha'i bu khyod kyis rnam grangs 'dis kyang ci nas 
[\[139a.4\]]de bzhin gshegs pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las skyes kyi/_lha mo sgyu 'phrul las ma yin pa de ltar rig par bya'o//_//bam po gnyis pa/_de nas bcom ldan 'das la lha'i bu zla bas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa chos 
[\[139a.5\]]gang gis kyang skyed pa ma lags/_bskrun pa ma lags/_'gag par bgyid pa ma lags na/_bcom ldan 'das ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de bzhin gshegs pa bskrun pa lags/_bka' stsal pa/_lha'i bu chos gang dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya ba'i grangs 
[\[139a.6\]]su 'gro ba'i chos de dag ni skye ba yang med/_'chi 'pho ba yang med/_'byung ba yang med do/_/lha'i bu gang skye ba yang med/_'chi 'pho ba yang med/_'byung ba yang med pa de lta bu'i ye shes de skyed pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las ni gang skye ba med pa dang /_'chi 'pho med 
[\[139a.7\]]pa dang /_'byung ba med pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa skyes so/_/lha'i bu gang la skye ba yang med/_'chi 'pho ba yang med/_'byung ba yang med pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod pa las yang dag par nges par 'byung ba yod mod kyi/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med pa las ni nges par 'byung ba med do/_/gsol pa/_
[\[139b\]]
[\[139b.1\]]bcom ldan 'das de ltar shes rab mchis na nges par 'byung ba mchis pa las na ci shes rab de la sems pa'am/_'tshal ba mchis sam/_bka' stsal pa/_lha'i bu shes rab la ni sems pa'am/_shes pa yang med do/_/lha'i bu gal te shes rab sems pa'am/_shes pa zhig yin par gyur 
[\[139b.2\]]na shes rab las rtag tu nges par 'byung ba med par 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_lha'i bu gang la sems sam tshor ba yod na de la nges par 'byung ba ci yang med pa'i phyir ro/_/lha'i bu gang gi phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sems pa med cing /_shes pa med pa de'i phyir shes rab rtag tu nges par 
[\[139b.3\]]'byung ba yin no/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das nges par 'byung ba zhes bgyi ba de gang gi tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]lags/_bka' stsal pa/_lha'i bu spros pa med pa'i tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]so/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das spros pa ma mchis pas ci zhig nges par 'byin par bgyid lags/_bka' stsal pa/_
[\[139b.4\]]lha'i bu gang dag spros pa la spyod pa de dag ni khams gsum du skye ba mi 'dor ro/_/gang dag spros par mi byed pa de dag ni khams gsum du skye ba 'dor bar byed do/_/lha'i bu de lta bas na gang khyod spros pa med par nges par 'byung bas ci zhig nges par 'byin ces zer ba ni khams gsum du skye ba nges 
[\[139b.5\]]par 'byin par byed do/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das/_bcom ldan 'das kyis khams gsum las yang dag par 'da' bar bgyi ba'i slad du nyan thos rnams la chos bstan lags sam/_bka' stsal pa/_lha'i bu nga ni 'dod pa'i khams las kyang brtsams te nyan thos rnams la chos ston la/_
[\[139b.6\]]de bzhin gshegs pas 'dod pa'i khams kyang ma dmigs so/_/lha'i bu nga ni gzugs kyi khams las kyang brtsams te nyan thos rnams la chos ston la/_de bzhin gshegs pas gzugs kyi khams kyang ma dmigs so/_/lha'i bu nga ni gzugs med pa'i khams las kyang brtsams 
[\[139b.7\]]te nyan thos rnams la chos ston la/_de bzhin gshegs pas gzugs med pa'i khams kyang ma dmigs so/_/lha'i bu nga ni yang dag par 'da' bar bya ba'i phyir chos ston la/_de bzhin gshegs pas gang yang dag par 'da' ba'i chos de yang dag par ma mthong 
[\[140a\]]
[\[140a.1\]]ngo /_/lha'i bu nga'i nyan thos rnams ni 'dod pa'i khams la dmigs nas 'dod pa'i khams las yang dag par 'da' bar mi byed do/_/nga'i nyan thos rnams ni gzugs kyi khams la dmigs nas gzugs kyi khams las yang dag par 'da' bar mi byed do/_/
[\[140a.2\]]nga'i nyan thos rnams ni gzugs med pa'i khams la dmigs nas gzugs med pa'i khams las yang dag par 'da' bar mi byed do/_/lha'i bu gzhan yang nga'i nyan thos rnams ni khams gsum pa mi dmigs pas khams gsum pa la mi rten te/_chos rnams stong pa nyid du dmigs pas 
[\[140a.3\]]'dod pa'i khams su smon lam mi 'debs so/_/gzugs kyi khams su smon lam mi 'debs so/_/gzugs med pa'i khams su smon lam mi 'debs so/_/khams gsum par smon lam mi 'debs pas na khams gsum par mi skye'o/_/ma skyes pa de dag gi 'gro ba ni gdags su med do/_/kye 
[\[140a.4\]]lha'i bu 'on kyang 'phags pa rnams ni yang dag par 'da' ba zhes de skad brjod par mdzad do/_/'on kyang don dam par na 'di la su yang yang dag par 'da' ba yang med 'ong ba yang med do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_lha'i bu chos thams cad ni yang dag par 'da' ba med pa las blta bar bya'o/_/lha'i bu dper na/_nam mkha' 
[\[140a.5\]]ni ma skyes pa/_ma byas pa/_mngon par ma grub pa/_'pho ba med pa/_'ong ba med pa ste/_chos thams cad kyang de bzhin du blta bar bya'o/_/gtam 'di bstan pa na lha'i 'khor de'i nang nas lha'i bu bdun khri nyis stong chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba skyes so/_/sngon dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa'i lha'i 
[\[140a.6\]]bu khri drug stong ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyes so/_/dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su smin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' brgyad stong ni mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa skyes so/_/de dag gi lag tu bcom ldan 'das kyi mthus sngon ma mthong ba'i me tog gi snod byung bar gyur te/_me tog gi 
[\[140a.7\]]snod de dag nas de bzhin gshegs pa la gtor to/_/me tog de dag gis kyang sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i gnas kho ra khor yug tu khebs par gyur to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das lha'i bu 'di rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs 
[\[140b\]]
[\[140b.1\]]pa la me tog gtor ba gang dag lags pa 'di dag ni sngon ma mthong lags so/_/de nas lha'i bu zla bas lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces smras so/_/kau shi ka da ltar gang la me tog dag gis gtor ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa 'di yang sngon ma mthong ngo /_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka sems can 
[\[140b.2\]]gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa ma mthong ba'i sems de ni 'gags shing med par gyur te mthong bar mi nus so/_/kau shi ka de bas na gang ci mthong yang rung ste/_de dag thams cad ni sngon ma mthong ba'o/_/gang ci thos kyang rung ste/_de dag thams cad ni sngon ma thos pa'o/_/smras pa/_lha'i 
[\[140b.3\]]bu khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ngam/_smras pa/_kau shi ka gal te de bzhin gshegs pa gzugs zhes bya ba yin na ni/_bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ngo /_/kau shi ka gal te de bzhin gshegs pa tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa 
[\[140b.4\]]zhes bya ba yin na ni bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa mthong na/_kau shi ka de bzhin gshegs pa ni gzugs zhes bya ba'am/_tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba ma yin no/_/kau shi ka de bzhin gshegs pa ni phung po lnga'i chos kyi mtshan nyid kyis 
[\[140b.5\]]rab tu phye ba ma yin te de ni mthong bar sla ba ma yin no/_/kau shi ka gzhan yang gang khyod 'di skad du lha'i bu khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ngam zhes zer ba ni/_ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pas bdag gzigs pa de bzhin du bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ngo /_/smras pa/_lha'i 
[\[140b.6\]]bu khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa ji ltar mthong /_smras pa/_kau shi ka de bzhin gshegs pa mdun na bzhugs pa 'di la zhus shig_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das lha'i bu zla ba ji ltar gzigs
