[\[140b.7\]]lags/_bka' stsal pa/_kau shi ka gzugs su mi mthong ngo /_/tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes par mi mthong ngo /_/sngon gyi mtha' dang /_phyi ma'i mtha' dang /_da ltar byung bar mi mthong ngo /_/langs 
[\[141a\]]
[\[141a.1\]]pa dang /_'dug pa dang /_'gro ba dang /_'ong ba dang /_rgyab dang /_glo dang /_mdun dang /_chos la ma gtogs par mi mthong ngo /_/slob par mi mthong ngo /_/mi slob par mi mthong ngo /_/mi slob pa'i chos dang ldan par mi mthong ngo /_/
[\[141a.2\]]dgra bcom par mi mthong ngo /_/dgra bcom pa'i chos dang ldan par mi mthong ngo /_/nyan thos kyi sa dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi sa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi sar mi mthong ste/_kau shi ka de ltar mthong ngo /_/kau shi ka sus de ltar mthong ba des ni yang dag par mthong ste/_log par 
[\[141a.3\]]mthong ba ma yin no/_/su yang dag par mthong ba des ni ci yang mi mthong ngo /_/su ci yang mi mthong ba des ni mnyam par mthong ste mi mnyam par mi mthong ngo /_/kau shi ka de ltar gzigs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa ni thams cad gzigs pa zhes bya'o/_/kau shi ka de ltar gzigs 
[\[141a.4\]]pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya ste/_'on kyang de bzhin gshegs pa ni chos kyi dbyings 'dres par yang mi mdzad do/_/kau shi ka 'di ji snyam du sems/_de ltar gzigs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pas ci zhig gzigs par 'gyur/_gsol pa/_bcom 
[\[141a.5\]]ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pas ni ming gzigs pa ma lags/_gzugs gzigs pa ma lags te/_bcom ldan 'das 'di la ni chos 'ga' tsam yang grangs su bgyis pa ma mchis so/_/bcom ldan 'das ci de bzhin gshegs pas ji ltar gzigs pa de bzhin du lha'i 
[\[141a.6\]]bu zla bas kyang de ltar mthong lags sam/_bka' stsal pa/_kau shi ka mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' su yang rung ba de dag thams cad kyis ni chos kyi dbyings kyi lugs kyis chos 'ga' tsam yang gzung ba'i phyir chos gang yang mi mthong ngo /_/gsol 
[\[141a.7\]]pa/_bcom ldan 'das ci lha'i bu zla ba mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob lags sam/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kau shi ka khyod kyis lha'i bu zla ba 'di nyid la dris shig dang /_'di nyid kyis khyod la lan ldon no/_/de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis lha'i bu zla ba 
[\[141b\]]
[\[141b.1\]]la 'di skad ces smras so/_/lha'i bu khyod mi skye ba'i chos rnams la bzod pa skyes sam/_smras pa/_kau shi ka ci mi skye ba skye'am/_smras pa/_lha'i bu de ni ma yin no/_/smras pa/_kau shi ka gal te mi skye ba skye bar gyur na mi skye ba'i chos rnams su'i bzod pa skye bar 'gyur/_kau shi ka mi 
[\[141b.2\]]skye ba zhes bya ba de ni chos kyi dbyings kyi tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]so/_/chos kyi dbyings gang yin pa de la ni skye ba'am 'gag pa mi dmigs so/_/de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin 'di snyam du sems par gyur te/_lha'i bu 'di'i bstan pa de 'dra ba las na/_kye ma lha'i bu 'di ni bzod pa thob pa 
[\[141b.3\]]yin te/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub dang nye'o snyam mo/_/de nas lha'i bu zla bas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyi sems kyi yongs su rtog pa sems kyis shes nas/_lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces smras so/_/kau shi ka bzod pa thob pa gang dag yin pa de 
[\[141b.4\]]dag ni sangs rgyas kyi byang chub dang nye ba ma yin no/_/smras pa/_lha'i bu khyod ci las bsams te de skad zer/_smras pa/_kau shi ka thob ces bya ba de ni dmigs pa'i tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]yin la dmigs pas ni byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya'o/_/mi skye ba'i bzod pa zhes bya 
[\[141b.5\]]ba de ni mi skye ba'i tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]so/_/mi skye ba gang yin pa de nyid ni byang chub bo/_/smras pa/_lha'i bu zla ba byang chub nyid gang las btsal bar bya/_smras pa/_kau shi ka byang chub ni bdag gi ngo bo nyid las btsal bar bya'o/_/smras pa/_bdag gi ngo bo nyid gang las btsal bar bya/_smras 
[\[141b.6\]]pa/_chos gang ma skyes/_mi skye/_skye bar mi 'gyur ba de las btsal bar bya'o/_/ci nas kyang tshol ba na gang btsal ba dang /_gang gis btsal ba de yang slong bar mi byed pa de ltar btsal bar bya'o de nas bcom ldan 'das la lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das 
[\[141b.7\]]lha'i bu zla ba 'di de ltar zab mo'i shes rab dang ldan pa ngo mtshar lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das lha'i bu zla ba 'di gang nas shi 'phos te 'dir mchis lags/_de nas lha'i bu zla bas lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces smras so/_/kau shi ka sgyu ma mkhan gyis skyes pa'am/_bud med 
[\[142a\]]
[\[142a.1\]]sprul pa gang yin pa de gang nas shi 'phos te 'dir 'ongs/_'di nas shi 'phos nas gang du 'gro bar 'gyur/_smras pa/_lha'i bu sgyu ma sprul pa la ni shi 'pho'am skye ba med do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ni rnam par rtog pa med pa'i phyir ro/_/smras pa/_kau shi ka khyod 
[\[142a.2\]]'di skad du sprul pa 'di gang nas shi 'phos te 'dir 'ongs/_'di nas shi 'phos nas gang du 'gro bar 'gyur zhes zer ba de ci mkhas pa rnams kyis smad par mi 'gyur ram/_smras pa/_lha'i bu de de bzhin no/_/smras pa/_kau shi ka bdag ni khyod kyis dri ba de la 'di snyam du byed de/_
[\[142a.3\]]gang khyod kyis lha'i bu 'di gang nas shi 'phos te 'dir mchis/_'di nas shi 'phos nas gar skye bar 'gyur zhes zhus pa ni sgyu ma lta bu'i chos rnams la de skad 'dri bar zad do snyam mo/_/kau shi ka 'di ji snyam du sems/_de bzhin gshegs pas sprul pa sprul par mdzad pa gang yin 
[\[142a.4\]]pa de 'ong ngam/_'chi 'pho'am/_skye'am/_smras pa/_lha'i bu de ni ma yin no/_/smras pa/_ci bya ba gang gi phyir/_sprul pa bya ba de byed dam/_smras pa/_lha'i bu byed do/_/smras pa/_kau shi ka de bzhin du gang gis chos thams cad sprul pa lta bu dang sgyu ma lta bur rtogs pa de ni 
[\[142a.5\]]'gro ba dang /_'ong ba dang /_'chi 'pho dang /_skye ba yang ston la de ni ci la yang rnam par mi rtog ste/_bya ba de yang byed do/_/kau shi ka 'di ji snyam du sems/_gang rmi lam du gzugs mthong ba'am/_sgra thos pa'am/_dri snom pa'am/_ro myong ba'am/_reg bya la reg pa'am/_
[\[142a.6\]]chos rnam par shes pa de dag ci de na ci yang yod dam/_smras pa/_lha'i bu de ni med do/_/smras pa/_kau shi ka de bzhin du gang gis chos thams cad rmi lam gyi ngo bo nyid du rtogs pa de ni mthong ba dang /_thos pa dang /_dran pa dang /_bye brag phyed pa dang /_rnam par shes pa'i chos rnams 
[\[142a.7\]]la chags par mi 'gyur/_rjes su chags par mi 'gyur/_khong khro bar mi 'gyur ro/_/mthong ba dang /_thos pa dang /_dran pa dang /_bye brag phyed pa dang /_rnam par shes pa'i chos rnams kyang gzhan dag la rjod par byed la/_brjod pa de yang mngon par zhen pa med do/_/de nas 
[\[142b\]]
[\[142b.1\]]bcom ldan 'das la lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das lha'i bu zla ba 'di skye ba yang mi dmigs 'chi 'pho yang mi dmigs lags na/_bcom ldan 'das 'dis ji ltar sems can rnams yongs su smin par bgyi bar rtogs shing bgyid par 'gyur 
[\[142b.2\]]lags/_gang la skye ba yang ma mchis/_'chi 'pho yang ma mchis pa de ni nyan thos kyis lags te/_de ni byang chub sems dpa'i sa ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpas ni bskal pa stong phrag mang por 'khor bar bgyi 'tshal lags so/_/de skad ces 
[\[142b.3\]]gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/kau shi ka byang chub sems dpa' mi skye ba'i chos rnams la bzod pa skyes pa ni su yang rung ste/_de ni skye ba la yang rlom sems med la 'chi 'pho la yang rlom sems med de/_de 
[\[142b.4\]]ni dgra bcom pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas lo brgya lon pa ji lta ba de bzhin du gzung bar bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de la ni bdag tu 'du shes dang gzhan du 'du shes mi 'jug pa'i phyir ro/_/kau shi ka gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' gang gtan du yongs su mya ngan las 
[\[142b.5\]]'das pa'i chos rnams kyang /_de ltar skye ba la yang rlom sems mi byed/_'chi 'pho la yang rlom sems mi byed pa dang /_bdag tu 'du shes par yang mi byed/_gzhan du 'du shes par yang mi byed la sems can gang chos kyi tshul gyi bzod pa 'di mi shes pa de dag la brda sprad pa'i 
[\[142b.6\]]phyir snying rje chen pos ched du bskal pa bye ba 'bum phrag grangs med par 'khor yang skyo ba med pa ni mchog tu dka' ba byed pa yin no/_/kau shi ka dper na mi la la zhig me mdag gi dong du lhung nas tshig cing 'dug pa de la mi snying rje chen po dang ldan pa 'ga' zhig gis lus dang srog la yang ma 
[\[142b.7\]]bltas te/_'dod pa'i yon tan lnga la dga' zhing 'dug pa las/_dga' zhing rtse ba bor nas me'i phung po de'i nang nas mi de phyung ste/_bdag nyid tshig pa ni dang du blangs na/_kau shi ka 'di ji snyam du sems/_mi de dka' ba byed pa yin nam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 
[\[143a\]]
[\[143a.1\]]'das dka' ba bgyid pa lags so/_/bka' stsal pa/_kau shi ka byang chub sems dpa' gang nyon mongs pa thams cad las grol la srid pa len par byed pa ni de bas kyang ches dka' ba byed pa yin no/_/kau shi ka de bas na rnam grangs 'dis kyang khyod kyis 'di 
[\[143a.2\]]ltar rig par bya ste/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni ci nas kyang nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas rnams zil gyis mnan nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/_/kau shi ka khyod 'di skad du lha'i bu 'di gang nas shi 'phos 
[\[143a.3\]]te 'dir 'ongs zhes zer ba de ngas bshad kyis nyon cig_/kau shi ka sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas shar phyogs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing khrag khrig 'bum phrag bdun cu rtsa gnyis 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che'i phung po bkram pa zhes bya ba zhig yod de/_'jig rten gyi khams de na 
[\[143a.4\]]rin po che du mas brgyan pa'i shing ljon pa rin po che sna tshogs kyi me tog rgyas pa dag dang 'chag sa'i skyed mos tshal gyi khang pa brtsegs pa rin po che sna tshogs kyis spras pa'i zam pa dang ldan pa dag yod do/_/sa gzhi chen po de yang bai dUr+ya las grub pa ste/_rin po che 'bum phrag mang pos 
[\[143a.5\]]spras so/_/kau shi ka 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che'i phung po bkram pa de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas phyag na rin chen gzi brjid mngon par 'phags pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba chos ston to/_/de na theg pa gnyis po 'di lta ste/_nyan 
[\[143a.6\]]thos kyi theg pa'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa rnam par gzhag pa med de/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'ba' zhig gis yongs su gang ngo kau shi ka de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas phyag na rin chen gzi brjid 
[\[143a.7\]]mngon par 'phags pa'i rgyal po de'i chos bstan pa re re la byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig phrag sum cu rtsa drug gis bzod pa thob par gyur te/_bzod pa thob pa'i mod la byang chub sems dpa' de dag ta la bdun srid tsam gyi nam mkha' la 'phags nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad 
[\[143b\]]
[\[143b.1\]]rab tu g.yos par byas te/_stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad rin po che'i pad ma 'dab ma 'bum yod pa sha stag gis pus mo nub tsam du khebs par byas nas de ltar 'khod bzhin du yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gzhan dag la blta ba dang /_phyag 
[\[143b.2\]]'tshal ba dang /_bsnyen bkur bya ba dang /_chos mnyan pa'i phyir bar snang las sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan dag tu 'dong bar byed do/_/kau shi ka sangs rgyas kyi zhing der bzod pa thob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' su yang mi gnas te/_bzod pa thob pa'i mod la sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan 
[\[143b.3\]]du 'dong ngo /_/kau shi ka de bzhin gshegs pa de byung nas bskal pa bcu gnyis kyi bar du nyin gcig bzhin du nyin lan gsum mtshan lan gsum du chos bstan pa 'byung ste/_chos bstan pa re re la byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig phrag sum cu rtsa drug gis bzod pa thob par 'gyur te 
[\[143b.4\]]bzod pa thob pa'i mod la sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan dag tu 'dong ngo /_/kau shi ka byang chub sems dpa' ji snyed bzod pa thob nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan du 'dong ba de snyed kyi byang chub sems dpa' dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan dag nas shi 'phos nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing der skye 
[\[143b.5\]]bar 'gyur te/_kau shi ka de lta bu'i tshul gyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing de byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag mang po dag gis mi stongs so/_/kau shi ka 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che'i phung po bkram pa de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa 
[\[143b.6\]]yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas phyag na rin chen gzi brjid mngon par 'phags pa'i rgyal po de'i thad nas lha'i bu zla ba 'di mi snang bar gyur te/_nga la blta ba dang /_phyag 'tshal ba dang /_bsnyen bkur bya ba dang /_zhu ba dang /_dri bar bya ba dang /_chos kyi 
[\[143b.7\]]rnam grangs 'di yang skye bo mang po la rgyas par bya ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa' gzhan dag gi yang chos kyi bzod pa 'di yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir sum cu rtsa gsum gyi gnas 'dir gnas par gyur to/_/kau shi ka lha'i bu zla ba 'di ni nga'i tshe'i mthas 
[\[144a\]]
[\[144a.1\]]gtugs pa'i bar du dam pa'i chos yongs su bzung nas de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'og tu phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus dam pa'i chos nub pa'i dus la bab pa na/_'di nas shi 'phos nas 'dzam bu'i gling du mi rnams dang skal ba mnyam par skye bar 
[\[144a.2\]]'gyur te/_'di lta bu'i chos kyi rnam grangs zab mo zab par snang ba 'di dag yongs su 'dzin pa la brtson par 'gyur ro/_/sems can 'bum phrag mang po dag kyang chos kyi bzod pa 'di la 'dod pa skyed par 'gyur ro/_/de phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus dam pa'i chos nub pa na mi'i 'jig rten nas 
[\[144a.3\]]shi 'phos nas dga' ldan gyi lha'i ris su skye bar 'gyur te/_dga' ldan gyi gnas na gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa dang lhan cig tu sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi byang chub 'di 'dzin du 'jug par 'gyur ro/_/lha'i bu 'bum phrag dpag tu 
[\[144a.4\]]med pa sngon byang chub tu sems ma bskyed pa dag kyang skyed du 'jug par 'gyur ro/_/gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba de'i tshe lha'i bu 'di 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir gnas 
[\[144a.5\]]nas lo bcu'i bar du khyim par 'dug cing de bzhin gshegs pa byams pa nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa la bkur sti byed bla mar byed par 'gyur ro/_/de de'i 'og tu mi khri bzhi stong dang lhan cig tu khyim nas khyim med par rab tu 'byung bar 'gyur te/_rab tu byung nas kyang de 
[\[144a.6\]]bzhin gshegs pa byams pa'i tshe'i mthas gtugs pa'i bar du dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur ro/_/yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas kyang dam pa'i chos ji srid gnas pa de srid du dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur ro/_/bskal pa bzang po'i sangs rgyas dgu brgya 
[\[144a.7\]]dgu bcu rtsa drug 'byung bar 'gyur ba gang dag yin pa de dag thams cad mnyes par byed par 'gyur ro/_/mnyes par byas nas kyang bkur sti byed par 'gyur te/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag thams cad kyi thad du tshangs par spyad pa spyod par 'gyur ro/_/de de'i 'og tu 
[\[144b\]]
[\[144b.1\]]bskal pa gang gA'i klung bdun cu'i bye ma snyed 'das pa na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas zla ba'i 'od ces bya bar 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas 
[\[144b.2\]]lha'i bu zla mchog gis lha'i bu zla ba la 'di skad ces smras so/_/lha'i bu khyod bcom ldan 'das kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan na/_ci khyod de bzhin gshegs pa la lhag par dga' ba dang /_dang ba dang /_gus pa skye'am/_de skad ces smras 
[\[144b.3\]]pa dang /_lha'i bu zla bas lha'i bu zla mchog la 'di skad ces smras so/_/lha'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa ni 'dun pa'i dbang du 'gro ba'am/_'jigs pa'i dbang du 'gro bas lung ston pa cung zad kyang med de/_lha'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa ni byang chub sems dpa' gang byang chub sems 
[\[144b.4\]]dpa'i bslab pa la slob pa lung ston par zad na/_gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa la lhag par dga' ba'am/_dang ba'am/_gus pa skyed du ci zhig yod/_smras pa/_lha'i bu dang ba gang las yongs su btsal bar bya/_smras pa/_dang ba sems las yongs su btsal bar 
[\[144b.5\]]bya'o/_/smras pa/_gang sems la sems su 'du shes pa des dang ba gang las btsal bar bya/_smras pa/_gang la 'dzin pa med pa de la dang ba yod do/_/smras pa/_gang la 'dzin pa med pa de la mchog tu dang ba yod dam smras pa/_lha'i bu de ni dang ba yin te/_gang la 
[\[144b.6\]]sdang ba yang med/_rab tu sdang ba yang med/_dang ba yang med pa dang /_gang la so so'i skye bo'i dang ba med pa de la ni dang ba yod do/_/de de ltar dang bar gyur pas de la rang bzhin gyis dang ba yang med la de ni de phyin chad kyang sdang bar mi 'gyur ro/_/lha'i bu de lta bas na dang ba 
[\[144b.7\]]thob par 'dod pas myur du chos lnga la sbyor bar bya ste/_ci nas sbyor ba yang med 'bral ba yang med pa de ltar sbyor bar bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_chos kyi dbyings la ni sbyor bar yang med/_'bral ba yang med pa'i phyir ro/_/de nas lha'i bu zla mchog gis lha'i bu zla ba la 'di 
[\[145a\]]
[\[145a.1\]]skad ces smras so/_/lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa'i bslab pa zhes bya na byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bslab pa rnams gang yin/_smras pa/_lha'i bu gang la lus kyang med/_lus kyi sdom pa yang med/_ngag kyang med/_ngag gi sdom pa yang med/_yid 
[\[145a.2\]]kyang med/_yid kyi sdom pa yang med pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sdom pa'i mchog yin no/_/gang la yid kyang med/_'dzin pa yang med/_sogs pa yang med/_'bri ba yang med pa de ni lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bslab pa yin no/_/de nas lha'i bu 
[\[145a.3\]]zla mchog gis lha'i bu zla ba la 'di skad ces smras so/_/lha'i bu khyod bslab pa 'di la bslabs pas de bzhin gshegs pas lung bstan tam/_smras pa/_lha'i bu bdag ni bslab pa 'di la bslabs pas de bzhin gshegs pas lung bstan to/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_lha'i bu 
[\[145a.4\]]bslab pa 'di la ni gang gis shes par 'gyur ba'i bdag gam/_bdag gi zhes bya ba'am/_bdag slob bo snyam du 'dzin pa med de/_yang dag par zhugs pa de ni bdag slob bo snyam du de ltar mi sems so/_/smras pa/_ji tsam gyis na yang dag par zhugs par 
[\[145a.5\]]'gyur/_smras pa/_gang mnyam pa nyid la snon par yang mi byed/_'bri bar yang mi byed/_len par yang mi byed/_'dor bar yang mi byed pa dang /_gang mnyam pa nyid la chos 'di dag ni mchog go/_/chos 'di dag ni ngan pa'o zhes gnyis su mi 'byed cing chos 
[\[145a.6\]]'di la yang dag par so sor shes te/_de ltar zhugs pa gang yin pa de ni yang dag par zhugs pa zhes bya'o/_/de nas lha'i bu zla mchog gis lha'i bu zla ba la 'di skad ces smras so/_/lha'i bu khyod kyis chos gang dag thob pa dang /_chos gang dag spangs pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pas 
[\[145a.7\]]lung bstan/_smras pa/_lha'i bu bdag ni so so'i skye bo'i chos rnams spangs pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams thob pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pas lung bstan pa ma yin gyi/_lha'i bu bdag ni chos 'di dag ma spangs ma thob pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pas lung bstan to/_/
[\[145b\]]
[\[145b.1\]]smras pa/_de lta na ni byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams kyang lung bstan par 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_so so'i skye bo rnams ni so so'i skye bo'i chos rnams kyang ma spangs la/_sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyang ma thob pa'i phyir ro/_/smras pa/_lha'i bu so so'i skye bo'i chos rnams 
[\[145b.2\]]kyis ci zhig spros par byed/_smras pa/_stong pa nyid dang /_chos nyid spros par byed do/_/smras pa/_sangs rgyas kyi chos de dag gis ci zhig spros par byed/_smras pa/_de bzhin nyid dang /_yang dag pa'i mtha' spros par byed do/_/smras pa/_stong pa nyid dang /_chos nyid spros 
[\[145b.3\]]par nus sam/_smras pa/_lha'i bu de ni ma yin no/_/smras pa/_de bzhin nyid dang /_yang dag pa'i mtha' spros par nus sam/_smras pa/_de ni ma yin no/_/smras pa/_lha'i bu bdag gis de las bsams te/_so so'i skye bo'i chos rnams ma spangs pa dang /_sangs rgyas 
[\[145b.4\]]kyi chos rnams ma thob pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pas bdag lung bstan to zhes smra'o/_/smras pa/_ci stong pa nyid dang /_chos kyi dbyings dang /_de bzhin nyid dang /_yang dag pa'i mtha' byang chub tu ji ltar lung bstan pa de bzhin du khyod de bzhin gshegs pas byang chub tu lung 
[\[145b.5\]]bstan tam/_smras pa/_bdag ni stong pa nyid dang /_chos kyi dbyings dang /_de bzhin nyid dang /_yang dag pa'i mtha' ji lta ba de bzhin du lung bstan to/_/lha'i bu chos 'di dag gi de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du lung bstan pa yang de bzhin te/_gang lung bstan zin 
[\[145b.6\]]pa yang de bzhin no/_/gang lung ston pa yang de bzhin no/_/gang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba'am/_mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba yang de bzhin no/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la lha'i bu zla mchog gis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das 
[\[145b.7\]]lha'i bu zla ba 'di ni zab mo'i shes rab dang ldan pa lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_lha'i bu bzod pa thob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi chos nyid ni de yin te/_lan ci dang ci 'debs pa de dag thams cad chos kyi dbyings kho nas 'debs la chos kyi 
[\[146a\]]
[\[146a.1\]]dbyings ni bstan pa'am/_lan gdab pa'am/_brjod par yang mi nus so/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_chos kyi dbyings ni brjod du med cing bsnyad du med pa'i phyir ro/_/chos kyi dbyings ji lta ba bzhin du sems can gyi khams kyang de dang 'dra'o/_/sems can 
[\[146a.2\]]gyi khams ji lta ba bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi yul yang de dang 'dra'o/_/chos thams cad kyang de dang 'dra'o/_/lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' gang dag de ltar chos kyi dbyings kyi rjes su 'gro ba de dag ni gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog pa zhes bya'o/_/gtam 'di brjod pa na tshe dang ldan pa maung 
[\[146a.3\]]gal gyi bu chen po khang [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]rnam par rgyal byed na 'dug ste/_'khor chen po la chos ston cing 'dug go/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po stan las langs te 'chag par byed do/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po 'di snyam du sems te/_kye ma 'dzam bu'i gling 
[\[146a.4\]]'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis stongs so/_/sems can dge ba'i bsam pa can dag kyang mang na/_de dag kyang chos mi thos pas yongs su nyams par 'gyur ro snyam mo/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen pos de nyid kyi phyir lha'i 
[\[146a.5\]]mig gis 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir rnam par bltas na/_des de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dge slong stong nyis brgya lnga bcu'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang thabs cig tu rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po na rgyal po gzugs can snying po'i khang pa na 
[\[146a.6\]]bshos gsol ba mthong nas de 'di snyam du sems te/_'di na bdag dang 'dra ba'i dge slong 'ga' lta yod dam snyam pa dang /_des bdag dang 'dra ba'i dge slong zhig bcom ldan 'das kyi g.yon logs na/_zan za zhing 'dug pa mthong nas des bdag gi lus la brtags so/_/
[\[146a.7\]]de brtags nas de la [{]chung zad [,]cung zad [}]kyang tha dad par ma mthong ste/_bdag nyid kyi chu zheng ci 'dra ba de'i chu zheng yang de kho na dang 'dra la lhag chad med de/_kha dog de dang /_rtags de dang /_dbyibs de tha dad pa med par mthong nas de 'di snyam du sems te/_de bzhin gshegs pa 'dzam bu'i gling 
[\[146b\]]
[\[146b.1\]]du gshegs sam snyam mo/_/des shing yongs 'du'i drung du bltas na de na yang de bzhin gshegs pa lha'i tshogs kyis bskor te chos ston cing bzhugs la shA ri'i bu yang g.yas logs na 'dug pa dang /_maud gal gyi bu 'dra ba'i dge slong yang g.yon logs na 'dug pa dang /_de ma 
[\[146b.2\]]yin pa'i nyan thos chen po dag kyang de na 'khod par mthong ngo /_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po 'di ltar ngo mtshar che bar gyur te/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni ngo mtshar che'o/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni rdzu 'phrul che'o/_/che bar yang grags so/_/
[\[146b.3\]]mthu yang che ste/_'di ltar 'dzam bu'i gling na yang chos ston pa'i rgyun mi 'chad la/_sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i gnas na yang sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams la chos ston to snyam mo/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po rgya cher ngo mtshar du gyur nas 'dzam bu'i gling du rnam par bltas na des de 
[\[146b.4\]]bzhin gshegs pa rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na 'khor 'bum phrag du mas yongs su bskor cing mdun gyis bltas te chos ston cing bzhugs pa mthong ngo /_/de na yang bdag kho na dang 'dra ba'i dge slong kha dog kyang de dang 'dra/_rtags kyang de dang 'dra/_dbyibs kyang 
[\[146b.5\]]de dang 'dra ba zhig mthong ngo /_/shA ri'i bu dang /_'od srung chen po dang /_kA t+yA'i bu chen po dang /_gang po dang /_rab 'byor dang /_nam gru dang /_rta thul dang /_ka pi na dang /_nyan thos chen po thams cad kyang chu zheng de kho na bzhin du mthong ngo /_/rgyal po'i khab na ji lta ba bzhin du rgyal bu 
[\[146b.6\]]rgyal byed kyi tshal na yang de dang 'dra'o/_/rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal na ji lta ba bzhin du sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i gnas na yang de dang 'dra'o/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po rgya cher ngo mtshar du gyur nas 'dzam bu gling du rnam par bltas na/_des bcom ldan 'das ser skya'i gnas kyi grong khyer chen 
[\[146b.7\]]po na shing n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs pa dang /_ser skya'i grong khyer chen po na bsod snyoms la gshegs pa mthong ste/_der yang maud gal gyi bu dang 'dra ba'i dge slong dang /_de ma yin pa'i nyan thos chen po dag kyang mthong ngo /_/de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa yangs pa'i grong 
[\[147a\]]
[\[147a.1\]]khyer chen po na lid tsa bi gzhon nu dri ma med pa'i zla ba'i khyim na bshos gsol zhing bzhugs pa mthong ste/_der yang bdag kho na dang 'dra ba'i dge slong kha dog de 'dra ba dang /_rtags de 'dra ba dang /_dbyibs de 'dra ba dang /_de ma yin pa'i nyan thos chen po dag kyang mthong ngo /_/
[\[147a.2\]]de nas tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen pos de bzhin gshegs pa bA rA Na sI'i grong khyer chen por bsod snyoms la gshegs nas slar gshegs pa mthong ste/_der yang bdag dang 'dra ba'i dge slong kha dog kyang de dang 'dra/_rtags kyang de dang 'dra/_dbyibs kyang de dang 'dra ba dang /_de ma yin pa'i nyan 
[\[147a.3\]]thos chen po dag kyang mthong ngo /_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen pos 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir rnam par bltas na/_de bzhin gshegs pa bzhugs bzhugs pa gang yang rung ste/_gtsug lag khang ngam/_'chag sa'am/_shing drung ngam/_rdo leb bam/_sa phyogs 
[\[147a.4\]]gang yang rung ba'i sa phyogs ji snyed pa de dag thams cad du de bzhin gshegs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis yongs su bskor cing mdun gyis bltas pa spyod lam sna tshogs kyis bzhugs pa mthong ngo /_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po rgya cher ngo mtshar du gyur nas byang gi sgra mi 
[\[147a.5\]]snyan gyi gling du rnam par bltas na de na yang de bzhin gshegs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang thabs cig tu byang gi sgra mi snyan gyi gling na bsod snyoms la gshegs pa dang /_bsod snyoms bzhes nas bshos gsol zhing bzhugs pa mthong ste/_de na yang bdag nyid dang 'dra ba'i 
[\[147a.6\]]dge slong dang /_de ma yin pa'i nyan thos chen po dag kyang mthong ngo /_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen pos shar gyi lus 'phags kyi gling du rnam par bltas na/_des der yang de bzhin gshegs pa skye bo'i tshogs chen po'i dbus na chos ston cing bzhugs pa mthong ste/_
[\[147a.7\]]de na yang bdag nyid dang 'dra ba'i dge slong dang /_de ma yin pa'i nyan thos chen po dag kyang mthong ngo /_/de bzhin du nub kyi ba lang spyod kyi gling na yang de bzhin gshegs pa bsam gtan nang du yang dag par 'jog la bzhugs te/_srog chags stong phrag du ma phyag 'tshal zhing 'dug 
[\[147b\]]
[\[147b.1\]]pa dang /_nyan thos chen po thams cad me'i khams kyi ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pa dag kyang mthong ste/_de na yang bdag nyid dang 'dra ba'i dge slong zhig mthong ngo /_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po rgya cher ngo mtshar du gyur nas sa bla'i lha rnams kyi gnas su rnam par bltas na de na 
[\[147b.2\]]yang de bzhin gshegs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs cig tu chos ston pa mthong ste/_de na yang bdag nyid dang 'dra ba'i dge slong dang /_de ma yin pa'i nyan thos chen po dag kyang mthong ngo /_/de bzhin du bar snang gi lha rnams kyi gnas su rnam par bltas na/_de na yang de bzhin 
[\[147b.3\]]gshegs pa 'khor brgya phrag du ma la chos ston pa mthong ste/_de na yang bdag nyid dang 'dra ba'i dge slong dang /_de ma yin pa'i nyan thos chen po dag kyang mthong ngo /_/de bzhin du rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams dang /_sum cu rtsa gsum pa dang /_'thab bral dang /_dga' ldan 
[\[147b.4\]]dang /_'phrul dga' dang /_gzhan 'phrul dbang byed rnams su yang de dang 'dra'o/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen pos tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar du rnam par bltas na tshangs pa'i 'jig rten na yang de bzhin gshegs pa tshangs pa 'bum phrag du mas yongs su bskor cing mdun gyis bltas 
[\[147b.5\]]nas chos ston pa mthong ste/_de na yang bdag nyid dang 'dra ba'i dge slong kha dog kyang de dang 'dra/_rtags kyang de dang 'dra/_dbyibs kyang de dang 'dra/_chu zheng yang de kho na dang 'dra ba mthong ngo /_/maud gal gyi bu 'dra ba'i dge slong de dag thams cad kyang rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul gyis chos ston te/_
[\[147b.6\]]thams cad kyang maud gal gyi bu zhes bya bar shes so/_/shA ri'i bu 'dra ba'i dge slong de dag thams cad kyang shes rab kyi snang ba chen pos 'khor gyi mdun na seng ge'i sgra sgrogs te/_de dag thams cad kyang shA ri'i bu zhes grags te/_de ltar nyan thos chen po de dag rang rang gi stobs bskyed pas 
[\[147b.7\]]chos ston to/_/de nas maud gal gyi bu chen po dga' zhing mgu la spu zing zhes byed nas ngo mtshar du gyur te/_dga' ba dang /_mchog tu dga' ba skyes nas/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni ngo mtshar to/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mchog tu ngo mtshar to zhes 
[\[148a\]]
[\[148a.1\]]lan gsum du ched du brjod pa ched du brjod do/_/de nas maud gal gyi bu chen po sangs rgyas rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas rnams la phyag 'tshal lo zhes tshig tu smra zhing khang [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]rnam par rgyal byed nas shugs chen pos yan lag lngas phyag byas so/_/de'i 
[\[148a.2\]]tshe ca co'i sgra chen po 'jig rten du grags te/_sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i gnas thams cad g.yos so/_/de na lha'i bu 'bum phrag du ma mi dga' bar gyur te/_bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/_bcom ldan 'das rgyu gang dang rkyen gang gis ca co'i sgra chen po dang /_sa chen po g.yo ba 'jig 
[\[148a.3\]]rten du byung lags/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i bu de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/lha'i bu dag dge slong maud gal gyi bu 'di sangs rgyas la gces par 'dzin pa'i phyir sa chen po'i steng du phyag byas te/_'di ni de'i mthu yin no/_/
[\[148a.4\]]gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du dge slong maud gal gyi bu chen po sa chen po'i steng du phyag 'tshal lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_lha'i bu dag dge slong maud gal gyi bu de 'ong gis de la dris shig_/de nas gnas brtan maud gal gyi bu chen po khang 
[\[148a.5\]{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]rnam par rgyal byed nas langs te shin tu myur ba dang /_shin tu rings par bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug ste/_sor 
[\[148a.6\]]mo bcu'i thal mo sbyar nas bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa dag gis bstod pa/_mgon po mtshungs med mi yi dbang po khyad par brnyes/_/dri ma gsum gyi tha ba spangs pa sems dul ba/_/mi mchog lha dang mi yi mchod pa'i gnas gyur pa/_/rgyal ba'i blo yi spyod pa 
[\[148a.7\]]bsam gyis yong mi khyab/_/nyi ma 'bum phrag mang po dag ni shar ba na/_/sems can long ba kun gyis mthong bar mi 'gyur ba/_/de bzhin stobs bcu mnga' ba kun tu 'od zer ldan/_/nyan thos kun gyis shes par sla bar ma lags so/_/nyan thos 'di dag thams cad 
[\[148b\]]
[\[148b.1\]]dmus long 'dra ba ste/_/sangs rgyas theg pa zhes ni 'dzin par yod mi bgyid/_/de bzhin gshegs pa la ni dang bas mchi mod kyi/_/rgyal ba dag gi chos nyid kyang ni yod ma 'tshal/_/rgya mtsho chen po'i drung na ba rjes lta bu dang /_/ri rab rgyal po dang ni yungs 'bru gcig pu dang /_/nyi 
[\[148b.2\]]ma'i 'od dang srin bu me khyer 'dra ba ste/_/sangs rgyas spyan sngar nyan thos 'khor rnams de dang 'dra/_/lhun po rnams kyang yungs 'bru dag la 'dod mi bgyid/_/mkha' la nyi ma gnas pa me khyer 'dod mi bgyid/_/rgya mtsho chen po ba rjes chu la 'dod mi bgyid/_/byang chub sems dpa' nyan 
[\[148b.3\]]thos rnams la 'dod mi bgyid/_/dmus long mi dang lha yi mig ldan ci 'dra dang /_/phal pa'i mi dang 'khor los sgyur ba ci 'dra dang /_/zla ba'i 'od kyis skar ma rnams ni zil gnon pa/_/sangs rgyas spyan sngar nyan thos 'khor rnams de dang 'dra/_/lha mo sgyu 'phrul la ni thugs brtse'i 
[\[148b.4\]]don slad du/_/lhun po'i rtse mo 'di na rgyal ba bzhugs pa na/_/sangs rgyas dang ni dge slong dge 'dun mi bzhugs pas/_/bdag ni 'dzam bu'i gling 'di stong snyam yid la bgyid/_/bcom ldan bdag ni rnam par rgyal byed nang na mchis/_/lha yi bu mo rnams la chos ni ston pa na/_/
[\[148b.5\]]bdag gis lha yi mig gis 'dzam bu'i gling du bltas/_/grong khyer dang ni tshong 'dus brgya phrag brtag pa bgyid/_/brtags pa'i tshe na bdag gis der ni rgyal ba mthong /_/rgyal po'i khab dang mthu chen gzugs can snying po'i khang /_/grong rdal mi dang 'khor gyis mdun gyis bltas pa na/_/
[\[148b.6\]]nyan thos rnams dang thabs cig tu ni bshos kyang gsol/_/g.yon logs na ni bdag gi kha dog 'dra ba yi/_/maud gal gyi ni bu mchis pa yang bdag gis mthong /_/g.yas logs na ni shA ri'i bu mchis gzhan dag kyang /_/rgyal ba yi ni nyan thos thams cad 'khod pa 
[\[148b.7\]]mthong /_/lhun po yi ni steng du rgyal ba gshegs snyam bgyid/_/bdag gis brtags na lhun po'i zom na bzhugs pa mthong /_/bdag nyid kyang ni rgyal po'i khab na mchis pa dang /_/lhun po'i rtse mo de nyid na yang mchis pa mthong /_/grong khyer mnyan yod na yang 'jig rten 
[\[149a\]]
[\[149a.1\]]mgon po ni/_/srog chags bye ba mang po dag la chos ston mthong /_/de dag na yang bdag dang shA ri'i bu dang ni/_/nyan thos gzhan rnams gang lags de dag mthong bar gyur/_/shAkya dag gi nang du bsod snyoms gshegs pa mthong /_/yangs pa nas ni 
[\[149a.2\]]slar gshegs pa yang mthong bar gyur/_/bA rA Na sIr yang ni de bzhin mthong bar gyur/_/thams cad du yang bdag nyid kyi ni lus kyang mthong /_/byang gi sgra mi snyan gyi gling na de bzhin du/_/tshogs dang lhan cig bsod snyoms dag la rgyu ba mthong /_/ma dros mtsho yi nang dag 
[\[149a.3\]]na yang nyan thos bcas/_/bsod snyoms zhal zas gsol ba bdag gis mthong bar gyur/_/de bzhin nub kyi ba lang spyod kyi gling dag na/_/sems can bye ba phrag gis mang po'i don mdzad mthong /_/thams cad du ni maud gal bu yang rdzu 'phrul gyi/_/stobs kyis 'gro ba 
[\[149a.4\]]rnams ni 'dul bar bgyid pa mthong /_/de bzhin du yang shar gyi lus 'phags gling dag na/_/mi rnams la ni chos rnams sna tshogs ston pa mthong /_/de na yang ni bdag dang shA ri'i bu dag dang /_/gzhan yang nyan thos gang lags de dag bdag gis mthong /_/de bzhin sa bla 
[\[149a.5\]]pa yi lha yi gnas rnams dang /_/bar snang dag na chos ni ston cing bzhugs pa mthong /_/chos kyi mnga' bdag dam pa khyod ni 'jig rten skyong /_/bzhi po dag la chos rnams ston cing bzhugs pa mthong /_/de bzhin du yang 'thab bral lha rnams nang du mthong /_/de nas shAkya seng ge 
[\[149a.6\]]dga' ldan dag tu mthong /_/rab 'phrul dag dang gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dag na yang /_/mgon po nyan thos rnams dang bcas pa bdag gis mthong /_/tshangs pa'i 'jig rten dag na tshangs pa bye ba la/_/chos rnams ston cing bzhugs pa bdag gis mthong bar gyur/_/thams 
[\[149a.7\]]cad du yang bdag gi lus dang de bzhin du/_/gzhan yang rgyal ba'i nyan thos rnams ni bdag gis mthong /_/gtsug lag khang dang 'chags shing gi gnas rnams dang /_/phug rnams gang na sngon chad sangs rgyas bzhugs bzhugs pa/_/thams cad du yang shAkya seng ge ci 'dra ba/_/
[\[149b\]]
[\[149b.1\]]de 'dra'i chos kyi rgyal po bdag gis mthong bar gyur/_/dpa' bo khyod kyi chos nyid 'di ni bdag gis su/_/mthong nas bdag ni ngo mtshar rmad du 'dzin par gyur/_/sangs rgyas 'od mdzad de dag rnams kyi rdzu 'phrul mchog_/'di 'dra de dag ngo mtshar rab tu che ba lags/_/rnam 'dren sum 
[\[149b.2\]]cu gsum na bzhugs par ma bas kyi/_/'dzam bu'i gling na thams cad du yang snang zhing bzhugs/_/grong rnams dang ni yul 'khor grong khyer dag na yang /_/kha dog 'thun pa yis ni chos rnams ston cing bzhugs/_/'jig rten mgon po khyod ni ji ltar mthong ba bzhin/_/de snyed 
[\[149b.3\]]kyi ni shA ri'i bu dang gsus po che/_/ka pi na dang nam gru kA t+yA na'i bu/_/gang po dang ni rab 'byor 'od srung mthong bar gyur/_/thos pa rgya mtsho lta bu'i dge ba kun dga' bo/_/kun tu sangs rgyas rnams la zhu ba bdag gis mthong /_/thams cad du yang bdag gi lus ni mdog 
[\[149b.4\]]dang rtags/_/mtshungs shing lhag pa ma mchis bdag gis mthong bar gyur/_/sangs rgyas bsam gyis mi khyab rnams la phyag 'tshal zhes/_/bdag gis lhun po'i zom la ched du brjod pa brjod/_/bdag gis spu yang zing zhes bgyid de gus pas gnas/_/yan lag lnga 
[\[149b.5\]]po rnams kyis kyang ni phyag bgyis lags/_/sgra skad chen po dag kyang yongs su grags par gyur/_/stong gsum sa gzhi dag kyang rab tu g.yos par gyur/_/lhun po'i rtse mo 'di yang kun tu snang bar gyur/_/rgyal ba des pa dag gi mthu ni mthong gyur nas/_/da ltar bdag ni 
[\[149b.6\]]shin tu rings pa'i tshul gyis su/_/mi mchog ga la bzhugs pa der ni bdag mchis te/_/chos kyi rnam par dbye ba mkhas pa khyod la zhu/_/rgyal ba de bzhin gshegs rnams ji ltar rnam par 'phrul/_/'dzam bu'i gling dang lha yi 'jig rten dag dang ni/_/lho phyogs dang ni shar 
[\[149b.7\]]phyogs byang gi phyogs rnams dang /_/tshangs pa'i 'jig rten dang ni bar snang gnas bzhugs pa/_/rgyal ba rnams kyi de nyid gang lags bdag la gsungs/_/ston pa chen po rdzu 'phrul che ba 'di mthong bas/_/deng ni bdag gis rnyed pa legs par rnyed par gyur/_/de 
[\[150a\]]
[\[150a.1\]]yi 'og tu sangs rgyas theg pa 'di dag las/_/bdag nyid dman par gyur pa deng du mya ngan bgyid/_/gal te bdag sems rnam par grol bar ma gyur na/_/byang chub tu ni da ltar sems kyang bskyed pa zhig_/bcom ldan bdag gi zag pa zad pas bgyir ma mchis/_/
[\[150a.2\]]bdag ni sangs rgyas ye shes 'di yi snod ma lags/_/ji ltar rgya mtshor rin chen don du song song na/_/kyi hud nor bu rin chen bor te mching bu blangs/_/byang chub bor nas nyan thos gyur pa gang lags pa'i/_/sems can rnams kyang da ni de 'drar mkhyen par mdzod/_/sems can 
[\[150a.3\]]dman pa ngan pa'i lta ba can dag ni/_/rgya chen byang chub tu ni sems kyang skye mi 'gyur/_/brtson 'grus ldan zhing mthu rtsal brten pa gang lags pa/_/de dag sangs rgyas ye shes la ni 'dun pa skyed/_/mgon po bdag ni thal mo sbyar nas sangs rgyas kyi/_/ye shes mchog zhugs 
[\[150a.4\]]gang lags pa la phyag kyang 'tshal/_/shAkya seng ge bzhin du de dag rnam par 'phrul/_/bdag ni 'di la yid gnyis mi 'tshal dogs ma mchis/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po la bka' stsal pa/_maud gal gyi bu chen po khyod kyi 
[\[150a.5\]]yul ji lta ba de bzhin du khyod kyis mthong zhing lta bar zad kyi/_maud gal gyi bu sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi yul bsam gyis mi khyab pa gang yin pa ni sems can thams cad rang sangs rgyas su gyur pas kyang kun shes pa'am/_rnam par shes par mi nus na/_
[\[150a.6\]]nyan thos phyogs gcig pa la spyod cing phyogs gcig gi shes pa dang ldan pa khyod kyis lta ga la shes/_maud gal gyi bu gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam par 'phrul pa'i cho 'phrul zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs ston 
[\[150a.7\]]gyis de'i bar du 'khor ma 'ongs pa rnams ni sdus shig_/'khor 'dus pa rnams ni 'khod du chug shig_/bcom ldan 'das de ltar 'tshal lo zhes gsol te/_tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen pos bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan nas lus 'bar zhing 'od zer dag 'gyed 
[\[150b\]]
[\[150b.1\]]bzhin du de'i tshe tshangs pa'i 'jig rten du 'dug nas gling chen po bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams su skad kyis bsgo ste de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/_/bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig rnams su yang /_/de bzhin gshegs rnams 'byung ba shin tu dkon/_/u dum ba ra'i me tog ji lta 
[\[150b.2\]]ba/_/'dren pa rnams mthong ba yang de dang 'dra/_/'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po rdzu 'phrul che/_/bsod nams stobs dang ldan zhing bu stong dang /_/rin chen bdun ldan 'dod pa gang yin pa/_/de ni song la sangs rgyas chos nyon cig_/brgya byin tshangs par 'gyur bar su 'dod 
[\[150b.3\]]dang /_/'dir ni lha mi'i bde ba gzhan dag gis/_/dga' zhing rtse la rtag tu bde ldan 'dod/_/de ni chos kyi rgyal po ltar song shig_/nyon mongs kun skams zhi ba mya ngan 'das/_/bdud rtsi reg dang rdzu 'phrul stobs gnas nas/_/rnam par 'phrul par 'dod pa gang yin pa/_/
[\[150b.4\]]de ni song la rgyal ba'i chos nyon cig_/rang sangs rgyas sam nyan thos 'gyur ba 'am/_/yang na stobs bcas dpung bcas bdud btul nas/_/sangs rgyas rkang gnyis mchog 'gyur 'dod pa gang /_/de ni chos kyi mnga' bdag ltar song shig_/de nas gnas brtan maung gal 
[\[150b.5\]]gyi bus bskul ba'i lha bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma dang /_'dod pa na spyod pa dang /_gzugs na spyod pa'i lha'i bu rnams myur du myur bar shin tu rings par me tog dang /_me tog phreng dang /_spos dang /_phye ma khyer nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas bcom 
[\[150b.6\]]ldan 'das la mchod pa byas te/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bus rdzu 'phrul de btang nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go/_/
[\[150b.7\]]de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po la bka' stsal pa/_maud gal gyi bu de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam par 'phrul ba'i cho 'phrul zhes bya ba'i chos kyi 
[\[151a\]]
[\[151a.1\]]rnam grangs ngas bshad do/_/bcom ldan 'das de ltar 'tshal lo zhes gsol te/_tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar nyan pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/maud gal gyi bu stong gsum gyi 
[\[151a.2\]]stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na zla ba bye ba phrag brgya dang /_nyi ma bye ba phrag brgya dang /_rgya mtsho chen po bye ba phrag brgya dang /_ri'i rgyal po ri rab bye ba phrag brgya dang /_gling chen po bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba phrag brgya yod de/_stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 
[\[151a.3\]]'jig rten gyi khams 'di ni sangs rgyas rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing yin no/_/maud gal gyi bu 'di ji snyam du sems/_gling chen po bzhi pa 'di 'ba' zhig tu nga mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi gling gzhan du ni ma yin no snyam du sems na/_maud gal gyi bu khyod kyis de ltar blta 
[\[151a.4\]]bar mi bya ste/_gling chen po bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du sems can rnams ji ltar yongs su smin pa bzhin du nga chos ston te/_kha cig tu ni mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas/_kha cig tu ni da dung ma'i mngal na gnas/_kha cig tu ni dga' ldan gyi gnas na 'dug_/
[\[151a.5\]]kha cig tu ni yongs su mya ngan las 'das par ngas yang dag par shes so//_//bam po gsum pa ste tha ma/_maud gal gyi bu stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di nyid na gling chen po bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di nyid kyi shar phyogs su gling chen 
[\[151a.6\]]po bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams khri nyis stong 'das pa na gling chen po bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams rdul med ces bya ba zhig yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rdul bral blo gros zhes bya ba da ltar chos ston to/_/maud gal gyi bu 
[\[151a.7\]]gling chen po bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams de na 'khod pa'i sems can de dag ni 'dod chags chung ba dang /_zhe sdang chung ba dang /_gti mug chung ba dang /_byad bzang ba dang /_legs par bshad kyis byang bar byed pa yin no/_/de na byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa ni nyung ba ste/_
[\[151b\]]
[\[151b.1\]]phal cher nyan thos kyi theg pa pa yin no/_/maud gal gyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rdul bral blo gros des chos bstan pa re re la nyan thos bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu dgu 'dul bar byed de/_da ltar 'di na rgyun du zhugs pa zhes bya ba 
[\[151b.2\]]dang /_lan cig phyir 'ong ba zhes bya ba dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba zhes bya ba bstan pa de lta bu'i dge sbyong gi tshul gyi 'bras bu bzhi rnam par gzhag pa ni de na med kyi de dag thams cad ni stan gcig la 'dug pa sha stag ste/_kha cig ni mngon par shes pa mngon sum du byed cing rnam par 
[\[151b.3\]]thar pa brgyad rjes su 'thob pa dang /_ye shes chen po thob nas ta la bdun srid tsam gyi nam mkha' la mngon par 'phags nas rang gi me'i khams kyis rang gi lus sreg par byed de/_yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa de dag gi thal ba'i bag tsam yang med do/_/maud gal 
[\[151b.4\]]gyi bu de ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa de rgyun mi 'chad par chos ston cing sems can rnams rnam par grol bar byed la rgyun mi 'chad par nyan thos rnams yongs su mya ngan las zlo bar byed do/_/de na sbyin pa yang med/_len pa yang med do/_/bza' ba dang /_btung 
[\[151b.5\]]ba dang /_gos rnams bsams pa tsam gyis 'byung bar 'gyur te/_dper na sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi dang 'dra'o/_/de na sems can rnams mngal na gnas pa med de rdzus te skye'o/_/sa gzhi chen po de yang gser las grub pa yin no/_/maud gal gyi 
[\[151b.6\]]bu de bzhin gshegs pa rdul bral blo gros de'i 'jig rten gyi khams de na mi de dag gi tshe'i tshad ni lo lnga brgya thub ste/_bar ma dor 'chi ba med do/_/maud gal gyi bu 'di ji snyam du sems/_'jig rten gyi khams de na bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rdul bral blo gros zhes 
[\[151b.7\]]bya ba de gzhan zhig yin snyam du sems na/_maud gal gyi bu khyod kyis de ltar mi blta'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_nga nyid 'jig rten gyi khams de na ming de skad ces bya bas chos ston to/_/maud gal gyi bu 'di yang sangs rgyas kyi rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par 'phrul pa'i cho 'phrul 
[\[152a\]]
[\[152a.1\]]yin te/_de la ni nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis 'jug par mi nus so/_/maud gal gyi bu stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di nyid na lho phyogs su gling chen po bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams khri brgyad stong 'das pa na gling chen po 
[\[152a.2\]]bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams rin chen 'byung zhes bya ba rin po che sna bzhi 'di lta ste/_gser dang /_dngul dang /_shel dang /_rdo'i snying po las grub pa zhig yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen phung po zhes bya ba 
[\[152a.3\]]da ltar chos ston te/_maud gal gyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa de ni shas cher rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams las brtsams nas chos ston te/_de na ni nyan thos kyi theg pa pa dag kyang nyung ngo /_/byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa dag kyang nyung ngo /_/rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa'i 
[\[152a.4\]]sems can gang dag yin pa de dag 'jig rten gyi khams de nas shi 'phos nas 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong pa dag tu skye bar 'gyur te/_de dag rkyen gnyis kyis rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'thob par 'gyur ro/_/maud gal gyi bu 'di ji snyam du sems/_'jig rten 
[\[152a.5\]]gyi khams de na bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen phung po zhes bya ba de gzhan zhig yin snyam du sems na/_maud gal gyi bu khyod kyis de ltar mi blta'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_nga nyid 'jig rten gyi khams de na ming de skad ces bya bas chos ston to/_/maud gal gyi bu 'di 
[\[152a.6\]]yang sangs rgyas kyi rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par 'phrul pa'i cho 'phrul yin te/_de la ni nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis 'jug par mi nus so/_/maud gal gyi bu stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di nyid nas nub phyogs su gling chen po bzhi pa'i 'jig 
[\[152a.7\]]rten gyi khams nyi khri nyis stong 'das pa na gling chen po bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams rin chen sna tshogs can zhes bya ba rin po che sna bdun gser dang /_dngul dang /_bai dUr+ya dang /_shel dang /_rdo'i snying po dang /_mu tig dmar po dang /_spug las grub pa zhig yod de/_maud 
[\[152b\]]
[\[152b.1\]]gal gyi bu 'jig rten gyi khams de na rin po che las byas pa'i 'chag sa dag dang /_rin po che las byas pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa dag dang /_rin po che'i stegs bus brgyan pa'i rdzing bu dag kyang yod do/_/bza' ba dang /_btung ba dang /_gos kyang bsams pa tsam gyis 
[\[152b.2\]]'byung bar 'gyur te/_dper na dga' ldan gyi lha rnams kyi nye bar spyod pa dang /_longs spyod ji lta ba de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams de na 'khod pa'i mi de dag gi nye bar spyod pa dang /_longs spyod kyang de dang 'dra'o/_/de na bud med kyi ming yang mi grag go/_/de na bud med 
[\[152b.3\]]skye ba yang med do/_/de na sems can de dag 'khrig pa'i chos kun tu spyod pa yang med do/_/sems can de dag 'dod pa'i rtog pa yang mi byed/_gnod sems kyi rtog pa yang mi byed/_rnam par 'tshe ba'i rtog pa yang mi byed do/_/de na su yang mngal na gnas pa 
[\[152b.4\]]med de sems can de dag rdzus te skye zhing skyil mo krung bcas bzhin du 'byung ngo /_/maud gal gyi bu rin chen sna tshogs can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen 'byung zhes bya ba da ltar chos ston te/_byang 
[\[152b.5\]]chub sems dpa'i sde snod ces bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs kyi gzungs kyi rdo rje'i tshig 'khor gsum yongs su chad pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang ldan pa ma gtogs par gtam gzhan mi gsung ngo /_/de na sems can dpag tu med grangs med pa dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs 
[\[152b.6\]]pa'i byang chub tu sems skyed par byed do/_/sems can dpag tu med grangs med pa dag gis mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob bo/_/sems can dpag tu med grangs med pa dag ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ston to/_/de na theg pa gnyis po 'di lta ste/_
[\[152b.7\]]nyan thos kyi theg pa dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa rnam par gzhag pa yang med de/_byang chub sems dpa' nyes pa'i dri nga ba med cing 'khrig pa dang bral ba 'ba' zhig gis gling chen po bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams de yongs su gang ngo /_/de bzhin gshegs pa de'i tshe tshad ni 
[\[153a\]]
[\[153a.1\]]lo brgyad khri bzhi stong thub bo/_/mi de dag ni bar ma dor 'chi 'pho ba yod de/_sems can su yang de nas shi 'phos nas sems can dmyal ba'am/_dud 'gro'i skye gnas sam/_gshin rje'i 'jig rten na ma/_mi khom pa rnams su skye ba med do/_/byang chub 
[\[153a.2\]]sems dpa' de dag phal cher de nas shi 'phos nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa gzhan dag tu skye bar 'gyur te/_de bzhin gshegs pa rnams mngon sum du 'gyur ro/_/gling de dag na lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za 'khod pa gang dag yin pa de dag thams cad ni 'di lta ste/_
[\[153a.3\]]thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems dang blo gros su blo gros gcig go/_/lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za de dag sangs rgyas kyi chos la dga' ba ma gtogs par gzhan la dga' ba mi skyed do/_/lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za dang /_mi de dag kyang lha zhes bya ba 
[\[153a.4\]]'am/_klu zhes bya ba'am/_dri za zhes bya ba'am/_mi zhes bya bar ming du gdags pa tsam yod pa ma gtogs par tha dad du dbyer med do/_/maud gal gyi bu 'di ji snyam du sems/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen 'byung 'jig rten 
[\[153a.5\]]gyi khams de na chos ston pa gang yin pa de gzhan zhig yin snyam du sems na/_maud gal gyi bu khyod kyis de ltar mi blta'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_nga nyid 'jig rten gyi khams de na ming de skad ces bya bas chos ston to/_/maud gal gyi bu 'di yang sangs rgyas kyi rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par 
[\[153a.6\]]'phrul pa'i cho 'phrul yin te/_de ni nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis kun shes par sla ba ma yin no/_/maud gal gyi bu stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di nyid nas byang phyogs su gling chen po bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams sum khri drug stong 'das pa 
[\[153a.7\]]na gling chen po bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'jigs med ces bya ba rin po che sna gnyis te/_gser dang dngul las grub pa zhig yod de/_de na sems can dmyal ba'i 'jigs pa yang med/_dud 'gro'i skye gnas kyi 'jigs pa yang med/_gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi 'jigs pa 
[\[153b\]]
[\[153b.1\]]yang med/_mi khom pa'i 'jigs pa yang med/_ngan 'gro'i 'jigs pa yang med do/_/de na sems can su yang tshul khrims nyams pa'am/_lta ba nyams pa'am/_cho ga nyams pa med do/_/de na gzhan mu stegs can spyod pa pa dang /_kun tu rgyu rnams kyi ming 
[\[153b.2\]]du gdags pa yang med do/_/maud gal gyi bu 'jig rten gyi khams 'jigs med de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'jigs med sbyin zhes bya ba da ltar chos ston te/_maud gal gyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa de ni 'di lta ste/_
[\[153b.3\]]nyan thos su 'gyur ba dang /_rang sangs rgyas su 'gyur ba dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su 'gyur ba'i theg pa gsum las brtsams nas sems can rnams la chos ston to/_/maud gal gyi bu/_de bzhin 
[\[153b.4\]]gshegs pa de gang gi tshe byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya ba'i phyir byang chub kyi shing drung du 'gro bar 'dod pa dang /_byang chub kyi shing drung na 'dug pa de la bdud blo gros bzang po zhes bya ba la sogs pa bdud khrag khrig phrag bdun cu rtsa gnyis 'ong bar 'gyur ro/_/de'i 
[\[153b.5\]]tshe de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub sems dpar gyur pa/_da dung thams cad mkhyen pa ma thob pa des bdud ji snyed yod pa de snyed kyi byang chub kyi shing sprul par byed do/_/byang chub kyi shing ji snyed yod pa de snyed kyi byang chub sems dpa' rang rang gi byang chub kyi shing drung na 'dug 
[\[153b.6\]]pa dag sprul te/_der bdud de dag ngo mtshar du gyur nas yang dag pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de gang yin/_bdag cag gis gang gi bar chad bya snyam mo/_/de nas sprul pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis bdud de dag la 'di skad ces smras so/_/grogs po dag 
[\[153b.7\]]chos thams cad ni sgyu ma lta bu yin na 'di la ji ltar khyod kyis bar chad bya/_gzhan yang khyed kun gyis gang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa'am/_gang yang dag par 'dzud pa de'i bsod nams ji snyed 'phel bar 'gyur ba shes sam/_khyod kyis ni de yang 
[\[154a\]]
[\[154a.1\]]mi rtogs so/_/gal te khyod kyis byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa la zhugs pa'i bar chad byed pa'i bsod nams ma yin pa ji snyed 'phel bar 'gyur ba shes na ni khyed bar chad byed pa'i phyir brtul bar ma byed cig_/de nas bdud rnams kyis smras pa/_gang 
[\[154a.2\]]bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa'am/_gang gzhan la khong du chud par bgyis te yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug pa de bsod nams ji snyed cig bskyed par bgyid/_smras pa/_grogs po dag gang gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed rin 
[\[154a.3\]]po ches yongs su bkang ste sbyin pa byin pa bas/_gang gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed na/_de ni de bas ches bsod nams mang du skyed par 'gyur ro/_/grogs po dag gang gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can de dag thams cad 
[\[154a.4\]]la bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis bskal pa 'bum gyi bar du bkur sti byas pa bas/_gang gis gzhan la khong du chud par byas te yang dag par 'dzin du bcug na de ni de bas ches bsod nams mang du skyed par 'gyur ro/_/de dag gis smras pa/_gang gis bla na med pa yang dag par 
[\[154a.5\]]rdzogs pa'i byang chub las byang chub sems dpa'i bar chad bgyis na de bsod nams ma lags pa ji snyed cig skyed par 'gyur/_sprul pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis smras pa/_sems can de dag gi mig phyung na de bsod nams ma yin pa ji tsam zhig skyes par 'gyur/_de dag gis 
[\[154a.6\]]smras pa mang ngo /_/smras pa/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las byang chub sems dpa'i bar chad byas pa ni de bas ches bsod nams ma yin pa mang du skyed par 'gyur ro/_/de nas bdud mang po de dag gdams ngag 'di dag bstan pa dang /_cho 'phrul 'di lta bu 
[\[154a.7\]]mthong nas thams cad kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do/_/sprul pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad la yang lha'i me tog dang /_me tog phreng dang /_byug pa rnams kyis mngon par gtor to/_/sil snyan brgya stong dag kyang kun tu dkrol 
[\[154b\]]
[\[154b.1\]]te/_tshig 'di skad du ded dpon chen po khyod myur ba myur bar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas de'i 'og tu bdag cag kyang byang chub la dgod du gsol zhes kyang 'dzer to/_/der lha gzhan dag gis kyang sgra phyung ste/_kye ma bdud 
[\[154b.2\]]'di dag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa'i phyir 'di rnams ni ngan 'gro'i 'jigs pa thams cad las rab tu grol lo/_/kye ma de bzhin gshegs pa 'di ni 'jigs pa med pa sbyin pa ste/_de bas na de bzhin gshegs pa 'di'i mtshan ni 'jigs 
[\[154b.3\]]med sbyin 'jigs med sbyin zhes bya'o zhes 'dzer to/_/maud gal gyi bu 'di ji snyam du sems/_'jig rten gyi khams de na sems can de dag la chos ston pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa de gzhan zhig yin snyam du sems na/_maud gal gyi bu khyod kyis de ltar mi blta'o/_/
[\[154b.4\]]de ci'i phyir zhe na/_nga nyid 'jig rten gyi khams de na ming de skad ces bya bas chos ston to/_/maud gal gyi bu 'di yang sangs rgyas kyi rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par 'phrul pa'i cho 'phrul yin te/_de la ni nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis 'jug par mi nus so/_/maud gal 
[\[154b.5\]]gyi bu stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di nyid nas shar dang lho'i phyogs mtshams su gling chen po bzhi'i 'jig rten gyi khams brgyad khri bzhi stong 'das pa na gling chen po bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kun nas sna tshogs can zhes bya ba zhig yod de/_de na de bzhin 
[\[154b.6\]]gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas me tog sna tshogs can zhes bya bas chos ston to/_/maud gal gyi bu gling chen po bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams de yang bkra zhing blta na sdug la mig [{]mangs [,]mang [}]ris su 'dug cing rin po che'i dra bas khebs la/_ka tsa 
[\[154b.7\]]lin di ka ltar reg na bde ba'i rtswa sngon po khrun du sor bzhi tsam gyis kun tu khyab par 'dug go/_/sa chen po de yang rkang pa bteg na ni par ces byed la rkang pa bzhag na ni nems zhes byed de/_sa chen po de lag mthil ltar mnyam par 'dug go/_/maud gal gyi bu kun nas 
[\[155a\]]
[\[155a.1\]]sna tshogs can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams de na grong khyer chen po bzang mchog ces bya ba 'byor cing rgyas la bde ba dang /_lo legs pa dang /_nyams dga' ba dang /_skye bo dang /_mi mang pos gang ba zhig yod de/_grong khyer de'i shar phyogs nas nub phyogs 
[\[155a.2\]]kyi chur ni dpag tshad sum cu rtsa gnyis yod do/_/lho phyogs nas byang phyogs kyi zheng du ni dpag tshad bcu gnyis yod do/_/maud gal gyi bu grong khyer chen po bzang mchog de'i nang na sems can ches mang ba dag gnas kyi/_yul ang ga dang /_ma ga d+hA dang /_ku ru 'di dag na ni de lta ma 
[\[155a.3\]]yin no/_/maud gal gyi bu de ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa me tog sna tshogs can ni grong khyer chen po bzang mchog na gnas shing bzhugs te/_de'i chos bstan pa gcig gis sems can khrag khrig phrag sum cu ni dgra bcom pa nyid du btul to/_/khrag khrig phrag sum cu ni phyir mi 'ong ba'i 
[\[155a.4\]]'bras bu la btul to/_/khrag khrig phrag sum cu ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la btul to/_/khrag khrig phrag sum cu ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la btul to/_/khrag khrig phrag sum cu ni rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub tu yongs su smin par byas so/_/de'i nyis 'gyur ni 
[\[155a.5\]]bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do/_/gzhan yang sems can dpag tu med pa dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su smin par byas so/_/maud gal gyi bu gling chen po bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams de na sbrang rtsi 'byung zhes bya ba'i shing ljon pa rtag tu me tog 
[\[155a.6\]]dang ldan pa dang /_rtag tu 'bras bu dang ldan pa dag yod de/_me tog dang /_'bras bu de dag gi ro ni dper na ro brgya dang sbyar ba'i 'bras can dang 'dra ste/_de las skyes pa'am/_bud med dag gis me tog gcig gam/_'bras bu gcig zos na de nyin mtshan bdun 
[\[155a.7\]]gyi bar du des 'tsho bar 'gyur te/_spro ba dang mdog kyang nyams par mi 'gyur la/_lus gzi byin dang kha dog dang ldan par yang nyams su tshor bar 'gyur ba dang /_zo bdog yang bar 'gyur ro/_/zos nas kyang phyi sa dang gci ba med la/_ngar snabs dang 
[\[155b\]]
[\[155b.1\]]snabs kyang med do/_/'jig rten gyi khams de na zhing rmed pa yang med/_tshong byed pa yang med/_rtsis byed pa yang med/_las su bya ba yang med de/_sems can de dag ni me tog dang 'bras bu za'o/_/de na phyug po yang med/_dbul po yang med de/_
[\[155b.2\]]sems can de dag longs spyod mnyam mo/_/maud gal gyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa de'i nyan thos kyi dge 'dun ni 'bum phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu yod do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa de yang me tog kun tu rgyas pa zhes bya ba'i skyed mos tshal de na bzhugs te/_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[155b.3\]]de nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas par bzhugs nas gdugs tshod la bab pa na shing ljon pa rnams der 'dud par 'gyur te/_me tog dang 'bras bu de dag bcom ldan 'das dang /_dge slong rnams kyi lhung bzed kyi nang du 'brul bar 'gyur la/_bshos gsol zin par rig 
[\[155b.4\]]nas shing ljon pa de dag phyir rangs te snga mkho bzhin du 'dug go/_/maud gal gyi bu 'jig rten gyi khams de'i yon tan ni de dag yin te/_de bas kyang lhag par yod do/_/maud gal gyi bu 'di ji snyam du sems/_de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten gyi khams de na sems can 
[\[155b.5\]]de dag la chos ston pa de gzhan zhig yin par khyod som nyi'am/_yid gnyis sam/_the tshom za na khyod kyis de ltar mi blta'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_nga nyid 'jig rten gyi khams de na me tog sna tshogs can zhes bya ba'i ming gis chos ston to/_/maud gal gyi bu 'di yang 
[\[155b.6\]]sangs rgyas kyi rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par 'phrul pa'i cho 'phrul yin te/_de la ni nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis 'jug par mi nus so/_/maud gal gyi bu stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di nyid nas lho dang nub kyi phyogs mtshams su 
[\[155b.7\]]gling chen po bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams bdun khri 'das pa na/_gling chen po bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par phye ba'i blo gros zhes bya ba zhig yod de/_de na gling gcig na'ang rgyal po brgyad khri yod do/_/gling gcig la yang grong khyer brgyad khri dang /_tshong 'dus 
[\[156a\]]
[\[156a.1\]]brgyad khri yod do/_/grong dang /_grong khyer dang /_grong rdal dang /_yul 'khor dang /_tshong 'dus de dag thams cad na yang mi bye ba phrag 'bum dag gis yongs su gang ngo /_/rgyal po de dag thams cad kyang rang rang gi rgyal srid kyis chog par 'dzin to/_/
[\[156a.2\]]rgyal po de dag thams cad kyang chos dang ldan pa'i rgyal po ste chos ma yin pa spangs pa sha stag go/_/rgyal po de dag thams cad la yang btsun mo bud med brgyad khri bzhi stong brgyad khri bzhi stong yod de bud med de dag thams cad kyang yul gyi bzang mo sha stag go/_/rgyal po re 
[\[156a.3\]]re la yang bu lnga brgya lnga brgya yod do/_/rgyal po re re la yang bu mo khri nyis stong nyis stong yod de/_de dag thams cad kyang yul gyi bzang mo sha stag go/_/rgyal po de dag thams cad kyang chad pa med pa dang /_mtshon cha med par rang rang gi 'og tu gtogs pa 
[\[156a.4\]]'dul bar byed do/_/maud gal gyi bu 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par phye ba'i blo gros de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od zer rab tu 'gyed pa zhes bya ba chos ston to/_/maud gal gyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa de ni bla na med pa yang dag 
[\[156a.5\]]par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas gling chen po bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams der ta la bdun srid tsam gyi nam mkha' la mngon par 'phags nas skyil mo krung bcas te/_skyil mo krung gcig gis gling chen po bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams khyab par 
[\[156a.6\]]byas nas 'od zer dag rab tu 'gyed pa dang /_me tog gi char 'bebs pa dang /_sil snyan brgya stong dag dkrol bzhin du sa chen po rnam pa drug tu rab tu bskyod nas/_tshangs pa'i sgra skad lta bu dge ba'i rtsa ba 'bum phrag du mas yang dag par bsgrubs pa'i gsung gis chos kyi 
[\[156a.7\]]'khor lo bskor te/_'di lta ste/_nyon mongs pa thams cad zad par bya ba'i phyir rdul med pa mya ngan las 'das pa yang dag par ston te/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams bsdu ba'i phyir chos ston to/_/des de lta de ltar chos bstan pas gling bzhi pa'i rgyal po brgyad khri 
[\[156b\]]
[\[156b.1\]]bu dang bcas/_chung ma dang bcas/_bu mo dang bcas pa de dag ma gtogs pa'i skyes pa dang /_bud med dang /_khye'u dang /_bu mo de dag chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba rnam par dag go/_/rgyal po de dag bu dang bcas/_chung ma dang 
[\[156b.2\]]bcas/_bu mo dang bcas pas kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed de thams cad kyis tshig 'thun par de bzhin gshegs pa la rab tu 'byung bar gsol ba 'debs so/_/de dag thams cad kyang de bzhin gshegs pas dge slong tshur 
[\[156b.3\]]shog ces gsungs pas rab tu byung ngo /_/de ltar thams cad rab tu byung nas so so'i grong dang /_grong khyer dang /_grong rdal dang /_yul 'khor dang /_tshong 'dus dang /_rgyal po'i pho brang dag tu gnas pa'i longs spyod kyis gnas so/_/ma rmos ma btab pa'i 
[\[156b.4\]]'bras sa lu yang byung ngo /_/lha rnams kyang de dag la bsnyen bkur byed do/_/de nas de bzhin gshegs pa de'i chos bstan pa gnyis pa la nyan thos kyi theg pa pa thams cad ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la bkod do/_/byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa rnams 
[\[156b.5\]]ni chos rnams la mi skye ba dang 'thun pa'i bzod pa la 'god do/_/chos bstan pa gsum pa la ni nyan thos kyi theg pa pa rnams ni phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la 'god do/_/byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa rnams ni mngon par shes pa lnga 'thob bo/_/chos bstan pa bzhi pa 
[\[156b.6\]]la ni nyan thos kyi theg pa pa thams cad ni dgra bcom pa nyid la 'god do/_/byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa rnams ni chos rnams la mi skye bar bzod pa 'thob bo/_/rgyal po'i btsun mo de dag dang /_sras de dag dang /_rgyal po'i bu mo de dag ni lus de nyid kyis bud 
[\[156b.7\]]med kyi lus las gyur te/_skyes pa'i lus thob par gyur nas de dag thams cad kyang de bzhin gshegs pa des bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to/_/maud gal gyi bu 'di ji snyam du sems/_'jig rten gyi khams de na de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[157a\]]
[\[157a.1\]]chos ston pa de gzhan zhig yin snyam du sems na/_maud gal gyi bu khyod kyis de ltar mi blta'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_nga nyid 'jig rten gyi khams de na ming de skad ces bya bas chos ston to/_/maud gal gyi bu 'di yang sangs rgyas kyi rdzu 'phrul gyis 
[\[157a.2\]]rnam par 'phrul pa'i cho 'phrul yin te/_de la ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis 'jug par mi nus so/_/maud gal gyi bu stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di nyid nas nub dang byang gi phyogs mtshams su gling chen po bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams 
[\[157a.3\]]lnga khri lnga stong 'das pa na gling chen po bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams spos ldan zhes bya ba zhig yod de/_tsan dan sbrul gyi snying po 'ba' zhig yod la spos de srang gcig la ni 'dzam bu gling 'di ri'o/_/de na shing ljon pa spos kyi ngad kun nas ldang ba zhes bya ba dag kyang yod de shing 
[\[157a.4\]]gcig las kho ra khor yug tu dpag tshad bcur spos kyi ngad ldang ngo /_/de na sa chen po las pad ma shing rta'i 'phang lo tsam la 'dab ma 'bum phrag du ma dang /_kha dog 'bum phrag du ma dang ldan pa/_'jam zhing ka tsa lin di ka ltar reg na bde ba 'phang du khru bcu pa tsam dag skyes 
[\[157a.5\]]te/_pad ma re re'i dris kyang gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams de dri bsung zhim par byed do/_/gling chen po bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams de na tsan dan gyi khang pa brtsegs pa dang /_tsan dan gyi 'chag sa pad ma dang me tog gis gang bar 'dug go/_/khang pa brtsegs 
[\[157a.6\]]pa sha stag 'bum phrag du mas 'jig rten gyi khams de khyab par 'dug go/_/de na grong dang grong khyer gyi yongs su 'dzin pa med de/_dper na gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams kyi nye bar spyad pa dang /_longs spyod ji lta ba de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams de na mi de dag 
[\[157a.7\]]gi nye bar spyad pa dang /_longs spyod kyang de dang 'dra'o/_/maud gal gyi bu 'jig rten gyi khams spos ldan de na de bzhin gshegs pa spos 'gyed 'od zer can zhes bya ba da ltar chos ston te/_de bzhin gshegs pa de ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi gtam yongs su spangs 
[\[157b\]]
[\[157b.1\]]pa byang chub sems dpa'i gtam 'ba' zhig gsung ngo /_/gling chen po bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyang rdzu 'phrul thob pa sha stag gis yongs su gang ngo /_/byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor de na byang chub sems 
[\[157b.2\]]dpa' chos thams cad la rnam par 'phrul pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i 'jug pa dang ldan pa/_bzod pa gnyis pa thob pa/_mngon par shes pa rnams la mkhas pa/_spobs pas rtogs par khong du chud pa/_sangs rgyas 'bum phrag du ma mang 
[\[157b.3\]]po la bsnyen bkur byas pa 'dug ste/_maud gal gyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos thams cad la rnam par 'phrul pa'i rgyal po de la de bzhin gshegs pa des bskul te skabs phye nas chos ston te/_bcom ldan 'das de'i spyan sngar stan las langs nas de bzhin gshegs 
[\[157b.4\]]pa'i zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/_de bzhin gshegs pa la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas steng gi bar snang la mngon par 'phags te skyil mo krung gis kho ra khor yug tu dpag tshad bcur khyab par byas nas spu'i khung bu thams cad nas 'od zer dag bkye ste/_'jig rten gyi 
[\[157b.5\]]khams thams cad 'od kyis khyab par byas nas me tog kha dog sna tshogs 'bum dang ldan pa/_shing rta'i 'phang lo tsam dag gis sa chen po de dag la mi 'greng tsam du bkram ste/_'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du lha dang mi'i sil snyan dag gi sgra 'byin to/_/sil snyan de dag 
[\[157b.6\]]las kyang chos kyi phyag rgya'i sgra brgyad brgya 'byung ngo /_/chos kyi phyag rgya re re la yang mdo bye ba phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi bsdus so/_/mdo re re la yang tshigs su bcad pa bdun khri nyis stong gis brjod do/_/des skyil mo krung de las ma langs par sems can bye ba khrag khrig 'bum 
[\[157b.7\]]phrag dgu bcu rtsa drug bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa la bkod de thams cad kyang chos rnams mi skye bar bzod pa thob par byas so/_/maud gal gyi bu 'jig rten gyi khams de de lta bu'i byang chub sems dpa' dag gis yongs su gang ngo /_/de na sems 
[\[158a\]]
[\[158a.1\]]can zhar ba'am/_theng po'am/_gyol po'am/_'on pa'am/_dbul po'am/_mdog ngan pa 'ga' yang med de/_sems can de dag thams cad skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sha stag go/_/sems can de dag ni 
[\[158a.2\]]chos kyi dga' ba'i dga' ba ma gtogs par gzhan ci la yang dga' ba med do/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag la ni bsam gtan gyi dga' ba'i zas ma gtogs par zas gzhan ci yang med do/_/de na mi khom par lhung zhing skye ba yang med do/_/de nas shi 'phos nas 
[\[158a.3\]]kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'gro ba ma gtogs par 'gro ba gzhan du 'gro ba med do/_/maud gal gyi bu 'di ji snyam du sems/_'jig rten gyi khams de na bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa spos 'gyed 'od zer can zhes bya ba de gzhan zhig yin snyam du sems na maud gal gyi bu khyod kyis 
[\[158a.4\]]de ltar mi blta'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_nga nyid 'jig rten gyi khams de na ming de skad ces bya bas sems can rnams la chos ston to/_/maud gal gyi bu 'di yang sangs rgyas kyi rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par 'phrul pa'i cho 'phrul yin te/_de la ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis 
[\[158a.5\]]'jug par mi nus so/_/maud gal gyi bu stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di nyid nas byang dang shar gyi phyogs mtshams su gling chen po bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams bzhi khri nyis stong 'das pa na/_gling chen po bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams mya ngan gyis 'joms pa zhes 
[\[158a.6\]]bya ba zhig yod de/_de na sems can 'khod pa rnams ni 'dod chags kyis chags pa dang /_zhe sdang gis sdang ba dang /_gti mug gis rmongs pa dang /_brkam pa dang /_brlang ba dang /_rgod pa dang /_mu cor smra ba dang /_dbang po zhan pa dang /_ser sna can dang /_tshul 
[\[158a.7\]]khrims 'chal pa dang /_gnod sems che ba dang /_le lo can dang /_snyom las can dang /_brjed ngas pa dang /_shes bzhin med pa dang /_bdag tu lta ba dang /_sems can dang /_srog dang /_gang zag tu lta ba dang /_shes rab 'chal pa dang /_lug ltar 
[\[158b\]]
[\[158b.1\]]lkugs pa dang /_ngo tsha mi shes pa dang /_khrel med pa dang /_gus pa med pa dang /_sems 'khrul pa sha stag go/_/sems can de dag ni kha dog ngan pa dang /_chung bar grags pa dang /_byad ngan pa dang /_dka' bas 'tsho ba dang /_gcig la gcig 'drid pas gnas 
[\[158b.2\]]pa sha stag go/_/de na zla ba drug tu char mi 'bab ste/_lo tog legs par mi smin to/_/sa chen po de ni rtsub pa dang /_mkhrang pa dang /_tsher ma sna tshogs can dang /_g.yang sa dang /_ri brag gis gang ngo /_/'jig rten gyi khams de na sems can de dag gi chu ni 'bru mar 
[\[158b.3\]]gyi snyigs ma dang dri ma dang 'dra'o/_/sems can de dag ni gos dang /_chos gos dang /_longs spyod dag gis dbul ba dang /_bkren pa dang /_gzhan gyi nor 'phrog pa sha stag go/_/'jig rten gyi khams de na rgyal po sdang chags zhes bya ba zhig yod de/_sems can de 
[\[158b.4\]]dag la rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug la dbang byed de sems can de dag gi nor dang 'bru byung ngo cog rgyal po'i mdzod du 'brub par byed do/_/sems can de dag ni chad pa dang brdeg pa 'ba' zhig gis gzir ba sha stag go/_/maud gal gyi bu de dag ni 'jig rten gyi khams de na tshe de'i sdug 
[\[158b.5\]]bsngal yin no/_/gang 'chi ba de dag kyang shi nas phal cher sems can dmyal ba rnams dang /_dud 'gro'i skye gnas rnams dang /_gshin rje'i 'jig rten du skye bar 'gyur ro/_/maud gal gyi bu gling chen po bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa 
[\[158b.6\]]yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas snying brtse ba dang snying rje'i sems yid la byed pa zhes bya ba chos ston te/_maud gal gyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa de ni cho 'phrul rnam pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad kyis chos ston to/_/des lo bdun brgya'i bar du chos bstan kyang sems can gcig gis kyang chos 
[\[158b.7\]]mngon par rtogs par ma gyur la de bzhin gshegs pa de yang skyo ba med pa'i steng du snying rje chen pos chos kyang ston to/_/maud gal gyi bu de ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa de grong ngam/_grong khyer ram/_grong rdal du gnas shing bzhugs la sems can de dag gis spyos shing brgyad bkag ste/_smod 
[\[159a\]]
[\[159a.1\]]cing bshung bar byed kyang der sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir snying rje chen pos de dag bzod par mdzad do/_/maud gal gyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa des lo bdun brgya bas kyang lhag pas sems can kha cig yongs su smin par mdzad de chos bstan pa lan cig la/_
[\[159a.2\]]sems can khrag khrig phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhis ni dgra bcom pa nyid thob bo/_/khrag khrig phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhis ni phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob bo/_/khrag khrig phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhis ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob bo/_/khrag khrig phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhis ni rgyun du 
[\[159a.3\]]zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob ste/_de dag kyang nyi ma gcig la rab tu byung ba bsnyen par rdzogs so/_/slob pa dang mi slob pa de dag thams cad kyang gcig la gcig lung bstan pas nyi ma gcig gis yongs su mya ngan las 'das so/_/de bzhin gshegs pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' lnga 
[\[159a.4\]]las kyi sgrib pas der skyes te/_sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba nyams su myong ba de dag yongs su smin par mdzad pa'i phyir da dung yang bzhugs so/_/de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen pos 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 
[\[159a.5\]]'das las kyi sgrib pa gang gis na byang chub sems dpa' rnams re zhig 'jig rten gyi khams nyon mongs par skye bar 'gyur lags/_bka' stsal pa/_maud gal gyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na re zhig skye ba ngan pa len par 'gyur ro/_/bzhi gang zhe na/_maud 
[\[159a.6\]]gal gyi bu byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i ming gis rnyed pas 'tsho bar byed la byang chub sems dpa'i bslab pa la mi slob pa dang /_maud gal gyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' dam pa'i chos spong ba yal bar 'dor zhing zlog par mi byed pa dang /_maud gal gyi bu gzhan 
[\[159a.7\]]yang byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa' gzhan dag gi rnyed pa'i bar chad byed cing bsngags pa ma yin pa brjod pa dang /_maud gal gyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' lus kyi las dang /_ngag gi las dang /_yid kyi las ma bsrungs pa dang ldan pa ste/_maud gal 
[\[159b\]]
[\[159b.1\]]gyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na re zhig 'gro ba ngan par 'gro bar 'gyur ro/_/maud gal gyi bu 'di ji snyam du sems/_'jig rten gyi khams de na bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa snying brtse ba dang snying rje'i sems yid la byed pa zhes bya ba de gzhan 
[\[159b.2\]]zhig yin snyam du sems na/_maud gal gyi bu khyod kyis de ltar mi blta'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_nga nyid 'jig rten gyi khams de na ming de skad ces bya bas sems can rnams la chos ston to/_/maud gal gyi bu 'di yang sangs rgyas kyi rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par 'phrul pa'i cho 
[\[159b.3\]]'phrul yin te/_de la ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis 'jug par mi nus so/_/maud gal gyi bu de ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa ni stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du sangs rgyas kyi phrin las mdzad de/_de la ni ston pas ma bstan 
[\[159b.4\]]pa'i bar du khyed nyan thos rnams kyis 'jug par mi nus so/_/maud gal gyi bu stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na gling chen po bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba phrag brgya yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa mos pa ji lta ba bzhin du sems can rnams la 
[\[159b.5\]]chos ston to/_/maud gal gyi bu stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di nyid na gling chen po bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang na nga tshangs pa'i gzugs kyis chos ston te/_de bzhin gshegs pa rab tu 'byung ba dang /_gos ngur smrig mi ston pa yang yod do/_/
[\[159b.6\]]de bzhin du brgya byin gyi gzugs kyis kyang nga chos ston to/_/de bzhin du skye ba thams cad kyis kyang nga chos ston to/_/maud gal gyi bu stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di dag thams cad na ji lta bur mos pa'i sems can rnams la ji ltar mos pa bzhin du 
[\[159b.7\]]nga chos ston to/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing tshad med pa gzhan dang gzhan dag tu yang nga chos ston te/_de la ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis 'jug par mi nus so/_/maud gal gyi bu dper na zla ba'i dkyil 'khor ram/_nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor ni gzhal 
[\[160a\]]
[\[160a.1\]]med khang nas kyang mi g.yo la grong dang /_grong khyer dang /_grong rdal dang /_yul 'khor dang /_rgyal po'i pho brang thams cad du yang dag par snang ngo /_/maud gal gyi bu de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni rang gi sangs rgyas 
[\[160a.2\]]kyi zhing las kyang ma g.yos la sangs rgyas kyi zhing dpag tu med pa dag tu yang dag par snang ste/_sems can ji ltar yongs su smin par gyur pa rnams la chos ston to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen pos 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das gang 
[\[160a.3\]]sum cu rtsa gsum dag na bzhugs pa dang /_'dzam bu'i gling dang /_lha'i gnas rnams dang /_stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na gling chen po bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan dang gzhan dag na chos ston cing bzhugs pa la de bzhin gshegs pa yang dag pa 
[\[160a.4\]]gang lags/_gang la yon phul na mthu che bar 'gyur ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa yang dag pa ni 'di lags so snyam du bdag gis ji ltar 'tshal bar bgyi/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/maud 
[\[160a.5\]]gal gyi bu de'i phyir khyod nyid la phyir dri bar byas/_khyod kyis ji ltar bzod pa de bzhin du lan thob shig_/maud gal gyi bu 'di ji snyam du sems/_sgyu ma mkhan gyis sprul pa'i skyes pa'am/_bud med gang yin pa de la yang dag pa gang yin/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[160a.6\]]de la ni yang dag pa ci yang ma mchis so/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_sgyu ma mkhan gyis gsang sngags dang rig sngags kyi stobs bskyed de/_sprul pa sprul par byas pas na de dag la ni khyad par ma mchis so/_/bka' stsal pa/_maud gal gyi bu ci gang gi phyir sprul pa 
[\[160a.7\]]de'i bya ba byed dam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das bgyid lags so/_/bka' stsal pa/_maud gal gyi bu de bzhin du sgyu ma lta bu'i chos thams cad la ni khyad par ram tha dad du dbye ba med do/_/maud gal gyi bu ji ltar sgyu ma mkhan gyi gsang sngags dang rig sngags kyi stobs 
[\[160b\]]
[\[160b.1\]]kyis sprul pa mang po sprul la/_de dag kyang mnyam zhing khyad par med pa de bzhin du maud gal gyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i shes rab dang /_rig pa dang /_ye shes kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du ston par mdzad la/_de dag kyang mnyam zhing khyad par med pa 'di lta 
[\[160b.2\]]ste/_sangs rgyas kyi phrin las kyi bya ba byed de de la yon phul ba gang yin pa de dag gi rnam par smin pa yang mnyam par 'gyur ro/_/maud gal gyi bu sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni cung zad kyang tha dad du dbyer med do/_/maud gal gyi bu de lta bas na yang dag pa ma yin pa dang /_
[\[160b.3\]]sgyu ma lta bur gyur pa'i chos thams cad ni chos kyi dbyings su khyad par ra ma tha dad du dbyer med do/_/maud gal gyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa ni bzhed na 'jig rten gyi khams gcig tu yang mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang ldan pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa de'i rang bzhin dang chu zheng dang ldan 
[\[160b.4\]]pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed sprul par mdzad de/_de dag kyang rnam pa drug cu dang ldan pa'i ngag gi las kyis chos ston to/_/de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyis kyang sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi spyod pa mkhyen to/_/de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyang ji ltar
