[\[160b.5\]]mos pa'i sems can rnams la mos pa dang /_dbang po ji lta ba bzhin du 'jug pa'i shes pa bskyed pa'i phyir chos ston to/_/de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyi chos bstan pas sems can sna tshogs nges par 'byung bar 'gyur te/_de ltar sdug bsngal yang dag par 
[\[160b.6\]]zad par bya ba'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad cho 'phrul rnam pa bzhis chos ston to/_/de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad ni sangs rgyas kyi yon tan thams cad kyang yang dag par ston to/_/maud gal gyi bu 'di ji snyam du sems/_de dag la ches khyad par du 
[\[160b.7\]]'phags pa'am/_ches gzugs dang ldan pa'am/_ches kha dog dang ldan pa'am/_ches spobs pa dang ldan pa'am/_ches ye shes dang ldan pa'am/_ches rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa'am/_ches chos ston pa dang ldan pa'am/_ches sems can yongs su dgrol ba dang 
[\[161a\]]
[\[161a.1\]]ldan pa gang yin/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de la ni tha dad par bstan par mi nus lags so/_/bka' bstsal pa/_maud gal gyi bu de lta bas na rnam grangs 'dis kyang chos thams cad ni sprul pa'i ngo bo nyid de/_khyad par yang med/_tha dad du dbyer yang med 
[\[161a.2\]]pa de ltar rig par bya'o/_/maud gal gyi bu chos thams cad sprul pa'i ngo bo nyid du shes pa gang yin pa de dag ni so so'i skye bo rnams la'ang tha dad par dbye bar mi 'dod na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams lta ci smos/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_maud gal gyi bu chos thams cad ni 
[\[161a.3\]]rang bzhin gyis stong pa/_kun du brtags pa dang /_yongs su brtags pa las byung ba ste/_de dag la ji ltar 'dod pa de bzhin du rnam par sgrub mod kyi/_chos kyi dbyings ni skye ba yang med 'jig pa yang med do/_/maud gal gyi bu chos kyi dbyings de ni de bzhin gshegs pas 
[\[161a.4\]]de bzhin du thugs su chud de/_de thugs su chud pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pas spu'i khung bu gcig nas 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can ji snyed pa de dag thams cad kyi mdun du de bzhin gshegs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pa yang dag par ston la/_de dag kyang 
[\[161a.5\]]gcig gis gcig mi shes so/_/maud gal gyi bu 'dzam bu'i gling lta zhog gi/_/gling chen po bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can lha'am/_mi'am/_de ma yin pa'i skye ba'i gnas na gnas pa ji snyed pa'i sems can de dag thams cad kyi mdun du de bzhin 
[\[161a.6\]]gshegs pas spu'i khung bu gcig nas de bzhin gshegs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pa yang dag par ston la/_de dag kyang gcig gis gcig mi shes so/_/maud gal gyi bu gling chen po bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can rnams lta zhog gi_/maud 
[\[161a.7\]]gal gyi bu nan gyis dper bya na stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can du bsdu bar bsdus pa ji snyed pa de dag thams cad snga phyi med par mi'i lus thob par gyur la/_maud gal gyi bu sems can mir gyur pa de dag thams cad kyi mdun du de bzhin 
[\[161b\]]
[\[161b.1\]]gshegs pas spu'i khung bu gcig nas de bzhin gshegs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pa yang dag par ston par mdzad la/_de dag kyang gcig gis gcig mi shes so/_/maud gal gyi bu stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can 
[\[161b.2\]]thams cad lta zhog gi_/maud gal gyi bu shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na sems can du smos pa gang yin pa'i sems can gyi khams ni ches mang gi sa'i khams ni de lta ma yin no/_/de bzhin du lho dang /_nub dang /_byang gi phyogs dang /_
[\[161b.3\]]phyogs mtshams dang /_'og dang steng gi phyogs bcur kho ra khor yug tu phyogs re rer yang 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na sems can du smos pa gang yin pa'i sems can gyi khams ni ches mang gi_/sa'i khams ni de lta ma yin no/_/maud gal gyi 
[\[161b.4\]]bu nan gyis dper bya na/_sems can de dag thams cad kyis snga phyi med par mi'i lus thob par gyur kyang /_maud gal gyi bu sems can de dag thams cad la yang de bzhin gshegs pas spu'i khung bu gcig nas re re'i mdun du de bzhin gshegs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun dang 
[\[161b.5\]]bcas pa yang dag par ston la sems can de dag kyang gcig gis gcig mi shes so/_/maud gal gyi bu phyogs bcur gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams dag na sems can 'khod pa rnams lta zhog gi_/maud gal gyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa ni gdan 
[\[161b.6\]]'di la bzhugs bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi spyan sgrib pa med pa dang thogs pa med pas sangs rgyas kyi zhing ji snyed yod pa rnams gzigs te/_de dag ni ngas kyang sangs rgyas kyi ye shes ma nyams pas bskal pa 'bum du yang dper blang ba bgrangs pa'i tshul gyis bstan par sla ba ma 
[\[161b.7\]]yin te/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag ni de tsam du dpag tu med do/_/ngas gdan 'di la bzhugs bzhin du gang gzigs pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pas dper blang ba bgrangs pa dag gis bstan pa gang yin pa de ni sems can thams cad rang sangs rgyas dang 'dra bar gyur pas 
[\[162a\]]
[\[162a.1\]]kyang shes pa'am/_gzhal ba'am/_brtag par sla ba ma yin na nyan thos rnams kyis lta ci smos te/_de bzhin gshegs pa 'ba' zhig gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag brgya phrag ji snyed yod pa dang /_stong phrag ji snyed yod pa dang /_'bum phrag ji snyed yod pa dang /_
[\[162a.2\]]bye ba 'bum phrag ji snyed yod pa dang /_gtams phrag ji snyed yod pa dang /_dkrigs phrag ji snyed yod pa dang /_mi 'khrugs phrag ji snyed yod pa dang /_grangs med pa phrag ji snyed yod pa dang /_dpag tu med pa phrag ji snyed yod pa dang /_gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed phrag ji snyed yod 
[\[162a.3\]]pa dang /_stong gsum gyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul yongs su gang ba ji snyed yod pa mkhyen to/_/maud gal gyi bu ngas sangs rgyas kyi spyan sgrib pa med pa dang thogs pa med pas sangs rgyas kyi zhing ji snyed mthong ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na sems can gang sems can du bsdu bas bsdus 
[\[162a.4\]]shing smos pa'i sems can gyi khams rnams ni ches mang gi sa'i khams ni de lta ma yin no/_/sems can de dag thams cad kyis snga phyi med par mi'i lus thob par gyur la thob nas kyang 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por gyur te/_'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po re re la yang de snyed kyi 
[\[162a.5\]]'khor yod par gyur kyang /_maud gal gyi bu 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po 'khor dang bcas pa de dag thams cad la de bzhin gshegs pas spu'i khung bu gcig nas re re'i mdun du de bzhin gshegs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pa yang dag par ston la gcig gis gcig 
[\[162a.6\]]kyang mi shes te rang rang gi de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ngo /_/de bzhin du spu'i khung bu thams cad nas kyang de bzhin gshegs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pa yang dag par ston kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par 'phrul pa'i cho 'phrul gyi brgya'i cha'am/_
[\[162a.7\]]stong gi cha'am/_'bum gyi cha'am/_bye ba phrag 'bum gyi cha'am/_grangs sam/_cha'am/_bgrang ba'am/_dpe'am/_rgyu tsam yang yang dag par bstan par mi 'gyur te maud gal gyi bu de ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni rdzu 
[\[162b\]]
[\[162b.1\]]'phrul dang ye shes dpag tu med pa dang ldan no/_/maud gal gyi bu 'di ji snyam du sems/_sems can 'khor los sgyur bar gyur pa de dag gi bsod nams kyi phung po gang gi 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal srid dang rin po che sna bdun thob pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po mang ngam gsol pa/_bcom ldan 
[\[162b.2\]]'das mang lags so/_/bde bar gshegs pa dpag tu ma mchis so/_/bka' stsal pa/_maud gal gyi bu khyod mos par bya'o/_/khong du chud par bya'o/_/sems can 'khor los sgyur bar gyur pa de dag thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi phung po de bas ches mang ba'i bsod nams kyi phung 
[\[162b.3\]]pos de bzhin gshegs pa'i spu'i khung bu gcig yongs su 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen pos 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag gi ston pa 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul che ba dang /_'di ltar che bar grags pa 
[\[162b.4\]]dang /_'di ltar mthu che ba ni bdag gis rnyed pa legs par rnyed lags so/_/de lta lags kyis kyang bdag ni rgyu'i rjes su 'gro ba'i chos thams cad la thogs pa ma mchis pa'i ye shes 'di lta bu las dman par gyur pa lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs 
[\[162b.5\]]pa'i sangs rgyas kyi rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par 'phrul pa'i cho 'phrul 'di thos nas lan cig sems bskyed pa'i sems can de dag kyang rnyed pa legs par rnyed pa lags na gang dag mos par bgyid la mos shing yid ches nas kyang rdzu 'phrul dang ye shes 'di lta bu yongs su rdzogs 
[\[162b.6\]]par bgyi ba'i slad du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa lta smos kyang ci 'tshal te sems can de dag ni lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten na phyag bgyi ba'i gnas lags so/_/bka' stsal pa/_maud gal gyi bu de ni de bzhin te/_khyod ji skad zer 
[\[162b.7\]]ba bzhin du sems can gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan rnams la yid ches pa de dag gis ni rnyed pa legs par rnyed do/_/de dag ni log par ltung ba'i dogs pa med par shes par bya'o/_/de nas lha de dag dang /_klu de dag dang /_brgya byin de dag dang /_tshangs pa de 
[\[163a\]]
[\[163a.1\]]dag gis bcom ldan 'das las sangs rgyas kyi rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par 'phrul pa'i cho 'phrul 'di thos nas tshig 'thun par sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la phyag 'tshal lo phyag 'tshal lo/_/sems can gang dag gis ye shes 'di lta bu yongs su rdzogs par 
[\[163a.2\]]bya ba'i phyir sems bskyed pa'am skyed par 'gyur ba de dag la yang phyag 'tshal lo/_/ji ltar da ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par 'phrul pa de bzhin du de dag kyang rnam par 'phrul par 'gyur te de bas na bdag cag gis 'di la som nyi'am yid gnyis sam the tshom za bar mi bya'o zhes 
[\[163a.3\]]ched du brjod pa ched du brjod do/_/de nas lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang dri za de dag dang /_brgya byin de dag dang /_tshangs pa de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bya ba dang /_chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la gus par bya ba'i phyir sil snyan 'bum sgra phyung ngo /_/lha'i me tog ud pa la dang /_pad ma 
[\[163a.4\]]dang /_ku mu da dang /_pad ma dkar po dag gis sum cu rtsa gsum gyi gnas thams cad la mngon par gtor to/_/chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bstan pa na sngon bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems ma bskyed pa'i lha khrag khrig phrag bdun cu rtsa gnyis kyis sems bskyed de tshig 
[\[163a.5\]]'di skad du ji ltar da ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge'i sgra sgrogs pa de bzhin du bdag cag kyang ma 'ongs pa'i dus na lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi mdun du bla na med pa'i seng ge'i sgra sgrogs par gyur cig ces smras so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la lha'i bu zla ba dang zla mchog gis 'di 
[\[163a.6\]]skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzin pa dang /_'chang ba dang /_klog pa dang /_kun chub par bgyid pa dang /_gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par ston pa de bsod nams ji tsam zhig skyed par 'gyur lags/_de skad ces 
[\[163a.7\]]gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i bu zla ba dang zla mchog la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/lha'i bu dag rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bdag nyid kyang 'chang la gzhan dag la yang ston pa de ni dkon mchog gsum rgyun mi gcad pa'i phyir zhugs pa yin 
[\[163b\]]
[\[163b.1\]]no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_lha'i bu 'di ltar chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos na nyan thos kyi sems sam/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sems bskyed par mi 'gyur te/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'ba' zhig tu sems bskyed par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_
[\[163b.2\]]lha'i bu rgya chen po la mos pa dbang po rnon po sngon gyi rgyal ba la lhag par bya ba byas pa rnams ni chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la dga' ba skye bar 'gyur gyi/_chung ngu la mos pa rnams ni de lta ma yin no/_/lha'i bu rnam grangs 'dis na gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'chang ba dang /_
[\[163b.3\]]klog pa rnams ni ci nas dkon mchog gsum gyi rgyun mi gcad pa'i phyir gnas pa yin pa de ltar rig par bya'o/_/lha'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/_gang dkon mchog gsum rgyun mi gcad pa'i phyir gnas pa de'i bsngags pa'i mtha' 'am/_bsod nams kyi mtha' sangs rgyas 
[\[163b.4\]]'bum sku tshe'i tshad bskal par bzhugs pas kyang bstan pa'am/_bshad par spyod dam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so/_/bka' stsal pa/_lha'i bu rnam grangs 'dis kyang gang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'chang ba'am/_gzhan dag la ston pa de 
[\[163b.5\]]bsod nams tshad med pa skyed par 'gyur bar mkhas pas de ltar rig par bya'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming ci lags/_'di ji ltar gzung bar bgyi/_
[\[163b.6\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_byams pa de'i phyir khyod kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i le'u zhes bya bar zung shig_/sangs rgyas kyi rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par 'phrul pa'i cho 'phrul zhes bya bar yang zung shig_/bcom ldan 'das kyis 
[\[163b.7\]]de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_lha'i bu zla ba dang /_zla mchog dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa dang /_tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po dang /_tshangs pa de dag dang /_brgya byin de dag dang /_lha dang /_mi dang /_lha ma yin dang /_
[\[164a\]]
[\[164a.1\]]dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/_/'phags pa sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i le'u zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so//_//rgya gar gyi mkhan po pradz+nyA bar ma dang /_zhu chen 
[\[164a.2\]]gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban de ye shes sde la sogs pas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa//[ {D224}]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_Ar+ya s+thI ra a d+h+yA sha ya pa ri brta nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/_bod skad du/_'phags pa lhag 
[\[164a.3\]]pa'i bsam pa brtan pa'i le'u zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/_sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri la/_dge slong stong nyis brgya 
[\[164a.4\]]lnga bcu'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang /_byang chub sems dpa' lnga brgya tsam dang thabs cig tu bzhugs so/_/de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' lhag pa'i bsam pa brtan pa nang par sngar sham thabs dang /_chos gos bgos/_lhung bzed thogs te rgyal po'i khab tu bsod 
[\[164a.5\]]snyoms la song ngo /_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' lhag pa'i bsam pa brtan pa bsod snyoms kyi phyir rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen por mthar chags su rgyu ba na/_tshong dpon zhig gi khyim na bu mo gzugs bzang ba mdzes pa/_blta na sdug pa/_kha dog bzang po rgyas pa 
[\[164a.6\]]mchog dang ldan pa zhig yod pa mthong ngo /_/des bu mo de mthong nas 'dod chags kyis yongs su gdung ba skyes te/_des mi sdug pa yid la bya'o snyam du bsams kyang de'i sems sdug pa'i mtshan ma 'ba' zhig gis yongs su zin te 'dug par gyur to/_/de nas byang chub 
[\[164a.7\]]sems dpa' lhag pa'i bsam pa brtan pa dga' bar 'dzin pa'i sems kyis khyim de nas bsod snyoms ma blangs par rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer nas lhung bzed stong bzhin du phyir song ste/_'dod pa'i rtog pa de yid la mi bya bar bya ba'i phyir 'bad na so sor brtag pa'i 
[\[164b\]]
[\[164b.1\]]stobs kyis kyang 'dod pa'i rtog pa bsal ma nus nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i spyan rnam par dag pa mi'i las 'das pas byang chub sems dpa' lhag pa'i bsam pa brtan pa'i 'dod pa'i rtog pa dang ldan pa so sor rtog pa'i stobs kyis kyang 'dod pa'i rtog pa 
[\[164b.2\]]bsal ma nus pa gzigs so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' lhag pa'i bsam pa brtan pa gdul bar bya ba'i dbang gi phyir byang chub sems dpa' lhag pa'i bsam pa brtan pa lam gang nas 'gro ba'i lam der tshong dpon gyi bu mo de ci 'dra ba de 
[\[164b.3\]]'dra ba'i bu mo zhig sprul nas byang chub sems dpa' lhag pa'i bsam pa brtan pas sprul pa'i bu mo de mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang 'di skad ces smras so/_/rigs kyi bu mo khyod gar 'gro/_/sprul pa'i bu mos smras pa/_khyod gar bzhud pa der bdag mchi'o/_/
[\[164b.4\]]de nas byang chub sems dpa' lhag pa'i bsam pa brtan pa 'jigs shing skrag nas bros so/_/bros nas ri bgrod dka' ba zhig tu song ngo /_/sprul pa'i bu mo de yang ri bgrod dka' ba de nyid du song ngo /_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' lhag pa'i bsam pa brtan pa 
[\[164b.5\]]lus ngal chad de 'dug go/_/sprul pa'i bu mo de yang byang chub sems dpa' lhag pa'i bsam pa brtan pa'i mdun du 'dug go/_/'dug nas kyang tshigs su bcad pa 'di skad ces smras so/_/bdag ni sems kyis spang bar gyis/_/lus ni bros pas ci zhig bya/_/
[\[164b.6\]]brtan po lus ni bros pa yis/_/'dod chags spong bar mi 'gyur ro/_/de nas sprul pa'i bu mo des tshigs su bcad pa de skad ces smras nas ri bgrod dka' ba de las lhung ngo /_/lhung nas de'i mgo yang logs shig tu song ngo /_/lag pa yang logs shig_/rkang pa yang 
[\[164b.7\]]logs shig_/yan lag dang nying lag rnams kyang logs shig tu song ste/_'di lta ste dper na kha ba bcangs pa las rab tu dros shing rab tu zhu nas sa la thim pa de bzhin du sprul pa'i bu mo de/_de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' lhag 
[\[165a\]]
[\[165a.1\]]pa'i bsam pa brtan pas/_sprul pa'i bu mo de ma mthong nas 'dod chags kyi sems de nyid zhi bar gyur te/_de skyo ba chen po skyes so/_/des skyo ba chen po thob ste/_sprul pas tshigs su bcad pa smras pa de mngon sum du gyur nas de 'di snyam du sems te/_
[\[165a.2\]]rang bzhin 'di dag thams cad bcom ldan 'das la bdag gis gsol to/_/de ltar byas na bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs kyis sems mkhyen nas ci nas bdag gis chos mngon par rtogs par 'gyur ba'i chos ston par 'gyur snyam mo/_/de nas byang chub sems 
[\[165a.3\]]dpa' lhag pa'i bsam pa brtan pa bgrod dka' ba de nas byung nas/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das 'khor 'bum phrag du mas yongs 
[\[165a.4\]]su bskor cing mdun gyis bltas nas chos ston to/_/byang chub sems dpa' lhag pa'i bsam pa brtan pas bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' rdzogs par rig nas bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar te/_pus mo'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba 
[\[165a.5\]]de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/_bcom ldan 'das la rang bzhin thams cad gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu gang lam gyis 'byung ba yongs su tshol ba de ni de bzhin te/_rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pas ni chags 
[\[165a.6\]]par 'gyur ba'i chos rnams spangs pas 'dod chags spangs par ma gsungs so/_/de bzhin du zhe sdang bar 'gyur ba dang /_gti mug par 'gyur ba'i chos rnams spangs pas de bzhin gshegs pas gti mug spangs par ma gsungs so/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_
[\[165a.7\]]rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa ni chos gang yang dor bar bya ba'am/_thob par bya ba'i phyir chos mi ston to/_/yongs su shes par bya ba dang /_yongs su spang bar bya ba dang /_bsgom par bya ba dang /_mngon sum du bya ba dang /_mngon par rtogs par bya 
[\[165b\]]
[\[165b.1\]]ba dang /_'khor ba las bskyod par bya ba dang /_mya ngan las 'das par 'gro bar bya ba dang /_bsal bar bya ba dang /_gzhag par bya ba dang /_dbye bar bya ba'i phyir chos mi ston to/_/rigs kyi bu gnyis su dbye ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi chos nyid ma yin no/_/
[\[165b.2\]]gnyis su spyod pa gang yin pa de dag ni yang dag pa la zhugs pa ma yin no/_/rigs kyi bu gnyis gang zhe na/_bdag gis 'dod chags spang bar bya'o snyam pa 'di ni gnyis so/_/bdag gis zhe sdang spang bar bya'o/_/bdag gis gti mug spang bar bya'o snyam pa 'di ni 
[\[165b.3\]]gnyis so/_/de ltar sbyor ba gang yin pa de dag ni yang dag pa la zhugs pa ma yin te/_de dag ni log par zhugs pa zhes bya'o/_/rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/_mi la la zhig gis sgyu ma mkhan gyi rol mo byung ba'i tshe/_sgyu ma mkhan gyis sprul pa'i bud med mthong 
[\[165b.4\]]na 'dod chags kyi sems bskyed de/_de 'dod chags kyis sems dkris nas 'khor gyis 'jigs shing bag tsha ste stan las langs nas song ste/_de song nas bud med de nyid la mi sdug pa yid la byed cing /_mi rtag pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_stong pa dang /_bdag 
[\[165b.5\]]med par yid la byed na/_rigs kyi bu 'di ji snyam du sems/_ci mi de yang dag par zhugs pa yin nam/_'on te log par zhugs pa yin/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das gang bud med ma mchis pa la mi sdug par yid la bgyid cing mi rtag pa dang /_sdug bsngal 
[\[165b.6\]]ba dang /_stong pa dang /_bdag med par yid la bgyid pa'i mi de'i mngon par brtson pa de ni log pa lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu 'di na dge slong dang /_dge slong ma dang /_dge bsnyen dang /_dge bsnyen ma kha cig ma skyes 
[\[165b.7\]]ma byung ba'i chos rnams la mi sdug par yid la byed cing mi rtag pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_stong pa dang /_bdag med par yid la byed pa gang yin pa rnams kyang de dang 'dra bar blta bar bya'o/_/nga ni mi blun po de dag la lam sgom pa yin no zhes mi smra ste/_
[\[166a\]]
[\[166a.1\]]de dag ni log par zhugs pa zhes bya'o/_/rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na mi la la gnyid log pa'i rmi lam du bdag gi khyim du rgyal po'i btsun mo mthong nas de dang lhan cig nyal bar byed de/_dran pa nyams pa'i phyir/_bdag ni gsad do snyam du 
[\[166a.2\]]de ltar sems nas rgyal pos ma tshor grang /_des bdag gsad du 'ong ngo snyam nas de 'jigs shing skrag ste bros na 'di ji snyam du sems/_ci mi de 'jigs shing skrag ste bros pas rgyal po'i btsun mo'i phyir 'jigs pa de las thar bar 'gyur ram/_gsol pa/_
[\[166a.3\]]bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar mi des bud med ma mchis par bud med kyi 'du shes bskyed de yang dag pa ma lags pa kun brtags pa'i slad du'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu 
[\[166a.4\]]'di na dge slong dang /_dge slong ma dang /_dge bsnyen dang /_dge bsnyen ma kha cig 'dod chags med pa la 'dod chags kyi 'du shes bskyed nas 'dod chags kyi 'jigs pas skrag ste/_'dod chags las nges par 'byung ba yongs su tshol ba dang /_de bzhin du zhe 
[\[166a.5\]]sdang med par zhe sdang gi 'du shes bskyed/_gti mug med par gti mug gi 'du shes bskyed nas gti mug gi 'jigs pas skrag ste/_gti mug las nges par 'byung ba yongs su tshol ba gang yin pa rnams kyang de dang 'dra bar blta bar bya'o/_/nga ni mi blun po de 
[\[166a.6\]]dag la lam sgom pa yin no zhes mi smra ste/_de dag ni log par zhugs pa zhes bya'o/_/rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/_mi des med bzhin du sgro btags pas 'jigs pa med pa la 'jigs pa'i 'du shes bskyed pa de bzhin du/_rigs kyi bu byis pa so so'i 
[\[166a.7\]]skye bo rnams ni 'dod chags kyi mtha' ma shes nas 'dod chags kyi mtha'i 'jigs pas skrag ste/_'dod chags kyi mtha' las nges par 'byung ba yongs su tshol lo/_/zhe sdang gi mtha' ci yang med pa'i mthar ma shes nas zhe sdang gi mtha'i 'jigs pas skrag 
[\[166b\]]
[\[166b.1\]]cing ci yang med pa'i mtha' las nges par 'byung ba yongs su tshol lo/_/gti mug gi mtha' stong pa nyid kyi mthar ma shes nas gti mug gi mtha'i 'jigs pas skrag ste/_stong pa nyid kyi mtha' las nges par 'byung ba yongs su tshol bar byed do/_/nga ni mi blun po de dag la 
[\[166b.2\]]lam sgom pa yin no zhes mi smra ste/_de dag ni log par zhugs pa zhes bya'o/_/rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/_mi la la zhig sos ka'i zla ba tha ma'i nyi ma gung la lam du zhugs nas tsha bas nyen te ngal chad nas skom zhing gdungs te shin tu so sor rtog pa'i stobs dang ldan par 
[\[166b.3\]]gyur nas/_des 'brog dgon par smig rgyu'i chu 'dal pa chen po'i rgyun 'bab pa mthong la/_de der 'di ltar so sor rtog par byed de/_bdag khyim du ma phyin gyi bar du re zhig chu 'di btung bar mi bya'o snyam nas des smig rgyu de bor te rang gi khyim du song ngo /_/rang gi khyim du song nas 
[\[166b.4\]]bdag skom la chu mthong bzhin du ma 'thungs par bor ba ni bdag gis ngo mtshar cig byas so/_/bdag gis mchog tu ngo mtshar ba zhig byas so zhes ched du brjod pa ched du brjod na/_rigs kyi bu 'di ji snyam du sems/_mi des chu med cing yod pa ma yin pa ma 'thungs te bor 
[\[166b.5\]]ba la ngo mtshar cig byas pa yod dam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das de na chab kyang ma mchis/_chab tu gdags pa yang ma mchis te/_bcom ldan 'das mi de chab ma mchis par 'du shes 'khrul te/_de chab dor 
[\[166b.6\]]bar so sor rtog par bgyid cing mi bden pa'i dga' ba dang /_mchog tu dga' ba bskyed nas dga' ba des mgu bar 'dzin par byas so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu 'di na dge slong dang /_dge slong ma dang /_dge bsnyen dang /_dge bsnyen ma kha cig de bzhin 
[\[166b.7\]]gshegs pa'i dgongs pa'i tshig ma shes nas/_ser sna'i sems yongs su spang ba'i phyir sbyin pa med par sbyin pa'i 'du shes skyed de med bzhin du so sor rtog par byed la/_mi bden pa'i dga' ba dang /_mchog tu dga' ba skyed cing bdag cag gis ni ser sna'i sems bsal to 
[\[167a\]]
[\[167a.1\]]snyam ste/_dga' ba des mgu bar 'dzin pa dang /_'chal pa'i tshul khrims kyi sems yongs su spang ba'i phyir tshul khrims med par tshul khrims kyi 'du shes skyed de med bzhin du so sor rtog par byed la/_mi bden pa'i dga' ba dang /_mchog tu dga' ba skyed cing 
[\[167a.2\]]bdag cag gis ni 'chal pa'i tshul khrims kyi sems bsal to snyam ste/_dga' ba des mgu bar 'dzin pa dang /_gnod sems kyi sems yongs su spang ba'i phyir bzod pa med par bzod pa'i 'du shes skyed de med bzhin du so sor rtog par byed la/_mi bden pa'i dga' ba dang /_
[\[167a.3\]]mchog tu dga' ba skyed cing bdag cag gis ni gnod sems kyi sems bsal to snyam ste/_dga' ba des mgu bar 'dzin pa dang /_le lo'i sems yongs su spang ba'i phyir brtson 'grus med par brtson 'grus kyi 'du shes skyed de/_med bzhin du so sor rtog par byed la/_mi 
[\[167a.4\]]bden pa'i dga' ba dang /_mchog tu dga' ba skyed cing bdag cag gis ni le lo'i sems bsal to snyam ste/_dga' ba des mgu bar 'dzin pa dang /_rnam par g.yengs pa'i sems yongs su spang ba'i phyir bsam gtan med par bsam gtan gyi 'du shes skyed de med bzhin du so 
[\[167a.5\]]sor rtog par byed la/_mi bden pa'i dga' ba dang /_mchog tu dga' ba skyed cing bdag cag gis ni rnam par g.yengs pa'i sems bsal to snyam ste/_dga' ba des mgu bar 'dzin pa dang /_mi shes pa'i sems yongs su spang ba'i phyir shes rab med par shes rab kyi 'du shes 
[\[167a.6\]]skyed de med bzhin du so sor rtog par byed la/_mi bden pa'i dga' ba dang /_mchog tu dga' ba skyed cing bdag cag gis ni mi shes pa'i sems bsal to snyam ste/_dga' ba des mgu bar 'dzin pa gang yin pa rnams kyang de dang 'dra bar blta bar bya'o/_/nga ni mi blun po de dag 
[\[167a.7\]]la lam sgom pa yin no zhes mi smra ste/_de dag ni log par zhugs pa zhes bya'o/_/rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na mi zhig chu med par 'du shes 'khrul te/_de chu dor bar so sor rtog par byed la/_mi bden pa'i dga' ba dang /_mchog tu dga' ba skyed cing dga' ba des mgu 
[\[167b\]]
[\[167b.1\]]bar 'dzin pa de bzhin du rigs kyi bu 'di na dge slong dang /_dge slong ma dang /_dge bsnyen dang /_dge bsnyen ma kha cig de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi dbyings ma shes nas rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu med par rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bur 'du shes 'khrul/_lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu med 
[\[167b.2\]]par lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bur 'du shes 'khrul/_phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu med par phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bur 'du shes 'khrul/_dgra bcom pa nyid kyi 'bras bu med par dgra bcom pa nyid kyi 'bras bur 'du shes 'khrul/_rang sangs rgyas nyid kyi 'bras bu med par rang sangs rgyas 
[\[167b.3\]]nyid kyi 'bras bur 'du shes 'khrul/_sangs rgyas nyid kyi 'bras bu med par sangs rgyas nyid kyi 'bras bur 'du shes 'khrul/_mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'bras bu med par mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'bras bur 'du shes 'khrul te/_med bzhin du so sor rtog par byed la/_mi bden pa'i dga' 
[\[167b.4\]]ba dang /_mchog tu dga' ba skyed cing dga' ba des mgu bar 'dzin pa gang yin pa rnams kyang de dang 'dra bar blta bar bya'o/_/nga ni mi blun po de dag la lam sgom pa yin no zhes mi smra ste/_de dag ni log par zhugs pa zhes bya'o/_/rigs kyi bu de lta bas na rigs kyi bu'am/_
[\[167b.5\]]rigs kyi bu mo dad pa can rnams kyis ji ltar smig rgyu la chu'i 'du shes skyed pa de lta bur chos rnams rab tu shes par bya'o/_/de ltar chos rnams rab tu shes pa de dag ni yang dag par zhugs pa yin nam gzhan du shes pa gang dag yin pa de dag ni yang dag par zhugs pa ma yin no/_/nga ni 
[\[167b.6\]]mi blun po de dag la lam sgom pa yin no zhes mi smra ste/_de dag ni log par zhugs pa zhes bya'o/_/rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na bud med gcig gis me long blangs te bzhin gyi mtshan ma brtags na des me long shin tu phyis pa de la gzugs brnyan mdzes shing blta na sdug pa mthong 
[\[167b.7\]]nas/_des de la bdag gis gzugs brnyan 'di la 'dod chags kyi sems bskyed par mi bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ni bdag gi ma yin la bdag kyang 'di'i ma yin pa'i phyir ro snyam du so sor rtog par byed na/_rigs kyi bu 'di ji snyam du sems/_de ltar gzugs brnyan de 
[\[168a\]]
[\[168a.1\]]bud med 'di la 'dod chags kyi sems mi skyed pa ngo mtshar to snyam du 'dzin tam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das gzugs brnyan ni rnam par rtog pa ma mchis pa dang /_yongs su ma grub pa 
[\[168a.2\]]lags te/_de la rtog pa ci yang ma mchis pa'i slad du'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu de de bzhin te/_byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams ni gzugs rnams la rtog par byed de gzugs 'di dag ni ngan no/_/'di dag ni 'bring ngo /_/'di dag ni rab bo snyam 
[\[168a.3\]]du sems mod kyi 'on kyang gzugs rnams ni gzugs kyi ngo bo nyid la rnam par rtog pa mi skyed de rtog par mi byed/_rnam par rtog par mi byed do/_/sgra dang /_dri dang /_ro dang reg bya rnams kyang de dang 'dra'o/_/'di ltar yang byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams ni chos rnams la rtog par byed 
[\[168a.4\]]de chos 'di dag ni ngan no/_/'di dag ni 'bring ngo /_/'di dag ni rab bo snyam du sems mod kyi/_'on kyang chos rnams ni chos kyi ngo bo nyid la rnam par rtog pa mi skyed de/_rtog par mi byed/_rnam par rtog par mi byed do/_/rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na bud med des med pa la yod pa'i 
[\[168a.5\]]'du shes bskyed nas/_de yang so sor rtog par byed cing de la mngon par zhen pa de bzhin du rigs kyi bu 'di dag ni dge slong dang /_dge slong ma dang /_dge bsnyen dang /_dge bsnyen ma kha cig chos thams cad gzugs brnyan lta bur shes nas 'di skad du bdag cag gzugs rnams la 
[\[168a.6\]]chags par mi bya'o/_/de bzhin du bdag cag sgra rnams dang /_dri rnams dang /_ro rnams dang /_reg bya rnams dang /_chos rnams la chags par mi bya'o/_/bdag cag gis sdom pa bsgrub par bya'o zhes zer te/_de dag med pa de la yod par 'du shes bskyed nas med bzhin du 
[\[168a.7\]]so sor rtog par byed de de la mngon par zhen la/_des kyang dga' bar 'dzin cing bdag la ni stod par byed/_gzhan la ni brnyas par byed pa gang dag yin pa rnams kyang de dang 'dra bar blta bar bya'o/_/nga ni mi blun po de dag la lam sgom pa yin no zhes mi smra ste/_de dag ni 
[\[168b\]]
[\[168b.1\]]log par zhugs pa zhes bya'o/_/rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na mo sham zhig yod la de dran pa nyams pas 'di ltar bdag ni bu mi 'dod par bya'o zhes dam 'cha' bar byed pa de la/_bud med la la zhig gis yid bsrung ba'i phyir shes shing rtogs bzhin du 'di skad ces/_khyod 
[\[168b.2\]]kyi bu gzugs bzang zhing mdzes la blta na sdug pa zhig yod par 'gyur gyis/_'di ltar dam mi bca' bar gsol zhes zer la/_de nas mo sham des bud med de'i tshig mnyan nas dran pa nyams pas bdag gi bu gzugs bzang zhing mdzes la blta na sdug pa zhig yod 
[\[168b.3\]]par 'gyur ro snyam du re ba'i sems skyed par byed de/_sems 'khrul pa des 'du shes kyi rnam pa des sems yongs su mgu bar byed la/_bu ni skyes kyang ma skyes skye bar yang mi 'gyur ba de bzhin du rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa ni chos thams cad/_mo sham gyi bu dang 
[\[168b.4\]]'dra bar mkhyen cing gzigs bzhin du 'jig rten gyi rjes su 'thun par bya ba'i phyir gnyis su ston te/_'das pa'i dus na khyod ming 'di zhes bya bar gyur/_rigs ni 'di zhes bya/_rus ni 'di zhes bya/_kha dog ni 'di 'dra bar gyur/_zas ni 'di lta bu zhig za za/_yun 
[\[168b.5\]]ni 'di srid cig tu gnas gnas/_bde ba dang sdug bsngal ni 'di lta bu zhig nyams su myong /_tshe'i mtha' ni 'di srid cig tu gyur to/_/ma 'ongs pa'i dus na ni 'di lta bu zhig tu 'gyur te/_ming ni 'di skad ces bya bar 'gyur/_rigs ni 'di zhes bya/_rus ni 'di 
[\[168b.6\]]zhes bya/_kha dog ni 'di 'dra bar 'gyur/_zas ni 'di lta bu zhig za bar 'gyur/_yun ni 'di srid cig tu gnas par 'gyur/_bde ba dang sdug bsngal ni 'di lta bu zhig nyams su myong bar 'gyur/_tshe'i mtha' ni 'di srid cig tu 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du da ltar byung 
[\[168b.7\]]ba'i dus na ming ni 'di zhes bya/_rigs ni 'di zhes bya/_rus ni 'di zhes bya/_kha dog ni 'di 'dra ba zhig_/zas ni 'di lta bu zhig za/_yun ni 'di srid cig gnas/_bde ba dang sdug bsngal ba ni 'di lta bu zhig nyams su myong /_tshe'i mtha' ni 'di srid cig thub po zhes 
[\[169a\]]
[\[169a.1\]]ston par mdzad do/_/rigs kyi bu dper na mo sham de rang gi brtags pas bu'i 'du shes des re bar byed la bu de ni mi skye ba'i chos can no/_/mi skye ba'i chos can yin pas na mi 'gag pa'i chos can no/_/mi 'gag pa'i chos can yin pas na rnam par rig byed ma yin 
[\[169a.2\]]pa'i chos can no/_/rigs kyi bu de bzhin du gzugs thams cad ni gzugs kyi ngo bo nyid kyis mi skye ba'i chos can no/_/mi skye ba'i chos can yin pas na mi 'gag pa'i chos can no/_/mi 'gag pa'i chos can yin pas na rnam par rig byed ma yin pa'i chon can no/_/tshor ba 
[\[169a.3\]]thams cad dang /_'du shes thams cad dang /_'du byed thams cad dang /_rnam par shes pa thams cad kyang de dang 'dra ste/_rnam par shes pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis mi skye ba'i chos can no/_/mi skye ba'i chos can yin pas na mi 'gag pa'i chos can no/_/mi 'gag pa'i chos 
[\[169a.4\]]can yin pas na rnam par rig byed ma yin pa'i chos can te/_chos kyi ngo bo nyid de ltar mi shes pa gang dag yin pa de dag ni yang dag par zhugs pa ma yin no/_/nga ni mi blun po de dag la lam sgom pa yin no zhes mi smra ste/_de dag ni log par zhugs pa zhes bya'o/_/chos 
[\[169a.5\]]rnams de ltar shes pa gang dag yin pa de dag ni yang dag par zhugs pa yin te/_de dag ni lam la gnas pa yin no/_/de dag ni lam las mi g.yo ba yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi chos gnas pa ni chos kyi dbyings mi g.yo ba'i 
[\[169a.6\]]tshul gyis mi g.yo ba yin pa'i phyir ro/_/rigs kyi bu de lta bas na/_rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi chos kyi tshul la 'jug par 'dod pas 'dod chags las g.yo bar mi bya'o/_/zhe sdang las g.yo bar mi bya'o/_/gti mug las 
[\[169a.7\]]g.yo bar mi bya'o/_/nyon mongs pa thams cad las g.yo bar mi bya'o/_/mig dang /_gzugs dang /_mig gi rnam par shes pa las g.yo bar mi bya'o/_/de bzhin du rna ba dang /_sgra dang /_rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang /_sna dang /_dri dang /_sna'i rnam par shes pa 
[\[169b\]]
[\[169b.1\]]dang /_lce dang /_ro dang /_lce'i rnam par shes pa dang /_lus dang /_reg bya dang /_lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang /_yid dang /_chos dang /_yid kyi rnam par shes pa las g.yo bar mi bya'o/_/chos thams cad kyi 'du shes las g.yo bar mi bya'o/_/chos thams cad kyi 'du shes la yang gnas par 
[\[169b.2\]]mi bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_gal te 'dod chags las g.yo bar gyur na chos kyi dbyings las g.yo bar 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_stong pa nyid mi g.yo ba'i don gyis 'dod chags nyid chos kyi dbyings yin pa'i phyir ro/_/gal te zhe sdang las g.yo bar gyur na chos kyi dbyings las g.yo 
[\[169b.3\]]bar 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_mtshan ma med pa mi g.yo ba'i don gyis zhe sdang nyid chos kyi dbyings yin pa'i phyir ro/_/gal te gti mug las g.yo bar gyur na chos kyi dbyings las g.yo bar 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_smon pa med pa mi g.yo ba'i don gyis gti mug nyid 
[\[169b.4\]]chos kyi dbyings yin pa'i phyir ro/_/gal te nyon mongs pa thams cad las g.yo bar gyur na chos kyi dbyings las g.yo bar 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_nyon mongs pa thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid ji lta ba bzhin du rtogs pa mi g.yo ba'i don gyis nyon mongs pa thams cad nyid chos kyi dbyings 
[\[169b.5\]]yin pa'i phyir ro/_/gal te mig dang /_gzugs dang /_mig gi rnam par shes pa las g.yo bar gyur na chos kyi dbyings las g.yo bar 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba mi g.yo ba'i don gyis mig dang /_gzugs dang /_mig gi rnam par 
[\[169b.6\]]shes pa nyid chos kyi dbyings yin pa'i phyir ro/_/de bzhin du gal te rna ba dang /_sgra dang /_rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang /_sna dang /_dri dang /_sna'i rnam par shes pa dang /_lce dang /_ro dang /_lce'i rnam par shes pa dang /_lus dang /_reg 
[\[169b.7\]]bya dang /_lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang /_yid dang /_chos dang /_yid kyi rnam par shes pa las g.yo bar gyur na/_chos kyi dbyings las g.yo bar 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba mi g.yo ba'i don gyis/_yid dang /_
[\[170a\]]
[\[170a.1\]]chos dang /_yid kyi rnam par shes pa nyid chos kyi dbyings yin pa'i phyir ro/_/gal te chos thams cad kyi 'du shes las g.yo bar gyur na chos kyi dbyings las g.yo bar 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_chos thams cad kyi 'du shes kyi ngo bo nyid ji lta ba 
[\[170a.2\]]bzhin du rtogs pa mi g.yo ba'i don gyis chos thams cad kyi 'du shes nyid chos kyi dbyings yin pa'i phyir ro/_/ngas de las dgongs nas tshig 'di skad du log par lta ba/_log par lta ba yin par mthong na/_de de'i yang dag par lta ba yin no zhes gsungs so/_/bsal 
[\[170a.3\]]ba med pa dang /_gzhag pa med pa'i tshul gyis log par lta ba las kyang mi g.yo la/_log par lta ba med par gyur pa las gud na yang /_yang dag par lta ba med de/_chos thams cad gnyis su med pa'i phyir/_log par lta ba yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du mthong ba 
[\[170a.4\]]nyid yang dag par lta ba yin gyi gnyis su 'du shes pa la ni yang dag par lta ba med do/_/rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na mi la la zhig nub mo mun pa mun nag gi nang na lam du zhugs te/_des 'brog khong stong zhig tu shing ljon pa phal po che stug po mthong la/_des der shing zhig gi 
[\[170a.5\]]drung na chom rkun yod pa'i 'du shes bskyed nas skrag ste lam der ma song na/_rigs kyi bu 'di ji snyam du sems/_ci mi de snang ba yang ma byung /_shing de yang mngon sum du ma byas par shing stug po de las 'phags pa'am/_chom rkun gyi 'jigs pa med par 'gyur ram/_
[\[170a.6\]]gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu 'di ji snyam du sems/_ci mi de snang ba yang yod la shing yang mngon sum du byas na shing stug po de las 'phags pa'am/_chom rkun gyi 'jigs pa med par 'gyur ram/_
[\[170a.7\]]gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de de lta lags so/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar mi des 'jigs pa ma mchis pa la 'jigs pa'i 'du shes bskyed cing /_yang dag pa ma lags pa kun brtags pa'i slad du'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal 
[\[170b\]]
[\[170b.1\]]pa/_rigs kyi bu de bzhin du byis pa so so'i skye bo rtsod pas yang dag pa ma yin pa'i phyin ci log gis phyin ci log tu gyur pa/_ma rig pa'i mun pas mig kun nas g.yogs pa thams cad med bzhin du sgro btags pas 'khor ba'i 'jigs pas skrag nas 'khor ba las nges par 'byung 
[\[170b.2\]]ba yongs su tshol lo/_/de dag gis gang du 'jigs pa'i 'du shes bskyed pa'i 'khor ba de yang don dam par mi dmigs na de dag mya ngan las 'das pa ni 'jigs pa med pa'o zhes yongs su tshol bar byed do/_/dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su zin pa yang dag par zhugs pa 
[\[170b.3\]]rnams ni 'khor ba de nyid mya ngan las 'das pa yin par yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes la/_chos thams cad kyi skye ba med pa yang rab tu shes te/_de ltar yang dag par zhugs pa de dag ni chos gang yang len par mi byed/_'dor bar mi byed/_sel bar mi byed/_'jog 
[\[170b.4\]]par mi byed do/_/chos kyi dbyings la gnas te g.yo ba med do/_/mi g.yo bas na gnas sgom par mi byed/_mi sgom pas na gnas med do/_/gnas med pas na g.yo ba med de/_'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi chos kyi tshul g.yo ba med pa ste/_de la ni g.yo bar bya ba'am 
[\[170b.5\]]'phags par bya ba'am/_dor bar bya ba'am blang bar bya ba'i chos ci yang mi dmigs so/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_chos kyi tshul ni nam mkha'i tshul nyid yin la/_nam mkha' la ni g.yo ba yang med/_'phags pa yang med pa'i phyir ro/_/rigs kyi bu de ltar yang dag par zhugs pa shes 
[\[170b.6\]]pa dang ldan pa ni sems can thams cad kyis kyang shes pa'i yongs su shes pa de las bskyod cing bsgul bar mi nus so/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar des mi g.yo ba'i ye shes thob pa'i phyir ro/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu stan las langs te/_bla gos phrag pa 
[\[170b.7\]]gcig tu gzar nas/_pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 
[\[171a\]]
[\[171a.1\]]'di 'dzin pa'am/_kun chub par bgyid pa'am/_mos par bgyid pa de dag ni shes rab dang ldan pa'i mchog tu bstan par bgyi ba lags so/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni mi shes pa thams cad sel ba dang /_shes pa thams 
[\[171a.2\]]cad dang ldan pa'i slad du'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen pos 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzin pa'am/_kun chub bar bgyid pa'am/_mos 
[\[171a.3\]]par bgyid pa de dag ni/_rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa'i mchog tu bstan par bgyi ba lags so/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das mig gi rnam par shes par bgyi ba gang lags pa de ni rdzu 'phrul ma lags kyi/_bcom ldan 'das gang mig gi rnam 
[\[171a.4\]]par shes par bgyi ba'i chos thams cad la se gol gtogs pa tsam yang mos par mi bgyid pa de ni rdzu 'phrul gyi mchog lags pa'i slad du'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa nam grus 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs 
[\[171a.5\]]kyi bu mo gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzin pa'am/_kun chub par bgyid pa'am/_mos par bgyid pa de dag ni bsam gtan pa'i mchog tu bstan par bgyi ba lags so/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni nyon mongs pa thams 
[\[171a.6\]]cad nges par sreg pa lags pa'i slad du'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzin pa'am/_kun chub par bgyid pa 
[\[171a.7\]]'am/_mos par bgyid pa de dag ni nyon mongs pa ma mchis par gnas pa'i mchog tu bstan par bgyi ba lags so/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni nyon mongs pa'i dgra thams cad dang bral ba dang /_chos thams cad kyis ma gos 
[\[171b\]]
[\[171b.1\]]pa lags pa'i slad du'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen pos 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzin pa'am/_kun chub par bgyid pa'am/_mos par bgyid 
[\[171b.2\]]pa de dag ni sbyangs pa'i yon tan smra ba'i mchog tu bstan par bgyi ba lags so/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni nyon mongs pa thams cad sbyangs pa dang /_chos thams cad kyis kun nas nyon mongs pa can du mi 'gyur ba'i slad du'o/_/de nas 
[\[171b.3\]]bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa sgra gcan zin gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzin pa'am/_kun chub par bgyid pa'am/_mos par bgyid pa de dag ni bslab pa la dga' ba'i mchog tu 
[\[171b.4\]]bstan par bgyi ba lags so/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni bslab pa thams cad kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lags pa'i slad du'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa nye bar 'khor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das 
[\[171b.5\]]rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzin pa'am/_kun chub par bgyid pa'am/_mos par bgyid pa de dag ni 'dul ba 'dzin pa'i mchog tu bstan par bgyi ba lags so/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 
[\[171b.6\]]ni nyon mongs pa thams cad sel bar bgyid pa lags pa'i slad du'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzin pa'am/_kun chub 
[\[171b.7\]]par bgyid pa'am/_mos par bgyid pa de dag ni mang du thos pa'i mchog tu bstan par bgyi ba lags so/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni thos pa thams cad dang ldan pa lags pa'i slad du'o/_/de ltar nyan thos chen po de dag thams cad kyis 
[\[172a\]]
[\[172a.1\]]rang rang gi mchog brjod pa dag gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di mngon par bstod do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo de lta bas na khyod kyis chos thams cad bsal ba med cing gzhag pa med pa la gnas 
[\[172a.2\]]pas sangs rgyas kyi byang chub 'di bdag nyid kyis yang dag par ston cig_/chos gang yang dor du med pa dang /_thob par byar med par chos ston cig_/yongs su shes par byar med pa dang /_spang du med pa dang /_bsgom du med pa dang /_mngon sum du byar med pa dang /_mngon 
[\[172a.3\]]par rtogs par byar med pa dang /_'khor ba las bskyod du med pa dang /_mya ngan las 'das par 'gror med pa dang /_rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par byar med pa dang /_lan cig phyir 'ong bar 'gyur ba dang /_phyir mi 'ong bar 'gyur ba dang /_dgra bcom pa nyid kyi 'bras 
[\[172a.4\]]bu thob par byar med par chos ston cig_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kun dga' bo chos thams cad ni rgyun du zhugs pa dang /_lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba dang /_dgra bcom pa'i chos yin te/_chos kyi dbyings mnyam pa nyid kyi phyir ro/_/kun dga' bo de lta bas na/_
[\[172a.5\]]khyod kyis byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i gang zag rnams la nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las bzlar med pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams thob par byar med par chos ston cig_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kun dga' bo chos thams cad ni sangs rgyas kyi chos 
[\[172a.6\]]yin te/_chos kyi dbyings mnyam pa nyid kyi phyir ro/_/kun dga' bo/_gzhan yang khyod kyis rnal 'byor spyod pa'i dge slong dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du bya bar 'dod pa rnams la 'dod chags dang /_zhe sdang dang /_gti mug spang du med par chos ston cig_/de 
[\[172a.7\]]bzhin gshegs pa bltar med pa dang /_chos mnyan du med pa dang /_dge 'dun la bsnyen bkur byar med par chos ston cig_/kun dga' bo 'dod chags dang /_zhe sdang dang /_gti mug rnams ni spang du med pa kho na ste/_'dod chags dang /_zhe sdang dang /_gti 
[\[172b\]]
[\[172b.1\]]mug rnams ya ma brla yin pa'i phyir ro/_/kun dga' bo skad cig pa rnams ni spang bar bya ba ma yin te med pa'i phyir ro/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa bltar ma mchis 
[\[172b.2\]]pa lags/_ji ltar chos mnyan du ma mchis pa lags/_ji ltar dge 'dun bsnyen bkur bgyir ma mchis pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo de bzhin gshegs pa ni bstan du med pa ste/_de ni mig gis blta bar mi nus so/_/kun dga' bo 
[\[172b.3\]]chos ni brjod du med pa ste/_de ni rna bas mnyan par mi nus so/_/kun dga' bo dge 'dun ni 'dus ma byas pa ste/_de ni lus sam/_ngag gam/_sems kyis bsnyen bkur byar mi nus so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom 
[\[172b.4\]]ldan 'das sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos nyid 'di ltar rtogs par dka' ba ni ngo mtshar lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo de ni khyod ji skad zer ba de bzhin te/_rnam grangs 'dis na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos nyid 
[\[172b.5\]]ni rtogs par dka'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kun dga' bo nyon mongs pa thams cad las kyang sems yongs su sbyang dgos la/_chos gang las kyang bskyod par yang mi bya/_'phags par yang mi bya ba'i phyir ro/_/kun dga' bo gang rnam grangs 'dis de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi chos 
[\[172b.6\]]kyi tshul la 'jug cing mos par byed pa'i sems can de dag ni ngo mtshar du gyur pa yin par rig par bya'o/_/kun dga' bo rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang dag nga'i bstan pa 'di la rab tu byung ba chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzin pa'am/_kun chub par byed pa'am/_mos par byed 
[\[172b.7\]]pa de dag gis ni yul 'khor gyi zas legs par zos so/_/de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la legs par rab tu byung ngo /_/de dag gis ni mi'i lus thob pa legs par thob bo/_/de dag gis ni bdud sdig can btul lo/_/de dag gis ni nga'o snyam pa'i nga rgyal nges 
[\[173a\]]
[\[173a.1\]]par bcom mo/_/de dag gis ni sbyin gnas sbyangs so/_/de dag gis ni yon gnas su gzung bar bya'o/_/de dag gis ni bsod nams kyi zhing du blta bar bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kun dga' bo chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni mngon pa'i nga rgyal can rnams dang /_'bras bu la 
[\[173a.2\]]dmigs pa rnams dang /_byang chub la dmigs pa rnams dang /_sngon gyi rgyal ba rnams la bya ba ma byas pa rnams kyis bzod par mi nus pa'i phyir ro/_/chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bstan pa na byang chub sems dpa' lhag pa'i bsam pa brtan pas mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to/_/
[\[173a.3\]]de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe 'dzum pa mdzad do/_/'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos nyid de/_gang gi tshe 'dzum pa mdzad pa de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal gyi sgo nas 'od zer kha dog du ma kha dog sna tshogs 'di lta ste/_sngon po dang /_ser po dang /_dmar po dang /_dkar po 
[\[173a.4\]]dang /_btsod ka dang shel dang /_dngul gyi kha dog lta bu dag byung nas/_'od zer de dag gis 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas mu med pa snang bas khyab par byas te/_tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar dag tu song nas phyir log ste/_bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas bcom ldan 
[\[173a.5\]]'das kyi spyi gtsug tu nub par gyur to/_/de nas sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo stan las langs te/_bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas 
[\[173a.6\]]bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ni rgyu ma mchis rkyen ma mchis par 'dzum pa mi mdzad na/_bcom ldan 'das 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i rgyu ni gang lags/_rkyen ni gang lags de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[173a.7\]]kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/kun dga' bo 'khor 'di'i nang nas dge slong mngon pa'i nga rgyal can du gyur pa nyis brgya po de dag gis mngon pa'i nga rgyal med pa'i chos 'di thos nas len pa med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol lo/_/byang chub 
[\[173b\]]
[\[173b.1\]]sems dpa' lhag pa'i bsam pa brtan pas ni mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob bo/_/kun dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' lhag pa'i bsam pa brtan pa 'di ni bskal pa khris bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/_bskal pa rin po che 
[\[173b.2\]]thams cad kun du snang ba la/_'jig rten gyi khams me tog thams cad kyis rnam par bkra ba zhes bya bar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin po che'i pad ma dpal gyi snying po can zhes bya bar 'gyur ro/_/de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang yon tan 
[\[173b.3\]]bkod pa dpag tu med pa dang ldan par 'gyur te/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing de yang byang chub sems dpa' 'ba' zhig gis yongs su gang bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i 
[\[173b.4\]]ming ci lags/_'di ji ltar gzung bar bgyi/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de'i phyir kun dga' bo khyod kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di/_chos thams cad g.yo ba med pa zhes bya bar zung shig_/lhag pa'i bsam pa brtan pa'i le'u zhes bya bar yang zung shig_/bcom 
[\[173b.5\]]ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang /_byang chub sems dpa' lhag pa'i bsam pa brtan pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang /_dge slong de dag dang /_thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dang /_lha dang /_mi dang /_lha ma 
[\[173b.6\]]yin dang /_dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do//_//'phags pa lhag pa'i bsam pa brtan pa'i le'u zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so//_//rgya gar gyi mkhan 
[\[173b.7\]]po su ren dra bo d+hi dang /_pra dz+nyA bar ma dang /_zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban de ye shes sde la sogs pas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa//_//
[\[174a\]]
[\[174a.1\]{D225}]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_A r+ya tri sha ra Na ga ma na nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/_bod skad du/_'phags pa gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/_dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 
[\[174a.2\]]'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na/_dge slong stong nyis brgya lnga bcu'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang thabs cig tu bzhugs so/_/de nas de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gcig pu dben par 'dug pa dang /_sems kyis sems 
[\[174a.3\]]kyi yongs su rtog pa 'di lta bu skyes so/_/ston pa ni bdag gi mngon sum du gyur na/_bde bar gshegs pa chos kyi rje'i spyan sngar bdag song la/_rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo dad pa dang ldan pa gang la la sangs rgyas dang /_chos dang /_dge slong gi dge 'dun la 
[\[174a.4\]]skyabs su song ba'i gang zag de'i bsod nams ji snyed cig sogs par 'gyur ba'i don de zhu bar bya'o snyam du sems so/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu phye ma red kyi dus kyi tshe nang du yang dag 'jog las langs te/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/_bcom ldan 
[\[174a.5\]]'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bdag gcig pu dben par mchis te/_nang du yang dag 'jog la mchis pa na sems 
[\[174a.6\]]kyis sems kyi yongs su rtog pa 'di lta bu skyes te/_rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo dad pa dang ldan pa gang la la sangs rgyas dang /_chos dang /_dge slong gi dge 'dun la skyabs su mchis pa'i gang zag de'i bsod nams ji snyed cig sogs par 'gyur snyam bgyid 
[\[174a.7\]]lags so/_/de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/shA ri'i bu khyod skye bo mang po la phan pa dang /_skye bo mang po la bde ba dang /_'jig rten la snying brtse ba dang /_skye bo'i tshogs phal po 
[\[174b\]]
[\[174b.1\]]che'i don dang /_lha dang mi rnams la phan pa dang bde ba'i phyir zhus pa legs so legs so/_/gang khyod de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan sngar 'ongs te don 'di yongs su zhu bar sems pa de ni shA ri'i bu don de nyid rnam par shes par bya ba'i phyir dpes bstan par bya ste/_skyes bu 
[\[174b.2\]]gang zag 'ga' zhig rdzu 'phrul gyi mthu 'di lta bu dang ldan par gyur pas gang 'di 'dzam bu'i gling dang nye ba'i gling zheng dang /_srid du dpag tshad bdun stong yod pa'i 'dzam bu'i gling de na gang srog chags gnas pa de dag 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan du bkod de/_lag mthil ltar 
[\[174b.3\]]mnyam par byas par rin po che sna bdun la 'di lta ste/_gser dang /_dngul dang /_bai dUr+ya dang /_shel dang /_mu tig dmar po dang /_rdo'i snying po dang /_spug rnams las 'dzam bu'i gling tsam gyi mchod rten srid du tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar la thug par brtsigs te/_
[\[174b.4\]]mchod rten de la lha'i spos dang /_lha'i me tog dang /_lha'i phreng ba dang /_lha'i gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan rnams kyis mchod pa byas la/_de nas skyes bu de rdzu 'phrul gyi mthu 'di lta bu dang ldan par gyur pas/_gang rgya mtsho chen po bzhi'i chu de dag 
[\[174b.5\]]'jig rten gyi khams gzhan du byo ste/_ma ru ka'i til mar gyis rgya mtsho chen po bzhi ltar bkang ba'i nang du snying po ri rab tsam btsugs la/_bskal pa mang po'i mtha' ji srid par mar me'i rgyun mi 'chad par bus na/_shA ri'i bu de ji snyam du sems/_skyes bu de gzhi 
[\[174b.6\]]de las bsod nams mang du sogs snyam mam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das mang lags so/_/bde bar gshegs pa mang lags so/_/nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas thams cad las 'das pa lags te/_bcom ldan 'das 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i 
[\[174b.7\]]yul lo/_/bde bar gshegs pa 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul lo/_/bka' stsal pa/_shA ri'i bu rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig sangs rgyas dang /_chos dang /_dge 'dun la skyabs su song ba'i bsod nams kyi phung po de la bsod nams 
[\[175a\]]
[\[175a.1\]]kyi phung po snga ma des brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro ste/_stong dang /_brgya stong gi cha dang /_grangs dang /_rgyu dang /_bgrang bar yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/_/de nas chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa'i tshe stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di g.yos/_
[\[175a.2\]]rab tu g.yos/_kun tu rab tu g.yos/_'gul rab tu 'gul/_kun tu rab tu 'gul/_ldeg rab tu ldeg_/kun tu rab tu ldeg go/_/de'i tshe der glog gi rgyun chen po byung ngo /_/lha rnams kyis kyang rnga sgra bsgrags so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' 
[\[175a.3\]]bos 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming ci lags/_ji ltar gzung bar bgyi/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo khyod kyis 'di ltar chos kyi rnam grangs 'di sgo mtha' yas pas bsgrub pa zhes bya bar zung shig_/
[\[175a.4\]]de'i don ni de ltar blta bar bya ste/_de de bzhin du zung shig_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dang /_dge slong gzhan dag kyang bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa la mngon par bstod do//_//'phags pa gsum la 
[\[175a.5\]]skyabs su 'gro ba zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so//_//rgya gar gyi mkhan po sarba dz+nya de ba dang /_zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban de dpal brtsegs kyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa//_//
[\[175a.6\]{D226}]@#/_/rgya gar skad du/_Ar+ya b+ha ba saM krAn+ti nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/_bod skad du/_'phags pa srid pa 'pho ba zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/_sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/_bcom 
[\[175a.7\]]ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan da ka gnas pa na dge slong stong nyis brgya lnga bcu'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rab tu mang po dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/_de nas bcom ldan 'das 'khor 
[\[175b\]]
[\[175b.1\]]brgya stong du mas yongs su bskor cing mdun gyis bltas nas chos ston te/_tshangs par spyod pa/_thog mar dge ba/_bar du dge ba/_tha mar dge ba/_don bzang po/_tshig 'bru bzang po/_ma 'dres pa/_yongs su rdzogs pa/_yongs su dag pa/_yongs su byang ba yang dag 
[\[175b.2\]]par ston to/_/de'i tshe yul ma ga d+hA'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po nas byung ste/_rgyal po'i 'byor pa chen po dang /_rgyal po'i mthu chen pos 'od ma'i tshal ga la ba dang /_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/_bcom 
[\[175b.3\]]ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_lan gsum bskor ba byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas yul ma ga d+hA'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying pos bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 
[\[175b.4\]]'das ji ltar na las bgyis shing bsags pa 'gags nas yun ring du 'gags pa 'gum pa'i dus kyi tshe nye bar gnas shing yid la mngon du 'gyur lags/_'du byed thams cad stong pa la ji ltar las rnams chab mi 'tshal bar gda'/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom 
[\[175b.5\]]ldan 'das kyis yul ma ga d+hA'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rgyal po chen po 'di lta ste/_dper na mi zhig nyal ba'i rmi lam na yul gyi bud med bzang mo dang lhan cig tu yongs su spyod pa rmis la/_de nyal ba las sad nas yul 
[\[175b.6\]]gyi bud med bzang mo de dran na rgyal po chen po 'di ji snyam du sems/_rmi lam gyi yul gyi bud med bzang mo de yod dam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ni ma mchis lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rgyal po chen po 'di ji snyam du sems/_'o na 
[\[175b.7\]]gang rmi lam gyi yul gyi bud med bzang mo la mngon par zhen pa'i mi de ci mkhas pa'i rang bzhin can yin nam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags te/_de ci'i slad du zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das rmi lam gyi yul gyi bud med bzang mo yang shin tu ma mchis shing mi 
[\[176a\]]
[\[176a.1\]]dmigs lags na de dang yongs su spyod pa lta ga la mchis te/_'di ltar mi de ni phongs shing dub pa'i skal ba can du 'gyur lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rgyal po chen po de bzhin du byis pa so so'i skye bo thos pa dang mi ldan pa yang mig gis 
[\[176a.2\]]gzugs rnams mthong na yid bde bar 'gyur ba'i gzugs rnams la mngon par zhen te/_mngon par zhen par gyur nas rjes su chags par 'gyur ro/_/rjes su chags nas kun tu chags par 'gyur ro/_/kun tu chags nas 'dod chags las byung ba dang /_zhe sdang 
[\[176a.3\]]las byung ba dang /_gti mug las byung ba'i las lus dang /_ngag dang /_yid kyis mngon par 'du byed de/_las de mngon par 'dus byas par gyur nas 'gag go/_/'gag pa ni shar phyogs su brten te gnas pa ma yin/_lho phyogs su ma yin/_nub phyogs 
[\[176a.4\]]su ma yin/_byang phyogs su ma yin/_steng du ma yin/_'og tu ma yin/_phyogs mtshams rnams su brten te gnas pa ma yin no/_/dus gzhan ji tsam zhig na 'chi ba'i dus dang tshod nye bar gnas pa'i tshe de dang /_skal ba 'dra ba'i las zad nas rnam par shes pa tha ma 
[\[176a.5\]]'gag pa'i tshe 'di lta ste/_dper na nyal nyal ba las sad pa'i mi'i yul gyi bud med bzang mo lta bur las de yid la mngon du 'gyur ro/_/rgyal po chen po de ltar rnam par shes pa tha ma 'gag cing skye ba'i char gtogs pa'i rnam par shes pa dang po yang na ni lha'i nang du/_
[\[176a.6\]]yang na ni mi'i nang du/_yang na ni lha ma yin gyi nang du/_yang na ni sems can dmyal ba rnams su/_yang na ni dud 'gro rnams su/_yang na ni [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]rnams su 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/rgyal po chen po rnam par shes pa dang po de 'gags ma thag tu gang la rnam par smin 
[\[176a.7\]]pa myong bar 'gyur ba mngon pa de dang skal ba 'dra ba'i sems kyi rgyud 'byung ngo /_/rgyal po chen po de la chos gang yang /_'jig rten 'di nas 'jig rten pha rol tu 'pho ba yang med la 'chi 'pho dang skye bar mngon pa yang yod de/_rgyal po chen po de la gang rnam par shes pa tha ma 'gag pa 
[\[176b\]]
[\[176b.1\]]de ni 'chi 'pho zhes bya/_gang rnam par shes pa dang po 'byung ba de ni skye ba zhes bya'o/_/rgyal po chen po rnam par shes pa tha ma 'gag pa'i tshe yang gang du yang mi 'gro/_rnam par shes pa dang po skye ba'i char gtogs pa 'byung ba'i tshe yang gang nas kyang mi 'ong ngo /_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_
[\[176b.2\]]ngo bo nyid dang bral ba'i phyir ro/_/rgyal po chen po de la rnam par shes pa tha ma ni rnam par shes pa tha mas stong /_'chi 'pho ni 'chi 'phos stong /_las ni las kyis stong /_rnam par shes pa dang po ni rnam par shes pa dang pos stong /_skye ba ni skye bas stong la las rnams chud 
[\[176b.3\]]mi za bar mngon pa yang yod do/_/rgyal po chen po rnam par shes pa dang po'i skye ba'i char gtogs pa 'gags ma thag tu bar ma chad par gang la rnam par smin pa myong bar 'gyur ba mngon pa'i sems kyi rgyud 'byung ngo /_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal te/_bde bar gshegs 
[\[176b.4\]]pas de skad gsungs nas ston pas gzhan yang 'di skad bka' stsal to/_/'di dag thams cad ming tsam ste/_/'du shes tsam du gnas pa yin/_/brjod pa las ni gzhan gyur pa/_/brjod par bya ba yod ma yin/_/ming ni gang dang gang gis su/_/chos rnams gang dang gang brjod 
[\[176b.5\]]pa/_/de la de ni yod ma yin/_/'di ni chos rnams chos nyid do/_/ming gis ming nyid stong pa ste/_/ming ni ming gis yod ma yin/_/ming med pa yi chos rnams kun/_/ming gis yongs su brjod par byas/_/chos rnams 'di dag yod min te/_/rtog pa las 
[\[176b.6\]]ni kun tu 'byung /_/gang gis stong par rnam rtog pa/_/rtog pa de yang 'di na med/_/mig gis gzugs ni mthong ngo zhes/_/yang dag gzigs pas gang gsungs pa/_/'jig rten log pa'i nga can la/_/kun rdzob bden par de gsungs so/_/tshogs nas mthong zhes 
[\[176b.7\]]gang dag tu/_/'dren pas rab tu bstan mdzad pa/_/de ni don dam gdags pa'i sar/_/blo dang ldan pas bka' stsal to/_/mig gis gzugs rnams mi mthong zhing /_/yid kyis chos rnams mi rig pa/_/de ni bden pa mchog yin te/_/de la 'jig rten mi dpogs 
[\[177a\]]
[\[177a.1\]]so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_yul ma ga d+hA'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po dang /_byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang /_dge slong de dag dang /_lha dang /_mi dang /_lha ma yin dang /_dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig 
[\[177a.2\]]rten yi rangs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do//_//'phags pa srid pa 'pho ba zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so//_//rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang /_dA na shI la dang /_zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban de ye shes 
[\[177a.3\]]sdes bsgyur cing zhus te/_skad gsar chad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa//[ {D227}]@#/_/rgya gar skad du/_Ar+ya sarba bi da l+ya saMgra ha nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/_bod skad du/_'phags pa rnam par 'thag pa 
[\[177a.4\]]thams cad bsdus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/_sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri la dge slong drug khri nyis stong gi dge slong gi dge 
[\[177a.5\]]'dun chen po dang /_byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag brgyad cu dang /_lha drug khri dang /_dge bsnyen stong phrag mang po dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/_de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i dus la bab ste/_'di ni bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na dbyar 
[\[177a.6\]]gnas shing bzhugs pa'i tha ma yin no/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis ting nge 'dzin rnam pa ji lta bus stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di dar gyi lda ldi bres pas brgyan pa dang /_pog phor gyis brgyan cing bdug pas bdugs pa dang /_me tog sil mas chal 
[\[177a.7\]]par gang ba dang /_pad ma 'dab ma stong phrag brgya pas khebs par gyur pa de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/_/stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na tshangs pa bye ba phrag stong ji snyed yod pa'i tshangs pa de dag re re zhing yang g.yog 'khor bye ba phrag stong dang /_
[\[177b\]]
[\[177b.1\]]bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong nas phyin pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te thal mo sbyar nas/_bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal zhing phyogs gcig tu 'khod par gyur to/_/stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na gnas gtsang 
[\[177b.2\]]ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu rnams dang /_lha'i bu dbang phyug rnams dang /_dbang phyug chen po rnams dang /_lha'i dbang po rnams dang /_klu'i dbang po rnams dang /_gnod sbyin gyi dbang po rnams dang /_lha ma yin gyi dbang po rnams dang /_nam mkha' lding gi dbang po rnams dang /_
[\[177b.3\]]mi 'am ci'i dbang po rnams dang /_lto 'phye chen po'i dbang po rnams ji snyed pa de dag thams cad g.yog 'khor bye ba brgya stong phrag du ma dang /_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste phyin pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_thal mo sbyar 
[\[177b.4\]]nas bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal zhing phyogs gcig tu 'khod par gyur to/_/phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dbang che ba/_dbang che bar grags pa ji snyed pa de dag kyang /_bcom 
[\[177b.5\]]ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_thal mo sbyar nas bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal zhing phyogs gcig tu 'khod par gyur to/_/de'i tshe stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di 
[\[177b.6\]]srid pa'i rtse mo man chad/_lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi 'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po dbang che ba/_dbang che bar grags pa dag gis gang bar ma gyur pa ni/_tha na 'khar ba'i rtse mo gzugs 
[\[177b.7\]]pa'i phyogs tsam yang med do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das dgongs shing mkhyen bzhin du ting nge 'dzin de las bzhengs te/_bzhengs nas kyang 'khor la lan gsum gzigs so/_/'khor la gzigs nas kyang seng ge'i bsgyings pa chen po lan gsum mdzad do/_/bsgyings 
[\[178a\]]
[\[178a.1\]]nas kyang ljags kyi dbang po lan gsum phyung ngo /_/ljags kyi dbang po lan gsum phyung nas kyang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams ljags kyi dbang pos lan gsum khyab par mdzad do/_/stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 
[\[178a.2\]]ljags kyi dbang pos lan gsum khyab par mdzad cing rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba des khyab par mdzad nas yang rnam par gzigs so/_/de nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de stan las langs te thal mo sbyar nas/_bcom ldan 'das nyid la phyag 'tshal zhing 'khod par yang 
[\[178a.3\]]gyur to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa la bka' stsal pa/_mi pham pa de bzhin gshegs pa ring por mi thogs par yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur gyis 'di ni khyed de bzhin gshegs pa la yongs su dri ba'i 
[\[178a.4\]]dus yin no/_/'di ni tshod yin no/_/khyed gang su dag chos la the tshom yod pa de dag de bzhin gshegs pa la yongs su ma zhus na de bzhin gshegs pa mngon sum du bzhugs pa'i tshe bdag cag gis ma zhus pa ga la srid ces phyis 'gyod par gyur ta re/_de skad ces bka' stsal 
[\[178a.5\]]pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das nyid mkhas pa/_bcom ldan 'das nyid dus mkhyen pa/_tshod mkhyen pa/_ran pa mkhyen pa/_bcom ldan 'das nyid thams cad 
[\[178a.6\]]mkhyen cing thams cad gzigs pa ste/_chos thams cad rtogs par thugs su chud pa lags na/_bcom ldan 'das kyis chos bstan pa rnam pa ji lta bus yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos kyi tshul 'di yun ring du gnas par 'gyur ba/_de lta bur 
[\[178a.7\]]chos legs par bstan du gsol/_de nas lha'i bu dbang phyug chen po gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu bye ba phrag brgyad cu'i g.yog 'khor dang ldan pas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te thal mo sbyar nas/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad 
[\[178b\]]
[\[178b.1\]]ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das rnam par 'thag pa thams cad bsdus pa zhes bgyi ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis sngon gsungs na de skye bo mang po la sman pa dang /_skye bo mang po la bde 
[\[178b.2\]]ba dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa 'di yang yun ring du gnas par 'gyur ba'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang bstan du gsol zhes gsol nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i bu dbang phyug chen po la cang mi gsung bas gnang bar mdzad do/_/de nas lha'i bu dbang phyug chen 
[\[178b.3\]]pos bcom ldan 'das kyis cang mi gsung bas gnang bar rig nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa la bka' stsal pa/_mi pham pa 'das pa'i dus kyi de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[178b.4\]]dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang rnam par 'thag pa thams cad bsdus pa'i mdo'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ma gsungs pa de mi bzhugs so/_/ma 'ongs pa'i dus na de bzhin gshegs pa 'byung ba gang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gsung bar mi 'gyur ba gang 
[\[178b.5\]]yang mi 'byung ngo /_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_gang zhig chos 'di la sbyang ba ma byas par chos ston pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa la skur pa 'debs pa yin/_chos spong ba yin/_dge 'dun la smod pa yin no/_/su dkon mchog gsum la log par zhugs pa de ni ngas ngan song 
[\[178b.6\]]ba sems can dmyal ba par gsungs so/_/byams pa de lta bas na rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo byang chub la yang dag par zhugs pa gang dag bdag la 'khrul pa med par 'dod pa de dag gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di rtogs par khong du chud par byas la de nas gdod chos 
[\[178b.7\]]bstan par bya'o/_/byams pa phyi ma'i dus na dam pa'i chos bsdu ba 'di khyod kyi las yin gyis soms shig_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin no zhes gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar nyan to/_/de nas yang 
[\[179a\]]
[\[179a.1\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa la bos te 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/mi pham pa gang gi nub mo de bzhin gshegs pa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa dang /_
[\[179a.2\]]byams pa gang gi nub mo de bzhin gshegs pa len pa med par yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ba'i bar du de bzhin gshegs pa la 'khrul pa'am/_ca co'am/_bsnyel ba'am/_gsung gis nyes par gsungs pa'am/_nyes par dgongs pa'am/_phrin las 
[\[179a.3\]]nyes par mdzad pa ci yang yod dam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ni ma mchis so/_/bka' stsal pa/_mi pham pa gang gi nub mo de bzhin gshegs pa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa dang /_gang gi nub mo/_de 
[\[179a.4\]]bzhin gshegs pa len pa med par yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ba de'i bar du de bzhin gshegs pas gang ci gsungs pa de dag thams cad ni yang dag pa/_de kho na de bzhin ma nor ba de bzhin te gzhan du ma yin no/_/'di la mi blun po kha cig de bzhin gshegs pa'i thabs 
[\[179a.5\]]la mkhas pa mi shes shing khong du ma chud par nga'i ldem po ngag la 'di skad du 'di ni rung ngo /_/'di ni mi rung ngo zhes zer te/_de lta bu de dag ni dam pa'i chos spong ba yin/_de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa la skur pa 'debs pa yin te/_rgyu des na de dag ni sems can dmyal ba pa zhes nga 'chad do/_/
[\[179a.6\]]mi pham pa ma 'ongs pa'i dus phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus lnga brgya pa tha ma la dge slong dang /_dge slong ma dang /_dge bsnyen dang /_dge bsnyen ma byang chub sems dpar khas 'che ba/_sngon mu stegs can du gyur pa/_smon lam gyi dbang gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa legs par gsungs pa'i 
[\[179a.7\]]chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung nas phyogs gcig la spyod pa/_gnyen la gdu ba/_rnyed pa dang /_bkur sti la chags pa/_khyim la ser sna byed pa/_khyim sun par byed pa/_mdog ngan pa/_dman pa la mos pa/_bka' blo mi bde ba/_ma grags pa/_rigs dma' ba/_yo byad 
[\[179b\]]
[\[179b.1\]]la yongs su chags pa/_chos la bde bar gnas pa'i zas thams cad dang bral ba/_ting nge 'dzin gyi zas las shin tu ring zhing rnam par ring ba/_sgyu dang g.yo la gnas pa dag gzhan du smra zhing gzhan du byed de/_de dag mi shes bzhin du nged ni shes pa dang ldan no/_/zhes zer mi mkhas 
[\[179b.2\]]bzhin du nged ni mkhas so zhes zer te/_ngas sems can thams cad la sems mnyam pa la gnas nas thugs rje chen po dang thabs la mkhas pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bsnyel ba mi mnga' ba la gnas te/_mos pa la gzud pa'i phyir sems can thams cad la byang 
[\[179b.3\]]chub bstan pa gang yin pa de la/_de dag kha cig 'di skad du gang nyan thos rnams la gsungs pa'i mdo sde de dag la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis bslab par mi bya'o/_/de dag mnyan par mi bya'o/_/de ni bdag cag gi chos ma yin te/_'di ni nyan thos dang ldan pa yin 
[\[179b.4\]]gyis de la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis bslab par mi bya'o/_/gang rang sangs rgyas rnams la gsungs pa'i mdo sde de dag la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis bslab par mi bya'o/_/de dag mnyan par mi bya'o/_/de ni bdag cag gi chos ma yin te/_'di ni rang 
[\[179b.5\]]sangs rgyas dang ldan pa yin gyis de la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis bslab par mi bya'o/_/zhes zer ba dag 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/mi pham pa ngas ni lha rnams la chos bstan te ngas mos pa ji lta ba bzhin du btul to/_/de bzhin du ngas ni klu rnams dang /_gnod sbyin rnams 
[\[179b.6\]]dang /_lha ma yin rnams dang /_nam mkha' lding rnams dang /_mi 'am ci rnams dang /_lto 'phye chen po rnams dang /_dri za rnams dang /_mi rnams la chos bstan te ngas mos pa ji lta ba bzhin du btul to/_/mi pham pa nga ni sems can rnams kyi don bya ba'i phyir phyogs bcu'i 'jig 
[\[179b.7\]]rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du 'gro zhing der yang mos pa ji lta ba bzhin du sems can rnams la chos ston na/_de ni byang chub sems dpa' khas 'che ba/_byang chub sems dpa' dmu rgod/_byang chub sems dpa' la skur pa 'debs pa/_
[\[180a\]]
[\[180a.1\]{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]du smra ba/_thos pa nyung ba de dag nga'i byang chub gnyis kyis rab tu phye ba ma yin pa 'di la gnyis su smra ste/_'di la ni byang chub sems dpas bslab par bya/_'di la ni byang chub sems dpas bslab par mi bya'o zhes zer te/_sems des de bzhin gshegs 
[\[180a.2\]]pa la skur pa 'debs so/_/chos spong ngo /_/dge 'dun la smod do/_/de dag lus zhig ste/_shi nas sems can dmyal ba rnams su skye bar 'gyur te/_de dag der bskal pa mang po dang /_bskal pa brgya phrag mang po 'das nas thar pa 'thob ste/_yang de dag dbul 
[\[180a.3\]]po'i rigs su skye bar 'gyur ro/_/gang gi tshe brgya lam brgya lam na byang chub tu lung bstan pa 'thob par 'gyur na/_yang snyigs ma lnga'i dus na lung bstan pa thob par 'gyur te/_dper na da ltar nga yun ring po 'gyangs pas dus kyi snyigs ma'i tshe byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs 
[\[180a.4\]]rgyas pa lta bu'o/_/gang dag de dag gi ltar nyan pa'am/_byed pa'am/_yid ches par sems pa de dag kyang 'di lta ste/_sdig pa'i grogs po la mos pas 'gro ba de lta bu nyid du 'gro bar 'gyur ro/_/mi pham pa sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus bskal pa grangs med pa'i yang ches 
[\[180a.5\]]grangs med pa de'i tshe de'i dus na/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dri ma med pa'i 'od 'phro las byung ba'i grags pa zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/_des lo khrag khrig phrag brgyad cur sems can rnams la chos bstan to/_/de'i gsung 
[\[180a.6\]]rab la dge slong 'tsho ba yongs su dag pa zhes bya ba/_chos smra ba/_gtam sna tshogs smra ba/_skye bo mang po la yang dag par ston pa/_skye bo mang po la yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug pa/_skye bo mang po la yang dag par gzengs bstod pa/_skye bo mang po la yang dag par dga' bar 
[\[180a.7\]]byed pa byung nas/_de la de bzhin gshegs pa dri ma med pa'i 'od 'phro las byung ba'i grags pa des phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus na dam pa'i chos bsdu bar bcol te/_des de bzhin gshegs pa de yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'og tu lo bye bar dam pa'i chos kyi tshul bzung ste/_
[\[180b\]]
[\[180b.1\]]de rnam par 'thag pa thams cad bsdus pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la zhugs nas chos ston te/_mos pa ji lta ba de bzhin du sems can rnams la chos bstan to/_/des grong khyer stong phrag brgyad cur smon lam ji lta ba bzhin du sems can rnams rab tu dga' bar byas nas de grong 
[\[180b.2\]]khyer chen po bzang po zhes bya bar song ste/_khyim bye ba phrag brgyad cu la mos pa ji lta ba bzhin du chos bstan nas grong khyer de nas srog chags bye ba phrag brgyad cu rab tu dad par byas so/_/de'i nang nas bye ba phrag gcig ni bla na med pa'i byang chub la rab tu bkod do/_/sems 
[\[180b.3\]]can bye ba phrag bdun cu rtsa dgu ni nyan thos kyi theg pa la rab tu bkod de btul to/_/de nas dge slong 'tsho ba yongs su dag pa de dge slong khri dang lhan cig tu byang chub kyi snying po ga la ba der yul rgyu zhing song ngo /_/mi pham pa dge slong 'tsho ba yongs su dag pa song nas ring po ma lon 
[\[180b.4\]]par grong khyer chen po bzang po der dge slong chos zhes bya ba phyin te/_des rnam par 'thag pa'i mdo stong bzung ngo /_/bsam gtan bzhi yang thob par gyur to/_/dge slong 'tsho ba yongs su dag pas ni mdo sde bye ba phrag bcu dang /_rnam par 'thag pa'i mdo drug khri bzung 
[\[180b.5\]]bar gyur to/_/de nas dge slong chos des/_grong khyer chen po bzang po der tshul gcig gis chos bstan pas skye bo rab tu dga' bar byas kyang de mos pa ji lta ba bzhin du chos bstan pa la mkhas pa ma yin te/_de skye bo de dag la chos thams cad ni stong pa'o zhes stong pa 
[\[180b.6\]]nyid kyis 'doms shing stong pa nyid kyis rjes su ston te/_gang ngas chos thams cad stong pa'o zhes bstan pa 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' kho na yin no/_/gang 'tsho ba yongs su dag pa des bshad pa de ni skyon chags pa ste/_dge slong de 'tsho ba yongs su 
[\[180b.7\]]dag pa ma yin na/_ci'i phyir dge slong de'i ming 'tsho ba yongs su dag pa zhes bya/_de ni 'tsho ba yongs su dag pa ma yin te/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_me tog yongs su len cing blangs nas yongs su spyod do/_/spos dang byug pa yongs su len cing blangs nas yongs su spyod 
[\[181a\]]
[\[181a.1\]]do/_/de ni shes pa ma yin te byis pa'o/_/nga ni tshangs par spyad nas yun ring ba yin gyi de ni gsar bu ste/_bsnyen par rdzogs nas ring por ma lon pa yin gyis de ltar yid ches par ma byed cig ces zer ro/_/dge slong de ni bag yod pa yin te/_dge slong 'tsho ba 
[\[181a.2\]]yongs su dag pa de la skye bo de dag rab tu dad pas de ltar des skye bo de dag la dbyen byas na dbye bar ma nus so/_/de nas dge slong chos de 'chi ba'i dus byas par gyur te 'chi ba'i dus byas nas 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa la skur pa btab pa dang /_'di ltar chos spangs pas bskal 
[\[181a.3\]]pa bdun cur sems can dmyal bar skyes so/_/de bskal pa bdun cu po de dag 'das nas bskal pa drug cur byang chub kyi sems brjed do/_/bskal pa drug cu po de dag 'das nas de bzhin gshegs pa kun nas spos rin po che'i 'od kyi gsung rab la de bzhin gshegs pa des byang 
[\[181a.4\]]chub tu sems bskyed du bcug nas des byang chub tu sems bskyed do/_/tshe rabs dgu khrir dud 'gro'i skye gnas su skyes so/_/tshe rabs drug khrir mi dbul po rnams kyi nang du skyes te thams cad du yang lce med par gyur to/_/dge slong 'tsho ba yongs su dag pa de sangs rgyas khrag 
[\[181a.5\]]khrig phrag lnga'i gan na chos smra bar gyur te/_thams cad du yang mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan par gyur to/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis bod par 'os par gyur to/_/chos thams cad la yongs su dag par chos ston par yang gyur to/_/mi pham pa de'i tshe de'i 
[\[181a.6\]]dus na dge slong 'tsho ba yongs su dag pa zhes bya bar gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin pa snyam du khyod sems na khyod kyis de ltar mi blta ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med ces bya ba de'i tshe de'i dus na dge slong chos smra ba 'tsho ba yongs su dag pa zhes bya bar gyur to/_/mi pham pa de'i tshe 
[\[181a.7\]]de'i dus na dge slong chos zhes bya ba de gzhan zhig yin pa snyam du khyod sems na khyod kyis de ltar mi blta ste/_nga de'i tshe de'i dus na dge slong chos zhes bya bar gyur to nga nyid las de lta bu'i mi tshul ba byung ngo /_/mi pham pa chos kyis phongs par 'gyur ba'i las kyi sgrib pa ni de ltar 
[\[181b\]]
