[\[201b.3\]]sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la phyi phyir zhing mnyam par 'jog pa dang /_ji lta ji ltar sems can rnams mos par 'gyur ba de lta de ltar bdag gis lus sprul nas ched du srid par skye ba len pa ste/_byang chub sems dpa'i sa brgyad la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpas chos bzhi 
[\[201b.4\]]po de dag yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/_/gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'i sa dgu pa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpas smon lam la mkhas par bya ste/_ji ltar smon par bya ba de bzhin du smon lam bsgrub par bya'o/_/lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang dri za dang mi dang mi ma yin pa'i 
[\[201b.5\]]skad la shes shing spobs pa ston pa dang /_mngal nas 'byung ba phun sum tshogs pa dang /_rigs phun sum tshogs pa dang /_skyed par byed pa phun sum tshogs pa dang /_rus phun sum tshogs pa dang /_g.yog phun sum tshogs pa dang /_tshe phun sum tshogs pa dang /_
[\[201b.6\]]'byung ba phun sum tshogs pa dang /_byang chub kyi shing bkod pa phun sum tshogs pa dang /_yon tan gyi tshogs thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/_/gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sa bcu pa la gnas pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa nyid du bshad par bya ste/_byang chub sems 
[\[201b.7\]]dpa' rnams kyi sa nas sar 'phar ba de ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas bgro ba'o//_//bam po gnyis pa/_gzhan yang sangs rgyas bgro ba ni 'di lta ste/_yi ge mnyam pa nyid dang /_skad mnyam pa nyid dang /_
[\[202a\]]
[\[202a.1\]]yi ge'i rnam pa'i sgor 'jug pa'o/_/yi ge'i rnam pa'i sgor 'jug pa gang zhe na/_a'i sgo ni chos thams cad mi skye ba dang skye mched mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro/_/ra'i sgo ni chos thams cad rdul dang bral ba'i phyir ro/_/pa'i sgo ni chos thams cad don dam par 
[\[202a.2\]]bstan pa'i phyir ro/_/tsa'i sgo ni chos thams cad 'chi 'pho dang skye ba dang bral ba'o/_/na'i sgo ni chos thams cad ming dang bral ba'o/_/ming gi rang bzhin can ma thob pa ma stor ba'o/_/la'i sgo ni chos thams cad 'jig rten las 'das shing sred pa'i lcug ma'i rgyu dang rkyen bcom pa'i 
[\[202a.3\]]phyir ro/_/da'i sgo ni chos thams cad dul ba dang dul nas yongs su chad pa'i phyir ro/_/ba'i sgo ni shin tu dben pa'i phyir chos thams cad bcings pa dang bral ba'o/_/ra'i sgo ni chos thams cad gzugs la sogs pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir ro/_/sa'i sgo ni chos thams cad chags 
[\[202a.4\]]pa mi dmigs pa'i phyir chags pa med dgrol ba med pa'o/_/ba'i sgo ni chos thams cad ngag gi lam gyi sgo yongs su chad pa'o/_/ta'i sgo ni chos thams cad de bzhin nyid las mi g.yo ba'o/_/ya'i sgo ni chos thams cad ji lta bzhin gyi phyir ro/_/sta'i sgo ni chos thams cad 
[\[202a.5\]]la khengs pa med de chags pa med/_zhe sdang ba med pa'o/_/ka'i sgo ni chos thams cad dag la byed po ba med pa'o/_/sa'i sgo ni chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid las mi ldog pa'o/_/ma'i sgo ni chos thams cad dri ma dang bral ba shin tu dri ma med pa/_skyon med pa/_rnyog 
[\[202a.6\]]pa med pa'o/_/ga'i sgo ni chos thams cad gzung ba dang /_gzung ba med pa'i mi dmigs pa'i phyir zab pa/_nam mkha'i ngos dang 'dra ba shin tu dben pa'o/_/s+tha'i sgo ni chos thams cad thang dang bral ba/_rlan pa dang bral ba ste/_tshu rol dang pha rol med pa'o/_/dza'i 
[\[202a.7\]]sgo ni chos thams cad skye ba dang /_rga ba dang /_'chi ba mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro/_/shwa'i sgo ni chos thams cad dbugs dang dbugs nang du rngub pa dang /_dbugs phyir 'byin pa dang /_dbugs nang du 'gro ba dang /_dbugs phyir 'gro ba dang bral ba'o/_/d+hA'i sgo ni chos 
[\[202b\]]
[\[202b.1\]]thams cad chos kyi dbyings la gnas pa'i phyir ro/_/sha'i sgo ni chos thams cad zhi gnas yin pa dang /_dul ba dang /_zhi ba'i sar gyur pa'i phyir ro/_/kha'i sgo ni chos thams cad rtsa ba dang gnas med pa'i phyir nam mkha' dang 'dra'o/_/k+Sha'i sgo ni chos thams cad shin tu 
[\[202b.2\]]zad pa'i phyir zad pa las mi ldog pa dang /_mi g.yo ba'i phyir gnas pa dang mi 'gul ba'o/_/dza'i sgo ni chos thams cad ye shes mi rgyu ba'i phyir mi shes pa/_rnam par mi shes pa/_mi sems pa/_mi mthong ba'o/_/a'i sgo ni chos thams cad de bzhin ma yin pa'i tshig bla 
[\[202b.3\]]dgas kyi phyir ldan pa ma yin/_bral ba ma yin/_kun ldan pa ma yin/_kun bral ba ma yin pa'o/_/b+ha'i sgo ni chos thams cad khur dang bral ba'o/_/tsha'i sgo ni chos thams cad mdog kyang med de/_'di lta ste stong pa'o/_/sma'i sgo ni chos thams cad glen pa'i phyir dran pa zhes 
[\[202b.4\]]mi bya/_rmongs pa zhes mi bya'o/_/swa'i sgo ni chos thams cad rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang skad stong pa nyid kyi phyir ro/_/b+ha'i sgo ni chos thams cad skad stong pa nyid kyi phyir ro/_/sa'i sgo ni chos thams cad rtag tu zad pa chad pa dang rtag pa yongs su chad pa'o/_/g+ha'i sgo ni chos thams cad 
[\[202b.5\]]stug po'i mi dmigs pa'i phyir gdeg pa med/_gtor ba med pa'o/_/e'i sgo ni chos thams cad dben pa'i phyir mi gnas pa'i tshul gyis shin tu gnas pa'o/_/na'i sgo ni chos thams cad rdul phra rab mi dmigs pa'i phyir chos thams cad ma gtogs pa/_mi 'gro ba/_mi 
[\[202b.6\]]'ong ba/_mi 'greng ba/_mi 'dug pa/_mi nyal ba/_rnam par mi rtog pa'o/_/s+pha'i sgo ni chos thams cad khyab pa dang bral ba ste/_gang khyab par byed pa'am/_gang gis khyab par byed pa'am/_gang la khyab par byed pa med de/_ma khyab pa nam mkha' dang 'dra ba'o/_/ska'i sgo 
[\[202b.7\]]ni chos thams cad phung po ma dmigs pa'i phyir ro/_/dz+wa'i sgo ni chos thams cad rims nad dang bral ba/_rims med pa/_nad med pa'o/_/s+t+ya'i sgo ni chos thams cad shin tu btang bas btang ba'o/_/ba'i sgo ni chos thams cad lam chad pa'i phyir shin tu mya ngan las 'das pa/_mya 
[\[203a\]]
[\[203a.1\]]ngan las 'da' ba dang 'dra ba'o/_/ha'i sgo ni chos thams cad mtha' la gnas pas 'chi 'pho ba med pa/_skye ba med pa'o/_/'di lta ste/_ha'i pha rol na yi ge med de/_'di la ming ngam/_rang bzhin 'ga' yang med pa/_smrar med pa/_brjod du med pa/_bstan du med 
[\[203a.2\]]pa/_brir med pa/_bklag tu med pa'o/_/ji ltar de ma byas pa de bzhin du chos thams cad la rtogs par bya'o/_/gzungs la 'jug pa 'di ni yi ge a la sogs pa bshad pa la 'jug pa ste/_'jug pa de la gnas na byang chub sems dpa' yi ge thams cad la mkhas pa shes 
[\[203a.3\]]par 'gyur ro/_/chos thams cad kyang chos mnyam pa nyid dang sbyor bar 'gyur ro/_/skad la shes pa yang thob par 'gyur ro/_/byang chub sems dpa' gang yang blo tshul dang ldan pas yi ge la 'jug pa'i phyag rgya a'i sgo'i tshig 'di nyan tam/_len tam/_'dzin tam/_klog gam/_
[\[203a.4\]]gzhan dag la 'chad na/_de la yon tan nyi shu po 'di dag yod par blta'o/_/nyi shu gang zhe na/_dran pa dang ldan pa yin/_rtogs pa dang ldan pa yin/_blo gros dang ldan pa yin/_blo dang ldan pa dang /_spobs pa dang ldan pa dang /_gzungs kyang tshegs chung ngus thob par 'gyur ba 
[\[203a.5\]]dang /_the tshom med par 'gyur zhing nem nur med par 'gyur ba dang /_gzhan las tshig 'jam po thos nas chags pa'i sems mi skyed cing gzhan las tshig rtsub po thos nas zhe sdang ba'i sems mi skyed la/_khengs pa dang 'dud par mi 'gyur ba dang /_dgra las rgyal bar 'gyur ba dang /_
[\[203a.6\]]skad la mkhas pa dang /_phung po la mkhas pa/_khams la mkhas pa/_skye mched la mkhas pa dang /_rgyu la mkhas pa dang /_rkyen la mkhas pa dang /_chos kyi dbyings la mkhas pa dang /_dbang po dam pa dang /_dam pa ma yin pa la mkhas pa dang /_pha rol gyi 
[\[203a.7\]]sems shes pa la mkhas pa dang /_chos 'chad pa la mkhas pa dang /_gnas dang gnas ma yin pa'i ye shes la mkhas pa dang /_thabs mkhas pa dang /_'ong ba dang /_'gro ba la mkhas shing spyod lam la mkhas pa dang /_ngo tsha ba dang 'dzem pa la mkhas pa yang 
[\[203b\]]
[\[203b.1\]]thob par 'gyur ro/_/bud med la la zhig bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed de/_de yi ge'i tshul gyi sgo'i phyag rgya a bshad pa la 'jug pa 'di nyan par 'gyur/_len par 'gyur/_'dzin par 'gyur/_klog par 'gyur/_gzhan la rgya cher ston par 'gyur 
[\[203b.2\]]na thos ma thag tu yon tan bcu thob par 'gyur ro/_/bcu gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_bud med kyi lus tha mar 'gyur/_mi khom pa yongs su spangs par 'gyur/_dal 'byor thob par 'gyur/_sangs rgyas 'byung ba mthong nas dad par 'gyur/_dad nas bkur sti byed par 'gyur/_
[\[203b.3\]]de bzhin gshegs pas de'i bsam pa mkhyen nas chos ston par 'gyur/_chos de thos nas bzod pa thob par 'gyur/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur te/_de yang sangs rgyas bgro ba'o/_/gzhan yang sangs rgyas bgro ba ni 'di 
[\[203b.4\]]lta ste/_sangs rgyas kyi mnyam pa nyid 'khor gsum yongs su dag pa mi skye ba'i tshul rtogs pa/_ji lta ba bzhin du chos 'chad pa/_khams gsum pa yongs su shes pa/_'dod chags dang /_zhe sdang dang /_gti mug gi rang bzhin yongs su shes pa/_chad pa ma yin pa/_
[\[203b.5\]]rtag pa ma yin pa/_mi gnas pa/_mi 'gro ba/_theg pa gsum gyi tshul gcig pa la 'jug pa/_tshul gcig pa rtogs pa/_chos thams cad bgro bar mi bya ba/_brtsad par mi bya ba/_mi mnyam pa/_mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa/_ma 'ongs pa/_mi 'gro ba/_mi 
[\[203b.6\]]rgyu ba/_mtshan nyid med pa/_sangs rgyas rnams kyi chos gang yang mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas pa/_ma mkhyen pa/_sangs rgyas rnams kyis ye shes dang ye shes ma yin par ma dmigs pa/_nyon mongs pa spangs pa ma yin pa/_rnam par dag pa mngon du byas pa ma 
[\[203b.7\]]yin pa/_ma thob pa/_mngon par mi bya ba/_bsgom pa ma yin pa/_rtogs pa ma yin pa/_sangs rgyas rnams kyis ma dmigs pa/_ma bshig pa/_sangs rgyas rnams kyis sangs rgyas 'byung bar ma dmigs pa/_chos ma yin pa/_dge 'dun ma yin pa/_sangs 
[\[204a\]]
[\[204a.1\]]rgyas rnams kyis sems can dag ma bkrol ma bcings pa'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_chos thams cad thog ma nas rnam par dag pa'i phyir te/_sangs rgyas rnams kyis chos gang yang ma gzigs ma gsan/_ma dgongs ma mkhyen te/_sangs rgyas rnams kyis 
[\[204a.2\]]ma bshad ma gsungs so/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dag mi 'chad mi gsung 'chad par mi 'gyur ro/_/sangs rgyas dag ni ye shes dang ldan pa ma yin/_mi ldan pa'ang ma yin/_sbyin gnas ma yin/_sbyin gnas ma yin pa yang ma yin te/_sbyin pa sbyong bar yang mi 
[\[204a.3\]]mdzad do/_/sangs rgyas dag ni spyod par mi mdzad yongs su spyod par mi mdzad do/_/sangs rgyas dag la ni sku gang yang med do/_/sangs rgyas dag la ni gzugs su mi blta/_chos su ma yin/_mtshan du ma yin/_chos kyi dbyings su ma yin no/_/sangs rgyas dag ni byung 
[\[204a.4\]]ba ma yin no/_/'gags pa ma yin/_mya ngan las 'das pa ma yin/_mya ngan las ma 'das pa yang ma yin/_yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ba yang ma yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_chos thams cad thog ma nas yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i phyir te/_sangs 
[\[204a.5\]]rgyas dag ni gcig pu yang ma yin/_skye bo mang po'i nang du gshegs pa yang ma yin no/_/sangs rgyas dag ni sus kyang ma mthong ma thos/_ma mchod mchod par mi 'gyur ro/_/sangs rgyas dag ni chos gang la yang gcig pa'am/_tha dad par mi mdzad do/_/sangs rgyas 
[\[204a.6\]]dag gis ni byang chub ma 'thob bo/_/sangs rgyas dag ni rnyed pa 'dogs par yang mi mdzad do/_/sangs rgyas dag ni chos kyi 'khor lo yang mi skor te/_ming ji lta ba sangs rgyas dag kyang de bzhin/_sgra'i thog ma'i mtha' dang tha ma'i mtha' yang de bzhin no/_/'di ni mnyam pa 
[\[204a.7\]]nyid de gang mnyam pa nyid pa de la ni mi mnyam pa gang yang med do/_/mi mnyam pa med pa de la ni bdud rtsi gang yang med do/_/gang na bdud rtsi gang yang med pa de na ni sman kyang mi skye ste/_'di ni sangs rgyas bgro ba'o/_/sems can rnams ni drang bar bya ba'i phyir dpes bshad pa yin te/_
[\[204b\]]
[\[204b.1\]]sangs rgyas rnams ni bgro bar yang mi mdzad/_rtsod par yang mi mdzad/_bgro bas 'jog par yang mi mdzad do/_/bcom ldan 'das 'jug sred kyi rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams kun du 'od ces bya bar sangs rgyas bgro ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs 
[\[204b.2\]]'di bstan pa'i tshe/_byang chub sems dpa' khri nyis stong gis ni mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to/_/byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis ni sangs rgyas bye ba de snyed bzhugs pa las de bzhin gshegs pa gzhan gang yang ma mthong ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa 'jug sred 
[\[204b.3\]]kyi rgyal po nyag gcig mthong ngo /_/de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na gnas pa las 'di snyam du gyur te/_de ring shar phyogs na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'jug sred kyi rgyal po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams 
[\[204b.4\]]kun du 'od ces bya bar phyogs bcu kun nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'dus so/_/'dus nas sangs rgyas bgro ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs bgro bar mdzad/_'chad par mdzad kyis/_gang bdag ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la phyag 
[\[204b.5\]]bya ba dang /_chos bstan pa de dag mnyan pa'i phyir 'gro'o/_/gang bdag ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la blta ba dang /_chos mnyan pa'i phyir phyogs bcur yang 'gro zhing rgyu bar bya na/_de ltar tshegs chung zhing sangs rgyas kyi zhing gcig tu 'dus kyis gang bdag ni nges 
[\[204b.6\]]par 'gro'o/_/skyes bu dam pa de 'dra ba dag 'jig rten du byung bar thos pa'am mthong ba dkon no snyam mo/_/de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas byang chub sems dpa' byams pa la smras pa/_byams pa da ni bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'jug sred kyi rgyal po'i sangs 
[\[204b.7\]]rgyas kyi zhing du 'dong ngo /_/de nas sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya phrag mang po da ltar 'dus te sangs rgyas bgro ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'chad kyis/_de dag la bdag cag gis chos mnyan to/_/de bzhin gshegs pa de dag la bdag cag gis blta'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe 
[\[205a\]]
[\[205a.1\]]na/_skyes bu glang po chen po de dag gnas gcig tu 'dus pa mthong ba ni dkon no/_/de skad ces smras pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' byams pas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so/_/'jam dpal khyod bzhud cig bdag ni mi mchi'o/_/
[\[205a.2\]]de ci'i phyir zhe na/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dag ni mnyes dka' ste/_'dus pa de dag gis bdag cag lta bu la skabs ma phye bar blta ba'am/_mnyan par yang mi nus la/_'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ni gzugs kyi skur mi blta'o/_/de bzhin 
[\[205a.3\]]gshegs pa rnams ni chos kyi sku ste/_gang chos nyid de yang sus kyang ma mthong ma thos ma mchod do/_/'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_byams pa khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa la ma mchod dam/_byams pas smras pa/_'jam dpal bdag ni de bzhin gshegs 
[\[205a.4\]]pa la mi mchod do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de bzhin gshegs pa la ni sus kyang mchod mi nus so/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de bzhin gshegs pa dang de bzhin nyid de gnyis su med do/_/'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_byams pa gnyis su med ces bya ba de gang la bya/_byams pas 
[\[205a.5\]]smras pa/_'jam dpal gnyis su med ces bya ba ni nyon mongs pa rnams gcig pa yang ma yin tha dad pa yang ma yin pa'o/_/'jam dpal gnyis su med ces bya ba ni gang rnam pa gnyis su med pa'o/_/rnam pa gnyis su med pa yang gang zhe na/_'di ni kun nas nyon mongs pa'o/_/
[\[205a.6\]]'di ni rnam par dag pa'o zhes de ltar shes na de ni rnam pa gnyis su med do/_/'di ni tshul khrims dang ldan pa'o/_/'di ni ngang tshul ngan pa can no zhes rtog na rnam pa gnyis su byed do/_/'di ni nyan thos so/_/'di ni rang sangs rgyas so/_/'di ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas so 
[\[205a.7\]]zhes rnam par rtog na gnyis su byed do/_/'di dag ni bsgom par bya'o/_/'di dag ni spang bar bya'o/_/'di dag ni mngon du bya'o zhes rnam par rtog na rnam pa gnyis su byed do/_/'di ni ye shes kyis shes par bya'o/_/'di ni rnam par shes pas shes par bya'o zhes yid la 
[\[205b\]]
[\[205b.1\]]byed na rnam pa gnyis su byed do/_/'jam dpal gang du gnyis su 'jug pa'i rnam par shes pa rtog pa ni chung ngu na sangs rgyas so zhes rtog pa de thams cad rnam pa gnyis su byed do/_/'jam dpal bdag gis ni bskal pa'am/_bskal pa'i lhag ma lus kyi bar du rnam pa gnyis 
[\[205b.2\]]su med pa las brtsams te/_bshad du zin kyang spobs pa'i mthar phyin pa las zad par 'gyur ba med do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_bdag gis mtha' dang dbus ma mthong ba'i phyir ro/_/'jam dpal gnyis su med ces bya ba ni 'di lta ste/_chos thams cad kyi tshul gcig pa 
[\[205b.3\]]dang tha dad pa med pa'o/_/smras pa/_byams pa khyod ni chos thams cad ma skyes pa la 'jam dpal ngas ni bskal pa'am/_bskal pa'i lhag ma lus kyi bar du gnyis su med pa las brtsams te bshad na nga'i spobs pa zad par mi 'gyur ro zhes khyod de skad smra ba nyid 
[\[205b.4\]]dmigs pa chen po yin no/_/byams pas smras pa/_'jam dpal yi ge la chags par ma byed cig_/yi ge thams cad ni mi skye ba'i mtshan nyid las mi g.yo'o/_/de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad la smras pa/_rigs kyi bu khyed cag 
[\[205b.5\]]tshur sheg_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'jug sred kyi rgyal po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du de bzhin gshegs pa de dag la blta ba dang /_chos bstan pa de dag nyan du 'dong ngo /_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' spobs pa'i phung pos 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad 
[\[205b.6\]]ces smras so/_/'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ni sus kyang blta mi nus na ci'i phyir na khyod tshur sheg_/de bzhin gshegs pa la bltar 'dong zhes sa smra/_gang blta bar bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gang yin/_'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs 
[\[205b.7\]]pas ni de bzhin gshegs pa dag 'das pa ma yin/_ma byon pa ma yin/_da ltar ma yin te/_chos gang dus gsum du stong pa de ni blta mi nus so zhes de skad ces gsungs so/_/yang 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa blta'o zhes smras pa mig gi rnam par shes pa gang gis de 
[\[206a\]]
[\[206a.1\]]bzhin gshegs pa blta bar bya/_ci sha'i mig gis blta bar bya'am/_'on tam lha'i mig gis blta bar bya/_gal te sha'i mig gis blta na ni sha'i mig ni stong pa ste stong pas ni mthong bar mi nus so/_/de ste lha'i mig gis blta na ni de la lha'i mig tu 
[\[206a.2\]]brtags na lha'i mig go snyam du 'du shes par 'gyur te/_brtags pa'i mig gis ni de bzhin gshegs pa mi mthong ngo /_/smras pa/_rigs kyi bu khyod ni gang stong pa nyid kyis ston par byed na/_de la sus kyang de bzhin gshegs pa blta bar mi 'gyur/_mchod par mi 'gyur te/_
[\[206a.3\]]rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa zhe'am/_sangs rgyas zhe'am/_sems can zhe'am/_bgro ba zhe'am/_mchod pa zhe'am/_lta ba zhes gang [{]chung zad [,]cung zad [}]smra ba smos pa brjod pa'i yi ge de thams cad ni yi ge'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo /_/de bas na mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba'i tshig de ni 
[\[206a.4\]]de bzhin nyid la 'khrugs par mi byed de/_de bzhin nyid ldog par mi byed kyis khyed las gang bzod pa dag ni 'dong ngo /_/gang mi bzod pa dag ni khyed cig bdag ni 'gro'o/_/de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'di lta ste/_chos kyis chog mi shes pa'i phyir gnyis su med 
[\[206a.5\]]de gcig tu song ste/_sangs rgyas kyi mthus 'khor de nas su'ang ma song ngo /_/de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'di lta ste/_skyes bu stobs po che'i dpung pa brkyang ba las bskum pa'am/_bskum pa las brkyang ba tsam du de'i thang cig skad cig yud tsam gyis 'jam 
[\[206a.6\]]dpal gzhon nur gyur pa mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams su mi snang bar gyur nas kun du 'od kyi 'jig rten gyi khams su 'dug go/_/de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams la lan bdun bskor nas/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 
[\[206a.7\]]'das de dag gi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/yang de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'jug sred kyi rgyal po'i g.yas phyogs na sring mo the tshom sel ba zhes bya ba skyil mo krung du bcas shing 'dug ste/_de kun du zla ba'i 'od dri ma 
[\[206b\]]
[\[206b.1\]]med par snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par bzhag par gyur to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'jug sred kyi rgyal po 'di snyam du dgongs te 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis bdag la bstod do/_/
[\[206b.2\]]bkur ro/_/zab mo la bzod pa'o/_/stong pa la gnas pa'o zhes bshad do snyam du sems te/_'di ni mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams nas dmigs pa chen pos bskyod cing bdag tu 'dzin pa che ba dang ldan zhing 'ongs kyis/_gang ngas ni 'di ri khor yug gi rtse mo la 'phangs 
[\[206b.3\]]pa dang 'di las brtsams te chos zab mo ston par 'gyur bas skye bo phyi ma dag dang /_ma 'ongs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' dag la yang snang bar byas par 'gyur te/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ltar sangs rgyas kyi chos ni bsam gyis mi khyab de ltar zab pas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 
[\[206b.4\]]lta bu stong pa la gnas pa'i mchog kyang ri khor yug gi rtse mor 'phangs par 'gyur ro snyam mo/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'jug sred kyi rgyal pos 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/'jam dpal khyod kyis don gang 
[\[206b.5\]]gi dbang ma mthong nas 'dir 'ongs/_'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das bdag ni mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams de na mchis pa las 'di snyam du gyur te/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams 'jig rten du 'byung ba ni dkon no/_/chos thos pa yang 
[\[206b.6\]]dkon te/_kun tu 'od ces bgyi ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams su yang phyogs bcu nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dpag tu ma mchis/_grangs ma mchis pa dag tshogs so/_/tshogs nas sangs rgyas bgro ba zhes bgyi ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'chad kyis/_bdag ni de 
[\[206b.7\]]bzhin gshegs pa de dag la blta ba dang /_chos bshad pa de dag mnyan du mchi'o snyam nas bcom ldan 'das bdag ni chos nyan pa'i slad du sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir mchis so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'jug sred kyi rgyal pos de'i tshe ci nas kyang 
[\[207a\]]
[\[207a.1\]]rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba mngon par 'dus byas pas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa ri khor yug gi rtse mor 'phangs par gyur la/_bdag gang du blangs shing khyer snyam du yang mi shes pa de 'dra bar myur du bteg ste 'phang ba'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba mngon 
[\[207a.2\]]par 'dus byas so/_/de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa ri khor yug gi rtse mor 'phangs pa las sems shing 'di snyam du gyur to/_/rgyu gang dang rkyen gang gis na bdag sangs rgyas kyi 'khor chen po de lta bur blta na bzang ba/_mdzes pa/_glang po che chen po de 'dra ba dag gi nang 
[\[207a.3\]]nas ri khor yug gi rtse mo 'dir 'phangs par gyur/_bdag ri khor yug gi rtse mor sus 'phangs snyam du de ltar sems pa las 'di snyam du gyur te/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'jug sred kyi rgyal po des bdag ri khor yug gi rtse mor 'phangs so snyam mo/_/
[\[207a.4\]]de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'di snyam du gyur te bdag ni 'khor de nas 'phangs la/_sring mo the tshom sel ba de ni bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'jug sred kyi rgyal po'i drung na skyil mo krung bcas shing 'dug pa las sring mo de ni ma 'phangs kyi/_bdag 
[\[207a.5\]]'phangs na/_ci'i phyir zhig tu de ltar mo ni ma 'phangs la bdag 'phangs pa las na sring mo de ni dge ba'i rtsa ba shin tu 'bar ba zab mo la shin tu bzod par gyur pa zhig gi/_/bdag ni de lta bu ma yin pa zhig gam snyam mo/_/de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'di snyam du 
[\[207a.6\]]gyur te/_gang bdag gis rdzu 'phrul gyi mthu bskyed de/_slar yang 'khor der 'gro'o snyam mo/_/de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas de'i tshe ji lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba mngon par 'dus byas pas sems bskyed pa gcig gis shar phyogs nas sangs rgyas kyi 
[\[207a.7\]]zhing gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das par gyur pa de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba mngon par 'dus byas kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing der chung ngu na skra'i rtse mo'i cha shas tsam du yang 'gro mi nus na 'khor der 'gro ba lta ci smos te/_de lta bu'i gnas med do/_/de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur 
[\[207b\]]
[\[207b.1\]]gyur pa phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas mu med pa kun du song yang 'di lta ste/_sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang /_byin gyi rlabs kyis 'khor der 'gro ma nus so/_/de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong kun tu 
[\[207b.2\]]song nas slar yang ri khor yug gi rtse mo la 'dug nas 'di snyam du gyur te/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi byin gyi rlabs ni mthu ches/_de la bdag gi rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam pas gnon yang mi nus/_de la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis nyes pa yang med do/_/de 
[\[207b.3\]]ci'i phyir zhe na/_de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ni chos la slob dpon gyis 'chab pa med de/_bdag nyid [{]chung zad [,]cung zad [}]cig kho ru chung bas de'i phyir bdag zhi ba'i chos ston pa der 'gro ma nus par gyur du zad de/_de bzhin gshegs pa dag ni chos la slob dpon gyis 'chab pa med kyi/_de 
[\[207b.4\]]bzhin gshegs pa dag ni sems can thams cad la snyoms pas na gang bdag ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa la gnas pas ri khor yug gi rtse mo 'di nyid la gnas sa snyam mo/_/de la 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa ni 'di yin te/_'di lta ste/_chos 
[\[207b.5\]]thams cad dran pa med pa/_yid la byed pa med pa/_chos thams cad mi gnas pa/_chos thams cad gnas pa med pa ste/_ci'i phyir mi gnas zhe na 'gro ba med pa'i phyir te/_chos gang yang shin tu yod pa med de/_de'i phyir de dag mi 'gro'o/_/gang mi 'gro ba de ni mi 
[\[207b.6\]]gnas so/_/'di lta ste/_gnas dang gnas ma yin pa ston pa dang /_dran pa med cing yid la byed pa med pa ni 'jam dpal gyi dran pa nye bar 'jog pa yin no/_/de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas dran pa nye bar 'jog pa la gnas pa 'di la gnas pa las/_lha'i bu 
[\[207b.7\]]bzhi khri nyis stong 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa de ga la ba der song ste phyin nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i rkang pa la phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/_/de nas 'khor der 'od zer gyi rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba'i lha'i bu 'ongs te 'dug nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur 
[\[208a\]]
[\[208a.1\]]pa la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/'jam dpal khyod gnas pa gang la gnas te/_da ltar langs pa lags/_'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_lha'i bu gal te bdag la gnas pa yod na ni bdag gnas pas gnas par byed na/_lha'i bu chos thams cad dben pa'i 
[\[208a.2\]]phyir bdag la gnas pa med mod kyi/_lha'i bu khyod gnas pa gang la gnas te da ltar langs pa yin zhes zer ba/_bdag ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa la gnas pas gnas te da ltar langs pa yin no/_/gsol pa/_'jam dpal dran pa nye bar gzhag pa la gnas pa ji lta bu zhig 
[\[208a.3\]]lags/_smras pa/_chos thams cad dran pa med yid la byed pa med pa'o/_/gsol pa/_'jam dpal gang na dran pa med/_yid la byed pa med pa der gnas te da ltar langs pa lags sam/_'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_gnas pa gang la gnas na byis pa lta bu so so'i skye bo 
[\[208a.4\]]thams cad 'dod chags dang /_zhe sdang dang /_gti mug rgyu bar 'gyur ba'i gnas pa de la gnas te bdag da ltar langs pa yin no/_/lha'i bu 'od zer gyi rgyal mtshan gyis gsol pa/_'jam dpal gang sangs rgyas kyis ma dmigs pa'i gnas pa de ji lta bu lags/_smras 
[\[208a.5\]]pa/_lha'i bu stong pa nyid la gnas pa ni sangs rgyas kyis ma dmigs pa'o/_/mtshan ma med pa la gnas pa dang /_smon pa med pa la gnas pa ni sangs rgyas kyis ma dmigs pa'o/_/de bas na gnas pa de la gnas te da ltar langs pa yin no/_/gsol pa/_dran pa 
[\[208a.6\]]nye bar gzhag pa la gnas pa ji lta bu lags/_smras pa/_lha'i bu gang na dran pa med yid la byed pa med pa de ni gnas pa'i dam pa yin te/_gang gnas pa de la gnas pa de dag ni 'dod pa'i khams su mi gnas/_gzugs kyi khams su mi gnas/_gzugs med 
[\[208a.7\]]pa'i khams su mi gnas so/_/gang khams gsum la mi gnas pa de dag ni mnyam pa'i gnas pas gnas pa'o/_/gang mnyam pa'i gnas pas gnas pa de dag la ni mi mnyam pa med do/_/gang la mi mnyam pa med pa de dag ni 'gro ba med do/_/gang la 'gro ba med pa 
[\[208b\]]
[\[208b.1\]]de dag la ni ma rig pa mi mthong ngo /_/gang ma rig pa mi mthong ba de dag la ni rig pa ma skyes so/_/gang rig pa ma skyes pa de dag ni mi 'byung ngo /_/gang mi 'byung ba de dag ni 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/_/gang 'byung bar mi 'gyur ba de dag ni 'jig pa med do/_/gang 'jig pa med pa de dag 
[\[208b.2\]]ni mi 'byung ngo /_/gang ma byung ba de dag ni dbye bar mi nus so/_/gang dbye bar mi nus pa de dag ni lha'i bu shin tu dag pa yin te/_lha'i bu de ni 'phags pa gnas pa rdul dang bral ba'o/_/gsol pa/_'jam dpal rdul ces bgyi ba lags/_smras pa/_lha'i bu chung ngu na sangs 
[\[208b.3\]]rgyas su dmigs pa'i rnam par shes pa 'byung ba de ni rdul to/_/lha'i bu mtshan ma ni rdul to/_/'du shes dang /_'dzin pa dang /_chags pa dang /_rlom sems dang /_'dud pa dang /_khengs pa dang /_phyag 'tshal ba dang /_chags sems dang /_khong khro ba dang /_dmigs pa dang /_
[\[208b.4\]]'gro ba dang /_smon lam dang /_rtog pa dang /_rtog pa'i mtshan ma dang /_yongs su rtog pa dang /_rnam par rtog pa dang /_kun tu rtog pa dang /_yul yid la byed pa dang /_nga slong bar byed pa dang /_chad par 'dzin pa dang /_rtag par 'dzin pa dang /_med par 'dzin pa dang /_log 
[\[208b.5\]]par 'dzin pa dang /_yod par 'dzin pa dang /_med par 'dzin pa dang /_lha'i bu ji tsam du rnam par rtog cing spros pa dang /_yid la byed pa dang /_sems pa dang /_sgrun pa de thams cad ni 'phags pa'i chos 'dul ba la rdul du bshad do/_/de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 
[\[208b.6\]]la lha'i bu 'od zer gyi rgyal mtshan gyis legs so zhes bya ba byin te/_'jam dpal legs sa legs so/_/yang 'jam dpal khyod kyis dran pa nye bar gzhag pa la gnas pa bshad pa 'di legs sa zhes smras so/_/'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_lha'i bu chog gis ma rtog 
[\[208b.7\]]shig_/khyod ni ma skyes pa ma byung ba ma bstan pa'i chos kyis legs pa sbyin par byed de/_lha'i bu gang dran pa nye bar gzhag pa brtan pa 'di ni bshad pa'am/_brjod par mi nus so/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_chos thams cad brjod du med pa'i phyir te/_chos thams cad ni brjod du med 
[\[209a\]]
[\[209a.1\]]pa'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ni brjod pa gang yang med pas de'i phyir de dag ni mi brjod pa'o/_/lha'i bu 'od zer gyi rgyal mtshan gyis gsol pa/_'jam dpal gnas pa gang la gnas pa byis pa lta bu so so'i skye bo thams cad kyi 'dod chags dang /_zhe sdang dang /_
[\[209a.2\]]gti mug rnams rgyu bar 'gyur ba'i gnas pa de la gnas te langs so zhes de skad bshad pa gang la gnas na byis pa lta bu so so'i skye bo thams cad kyi 'dod chags dang /_zhe sdang dang /_gti mug rnams rgyu bar 'gyur ro/_/'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_lha'i bu byis pa lta bu so so'i skye bo 
[\[209a.3\]]thams cad dngos po med pa la gnas na/_'dod chags dang /_zhe sdang dang /_gti mug rnams rgyu bar 'gyur ro/_/chos kyi dbyings la gnas pa/_yang dag pa'i mtha' la gnas pa/_de bzhin nyid la gnas pa'i byis pa lta bu so so'i skye bo thams cad kyi 'dod chags dang /_zhe sdang dang /_
[\[209a.4\]]gti mug rnams rgyu bar 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_chos gang yang chos kyi dbyings dang /_de bzhin nyid dang /_yang dag pa'i mtha' las bral te bshad mi nus so/_/gsol pa/_'jam dpal yang dag pa'i mtha' zhes bgyi ba gang gi tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]lags/_smras pa/_
[\[209a.5\]]lha'i bu yang dag pa'i mtha' zhes bya ba ni sems can gyi mtha'i tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]so/_/gsol pa/_'jam dpal sems can gyi mtha' zhes bgyi ba gang gi tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]lags/_bdag gi mtha'i tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]so/_/gsol pa/_'jam dpal bdag gi mtha' zhes 
[\[209a.6\]]bgyi ba gang gi tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]lags/_smras pa/_'khor ba'i mtha'i tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]so/_/gsol pa/_'jam dpal 'khor ba'i mtha' zhes bgyi ba gang gi tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]lags/_smras pa/_nam mkha'i tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]yin no/_/lha'i bu 'di lta ste/_dper na nam mkha'i 
[\[209a.7\]]dbyings la ni mtha' ma med/_chad pa med/_ring ba med/_thung ba med/_zlum pa med/_gru bzhi med/_phra ba med/_sbom pa med/_leb leb po med/_dkar po med/_nag po med/_dmar po med de/_gzhan du na nam mkha' nam mkha' zhes ming tsam du grangs su 'gro ste ming 
[\[209b\]]
[\[209b.1\]]de yang gsob yin no/_/lha'i bu de bzhin du chos thams cad ni nam mkha'i mtha' nam mkha'i 'gros/_nam mkha'i ming gi rang bzhin no/_/lha'i bu 'di lta ste/_dper na nam mkha' ni mi skye/_mi rga/_mi 'chi/_mi 'byung /_nyon mi mongs/_rnam par mi dkar/_chags pa med/_zhe 
[\[209b.2\]]sdang ba med/_bkur ba med/_mi bkur ba'ang med de/_de'i mthas ni mi bgrang ba'i tshul gyis chos thams cad bgrang bar bya'o/_/lha'i bu gdags su med pa'i phyir chos thams cad ni 'du ba dang 'bral bar bstan cing gzhag mi nus so/_/lha'i bu chos thams cad ni ma brtags pa 
[\[209b.3\]]ma btul ba/_dam pa ma yin pa ste/_lha'i bu 'di ni chos thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid/_mi mnyam pa ma yin pa/_de bzhin nyid phyin ci ma log pa de bzhin nyid do/_/ston pa 'di bstan pa'i tshe lha'i bu de dag thams cad mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa skyes so/_/de dag mi skye ba'i 
[\[209b.4\]]chos la bzod pa thob nas chos la gus pas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la lha'i me tog man da ras gtor to/_/me tog de dag gtor ma thag tu 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis steng gi bar snang la gnas med cing yongs su ma btsud bzhin du 'dug par gyur 
[\[209b.5\]]to/_/de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas lha'i bu 'od zer gyi rgyal mtshan la 'di skad ces smras so/_/lha'i bu de ji snyam du sems/_me tog 'di dag gang la gnas/_gsol pa/_'jam dpal me tog 'di dag ni gnas pa ma lags so/_/smras pa/_lha'i bu de bzhin du 
[\[209b.6\]]chos thams cad kyang mi gnas pa ste/_mi gnas par nam mkha' la gnas shing nam mkha' las kyang mi 'phag_/mi ltung /_mi g.yo/_rab tu mi g.yo/_mi 'bugs rab tu mi 'bugs so/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_chos de dag thams cad ni nam mkha' dang mtshungs pas de'i phyir de dag 
[\[209b.7\]]mi g.yo rab tu mi g.yo/_mi 'bugs rab tu mi 'bugs so/_/de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la lha'i bu 'od zer gyi rgyal mtshan gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/'jam dpal khyod kyis rdzu 'phrul gyi mthu cho 'phrul thob ste/_khyod sems skyed pa gcig gis 
[\[210a\]]
[\[210a.1\]]phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong dpag tu med par 'gro zhing 'ong ba ngo mtshar to/_/'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_lha'i bu bdag ni rdzu 'phrul gyi mthu cho 'phrul thob pa yang ma yin/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi nyan thos 
[\[210a.2\]]kyang ma yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de dag ni ma gtogs shing zad pa med pa'i phyir ro/_/lha'i bu byis pa lta bu so so'i skye bo thams cad ni rdzu 'phrul gyi mthu'i cho 'phrul thob pa'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ltar lha'i bu sangs rgyas thams cad dang /_byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[210a.3\]]thams cad dang /_nyan thos thams cad dang /_rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis bskal pa grangs med par btsal kyang chos gang yang thob par ma gyur/_ma thob mi 'thob bo/_/byis pa lta bu so so'i skye bo thams cad kyis ni thob bo/_/ci thob ce na/_bdag thob bo/_/sems can 
[\[210a.4\]]dang /_srog dang /_skye ba po dang /_gso ba po dang /_gang zag dang /_shed las skyes pa dang /_shed bu dang /_chad pa dang /_rtag pa dang /_'dod chags dang /_zhe sdang dang /_gti mug thob bo/_/gang sangs rgyas rnams kyis chos ma thob pa ma bskyed pa de skyed par byed pas 
[\[210a.5\]]na/_lha'i bu de'i phyir byis pa lta bu so so'i skye bo rnams ni rdzu 'phrul gyi mthu thob pa yin gyi sangs rgyas rnams ma yin/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams ma yin/_rang sangs rgyas rnams ma yin/_nyan thos rnams ma yin no/_/de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag 
[\[210a.6\]]sangs rgyas bgro ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs rgya cher bshad nas bdag bdag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing du gshegs so/_/de nas de bzhin gshegs pa 'jug sred kyi rgyal po 'di snyam du dgongs te/_gang bdag gis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir 'ong 
[\[210a.7\]]bar ltas shig bya'o snyam mo/_/de nas de bzhin gshegs pa 'jug sred kyi rgyal pos byin gyi rlabs snga ma de btang ste/_phyag g.yas pa'i mthil nas 'od zer gser gyi kha dog lta bu phyung ste/_'od de ci nas kyang 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i lus la phog nas 
[\[210b\]]
[\[210b.1\]]lan bdun bskor te/_'jam dpal gyi spyi bor nub par 'gyur ba de ltar byin gyis brlabs so/_/de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'di snyam du gyur te/_ci'i rgyu ci'i rkyen gyis na 'di lta bu'i snang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa bdag gi lus la phog nas spyi bor mi snang bar gyur snyam pa las/_
[\[210b.2\]]yang de 'di snyam du gyur te/_de bzhin gshegs pa 'jug sred kyi rgyal po bdag gzigs par bzhed do snyam mo/_/de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas lha'i bu 'od zer gyi rgyal mtshan la 'di skad ces smras so/_/lha'i bu dag tshur sheg_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin 
[\[210b.3\]]gshegs pa 'jug sred kyi rgyal po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du de bzhin gshegs pa de blta ba dang /_phyag bya ba dang /_bsnyen bkur bya ba dang /_kun du zhu ba'i phyir 'dong ngo /_/zab mo zab pa'i phyir chos kyi sgo sgrub pa dag kyang de nas 'chad kyis de dag kyang mnyan par 
[\[210b.4\]]bya'o/_/de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la lha'i bu 'od zer gyi rgyal mtshan gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/'jam dpal de'i dus la bab par mkhyen na bzhud do/_/de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas sems bskyed pa gcig gis ri khor yug gi rtse mo 
[\[210b.5\]]de nas lha'i bu de dag dang bcas te mi snang bar gyur nas/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'jug sred kyi rgyal po'i spyan sngar 'khod do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'jug sred kyi rgyal po'i zhabs la 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas 
[\[210b.6\]]mgo bos phyag 'tshal te lan gsum bskor nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/_/lha'i bu de dag gis kyang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'jug sred kyi rgyal po'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas 
[\[210b.7\]]phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'jug sred kyi rgyal po la 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu dang /_rigs kyi bu mos legs par dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed 
[\[211a\]]
[\[211a.1\]]par bgyi'o/_/zab mo la bzod pa la yang the tshom ma mchis par bgyi'o/_/des bdag kyang snod du gyur par bgyi'o/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das de ltar glang po chen po dag gi nang nas bdag slad rol du byung bar gyur to/_/chos bshad 
[\[211a.2\]]pa de 'dra ba las kyang slad rol du byung bar gyur to/_/bcom ldan 'das sring mo the tshom sel ba 'di ni sa'i phyogs 'di las gang du yang ma g.yos/_gang du yang ma 'phangs par gyur to/_/bdag gis mngon par 'tshal ba snga dro gcig gis shar phyogs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing 
[\[211a.3\]]gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed grangs med par mchi zhing sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la phyag 'tshal ba dang /_gang de dag gi chos bshad pa de yang 'dzin cing sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la yongs su zhu/_yongs su gsol bar bgyid cing /_de bzhin 
[\[211a.4\]]gshegs pa de dag kyang bdag la zhus pa'i lung ston par mdzad de/_bcom ldan 'das bdag ni chos bshad pa gang du yang bskrad pa'am/_'jig rten gyi khams gzhan du 'phangs par ma 'tshal te/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag thams cad kyang bdag gi 
[\[211a.5\]]bsam pa mkhyen nas bdag nyid la chos 'chad par bsgo'o/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag ri khor yug gi rtse mo de la mchis pa'i tshe na chos la 'tshal ba dang /_chos la skom pa dang /_chos la bkur sti bgyid pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa yang cher 'tshal bar 
[\[211a.6\]]gyur to/_/yang bdag 'di snyam du gyur te/_ci'i rgyu ci'i rkyen gyis na/_bdag 'khor de nas ri khor yug gi rtse mo 'dir 'phangs shing sring mo the tshom sel ba 'di ni ma 'phangs par gyur snyam pa las bcom ldan 'das yang bdag 'di snyam du gyur te/_de bzhin 
[\[211a.7\]]gshegs pa ni chos rnams la slob dpon gyis 'chab pa yang mi mdzad/_chags pa'i sems kyang ma mchis na de la bdag nyid kho ru chung ngu bas sam/_yang na chos bshad pa 'di la bdag snod du ma gyur pa lta ste/_de'i slad du bdag der 'phangs so snyam bgyid 
[\[211b\]]
[\[211b.1\]]do/_/de ni bdag de bzhin gshegs pa la zhu na ci'i slad du bdag 'khor 'di nas ri khor yug gi rtse mor 'phangs la/_sring mo 'di ma 'phangs par gyur ces de skad gsol pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa 'jug sred kyi rgyal pos 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces 
[\[211b.2\]]bka' stsal to/_/'jam dpal sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos bshad pa gang du yang khyod snod du ma gyur pa de ni 'ga' yang med mod kyi/_'jam dpal sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mnyes par dka' ste/_dus thams cad du pha rol gyis chos spyod pa 
[\[211b.3\]]la lan gdab par mi nus te/_'jam dpal khyod thog ma kho nar 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed pa nas 'byung ba'i tshe 'di snyam du gyur te/_de ring kun du 'od kyi 'jig rten gyi khams su sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams sangs rgyas bgro ba zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'chad 
[\[211b.4\]]kyis/_bdag ni der sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams blta ba dang /_phyag bya ba dang /_bsnyen bkur bya ba dang /_chos bstan pa de dag mnyan pa'i phyir 'gro'o snyam du gyur to/_/'jam dpal khyod ni spobs pa chen po dang /_dmigs pa chen po dang /_rtog pa 
[\[211b.5\]]chen po dang /_yongs su rtog pa chen pos sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas song ste sangs rgyas rnams blta'o/_/chos kyang mnyan du 'gro'o snyam du sems te/_'jam dpal khyod ni chags pa gsum gyis chags shing sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing 
[\[211b.6\]]'dir 'ongs so/_/gsum gang zhe na/_bdag tu dmigs pa dang /_sangs rgyas su dmigs pa dang /_chos su dmigs pa'o/_/'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa' dmigs pa la spyod na ma chags pa thob par 'gyur ba med do/_/'jam dpal de ji snyam du sems/_
[\[211b.7\]]de bzhin gshegs pa la sus kyang shes pa 'am/_mthong ba'am/_de bzhin gshegs pa las gzhan pa'i chos gang yang mthong bar nus sam/_'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das chos rnams kyi chos nyid de la ni de bzhin gshegs pa la yang 
[\[212a\]]
[\[212a.1\]]blta bar mi bgyi/_chos la ma lags/_sems can la ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te sems can yongs su grub par gyur tam/_de bzhin gshegs pa 'byung bar gyur tam/_de bzhin gshegs pa gzugs kyi sku la blta bar bgyi na ni de bzhin 
[\[212a.2\]]gshegs pa yang blta bar nus/_de bzhin gshegs pas gzhan yang gzigs par 'gyur na bcom ldan 'das gang gi slad du/_chos thams cad ma skyes pas de'i slad du/_gang de bzhin gshegs par blta ba de la ma mchis so/_/de bzhin gshegs pas kyang [{]chung zad [,]cung zad [}]
[\[212a.3\]]kyang gzigs pa ma mchis so/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad ni mthong bar bgyid pa ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_'jam dpal mig dang rna ba gang dang ldan na de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mthong ba dang /_de bzhin 
[\[212a.4\]]gshegs pas bstan pa'i chos 'dul ba thos par 'dod pa'i mig dang rna ba [{]chung zad [,]cung zad [}]kyang yod dam/_de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa cang mi smra bar gyur to/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor de na byang chub sems dpa' kha cig 'di snyam du gyur te/_'jam dpal 
[\[212a.5\]]gzhon nur gyur pa 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pas rma ba rmas na cang mi zer bar gyur pas de bzhin gshegs pas rmas pa'i lan 'debs ma nus so snyam mo/_/de nas de bzhin gshegs pa 'jug sred kyi rgyal po'i sems kyis byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi sems kyi 
[\[212a.6\]]rtog pa yongs su mkhyen nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag la bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu dag de ltar ma sems shig_/khyod 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la brnyas pa'i 'du shes ma skyed cig_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa ni zab 
[\[212a.7\]]mo bzod pa dang ldan pa yin te/_gang de bzhin gshegs pas rma ba rmas pa de'ang 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas lan thebs pa yin no/_/byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das rigs pa gang dang tshul gang gis na rmas pa'i lan thebs pa 
[\[212b\]]
[\[212b.1\]]lags/_bka' stsal pa/_'di la rigs kyi bu dag 'jam dpal ni 'di snyam du sems te/_gal te bdag gis bdag la mig mchis so/_/bdag la rna ba mchis so zhes bshad na ni rtag par lta bar 'gyur/_gal te bdag la mig ma mchis so/_/rna ba ma mchis 
[\[212b.2\]]sa zhes bshad na ni chad par lta bar 'gyur te/_rtag pa dang chad par spyod pas chos nyid shes par mi 'gyur te/_chos nyid gang yin pa de la ni chad pa yang med rtag pa yang med do/_/gang na chad pa yang med rtag pa yang med pa de ni mi skye ba'o/_/gang mi skye ba de ni brjod 
[\[212b.3\]]du med pa'o zhes de ltar sems shing 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas rmas pa'i lan btab pa 'di yin no/_/ston pa 'di bstan pa'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' drug brgya mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa skyes so/_/de nas de bzhin gshegs pa 'jug sred kyi rgyal pos 
[\[212b.4\]]'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/'jam dpal rgyu 'di dang rkyen 'di yin te de'i phyir khyod ri khor yug gi rtse mor 'phangs so/_/'jam dpal gang yang ci'i slad du zhe na/_sring mo the tshom sel ba 'di ma 'phangs par gyur ces khyod de 
[\[212b.5\]]skad zer ba ni 'jam dpal sring mo 'di zla ba'i 'od kun du dri ma med par snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par bzhag ste/_de ni sangs rgyas dag 'dir gshegs sam ma gshegs zhe'am/_chos 'chad dam mi 'chad cig snyam du mi sems te 'di la ni sangs 
[\[212b.6\]]rgyas su 'du shes med/_chos su 'du shes med/_dge 'dun du 'du shes med/_bdag tu 'du shes med/_gzhan du 'du shes med de/_'jam dpal sring mo de ni 'du shes dang yid la byed pa thams cad dang bral ba'o/_/de ni ting nge 'dzin de la gnas nas phyogs 
[\[212b.7\]]bcu'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed rnams kyi chos nyan to/_/'dzin to/_/thos nas kyang gzhan la ston par byed mod kyi/_'jam dpal sring mo 'di ni zhing la zhing du 'du shes pa med do/_/sangs rgyas la sangs rgyas su 'du shes pa med/_
[\[213a\]]
[\[213a.1\]]chos la chos su 'du shes pa med/_dge 'dun la dge 'dun du 'du shes pa med/_bdag la bdag tu 'du shes pa med/_gzhan la gzhan du 'du shes pa med de/_'jam dpal 'di lta ste/_dper na zla ba'i dkyil 'khor ni gzhal med khang las kyang mi 
[\[213a.2\]]g.yo la kun du yang snang bar byed de/_thams cad du yang bstan mod kyi/_zla ba'i dkyil 'khor ni gang la yang nye bar mi byed/_'di la 'od snang bar bya'o/_/'di la 'od mi snang bar bya'o zhes rtog pa yang med do/_/'jam dpal de bzhin du sring mo de ting nge 'dzin 'di la gnas na 
[\[213a.3\]]'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas mu med par sems can dpag tu med pa rnams la snang bar byed/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing dpag tu med par ston par byed/_rnam par rtog pa med/_sems can thams cad la sems mnyam par byed cing sems can thams cad la chos ston to/_/
[\[213a.4\]]'jam dpal ngas ni bskal pa'am/_bskal pa'i lhag ma lus kyi bar du sring mo 'di'i yon tan brjod kyang yon tan zad par mi 'gyur te/_'jam dpal de ltar sring mo 'di ni yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan no/_/'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 
[\[213a.5\]]'das sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di na gang byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong dag mchis na ci lags/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag tshogs pa'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' de dag kyang bdag bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan du 'phangs par gyur tam/_
[\[213a.6\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_'jam dpal de skad ma zer cig_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes la ma rtog shig_/de bzhin gshegs pas rnam par sprul pa la ma rtog shig_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs la ma rtog shig_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'jam 
[\[213a.7\]]dpal stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams tshogs pas 'di lta ste/_dper na bu ram shing gi tshal lam/_'dam bu'i tshal lam/_smyig ma'i tshal bzhin du de 'dra bar mang ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis 
[\[213b\]]
[\[213b.1\]]yongs su khyab par gyur kyang /_gang sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di na byang chub sems dpa' dag dang /_lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za dang /_lha ma yin dang /_mi dang mi ma yin pa gnas pa de dag thams cad kyis kyang thams cad du thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa gzhan cig kyang 
[\[213b.2\]]ma mthong ste nga gcig pu gnyis su med par mthong ngo /_/de dag gi chos bshad pa yang ma thos te nga gcig pu'i thos so/_/'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i cho 'phrul dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa dang /_
[\[213b.3\]]de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku phra ba la ltos/_stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams de bzhin gshegs pa'i skus yongs su gang yang /_byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi lha'i mig gis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa gcig kyang ma mthong na sems can gzhan gyis mthong 
[\[213b.4\]]bar 'gyur ba lta ci smos te de ni gnas med do/_/'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang /_lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za dang /_lha ma yin dang /_mi dang mi ma yin pa de dag stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na gnas shing rgyu ba dang /_'chag pa dang /_
[\[213b.5\]]'gro ba dang /_'greng ba dang /_'dug pa dang /_nyal ba dag ji ltar sems pa bzhin du spyod pa de dag la de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku de ltar mang ba sgrib par mi byed/_thogs par mi byed pa la ltos/_'jam dpal rnam grangs 'dis kyang 'di ltar rig par bya ste/_de bzhin 
[\[213b.6\]]gshegs pa ni chos kyi sku yin gyi gzugs yongs su grub pa'i sku ma yin no/_/'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku ni zag pa med pa ste/_nam mkha' dang 'dra ba/_ma skyes pa/_ma byung ba/_ma mthong ba/_ma thos pa/_rnam par ma shes pa'o/_/'jam dpal 'di lta ste/_
[\[213b.7\]]dper na nam mkha' ni zag pa med pa/_gtogs pa med pa/_gzugs med pa/_bstan du med pa/_thogs pa med pa/_rnam par mi dmigs pa ste/_nam mkha' ni sus kyang blta mi nus so/_/yang nam mkha' ni spyan lngas mthong bar mi 'gyur ro/_/spyan lnga gang zhe na/_'di 
[\[214a\]]
[\[214a.1\]]lta ste/_sha'i spyan dang /_lha'i spyan dang /_shes rab kyi spyan dang /_chos kyi spyan dang /_sangs rgyas kyi spyan te/_gzhan du na nam mkha' nam mkha' zhes grangs su 'gro bar zad do/_/'jam dpal de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku yang zag pa med pa/_gtogs 
[\[214a.2\]]pa med pa/_gzugs med pa/_bstan du med pa/_thogs pa med pa/_dmigs su med pa ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku ni sus kyang mthong bar mi nus so/_/yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku ni sus kyang ma mthong ngo /_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku ni sha'i spyan nas sangs rgyas 
[\[214a.3\]]kyi spyan gyi bar du spyan lnga la snang bar mi 'gyur gyi/_gzhan du na de bzhin gshegs pa de bzhin gshegs pa zhes ming tsam gyi grangs su 'gro ste ming de yang gsob bo/_/'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa'i cho 'phrul la la ltos/_de bzhin gshegs pa dag ni nam mkha' 
[\[214a.4\]]dang 'dra ste/_de dag gzugs kyi sku'i kha dog yongs su rdzogs pa yang ston to/_/skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang yang ldan no/_/'jam dpal gang yang de bzhin gshegs pa de dag khyod kyi mig gis mthong bar ma gyur pa de dag thams cad ni/_de bzhin 
[\[214a.5\]]gshegs pa de dag gi byin gyi rlabs dang mthus de ltar gyur to/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ltar 'jam dpal gzhon nu khyod yin te khyod las brtsams nas chos zab mo bstan par 'gyur ro/_/de nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyis 
[\[214a.6\]]mgrin gcig tu ngo mtshar che ba'i sgra phyung nas ngo mtshar to/_/ngo mtshar to/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dag ni de ltar rdzu 'phrul che/_mthu che ste/_de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dag mang yang bdag cag gis de bzhin gshegs pa gcig kyang ma mthong ste/_'dir su zhig gshegs/_su 
[\[214a.7\]]zhig bzhud/_su zhig 'chang /_su zhig 'chad ces mtshan ma tsam yang ma 'tshal te/_'di na de bzhin gshegs pa gcig pu 'chad par mthong ngo /_/bcom ldan 'das gal te ye shes chen po 'di 'dra ba'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can 
[\[214b\]]
[\[214b.1\]]re re'i phyir bskal pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du sems can dmyal ba chen por bsgral kyang bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bzod par bgyi'o/_/ye shes chen po de 'dra ba yongs su dor bar ni mi bgyi'o/_/de nas de bzhin gshegs pa 'jug sred 
[\[214b.2\]]kyi rgyal po la 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das sring mo 'dis ji srid nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed na sring mo de 'di 'dra bar zhi ba dang dam pa'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par bzhag pa thob par gyur/_
[\[214b.3\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ni bskal pa dpag tu med pas bskyed pa ste/_rtag par skyes pa/_tshad med par skyes pa/_sbyin pa dang /_tshul khrims dang /_bzod pa dang /_brtson 'grus 
[\[214b.4\]]dang /_bsam gtan dang /_shes rab las skyes pa ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yin te/_'jam dpal sring mo 'di ni yun ring po nas spyad pa/_sngon gyi rgyal ba la bya ba byas pa/_dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa ste sring mo 'di ni 
[\[214b.5\]]sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya phrag stong du ma la bsnyen bkur byas pa yin mod kyi/_'jam dpal khyod kyis 'di ting nge 'dzin las slong la yun ji srid nas spyod ces dris shig dang /_sring mo 'di nyid khyod la ston par 'gyur ro//_//bam po gsum pa ste tha ma/_de 
[\[214b.6\]]nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas sring mo de slong bar 'dod nas se gol gyi sgra tha mal pa byas kyang sring mo de ting nge 'dzin de las ma langs so/_/de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas se gol ji lta bus phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas mu med pa'i sgra thos 
[\[214b.7\]]par 'gyur ba de 'dra ba'i se gol gyi sgra byas kyang sring mo de ting nge 'dzin de las ma langs so/_/de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba mngon par 'dus byas pa ji lta bus stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams lha dang mi'i sil snyan thams 
[\[215a\]]
[\[215a.1\]]cad ma dkrol bar sgra 'byung ba de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba mngon par 'du byas te/_bdag nyid kyang sil snyan bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong sprul nas yid du 'ong ba chags par byed pa rnar 'ong ba'i sgra 'byin to/_/yang de'i tshe na sil snyan gyi sgra gang gis phyogs 
[\[215a.2\]]bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas mu med pa kun tu grags par 'gyur ba'i sgra shin tu chen po byung bar gyur kyang sring mo de ting nge 'dzin de las ma langs te/_yang de'i tshe gang phyogs bcu na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa 'tsho ba gzhes pa de dag la bdag gi g.yog 
[\[215a.3\]]gis zhus pa/_bcom ldan 'das ci'i rgyu ci'i rkyen gyis na sil snyan gyi sgra dbyangs bcom ldan 'das sngon ma thos pa'i sgra gda' ba 'di 'jig rten du byung bar gyur/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis bdag gi g.yog la 'di skad ces bka' stsal 
[\[215a.4\]]to/_/'jig rten gyi khams kun tu 'od ces bya ba zhig yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa 'jug sred kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs 'tsho gzhes te/_de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing na sring mo the tshom sel ba zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa de'i g.yas phyogs na zla ba'i 'od 
[\[215a.5\]]kun tu dri ma med par snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par bzhag ste/_de na 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa zhes bya ba go cha bsam gyis mi khyab pa bgos pa phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' zhig yod de/_sring mo de ting nge 'dzin de las slong bar 'dod 
[\[215a.6\]]nas rigs kyi bu 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa des lha dang mi'i sil snyan gyi sgra phyung ste/_de'i byin gyi rlabs kyis sil snyan 'di dag ma dkrol bar sgra 'byin cing 'di lta ste/_sring mo 'di ting nge 'dzin de las bslang ba'i phyir des sil snyan bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong dag 
[\[215a.7\]]sprul te/_rigs kyi bu de dag kyang ma dkrol bar sgra 'byung mod kyi/_sring mo de ting nge 'dzin de las bslang bar ma nus so/_/rigs kyi bu rgyu de dang rkyen de'i phyir sil snyan gyi sgra chen po 'jig rten du byung ngo /_/de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 
[\[215b\]]
[\[215b.1\]]de dag la g.yog de dag gis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das sring mo de 'di 'dra ba'i ting nge 'dzin zhi ba thob cing 'di 'dra ba'i sil snyan gyi sgras kyang mi ldang ba ngo mtshar to/_/bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu de bzhin te/_sring mo 'di ni ting nge 'dzin bsam gyis 
[\[215b.2\]]mi khyab pa thob pa'o/_/de nas gtam 'di brjod pa'i tshe phyogs bcu nas sems can grangs med tshad med pa dag bla na med pa'i byang chub tu zhugs par gyur te/_sring mo de ji lta ba bzhin du bdag cag kyang de dang 'dra ba'i ting nge 'dzin zhi ba thob par gyur cig_/'jam dpal 
[\[215b.3\]]gzhon nur gyur pa ji lta ba bzhin du bdag cag kyang de 'dra ba'i rnam par sprul pa thob par gyur cig ces de skad kyi tshig smras so/_/de nas yang 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba mngon par 'du byed pa ji lta bus stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig 
[\[215b.4\]]rten gyi khams na ri rab lhun po'i ri'i rgyal po dang /_gangs kyi ri dang /_ri btang bzung dang /_ri btang bzung chen po dang /_ri khor yug dang /_khor yug chen po dang /_gzhan yang ri rab 'bring tha ma de dag thams cad gcig la gcig 'dus shing gcig la gcig thug pa dang /_
[\[215b.5\]]gcig la gcig 'thab pa 'di lta ste/_skyes bu stobs po che stobs po che'i zla bo la mthu'i shugs thams cad kyis thal mo rdob par byed pa de bzhin du ri chen po dang /_ri khor yug chen po de dag gcig la gcig 'dus nas ri'i rgyal po de dag 'jigs pa'i sgra'i dbyangs 
[\[215b.6\]]kyis ba spu zing zhes byed par gyur pa de 'dra ba'i sgras 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas mu med par grags par 'gyur ba de 'dra ba'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba mngon par 'dus byas kyang sring mo de ting nge 'dzin de las bslang ma nus so/_/de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas 
[\[215b.7\]]sring mo de lag pa gnyis kyis ma reg la/_byin gyi rlabs kyis lag pa gnyis bzung ste bslang bar 'dod nas de de ltar bskyod pa dang /_'og gi phyogs kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed g.yos/_rab tu g.yos/_kun tu rab tu g.yos kyang sring mo de 
[\[216a\]]
[\[216a.1\]]bslang bar ma nus te/_chung ngu na skra'i rtse mo'i cha shas tsam yang g.yo bar ma nus/_'gul bar ma nus so/_/ting nge 'dzin de las bslang bar yang ma nus nas/_de yang shin tu shugs thams cad kyis gdeg go snyam nas shugs phyung ste bteg pa dang /_sangs 
[\[216a.2\]]rgyas kyi zhing gang gA'i klung gi bye ma dang mnyam pa rnams gyen du 'phangs kyang ting nge 'dzin de las ma langs so/_/de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas sa gang gi phyogs na sring mo de mnyam par gzhog pas de'i phyogs kho ra khor yug tu drangs te lag pa g.yas pa la 
[\[216a.3\]]gzhog go/_/lag pa g.yas par bzhag nas tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar du 'phangs kyang sring mo de ting nge 'dzin de las ma langs so/_/tshangs pa'i 'jig rten nas slar yang sa la bzhag kyang ma langs so/_/de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas sring mo de lag pa g.yas 
[\[216a.4\]]par bzhag nas shar phyogs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du song zhing sil snyan gyi sgra de dag dang ri'i sgra dbyangs de dag 'byin cing me tog gi char 'bebs bzhin du song yang sring mo de ting nge 'dzin de las ma langs so/_/de bzhin du lho phyogs dang /_nub phyogs 
[\[216a.5\]]dang /_byang phyogs dang /_phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten kun tu sring mo de khyer te song nas sa phyogs de nyid du bzhag ste thal mo sbyar nas/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'jug sred kyi rgyal po la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[216a.6\]]rnams kyi spyod pa ni ngo mtshar te sems can thams cad kyis kyang 'tshal ba'am/_sems par sla ba ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te bdag gis sems ma mchis pa'i dngos po dag smrar stsal na'ang smra bar 'gyur na sring mo 'di la 'di 'dra ba'i sgra rdzu 'phrul dang /_
[\[216a.7\]]rnam par 'phrul pa dang /_cho 'phrul gyi sgras bslang bar ma nus te/_bcom ldan 'das sring mo 'di dang gang su'ang de las gzhan pa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la zhugs pa dang /_gang 'jug pa dang /_gang de 'dra ba'i ye shes chen po bsgrub par bgyid 
[\[216b\]]
[\[216b.1\]]pa de la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_gang bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa 'di ni 'dul ba chen po'i spyod pa lags so/_/sring mo de ting nge 'dzin de las bslang ba'i phyir 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas phyogs bcu thams cad du slong bar bgyid pa'i tshe sems 
[\[216b.2\]]can dpag tu med pa byang chub tu yongs su smin par byas so/_/sems can dpag tu med pa dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su grub par gyur to/_/de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'jug sred kyi rgyal pos 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di 
[\[216b.3\]]skad ces bka' stsal to/_/de bzhin no/_/'jam dpal ji skad smras pa de bzhin te/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi go cha ni bsam gyis mi khyab ste/_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas rnams kyis kyang bde bar shes par mi nus na sems can gzhan gyis lta ci smos te/_'jam 
[\[216b.4\]]dpal 'di lta ste/_dper na stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rnga'i kha ya gcig tu gyur/_yang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams gcig kyang rnga'i kha ya gcig tu gyur te yongs su brtag pa bzung na/_'jam dpal de 'dra ba'i rnga chen 
[\[216b.5\]]por gyur na de ni skyes bu de 'dra bar stobs che zhing /_de 'dra bar mthu che ba de lta bu'i lus dang ldan pas stong gcig gi 'jig rten gyi khams dang mnyam pa'i dbyug gu thogs te/_sring mo de'i mdun du bskal pa'am/_bskal pa'i lhag ma lus kyi bar du rnga chen po de 
[\[216b.6\]]brdungs su zin kyang sgra de sring mo de'i rnar grag par mi 'gyur na ting nge 'dzin las bslang bar lta ci smos te/_de ni gnas med de sring mo de ni de 'dra ba'i ting nge 'dzin zhi ba thob bo/_/'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das sring mo 'di ting nge 'dzin 'di las slong bar su 
[\[216b.7\]]zhig gis nus/_bka' stsal pa/_'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa'am/_byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba ma gtogs par gzhan sring mo 'di ting nge 'dzin 'di las slong bar nus pa med do/_/de nas rigs kyi bu de'i ming brjod ma thag tu 
[\[217a\]]
[\[217a.1\]]stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams de rnam pa drug tu g.yos so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das 'jug sred kyi rgyal po'i g.yog byang chub sems dpa' rab tu dga' ba'i rgyal po zhes bya ba des de bzhin gshegs pa de la zhus pa/_bcom ldan 
[\[217a.2\]]'das ci'i rgyu ci'i rkyen gyis na 'jig rten na sa chen po 'di g.yo bar gyur/_bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba'i ming brjod ma thag tu nges par stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams g.yo bar 'gyur te/_'jig 
[\[217a.3\]]rten gyi khams gzhan na yang gang na de bzhin gshegs pa dag rigs kyi bu de'i ming brjod par gyur pa de'i tshe brjod ma thag tu sa chen po rnam pa drug tu g.yo'o/_/de nas 'khor de na byang chub sems dpa' de dag byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba mthong bar 
[\[217a.4\]]skom/_'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa yang byang chub sems dpa' de mthong bar 'dod do/_/de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas byang chub sems dpa' de dag yongs su skom par yang shes/_bdag kyang mthong ba dang /_sring mo de ting nge 'dzin de las bslang ba'i 
[\[217a.5\]]phyir de bzhin gshegs pa 'jug sred kyi rgyal po la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das ci nas kyang bdag gis byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba mthong bar 'gyur ba de 'dra ba'i rdzu 'phrul gyi mthu legs par bstan par gsol/_bcom ldan 
[\[217a.6\]]'das 'khor 'di dag kyang rigs kyi bu de mthong bar 'tshal na/_bcom ldan 'das bdag kyang skyes bu dam pa de mthong bar 'tshal na ci nas kyang skyes bu de sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir mchi zhing rigs kyi bu de las brtsams nas chos zab mo bshad par 'gyur ba dang /_byang chub 
[\[217a.7\]]sems dpa' 'di dag kyang byang chub sems dpa' de mthong bar 'gyur zhing mthong nas kyang de'i rjes su slob pa dang /_sring mo de yang ting nge 'dzin de las ldang bar 'gyur ba de 'dra ba'i rdzu 'phrul rnam par 'phrul pa bstan na legs so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das 'jug sred kyi 
[\[217b\]]
[\[217b.1\]]rgyal po de la byang chub sems dpa' rab tu dga' ba'i rgyal pos 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das phyogs gang dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang na rigs kyi bu de ltar gnas pa lags/_de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing na de bzhin gshegs pa de'i mtshan ci lags/_bka' 
[\[217b.2\]]stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu 'og gi phyogs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams sna tshogs kyi rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba zhig yod do/_/de na de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge dang /_ngang pa dang /_bal glang gi phung 
[\[217b.3\]]po'i sgra bsgrags pa zhes bya ba bzhugs 'tsho gzhes shing chos kyang ston te/_de na byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba zhes bya ba de da ltar gnas so/_/de nas de bzhin gshegs pa 'jug sred kyi rgyal pos de'i tshe de ltar gdan la bzhugs bzhin du zhabs 
[\[217b.4\]]g.yas pa'i mthe bo las byang chub sems dpa' skul bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i 'od zer gyi kha dog lta bu gtong ngo /_/'od de btang ma thag tu 'og gi phyogs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang gA'i klung gi bye ma dang mnyam pa brtol nas byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par 
[\[217b.5\]]sel ba'i lus la phog ste/_rigs kyi bu de la lan gsum bskor nas spyi bor mi snang bar song ngo /_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba ci'i rgyu ci'i rkyen gyis na/_gang gi phyir de ltar 'od dang ba bdag la lan bdun bskor nas spyi bor mi snang 
[\[217b.6\]]bar song snyam du bsams pa las/_de 'di snyam du sems te/_de bzhin gshegs pa 'jug sred kyi rgyal po bdag gzigs par bzhed do snyam mo/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba seng ge dang /_ngang pa dang /_bal glang gi phung po'i sgra 
[\[217b.7\]]bsgrags pa de bzhin gshegs pa ga la ba der song nas phyin pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das de'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag ni steng gi phyogs su bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'jug sred kyi rgyal po 
[\[218a\]]
[\[218a.1\]]blta bar 'tshal lo/_/bka' stsal pa/_de'i dus la bab par shes na song shig_/de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge dang /_ngang pa dang /_bal glang gi phung po'i sgra bsgrags pa de'i g.yog don thams cad grub pa zhes bya ba des/_de bzhin gshegs 
[\[218a.2\]]pa de la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag ni de bzhin gshegs pa 'jug sred kyi rgyal po mthong bar 'tshal lo/_/de nas de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge dang /_ngang pa dang /_bal glang gi phung po'i sgra bsgrags pas de'i tshe smin mtshams kyi mdzod spu nas 'od byung ngo /_/'od byung ba 
[\[218a.3\]]des steng gi phyogs kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang gA'i klung gi bye ma dang mnyam pa brtol nas/_'jig rten gyi khams kun tu 'od ces bya bar snang bar gyur te de nyid du byung ba bzhin du snang ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa 'jug sred kyi rgyal po byang chub sems dpa' mang pos bskor cing 'dzam 
[\[218a.4\]]bu'i chu bo'i gser gyi ri bzhin du chos 'chad de/_'di lta ste/_dper na 'dom gang tsam na skyes bu mig dang ldan pa gcig gis skyes bu gcig gi rang bzhin la rtog pa de bzhin du 'khor de dag thams cad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa 'jug sred kyi rgyal po byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang bcas 
[\[218a.5\]]pa mthong ngo /_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba byang chub sems dpa' lnga 'bum dang sems gcig bskyed pas sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas mi snang bar gyur nas 'jig rten gyi khams kun tu 'od ces bya bar gnas te/_de bzhin gshegs pa 'jug sred 
[\[218a.6\]]kyi rgyal po'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te spyan sngar 'dug go/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang bcas te lus mi snang bar song nas/_bcom ldan 'das de'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_bcom 
[\[218a.7\]]ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor nas steng gi bar snang la gnas shing lus thams cad sun 'byin ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par bzhag go/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas ji lta bu'i ltas kyis steng gi bar snang las lha'i me tog gi char 
[\[218b\]]
[\[218b.1\]]'bab pa dang /_me tog de dag kyang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'jug sred kyi rgyal po'i zhabs la 'bab cing /_me tog de dag las seng ge dang /_ngang pa dang /_bal glang gi phung po'i sgra bsgrags pa de bzhin gshegs pa ni bcom ldan 'das la bsnyung ba ma mchis 
[\[218b.2\]]sam/_'o ma brgyal tam/_bzhengs pa yang ngam/_so bzhin nam/_mthu mnga' 'am/_bde ba la reg par gnas sam zhes gsung ngo zhes zer ba de 'dra ba'i sgra 'byung bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i ltas mdzad do/_/de nas 'khor de thams cad ngo mtshar thob par gyur nas/_bcom ldan 
[\[218b.3\]]'das gang me tog 'di 'dra ba dag dang /_sgra 'di 'dra bar yid du mchi ba sgrogs par bgyid pa su'i mthu lags zhes de skad kyi tshig smras so/_/de nas de bzhin gshegs pa 'jug sred kyi rgyal po la 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 
[\[218b.4\]]'das gang me tog 'di dag char 'bab pa dang /_me tog de dag las 'di 'dra ba'i sgra yid du mchi ba 'byung ba su'i mthu lags/_bka' stsal pa/_'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba de'i mthu yin no/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das byang 
[\[218b.5\]]chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba de gang na mchis/_bka' stsal pa/_'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba de ni steng gi bar snang la 'dug ste/_byang chub sems dpa' lnga 'bum dang 'grogs nas nga'i rkang pa la 
[\[218b.6\]]phyag 'tshal te/_steng gi bar snang la lus thams cad sun 'byin pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par gzhog go/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' de dag mi gda'o/_/bka' stsal pa/_byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam 
[\[218b.7\]]par sel ba'i mthus mi snang ngo /_/de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'di snyam du gyur te/_bdag kyang lus thams cad sun 'byin pa'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par bzhag go/_/bdag gis kyang ting nge 'dzin de la mnyam par bzhag ste skyes bu dam pa sgrib pa thams cad 
[\[219a\]]
[\[219a.1\]]rnam par sel ba de dang /_byang chub sems dpa' de dag yongs su btsal bar bya'o snyam mo/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i sems kyi rnam par rtog pa sems kyis shes nas bar snang la lus mi 
[\[219a.2\]]snang bar byas te/_'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so/_/'jam dpal de ji snyam du sems/_lus thams cad sun 'byin pa'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya ba gcig pu'o snyam du khyod de ltar ma lta shig_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'jam dpal rgya mtsho mching rnam chen po na chu'i 
[\[219a.3\]]phung po ji tsam yod pa de'i chu'i thigs pa ji snyed yod pa de snyed kyi lus thams cad sun 'byin pa'i ting nge 'dzin la nga mnyam par gzhog par yang byed ldang bar yang byed de/_khyod ni de dag gi ming tsam yang mi shes so/_/de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'di snyam du gyur te/_
[\[219a.4\]]gal te bdag gis ting nge 'dzin de ma bsgrubs na bdag gis sngar sbyangs pa dag don med do snyam mo/_/de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas de'i tshe ji lta bu'i brtson 'grus kyis se gol gcig gis 'grub par 'gyur ba de 'dra ba'i brtson 'grus brtsams so/_/de nas de bzhin 
[\[219a.5\]]gshegs pa 'jug sred kyi rgyal pos byang chub sems dpa' de dag la bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu dag ting nge 'dzin gang byang chub sems dpa' gzhan gyis bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig tu'ang grub par mi 'gyur ba de 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas se gol gcig gis 
[\[219a.6\]]bsgrubs so/_/lhag pa'i bsam pa'i sbyangs pa'i khyad par la ltos/_de nas de bzhin gshegs pa 'jug sred kyi rgyal po la 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das 'khor 'di dag skyes bu dam pa de rnams dang /_byang chub 
[\[219a.7\]]sems dpa' de mthong bar 'tshal na bstan par gsol/_byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba la bka' stsal pa/_'khor 'di dag khyod mthong bar 'dod kyis/_rigs kyi bu khyod kyis bdag gi lus ston cig_/de nas byang chub sems 
[\[219b\]]
[\[219b.1\]]dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas bar snang de las babs te/_slar yang bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas byang chub sems dpa' de dang 'grogs te/_lus mi snang bar byas nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so/_/nga mthong 
[\[219b.2\]]ngam/_'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_ngas ma mthong ngo /_/de nas de bzhin gshegs pa 'jug sred kyi rgyal pos byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba la bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu 'di dag dang /_'khor 'di khyod kyi lus mthong bar 'dod kyis rigs kyi bu khyod 
[\[219b.3\]]kyis bdag gi lus ston cig_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba byang chub sems dpa' lnga 'bum de dag dang 'grogs te gzugs kyi lus yongs su rdzogs pas bdag gis lus ston to/_/de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas byang chub 
[\[219b.4\]]sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba la smras pa/_rigs kyi bu khyod kyis sring mo 'di ting nge 'dzin 'di las slongs shig_/smras pa/_'jam dpal sring mo 'di ting nge 'dzin 'di las slongs shig ces de skad smras pa dang /_ci 'di ming bslang bar bya'am/_'on te 
[\[219b.5\]]gzugs dang /_tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed dang /_rnam par shes pa bslang bar bya/_'jam dpal gzugs kyi rang bzhin ni mnyam par mi gzhog go/_/tshor ba'i rang bzhin dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed dang /_rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin ni mnyam par yang mi 
[\[219b.6\]]gzhog ldang bar yang mi byed do/_/'jam dpal chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni mnyam par yang mi gzhog_/ldang bar yang mi byed na chos de gang zhig bslang bar bya/_'jam dpal gal te sring mo 'di mnyam par gzhog par 'gyur na ni de'i phyir bslang bar 
[\[219b.7\]]bya na/_'jam dpal sring mo 'dis ni cung zad kyang mnyam par bzhag pa med do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_chos thams cad ni g.yo zhing byed pa med pa'i phyir ro/_/de nas de bzhin gshegs pa 'jug sred kyi rgyal pos byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel 
[\[220a\]]
[\[220a.1\]]ba la bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu khyod kyis sring mo 'di ting nge 'dzin 'di las slong shig_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das bdag ni spyi brtol bgyid pa'i rngo mi thogs te/_de bzhin gshegs pas khyod kyis dge ba ni bcab par gyis shig ces bka' stsal pas de 
[\[220a.2\]]bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyis sring mo 'di bslang bar gsol/_bcom ldan 'das bdag gis ni sring mo 'di ting nge 'dzin 'di las bslang ba'i rngo yang thogs mod kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dag chos thams cad shes pa dang ston pa la mkhas pa lags kyis de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyis 
[\[220a.3\]]sring mo 'di bslang bar gsol/_de nas de bzhin gshegs pa 'jug sred kyi rgyal pos ting nge 'dzin gyi sems las ldang byed ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par bzhag nas de bzhin gshegs pas mnyam par bzhag ma thag tu stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams de 
[\[220a.4\]]na lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za dang /_byang chub sems dpa' mnyam par gzhog pa ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad langs par gyur to/_/sring mo de yang ting nge 'dzin de las langs par gyur te langs nas sa chen po rnam pa drug tu g.yo bar byas te steng gi bar snang la 'dug go/_
[\[220a.5\]]yang de'i tshe lha'i bu brgya stong phrag du ma dag 'dus par gyur to/_/de nas sring mo de steng gi bar snang la 'dug pa des me tog ud pa la dang /_ku mu da dang /_pun da ri kas de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku la gtor to/_/de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas sring mo the tshom sel ba la 'di 
[\[220a.6\]]skad ces smras so/_/sring mo khyod de 'dra ba'i ting nge 'dzin zhi ba thob pa ngo mtshar to/_/smras pa/_'jam dpal de skad ma gsung rnam par rtog pa la ma spyod cig_/bdag ni zhi ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob pa ma lags so/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi byang chub ni ma thob pas 
[\[220a.7\]]bskyed pa'o/_/'jam dpal gang na thob pa yod pa de na ni dmigs pa yang yod do/_/'jam dpal chos thams cad ni zhi ba rab tu zhi ba nye bar zhi ba ste zhi ba ni zhi bar mi bya'o/_/zhi ba ni mnyam par yang mi gzhog ldang bar yang mi byed do/_/smras pa/_sring mo de bzhin te/_ji skad smras pa bzhin mod kyi 
[\[220b\]]
[\[220b.1\]]'on kyang khyod ni ting nge 'dzin rgya chen po thob pa ste/_khyod ni sil snyan gyi sgra chen po phyung bas kyang langs par ma gyur to/_/smras pa/_'jam dpal ci chos kyi dbyings la mnyam par gzhog pa'am/_ldang ba mchis sam/_smras pa/_sring mo de ma lags so/_/smras pa/_'jam 
[\[220b.2\]]dpal ci gang mnyam par ma bzhag pa de bslang bar nus sam/_smras pa/_de ma lags so/_/smras pa/_'jam dpal gang dag la kha dog dang /_mtshan dang /_dbyibs dang /_mtshan ma ma mchis pa de dag mnyam par gzhog gi_/gang la kha dog ma mchis/_
[\[220b.3\]]mtshan ma mchis/_dbyibs ma mchis/_mtshan ma ma mchis pa de dag gang du mnyam par gzhog ste/_'jam dpal de dag ni rang bzhin gyis dus thams cad du mnyam par bzhag gi/_/de dag ni slar mnyam par mi gzhog_/ldang bar mi byed do/_/de bas 
[\[220b.4\]]na 'jam dpal gson cig_/'jam dpal 'di lta ste/_dper na lha dang mi'i sil snyan thams cad dkrol na ci yid du 'ong ba'i sgra 'byung ngam/_smras pa/_sring mo de bzhin no/_/'jam dpal ci nam mkha'i khams ni sil snyan 'di dag las yid du 'ong ba'i sgra 'byung 
[\[220b.5\]]ngo snyam du 'gyur ram/_smras pa/_sring mo de ma lags so/_/'jam dpal de bas na 'di la chos thams cad nam mkha' dang mtshungs na 'di la su zhig sgra thos par 'gyur/_gang la rnam par shes pa yod pa des thos su zad do/_/smras pa/_sring mo gang 
[\[220b.6\]]gis sgra thos par gyur pa'i rna ba khyod la med dam/_de nas sring mo de cang mi smra bar gyur nas/_smras pa/_sring mo ci'i phyir cang mi smra bar gyur/_smras pa/_mi thos so/_/smras pa/_ci'i phyir/_smras pa/_rna ba mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro/_/gzhan yang 
[\[220b.7\]]sring mo the tshom sel ba des/_'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so/_/'jam dpal 'di lta ste/_dper na rlung gi dkyil 'khor chen po zhig langs te shing chen po dag g.yo bar gyur kyang rlung ni sus kyang bltar mi nus la/_de yang rnam par 
[\[221a\]]
[\[221a.1\]]mi rtog pa de dag kyang rnam par mi rtog ste/_rlung yang bdag gis shing dag bsgul bar bya'o snyam du de ltar mi sems so/_/shing dag kyang bdag cag ni rlung dag gis bsgul to snyam du mi sems so/_/'jam dpal de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' shes 
[\[221a.2\]]rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa rnam par rtog pa thams cad spangs pa yang bdag ni mnyam par gzhog pa dang ldang bar bya'o snyam du mi sems so/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis dben pa'i phyir ro/_/'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_sring mo bar 
[\[221a.3\]]snang las bobs la de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan sngar 'dug la shod cig_/sring mo des smras pa/_'jam dpal bdag gi spyod yul du mchis kyi/_bdag la gzhan gyi spyod yul ni mi 'tshal lo/_/smras pa/_sring mo khyod kyi bdag gi spyod yul gang yin smras 
[\[221a.4\]]pa/_'jam dpal nam mkha'i dbyings ni sems can thams cad kyi spyod yul lo/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_sems can thams cad ni nam mkha' las 'gro zhing 'ong ste/_sems can gyi spyod pa de ji tsam pa de thams cad ni nam mkha' la spyod do/_/de bas na nam 
[\[221a.5\]]mkha' ni sems can thams cad kyi spyod yul te/_'di lta ste/_nam mkha'i phyag rgya 'di ni chos thams cad kyi phyag rgya'o/_/de nas sring mo de steng gi bar snang las babs nas phyogs gcig tu pad mo la 'dug gi/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs la mgo 
[\[221a.6\]]bos phyag kyang mi 'tshal/_tshig kyang mi smra'o/_/de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas sring mo de la 'di skad ces smras so/_/sring mo gang khyod ni de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag mi 'tshal bar 'dug ste gus pa ma yin no/_/smras pa/_'jam dpal de bzhin 
[\[221a.7\]]te/_'jam dpal bdag ni gus pa ma lags so/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ltar ci nas kyang byed pa yang med/_mi byed pa yang med pa de ltar bdag ma gus mod kyi/_'jam dpal de bzhin nyid la phyag bgyi bar nus sam/_smras pa/_de ma lags so/_/
[\[221b\]]
[\[221b.1\]]smras pa/_de bzhin gshegs pa la'ang phyag 'tshal bar mi nus so/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dang de bzhin nyid de ni gnyis su med de/_gnyis lta bur dbyer med pa'i phyir ro/_/yang smras pa/_'jam dpal khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa mthong 
[\[221b.2\]]ngam/_smras pa/_mthong ngo /_/smras pa/_ji ltar mthong /_smras pa/_ji ltar rdul tsam yang ma mthong ba de ltar mthong ste de 'dra bar mthong ngo /_/smras pa/_de ltar mthong na ci zhig mthong /_smras pa/_de ltar mthong na cung zad kyang ma mthong ngo /_/smras pa/_'jam 
[\[221b.3\]]dpal gang khyod cung zad kyang ma mthong na ci khyod mig rtul lam/_smras pa/_bdag ni mig rtul ba yang ma yin/_mig lnga dang ldan pa'ang ma yin/_mig med pa yang ma yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_sring mo mig ni ma skyes pa/_yang dag par ma skyes pa/_sgyu ma 
[\[221b.4\]]lta bu ste/_chos thams cad dngos po med pa'i phyir de ni dngos po'am/_dngos po med pa gang gis kyang bshad par mi bya'o/_/smras pa/_'jam dpal ci chos thams cad dngos po med pa'am/_smras pa/_dngos po yod pa yang ma yin/_dngos po med pa yang ma 
[\[221b.5\]]yin no/_/smras pa/_'jam dpal de bzhin du ji skad smras pa bzhin no/_/de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas sring mo de la 'di skad ces smras so/_/ci'i phyir na sring mo khyod bud med kyi lus las sgyur bar mi byed/_smras pa/_'jam dpal de skad ma smra/_
[\[221b.6\]]rnam par ma rtog shig_/khyod kyis chos gang yang skyes pa'am/_bud med du gyur pa de mthong ngam/_smras pa/_de ma yin no/_/smras pa/_'jam dpal ji snyam du sems/_gzugs skyes pa'am/_bud med yin nam/_smras pa/_ma yin no/_/tshor 
[\[221b.7\]]ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed dang /_rnam par shes pa skyes pa'am/_bud med yin nam/_smras pa/_ma yin no/_/'jam dpal de ji snyam du sems/_mig skyes pa'am/_bud med yin nam/_rna ba dang /_sna dang /_lce dang /_lus dang /_yid skyes pa'am/_bud 
[\[222a\]]
[\[222a.1\]]med yin nam/_smras pa/_ma yin no/_/'jam dpal de ji snyam du sems/_sa'i khams skyes pa'am/_bud med yin nam/_smras pa/_ma yin no/_/chu'i khams dang /_me'i khams dang /_rlung gi khams dang /_nam mkha'i khams dang /_rnam par 
[\[222a.2\]]shes pa'i khams skyes pa'am/_bud med yin nam/_smras pa/_ma yin no/_/'jam dpal de ji snyam du sems/_yi ge gang dag gis bshad pa'i yi ge dag tu skyes pa'am/_bud med du dmigs sam/_smras pa/_de ni ma yin no/_/'jam dpal 'o na da 'jam 
[\[222a.3\]]dpal ji ltar na sring mo khyod ci'i phyir bud med kyi lus las bsgyur ba med ces de skad smra/_'jam dpal gal te bdag bud med du dmigs sam/_skyes par mthong na ni bud med kyi lus de bor te skyes pa'i lus blang na/_'jam dpal bdag ni bud med du'ang mi 
[\[222a.4\]]dmigs/_skyes par yang mi mthong na de ji ltar na bud med kyi lus las bsgyur bar bgyi/_'jam dpal chos kyi dbyings ni 'byung bar yang mi 'gyur/_'jig par yang mi 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin nyid dang /_yang dag pa'i mtha' dang /_stong pa nyid dang /_nam 
[\[222a.5\]]mkha'i dbyings kyang 'byung bar mi 'gyur/_'jig par yang mi 'gyur na/_de ji ltar na chos thams cad nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa la bud med kyi lus dor zhing skyes pa'i lus blang bar nus par 'gyur/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de bzhin gshegs pa ni blang ba'am/_
