[\[222a.6\]]mi blang ba'i phyir chos 'chad par mi 'gyur te/_yang 'jam dpal mig ni skyes pa ma yin/_bud med ma yin/_de bzhin du rna ba dang /_sna dang /_lce dang /_lus dang /_yid skyes pa ma yin/_bud med ma yin no zhes de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs te/_
[\[222a.7\]]chos gang skyes pa ma yin/_bud med ma yin pa de ni 'byung ba yang med/_'jig pa yang med do/_/smras pa/_sring mo khyod kyis ji srid nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed/_smras pa/_sgyu ma'i skyes bus ji srid nas rnam 
[\[222b\]]
[\[222b.1\]]par shes pa'o/_/smras pa/_sgyu ma'i skyes bu yod dam/_smras pa/_de ma yin no/_/smras pa/_'o na ci'i phyir na de skad smra/_khyod ci bzod pa skyes sam/_smras pa/_de ma yin no/_/smras pa/_'o na ci'i phyir na 'chad par byed/_smras pa/_sgyu ma'i skyes bus ji 
[\[222b.2\]]srid nas byang chub tu sems bskyed pa de srid nas bdag gis byang chub tu sems bskyed do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_chos thams cad sgyu ma lta bu yin pa'i phyir ro/_/yang ji srid nas khyod kyis byang chub tu sems bskyed ces de skad smras pa'i 'dri ba 'di ni tshul bzhin ma yin no/_/de ci'i phyir 
[\[222b.3\]]zhe na/_mi skye ba ni bskyed par mi nus/_dgag par mi nus/_gdags par mi nus/_gang dgag tu med pa'i chos de ni skyed pa'am/_dgag par mi nus so/_/smras pa/_tshul bzhin du 'dri ba ni gang /_tshul de ni gang /_smras pa/_mi skye ba ni tshul te/_de 'dra 
[\[222b.4\]]bar 'di 'dra ba ni tshul bzhin du 'dri ba'o/_/yang sring mo khyod bzod pa skyes sam/_zhes de skad smra ba/_bdag ni bzod pa skyes pa yang ma lags/_bzod pa ma skyes pa yang ma lags so/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_bzod pa ni mi dmigs pa'i phyir bskyed par yang ma 
[\[222b.5\]]lags/_'bri ba yang ma lags so/_/de bas na bdag bzod pa skyes pa yang ma lags/_bzod pa ma skyes pa yang ma lags so/_/sring mo byang chub sems dpa' don gang gi dbang mthong na/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la 'jug_/smras pa/_
[\[222b.6\]]'jam dpal sems can yongs su mya ngan las bzla ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi phyir go cha bgo bar byed do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'jam dpal chos thams cad thog ma nas mya ngan las 'das pa'i phyir ro/_/'das pa'i yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs 
[\[222b.7\]]rgyas rnams kyis kyang sems can gang yang yongs su mya ngan las ma bzlas ma byon pa rnams kyang yongs su mya ngan las zlo bar mi 'gyur/_da ltar bzhugs pa rnams kyang yongs su mya ngan las zlo bar mi mdzad do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_sems can med pa'i phyir ro/_/
[\[223a\]]
[\[223a.1\]]smras pa/_sring mo ci'i phyir sangs rgyas 'byung bar 'gyur/_'jam dpal mi bya mi byed pa'i phyir sangs rgyas 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/smras pa/_ci'i phyir/_smras pa/_'di la cung zad kyang byar med do/_/smras pa/_sring mo ci'i phyir na rab tu 'byung 
[\[223a.2\]]ba dang bsnyen par rdzogs shing dge slong gi dngos por 'gyur/_smras pa/_mtshams med pa lnga yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir ro/_/smras pa/_sring mo de su zhig yid ches par 'gyur/_smras pa/_gang dag ye shes ma skyes pa mi 'jig pa'o/_/smras pa/_
[\[223a.3\]]de la su zhig mos par 'gyur/_smras pa/_gang mos pa'o/_/sring mo mos pa la yon tan ci zhig yod/_smras pa/_'jam dpal mos pa la ni rnam par grol ba'i yon tan mchis so/_/smras pa/_sring mo khyod thogs pa med pa'i yon tan dang ldan pa ngo mtshar to/_/
[\[223a.4\]]smras pa/_'jam dpal dmigs pa la ma spyod cig_/'jam dpal gang du'ang chags pa yod dam ci na/_de'i phyir bdag la khyod ni ma thogs pa'i spobs pa dang ldan no zhes smra/_smras pa/_de ma yin no/_/de bas na bdag ni thogs pa med pa'i spobs pa dang ldan 
[\[223a.5\]]pa ma yin no/_/smras pa/_sring mo gang spobs pa zhes bya ba de ci la spobs pa zhes bya/_smras pa/_gang dag gis rtogs pa de dag la ni spobs pa yod do/_/smras pa/_gang du rtogs/_smras pa/_gang du yang ma rtogs pas de'i phyir rtogs pa'o/_/chos kyi dbyings 
[\[223a.6\]]dang /_de bzhin nyid dang /_yang dag pa'i mtha' ma rtogs pas de'i phyir rtogs pa zhes bya'o/_/'jam dpal yang gang dag gis ma rtogs pa bdag gis rtogs pa'o/_/smras pa/_gang du ma rtogs/_smras pa/_khams gsum du ma rtogs pa ste/_gang dag gis 
[\[223a.7\]]khams gsum du ma rtogs pa de ni khong du ma chud pas rtogs so/_/smras pa/_sring mo khyod kyis ji srid nas byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur/_smras pa/_gang gi tshe na de bzhin gshegs pa 'jug sred kyi rgyal po byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang 
[\[223b\]]
[\[223b.1\]]rgya bar 'gyur ba de'i tshe na bdag kyang byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur mod kyi/_'jam dpal byang chub la mngon par 'tshang rgya ba'am/_thob par nus sam/_de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa cang mi smra bar gyur pa dang /_sring mo des 'di skad ces smras so/_/'jam 
[\[223b.2\]]dpal cang mi smra bar bya ba dus la ma bab kyis shod cig_/'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_sring mo byang chub ni bshad du med na de'i phyir ci bshad ma 'tshal to/_/de nas de bzhin gshegs pa 'jug sred kyi rgyal po la 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom 
[\[223b.3\]]ldan 'das sring mo 'di ye shes bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan zhing 'di 'dra ba'i bstan pa ston par bgyid/_bgyid pa ngo mtshar na/_bcom ldan 'das sring mo 'dis yun ji srid nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed/_ji srid nas byang chub mngon 
[\[223b.4\]]par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur/_'di sangs rgyas kyi zhing ji lta bur 'gyur/_'di'i ming cir 'gyur/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_sring mo 'dis byang chub kyi phyir spyad nas bskal pa grangs med pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya phrag stong gi phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu 'das 
[\[223b.5\]]pa dang /_de'i 'og tu khyod kyis byang chub tu sems bskyed do/_/'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/_sring mo 'dis gang gi drung du byang chub tu sems bskyed pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa de'i mtshan ci lags/_bka' stsal pa/_'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa dkon mchog 
[\[223b.6\]]'byung ba zhes bya ba zhig byung ste/_'dis de bzhin gshegs pa dkon mchog 'byung ba'i drung du byang chub tu sems bskyed do/_/de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod par gyur pa de dag bskal pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du bshad kyang cha tsam yang bshad par mi 'gyur te/_sring 
[\[223b.7\]]mo 'dis ni der byang chub tu sems bskyed do/_/gsol pa/_ci bud med du gyur pa lags sam/_bka' stsal pa/_de ni ma yin te/_'di ni de'i tshe de'i dus na/_'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po sgra dang bral ba zhes bya bar gyur te/_'jam dpal sring mo 'di la ni bud med 
[\[224a\]]
[\[224a.1\]]ces kyang mi bya/_skyes pa zhes kyang mi bya'o/_/sring mo 'di ni sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin thob pa ste/_de ji ltar 'dod pa ltar bdag gi lus sprul par byed do/_/'jam dpal sring mo 'di ni stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na rdul dang /_yal ga 
[\[224a.2\]]dang /_'dab ma ji snyed yod pa de snyed kyi bskal pa grangs med pa brgya phrag stong gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/_kun tu snang ba sbyin pa zhes bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das yon tan gyi tshogs 
[\[224a.3\]]chen pos brgyan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'byung bar 'gyur te/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dkon mchog 'byung ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing ci 'dra bar gyur pa 'di yang de bzhin te/_lhag pa med/_chad pa med do/_/de nas de bzhin gshegs pa 'jug sred kyi 
[\[224a.4\]]rgyal po la byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'di ni bgyid pa dang /_bgyi ba mang ste/_'das pa dang /_ma 'ongs pa'i chos rnams la yang rnam par rtogs par bgyid do/_/
[\[224a.5\]]'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_rigs kyi bu de bzhin te/_ji skad smras pa bzhin no/_/de ltar bdag ni byed pa mang ba ste/_de dag ni chos kyi dbyings mi zad pa'i phyir byed pa zad par mi 'gyur ro/_/de nas de bzhin gshegs pa 'jug sred kyi rgyal pos 'jam dpal gzhon 
[\[224a.6\]]nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/'jam dpal khyod byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba dang ma rtsod cig_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rigs kyi bu 'di ni spobs pa dang /_'dri ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan pa yin te/_byang chub sems 
[\[224a.7\]]dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba mnyam par bzhag pa gang la mnyam par gzhog pa dang ldan par byed pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_mnyam par gzhog pa de dag gi ming tsam yang khyod kyis mi shes so/_/de nas 'khor de na byang chub sems dpa' las thog ma 
[\[224b\]]
[\[224b.1\]]bdag 'di snyam du gyur te/_kye ma'o byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba de ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis bsngags par 'gyur ro snyam mo/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi sems sems kyis mkhyen nas/_byang chub sems 
[\[224b.2\]]dpa' sems shin tu dul ba zhes bya ba la bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na sems can ji snyed pa de dag thams cad 'jam dpal 'dra bar gyur du zin kyang sring mo 'di'i ting nge 'dzin gyi mthu dang /_rnam par 'phrul pa dang /_cho 'phrul 
[\[224b.3\]]dang /_ye shes kyi brgya phrag stong gi char yang mi phod do/_/ting nge 'dzin gang dag la sring mo 'di mnyam par gzhog pa dang ldang bar byed pa'i ming yang 'jam dpal gyis mi shes so/_/rigs kyi bu gal te stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/_sems can 
[\[224b.4\]]ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad ting nge 'dzin gyi mthu dang ye shes dang mnyam par gzhog pas the tshom sel ba dang 'dra bar gyur du zin kyang /_de dag thams cad kyis byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_ye shes dang /_stobs dang /_rnam 
[\[224b.5\]]par 'phrul pa'i brgya phrag stong gi char yang mi phod de/_byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba gang la mnyam par gzhog cing ldang bar byed pa'i ting nge 'dzin de dag gi ming tsam yang sring mo 'dis mi shes so/_/rigs kyi bu gal te sems can thams cad ting nge 
[\[224b.6\]]'dzin dang /_ye shes dang mnyam par gzhog pas sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba dang 'dra bar gyur te ye shes de dang ldan du zin kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i gom pa 'dor ba yang mi shes te rmongs par 'gyur zhing /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs gom pa ji ltar 'dor/_ji 
[\[224b.7\]]ltar 'jog mi shes par 'gyur te/_rigs kyi bu de ltar sangs rgyas kyi ye shes ni bsam gyis mi khyab bo/_/sangs rgyas kyi ye shes bsam gyis mi khyab pa bstan pa 'di ston pa'i tshe/_srog chags brgya stong phrag bdun cu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 
[\[225a\]]
[\[225a.1\]]tu sems bskyed nas/_bdag cag kyang ye shes de dang ldan par gyur cig ces de skad kyi tshig kyang smras so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems shin tu dul ba la bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu sring mo 'dis ni 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 
[\[225a.2\]]byang chub tu sems bskyed du bcug ste/_'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa ji lta ba de dang 'dra ba'i byang chub sems dpa' shar phyogs na gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed yod pa de bzhin du lho phyogs dang /_nub phyogs dang /_byang phyogs dang /_phyogs bcu na yod do/_/rigs kyi bu byang 
[\[225a.3\]]chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba 'dis sring mo 'di byang chub tu sems bskyed du bcug ste/_sring mo 'di ji lta ba de dang 'dra ba'i byang chub sems dpa' gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed rigs kyi bu 'dis ni shar phyogs su byang chub tu sems bskyed du bcug go/_/phyogs 
[\[225a.4\]]bcu kun gyi bar du'ang de bzhin no/_/rigs kyi bu nga nyid da ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas shing de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba mthong ngam/_rigs kyi bu nga yang 'das pa'i dus na de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[225a.5\]]ri rab rgyal mtshan gyi gsung rab las byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas byang chub tu sems bskyed du bcug ste/_nga ji lta ba de 'dra ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed phyogs bcur byang chub tu sems bskyed du bcug ste/_de dag 
[\[225a.6\]]da ltar bzhugs so/_/'tsho gzhes so/_/dpag tu med pa de dag kyang yongs su mya ngan las 'das so/_/tshig de gsungs ma thag tu de nas stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams rnam pa drug tu g.yos so/_/chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa'i tshe kun tu 
[\[225a.7\]]'od kyi 'jig rten gyi khams der byang chub sems dpa' khrag khrig phrag dgu bcu rtsa gnyis mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to/_/'jig rten gyi khams 'dir yang sems can bsam pa yongs su dag pa rnams kyi rna ba'i dbang po la chos kyi rnam grangs 
[\[225b\]]
[\[225b.1\]]grags par gyur to/_/byang chub sems dpa' byams pas kyang ma lhag ma chad par kun bzung ngo /_/'jig rten gyi khams 'dir yang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos nas srog chags bye ba drug cu rtsa bzhi bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyes so/_/byang chub 
[\[225b.2\]]sems dpa' stong phrag bdun cus ni mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa rab tu thob bo/_/dge slong stong phrag bcu bzhis ni zag pa las ma lus par sems rnam par grol lo/_/dge slong ma lnga stong dang /_lha dang mi'i skye dgu sems can khrag khrig phrag drug cu rtsa drug ni chos la chos 
[\[225b.3\]]kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba rnam par dag go/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa de bzhin gshegs pas byang chub sems dpa' byams pa la bka' stsal pa/_ma pham pa khyod kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di long shig_/gzhan la yang rgya cher shod cig_/
[\[225b.4\]]gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das bdag gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di blangs lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_ma pham pa ci nas kyang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di phyi ma'i dus phyi ma'i tshe spyod par 'gyur bar khyod la gtad do/_/ma pham pa gal te byang 
[\[225b.5\]]chub sems dpa' da ltar phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bzhugs pa 'tsho ba/_gzhes pa ji snyed pa dang /_gang ma 'ongs pa'i dus na spyad pa spyod pa dang /_spyod par 'gyur ba dang /_yongs su brtag 
[\[225b.6\]]pa bzung na sems can thams cad kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas shing stobs bcu dang ldan par 'gyur/_gang de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa de dag kyang yongs su brtag pa bzung na/_nyan thos dang 
[\[225b.7\]]rang sangs rgyas dang bcas te slar zhugs par gyur la/_de snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa mang po la phyi ma'i mthar thug gi bar du bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis bkur sti byas/_rim gro byas/_bsti stang byas/_mchod pa byas shing yongs su mya ngan las 'das 
[\[226a\]]
[\[226a.1\]]nas kyang yun de srid du mchod pa byas na byang chub sems dpa' bsod nams mang du 'phel bar 'gyur ram/_ma pham pas gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das bdag gis dpe 'di thos nas sems kyang rmongs par 'gyur te/_de ltar bsod nams kyi phung po dpag 
[\[226a.2\]]tu ma mchis par 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_ma pham pa gang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di len par byed/_'dzin par byed/_klog par byed/_kun chub par byed/_gzhan la yang rgya cher ston par byed cing chung ngu na thos nas mos par byed pa'i byang chub sems 
[\[226a.3\]]dpa' de ni de bas kyang shin tu bsod nams mang du 'phel bar 'gyur ro/_/ma pham pa nga da mya ngan las 'das nas gang bud med la la zhig gis sring mo the tshom sel ba de'am/_byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba de'am/_de bzhin gshegs pa 'jug 
[\[226a.4\]]sred kyi rgyal po de'i mtshan thos sam/_chung ngu na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos na/_de nyid de'i lus tha mar gyur te/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang myur du mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/_/tshe 'das nas kyang sangs rgyas 'byung ba mnyes par 
[\[226a.5\]]byed par 'gyur ro/_/mi khom pa brgyad kyang yongs su spong bar 'gyur ro/_/tshe rabs kyang dran par 'gyur ro/_/gzungs kyang thob par 'gyur ro/_/skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyang thob par 'gyur ro/_/gzhan yang mngal du mi gnas par 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i 
[\[226a.6\]]phyir zhe na/_skyes bu dam pa de dag ni bud med gang dag bdag cag gi ming thos pa de yon tan 'di dag dang ldan par gyur cig ces smon lam 'debs pa'i phyir ro/_/bcom ldan 'das dgyes shing de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ma pham pa dang /_lha 
[\[226a.7\]]dang /_mi dang /_lha ma yin dang /_dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa la mngon par dga'o/_/sangs rgyas bgro ba zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so//_//lo ts+tsha ba ban de dpal dbyangs dang dpal brtsegs kyis bsgyur cing zhus//_//
[\[226b\]]
[\[226b.1\]{D229}]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_ta tha ga ta saM gI ti na ma ma hA yA na sU tra/_bod skad du/_de bzhin gshegs pa bgro ba zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/_bam po dang po/_sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus 
[\[226b.2\]]gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na dge slong stong nyis brgya lnga bcu'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang thabs cig tu bzhugs so/_/de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa bsod snyoms gcig gis zla ba 
[\[226b.3\]]gsum nang du yang dag 'jog la zhugs nas bzhugs so/_/de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa zla ba gsum po de nyid 'das pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/
[\[226b.4\]]tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu yang zla ba gsum po 'das nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po dang /_tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po dang /_
[\[226b.5\]]tshe dang ldan pa kA t+yA'i bu chen po dang /_tshe dang ldan pa gsus po che chen po dang /_tshe dang ldan pa ka pi na dang /_tshe dang ldan pa don yod rgyal po dang /_tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor dang /_tshe dang ldan pa byams ma'i bu gang po dang /_tshe dang ldan pa nye bar 'khor dang /_tshe dang ldan pa nam gru 
[\[226b.6\]]dang /_tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka nag po dang /_tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang /_tshe dang ldan pa grags 'byin dang /_tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong dang /_tshe dang ldan pa gro zhin skyes bye ba nyi shu pa dang /_tshe dang ldan pa sgra gcan zin dang /_gnas brtan de lta bu dag dang /_de dag la 
[\[226b.7\]]sogs pa nyan thos stong nyis brgya lnga bcu'i bar dag bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/_/rigs kyi bu bzang skyong dang /_rigs kyi bu rin chen 'byung gnas dang /_yon tan sbed 
[\[227a\]]
[\[227a.1\]]dang /_ral gri'i tshogs can dang /_mis byin dang /_chu lha dang /_dbang pos byin dang /_gus byin dang /_mis byin dang /_de dag dang gzhan yang de dag la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' lnga stong tham pa bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste phyin nas/_bcom ldan 
[\[227a.2\]]'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/_/de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams dang lhan cig bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'khod 
[\[227a.3\]]do/_/lha'i bu yongs su dga' ldan dang /_lha'i bu dpal bzang dang /_lha'i bu sprul pa dag kyang bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/_/mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa yang lha'i bu stong 
[\[227a.4\]]phrag du ma dag dang lhan cig bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/_/de nas lha'i bu dbang phyug dang /_lha'i bu dbang phyug chen po dang /_lha'i bu rab zhi dul ba'i dbang phyug rnams 
[\[227a.5\]]gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu stong phrag du ma dag dang lhan cig bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/_/de nas lha'i bu nyi ma dang /_lha'i bu zla ba yang bcom ldan 'das ga 
[\[227a.6\]]la ba der dong ste phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/_/de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/_pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs 
[\[227a.7\]]te/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das gnas pa gang gis dgung zla gsum bzhugs shing /_bcom ldan 'das kyi dbang po rnams ni yongs su dang /_zhal 
[\[227b\]]
[\[227b.1\]]mdog ni yongs su dag_/sku mdog ni yongs su dkar lags/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/'jam dpal nga ni sangs rgyas bgro bas zla ba gsum gnas shing /_'jam dpal nga ni 
[\[227b.2\]]de bzhin gshegs pa bgro ba dang /_chos bgro bas zla ba gsum gnas gnas so/_/'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas bgro ba dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa bgro ba dang /_chos bgro ba de gang lags/_bcom ldan 'das sangs 
[\[227b.3\]]rgyas bgro ba dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa bgro ba dang /_chos kyi bgro ba de'i ngo bo ji lta bu lags/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa thabs cig tu mol pa mdzad pa ji lta bu lags pa'i bka' mchid de'i snod du bdag kyang gyur 
[\[227b.4\]]na legs lags so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/_'jam dpal legs so legs so/_/'jam dpal khyod de bzhin gshegs pa la de bzhin gshegs pa de bzhin gshegs pa de dag dang thabs cig 
[\[227b.5\]]tu bgro ba'i ngo bo gang yin pa'i don 'di nyid 'dri bar sems pa ni 'jam dpal khyod yang legs so/_/'jam dpal khyod sngon gyi rgyal ba la lhag par bya ba byas shing sangs rgyas 'bum phrag mang po la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa/_sangs rgyas 'bum phrag mang po la bsnyen bkur byas su 
[\[227b.6\]]zin kyang /_'jam dpal rigs kyi bu dang /_rigs kyi bu mo de dag gi mthus na chos bgro ba la khyod spobs so/_/'jam dpal sangs rgyas bgro ba dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa bgro ba dang /_chos kyi bgro ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gang dag gi lag tu 'gro ba de dag 
[\[227b.7\]]ni bdud sdig can gyi lag tu 'gro bar mi 'gyur ro/_/'jam dpal sangs rgyas bgro ba dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa bgro ba dang /_chos bgro ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gang dag gi lag tu 'gro ba'i rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo de dag gi mdun du yang de bzhin 
[\[228a\]]
[\[228a.1\]]gshegs pa mngon sum du gyur la/_de dag kyang ngas mthong bar rig par bya'o/_/'jam dpal sangs rgyas bgro ba dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa bgro ba dang /_chos bgro ba 'di rigs kyi bu 'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang dag gi lag tu 'gro ba dang /_gang dag spong 
[\[228a.2\]]bar byed pa de dag kyang ngas mthong ngo /_/'jam dpal rigs kyi bu dang /_rigs kyi bu mo gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di spong bar mi byed pa'i rigs kyi bu dang /_rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni dad pa dang ldan par 'gyur/_dang bar 'gyur/_drang ba dang /_g.yo med pa dang /_spyod lam 
[\[228a.3\]]phun sum tshogs pa dang /_lhag pa'i bsam pa phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ro/_/'jam dpal yang rigs kyi bu dang /_rigs kyi bu mo de dag tshul khrims dang ldan par 'gyur ro/_/le lo can dang /_brnab sems can dang /_gnod sems can gyi sems su mi 'gyur ro/_/
[\[228a.4\]]dran pa nyams pa dang /_ser sna can du mi 'gyur ro/_/'jam dpal rigs kyi bu dang /_rigs kyi bu mo de dag tshul khrims dang ldan par 'gyur ro/_/de dag ni le lo med pa dang /_brnab sems med pa dang /_gnod sems kyi sems med pa dang /_ser sna med pa dang /_dran 
[\[228a.5\]]pa dang ldan pa dang /_blo gros dang ldan pa dang /_rtogs pa dang ldan pa dang /_khrel yod pa phun sum tshogs pa dang /_brtson 'grus brtsams pa dang /_mos pa mang bar 'gyur ro/_/de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das la 'jam dpal gzhon nur 
[\[228a.6\]]gyur pas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis lha dang /_mi dang /_lha ma yin du bcas pa dang /_lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi mdun du sangs rgyas bgro ba dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa bgro ba dang /_chos bgro ba'i chos 
[\[228a.7\]]kyi rnam grangs kyi ting nge 'dzin 'di bka' stsal cing bshad pa de'i dus la bab lags so/_/bde bar gshegs pa de'i dus la bab lags te/_'di ltar bcom ldan 'das las thos nas de bzhin nyid du 'dzin par 'gyur lags so/_/de skad ces gsol pa dang /_
[\[228b\]]
[\[228b.1\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/'jam dpal khyod de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang bshad do/_/bcom ldan 'das legs so zhes gsol te/_'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar 
[\[228b.2\]]nyan pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/'jam dpal shar phyogs logs na/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams mngon par dga' ba zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i 
[\[228b.3\]]sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te/_'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston to/_/'jam dpal de nas ngas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa de la 'di skad ces smras so/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa 
[\[228b.4\]]yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pas gang la gnas te/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas/_de skad ces smras pa dang /_'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'khrugs pa des nga la 'di skad ces smras so/_/
[\[228b.5\]]byis pa so so'i skye bo'i bdag tu 'du shes pa gang la gnas pa de la gnas nas kho bo bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/_/de skad ces smras pa dang /_'jam dpal ngas de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'khrugs pa de la 'di skad ces smras 
[\[228b.6\]]so/_/byis pa so so'i skye bo'i bdag tu 'du shes pa gang la gnas/_de skad ces smras pa dang /_des nga la 'di skad ces smras so/_/mi shes pa la gnas nas byis pa so so'i skye bo'i bdag tu 'du shes pa byung ba ni mi gnas pa ste/_de lta bu la gnas nas kho bo bla na med pa 
[\[228b.7\]]yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/_/'jam dpal gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'khrugs pas nga la 'di skad ces smras so/_/shAkya'i rgyal po'i mchog shAkya thub pas ci la gnas te bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang 
[\[229a\]]
[\[229a.1\]]chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas/_de skad ces smras pa dang /_'jam dpal ngas de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'khrugs pa la 'di skad ces smras so/_/byis pa so so'i skye bo gang la gnas pa'i lta bar gyur pa drug cu rtsa gnyis kun tu 'byung ba de la gnas nas kho bo bla na med pa 
[\[229a.2\]]yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/_/de skad ces smras pa dang /_'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'khrugs pas nga la 'di skad ces smras so/_/byis pa so so'i skye bo'i lta bar gyur pa drug cu rtsa gnyis gang la gnas te kun tu 'byung bar 
[\[229a.3\]]'gyur/_de skad ces smras pa dang /_'jam dpal ngas de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'khrugs pa la 'di skad ces smras so/_/sgyu ma'i skyes bu gang la gnas pa'i sems dang sems las byung ba'i chos rnams rab tu 'jug pa de la gnas nas byis pa so so'i skye bo'i lta bar gyur pa drug cu 
[\[229a.4\]]rtsa gnyis kun tu 'byung ba de lta bu la gnas te/_kho bo bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/_de ni yid kyis yang dag par bgro ba'i dri ba'o/_/'jam dpal gzhan yang shar phyogs logs na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa 
[\[229a.5\]]yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun tu srung zhes bya ba des nga la 'di skad ces smras so/_/de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya'i rgyal po'i mchog shAkya thub pas gang la gnas te bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas/_de skad ces 
[\[229a.6\]]smras pa dang /_'jam dpal ngas de bzhin gshegs pa de la 'di skad ces smras so/_/byis pa so so'i skye bo gang la gnas pa'i 'dod chags dang /_zhe sdang dang /_gti mug kun tu 'byung ba de la gnas nas kho bo bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 
[\[229a.7\]]sangs rgyas so/_/de skad ces smras pa dang /_'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa des nga la 'di skad ces smras so/_/byis pa so so'i skye bo'i 'dod chags dang /_zhe sdang dang /_gti mug gang la gnas te kun tu 'byung bar 'gyur/_de skad ces smras pa dang /_'jam dpal ngas 
[\[229b\]]
[\[229b.1\]]de bzhin gshegs pa de la 'di skad ces smras so/_/bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings la gnas nas byis pa so so'i skye bo'i 'dod chags dang /_zhe sdang dang /_gti mug kun tu 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/de skad ces smras pa dang /_'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas bcom ldan 'das la 'di 
[\[229b.2\]]skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings de bsam gyis mi khyab pa lags/_bka' stsal pa/_'jam dpal gnas med pa zhes bya ba'i gnas med pa la gnas te/_byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams kyi 'dod chags dang /_zhe sdang dang /_gti 
[\[229b.3\]]mug kun tu 'byung ngo /_/'jam dpal gzhan yang ngas de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu srung de la 'di skad ces smras so/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun tu srung gang la gnas te bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon 
[\[229b.4\]]par rdzogs par sangs rgyas/_de skad ces smras pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa des nga la 'di skad ces smras so/_/byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams kyi mtshams med pa'i las rnams gang la gnas te kun tu 'byung ba de la gnas nas kho bo bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 
[\[229b.5\]]mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/_/de skad ces smras pa dang /_'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams kyi mtshams ma mchis pa'i las rnams gang la gnas te kun tu 'byung lags/_bcom 
[\[229b.6\]]ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_'jam dpal byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams kyi mtshams med pa'i las rnams ni yod pa ma yin pa de la gnas te kun tu 'byung ngo /_/'jam dpal 'di lta ste/_dper na mi zhig gnyid kyis log pa'i rmi lam na sbrul gdug pa zhig lag gis bzung ba 
[\[229b.7\]]las/_des de zin nas gzhi de las de 'chi bar 'gyur ba'am/_'chi ba la thug pa tsam du sdug bsngal zhing de 'chi bar nye ba'i tshor bas reg pa las sad par gyur na/_sad ma thag tu de'i sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba nyams su myong ba de dang de dag med pa nyid du shes pa na 'jam 
[\[230a\]]
[\[230a.1\]]dpal de ji snyam du sems/_ci mi de sbrul gdug pa des zin tam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so/_/'jam dpal 'di ji snyam du sems/_mi de ma zin bzhin du sdug bsngal bar gyur tam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so/_/
[\[230a.2\]]de ci'i slad du zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das de na sbrul gdug pa yang ma mchis la/_bcom ldan 'das gang zin pa de yang ma mchis pa lags na/_de na tshor bar 'gyur zhing mngon pa lta ga la zhig mchis/_bka' stsal pa/_'jam dpal de bzhin du chos thams cad ni mi gnas pa 
[\[230a.3\]]ste/_chos thams cad mi gnas pa ci 'dra bar zin pa yang de dang 'dra ste/_tshor ba yang de dang 'dra'o/_/tshor ba ci 'dra bar sbrul gdug pa yang de dang 'dra'o/_/sbrul gdug pa ci 'dra bar chos thams cad kyang de dang 'dra'o/_/chos thams cad ci 'dra bar mtshams med pa yang de dang 'dra'o/_/
[\[230a.4\]]mtshams med pa ci 'dra bar byang chub kyang de dang 'dra'o/_/byang chub ci 'dra bar gnas kyang de dang 'dra ste/_de lta bu la gnas nas kho bo bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/_de ni yid kyi yang dag par bgro ba'i dri ba'o/_/'jam dpal 
[\[230a.5\]]gzhan yang shar phyogs logs na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ri rab lta bu zhes bya ba de la ngas 'di skad ces smras so/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ri rab lta bus ci la gnas te bla na med 
[\[230a.6\]]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas/_de skad ces smras pa dang /_'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa ri rab lta bus nga la 'di skad ces smras so/_/sa'i khams dang /_chu'i khams dang /_me'i khams dang /_rlung gi khams dang /_nam mkha'i 
[\[230a.7\]]khams gang la gnas pa'i mtha' de la gnas nas kho bo bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/_/'jam dpal gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa ri rab lta bus nga la 'di skad ces smras so/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa 
[\[230b\]]
[\[230b.1\]]yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya'i rgyal po'i mchog shAkya thub pas gang la gnas te bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas/_de skad ces smras pa dang /_ngas de la 'di skad ces smras so/_/de bzhin gshegs pa ri rab lta bus gang la gnas

[\[230b.3\]]rgyas kun tu me tog ces bya ba da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/_de la ngas 'di skad ces smras so/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun tu me tog gis gang la gnas te bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 
[\[230b.4\]]mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas la/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di yang ji ltar mngon par bsgrubs/_de skad ces smras pa dang /_'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun tu me tog gis nga la 'di skad ces smras so/_/kho bo dang po 
[\[230b.5\]]sems bskyed pa la gnas nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas la/_sgyu ma'i skyes bus rnam par thar pa brgyad ji ltar mngon par bsgrubs pa de ltar sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di yang mngon par bsgrubs so/_/de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_'jam 
[\[230b.6\]]dpal gzhon nur gyur pas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu me tog des dang po sems bskyed pa la gnas nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas lags/_de skad ces 
[\[230b.7\]]gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_'jam dpal dang po'i sems gang yin pa de yang ma skyes pa yin la/_da ltar gyi de yang ma skyes pa yin te/_dang po'i sems bskyed pa de lta bu la gnas nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i 
[\[231a\]]
[\[231a.1\]]sangs rgyas kun tu me tog bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/_/'jam dpal gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu me tog gis nga la 'di skad ces smras so/_/de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya'i rgyal po'i mchog 
[\[231a.2\]]shAkya thub pas ci la gnas te bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas/_de skad ces smras pa dang /_'jam dpal ngas de bzhin gshegs pa de la 'di skad ces smras so/_/gang la gnas nas chags pa thams cad shes pa de la gnas nas kho bo 
[\[231a.3\]]bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/_de ni yid kyi yang dag par bgro ba'i dri ba'o/_/'jam dpal gzhan yang shar phyogs logs na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mya ngan thams cad las 
[\[231a.4\]]yang dag par 'das pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te de la ngas 'di skad ces smras so/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa ci la gnas te/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs 
[\[231a.5\]]rgyas/_de skad ces smras pa dang /_'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa des nga la 'di skad ces smras so/_/byis pa so so'i skye bo'i srid pa mngon par 'grub pa gang la gnas pa de la gnas te/_kho bo bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/_/
[\[231a.6\]]'jam dpal gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan thams cad las yang dag par 'das pas nga la 'di skad ces smras so/_/de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya'i rgyal po'i mchog shAkya thub pas gang la gnas te/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 
[\[231a.7\]]sangs rgyas/_de skad ces smras pa dang /_ngas de la 'di skad ces smras so/_/'khor ba na 'khor ba'i tshe sems can thams cad kyi sngon gyi mtha' mi mngon pa gang la gnas pa de la gnas te/_kho bo bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/_/de skad 
[\[231b\]]
[\[231b.1\]]ces bka' stsal pa dang /_'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/'khor ba na 'khor ba'i tshe gang la gnas te sems can thams cad kyi sngon gyi mtha' mi mngon lags/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_
[\[231b.2\]]'jam dpal ma rig pa la gnas nas byis pa so so'i skye bo thams cad kyi sngon gyi mtha' mi mngon no/_/'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du sngon gyi mtha' mi mngon lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_'jam dpal 'di ltar chos thams cad ni dngos 
[\[231b.3\]]po med pa ste/_dngos po med pa la gnas nas kho bo bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/_/'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/_de bzhin gshegs pa ting nge 'dzin ji lta bu zhig la gnas nas chos 'di dag la yang dag par bgro ba mdzad/_
[\[231b.4\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_'jam dpal bsam gyis mi khyab cing dri ma med pa shin tu yongs su dkar ba'i phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas nas de bzhin gshegs pa rnams chos 'di dag la bgro ba mdzad do/_/'jam dpal sangs rgyas kyi sku gcig kyang med mod kyi/_ting nge 
[\[231b.5\]]'dzin de la gnas na sangs rgyas kyi sku tha dad pa yang snang ngo /_/'jam dpal sangs rgyas kyi zhing gcig kyang med mod kyi/_ting nge 'dzin de la gnas na sangs rgyas kyi zhing tha dad pa yang snang ngo /_/'jam dpal nyan thos gcig kyang med mod kyi/_ting nge 'dzin de la gnas na nyan thos 
[\[231b.6\]]tha dad pa yang snang ngo /_/'jam dpal sangs rgyas kyi gsung gcig kyang med mod kyi/_ting nge 'dzin de la gnas na sangs rgyas kyi gsung tha dad pa yang grag go/_/'jam dpal rnam par rig pa gcig kyang med mod kyi/_ting nge 'dzin de la gnas na rnam par rig pa tha 
[\[231b.7\]]dad pa yang byed do/_/'jam dpal sems can gcig kyang med mod kyi/_ting nge 'dzin de la gnas na sems can mang po de dag kyang rnam par grol bar 'gyur ro/_/'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das a la la ting nge 'dzin 'di ni rgya che ba lags so/_/bcom ldan 
[\[232a\]]
[\[232a.1\]]'das a la la ting nge 'dzin 'di ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das a la la ting nge 'dzin 'di ni chags pa ma mchis pa lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das a la la ting nge 'dzin 'di ni rtogs par dka' ba lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das a la la ting 
[\[232a.2\]]nge 'dzin 'di ni zab pa lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das a la la ting nge 'dzin 'di ni shin tu 'das pa lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_'jam dpal de de bzhin no/_/ji skad smras pa bzhin te/_'jam dpal ting nge 'dzin 'di ni rgya che ba'o/_/'jam dpal 
[\[232a.3\]]ting nge 'dzin 'di ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa'o/_/'jam dpal ting nge 'dzin 'di ni chags pa med pa'o/_/'jam dpal ting nge 'dzin 'di ni rtogs par dka' ba'o/_/'jam dpal ting nge 'dzin 'di ni zab pa'o/_/'jam dpal ting nge 'dzin 'di ni shin tu 'das pa'o/_/'jam dpal ting nge 
[\[232a.4\]]'dzin 'di la gnas nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la dri ba'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan du yang mi 'gro'o/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag kyang nga'i thad du mi 'ong ste/_nga yang de dag la 'dri'o/_/de dag kyang nga la 'dri bar byed do/_/'on 
[\[232a.5\]]kyang 'jig rten gyi khams 'di nyid na gnas te/_'jig rten gyi khams de dang de dag na gnas pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la 'dri'o/_/'jig rten gyi khams de dang de dag na gnas pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag kyang nga 'di na gnas pa la 'dri bar byed do/_/
[\[232a.6\]]'jam dpal nga ting nge 'dzin 'di la gnas te sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du dbyangs kyis go bar byed de/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi thad du sgra de sgrib pa'i bya ba mi byed do/_/'jam dpal sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag kyang ting nge 'dzin 'di la gnas te sangs rgyas 
[\[232a.7\]]kyi zhing thams cad du dbyangs kyis go bar byed de/_nga la yang sgrib par mi byed do/_/'jam dpal nga ting nge 'dzin 'di la gnas te/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la lan yang 'debs la/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag kyang ting nge 'dzin 'di la gnas na nga la yang lan 
[\[232b\]]
[\[232b.1\]]'debs so/_/'jam dpal 'di lta ste/_dper na mi zhig 'di nas song ste grong khyer chen po rgya che ba zhig tu phyin la/_de dag gcig la gcig smra ste/_de dag phan tshun smra ba'i tshe brag ca'i sgra zhig grag par gyur na/_'jam dpal 'di ji snyam du sems/_de ni brag ca cig shos kyis brag ca 
[\[232b.2\]]gzhan la go bar byed dam/_ci brag ca snga ma shos kyi sgra brag ca phyi ma shos gzhan gyis shes sam/_'on te phan tshun du thos sam kun tu shes/_'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das brag ca snga ma shos de'i sgra de dag brag ca phyi ma shos kyis thos pa'am 'tshal ba ma mchis 
[\[232b.3\]]lags so/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das brag ca ni rnam par rig pa ma mchis pa'i slad du ste/_rnam par rig pa ma mchis pa de ni yid kyi yang dag par bgro ba'i dri ba'o/_/'jam dpal gzhan yang shar phyogs logs na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par 
[\[232b.4\]]rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun tu 'od ces bya ba de la ngas 'di skad ces smras so/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun tu 'od kyis gang la gnas te bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas/_de skad ces 
[\[232b.5\]]smras pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu 'od kyis nga la 'di skad ces smras so/_/'du shes la brten nas kho bo bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/_/de la ngas 'di skad ces smras so/_/ji ltar 'du shes la brten te bla na med pa yang dag par 
[\[232b.6\]]rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas/_des nga la 'di skad ces smras so/_/'du shes la gnas pa de ji lta bu/_de skad ces smras pa dang /_'jam dpal ngas de bzhin gshegs pa de la 'di skad ces smras so/_/'du shes la gnas pa med do/_/des smras pa/_
[\[232b.7\]]de ltar na gnas pa med pas kho bo bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/_/'jam dpal gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu 'od kyis nga la 'di skad ces smras so/_/de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya'i rgyal po'i mchog shAkya thub pas gang 
[\[233a\]]
[\[233a.1\]]la gnas te/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas/_de skad ces smras pa dang /_'jam dpal ngas de bzhin gshegs pa de la 'di skad ces smras so/_/de bzhin gshegs pas byang chub sems dpa' rnams bla na med pa 
[\[233a.2\]]yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa gang la gnas pa de la gnas te/_kho bo bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/_de ni yid kyi yang dag par bgro ba'i dri ba'o/_/'jam dpal gzhan yang shar phyogs logs na de bzhin gshegs 
[\[233a.3\]]pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun tu srung gi bdag po sprin gyi dbang phyug sgron ma zhes bya ba de la ngas 'di skad ces smras so/_/de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu srung gi bdag po sprin gyi dbang phyug sgron mas gang la gnas te bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon 
[\[233a.4\]]par rdzogs par sangs rgyas/_des nga la 'di skad ces smras so/_/bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings gang la gnas pa de la gnas te/_kho bo bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/_/'jam dpal gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa des 
[\[233a.5\]]nga la 'di skad ces smras so/_/de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya'i rgyal po'i mchog shAkya thub pas gang la gnas te bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas/_de la ngas 'di skad ces smras so/_/sems can gyi khams gang la gnas pa de la gnas te/_
[\[233a.6\]]kho bo bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/_/de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das sems can gyi khams zhes bgyi ba gang la gnas pa lags/_de skad ces gsol 
[\[233a.7\]]pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/'jam dpal de'i phyir khyod kyis don de nyid shes par bya ba'i phyir dpe bstan par bya'o/_/dpes bka' stsal ba'i don 'dir mi kha cig gis shes par yang 'gyur ro/_/'jam dpal 
[\[233b\]]
[\[233b.1\]]'di lta ste/_dper na sgyu ma mkhan nam sgyu ma mkhan gyi slob ma mkhas pa zhig gis steng gi bar snang la glang po che'i tshogs dang /_rta pa'i tshogs dang /_shing rta'i tshogs dang /_dpung bu chung gi tshogs dang /_mi'i lus dag sprul te 'ong zhing 'gro ba'am/_yan lag bzhi pa'i dpung gi tshogs 
[\[233b.2\]]dag kun tu ston par byed na/_'jam dpal de ji snyam du sems/_yan lag bzhi pa'i dpung gi tshogs de gang na gnas/_dpung gi tshogs bstan pa gang yin pa gang yang de na snang ngam/_'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags te/_de na dpung gi tshogs 
[\[233b.3\]]shin tu ma mchis na snang bar 'gyur ba'am/_gang na gnas par 'gyur ba'am/_mngon pa lta ga la zhig mchis/_'jam dpal de bzhin du sems can nam/_sems can du btags pa yang shin tu yod pa ma yin na de na gnas par 'gyur ba dang /_mngon pa lta ga la yod/_'jam 
[\[233b.4\]]dpal gnas de lta bu la gnas te nga bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/_de ni yid kyi yang dag par bgro ba'i dri ba'o/_/bstan pa 'di bshad pa na 'dod pa na spyod pa dang /_gzugs na spyod pa'i lha'i bu stong phrag drug khri chos rnams la chos kyi mig 
[\[233b.5\]]rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba rnam par dag go/_/bram ze lhag pa'i nga rgyal can 'bum phrag sum cu rtsa gnyis ni lhag pa'i nga rgyal med pa'i shes pa skyes so/_/lha'i bu 'bum phrag bzhi ni mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa skyes so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das de'i tshe 'dzum pa mdzad de/_'di ni 
[\[233b.6\]]sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams gang gi tshe 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i chos nyid de/_de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal gyi sgo nas 'od zer kha dog sna tshogs kha dog du ma 'di lta ste/_sngon po dang /_ser po dang /_dmar po dang /_dkar po dang /_btsod ka dang /_shel dang /_dngul gyi kha dog 
[\[233b.7\]]lta bu dag byung nas de dag gis 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas mu med pa dag 'od kyis khyab par byas te/_tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar du song nas slar log ste/_bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug tu mi snang bar gyur to/_/
[\[234a\]]
[\[234a.1\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dzum pa mdzad ma thag tu stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams dag 'od kyis snang bar byas shing rab tu brgyan to/_/de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 
[\[234a.2\]]rnams ni rgyu ma mchis rkyen ma mchis par 'dzum pa mi mdzad na/_bcom ldan 'das 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i rgyu ni gang lags/_rkyen ni gang lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_bstan pa 'di bshad pa na 'dod pa na spyod pa dang /_gzugs na spyod pa'i lha'i bu stong phrag drug 
[\[234a.3\]]khri chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba rnam par dag go/_/bram ze lhag pa'i nga rgyal can 'bum phrag sum cu rtsa gnyis ni lhag pa'i nga rgyal med pa'i shes pa skyes so/_/lha'i bu 'bum phrag bzhi ni mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa skyes so/_/lha'i bu sum khri nyis stong 
[\[234a.4\]]po 'di dag lha'i ris 'di nas shi 'phos te/_de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'khrugs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du skye bar 'gyur la/_de dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing dag tu yang 'gro bar 'gyur ro/_/de dag gis bskal pa dpag tu med grangs med par bla na med 
[\[234a.5\]]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bsgrubs nas byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun tu 'od ces bya bar 'gyur ro/_/byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa de dag gi sangs rgyas 
[\[234a.6\]]kyi zhing yang kun nas snang ba dang ldan par 'gyur ro/_/dper na sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi blta na sdug pa rtag tu brgyan pa de bzhin du/_de dag byang chub thob pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyang rtag tu brgyan par 'gyur te/_'jam dpal 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i rgyu ni de yin no/_/rkyen ni de 
[\[234a.7\]]yin no/_/'jam dpal 'di lta ste/_dper na shar phyogs logs na de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba grangs med dpag tu med pa dag kyang sangs rgyas kyi bgro ba dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i bgro ba dang /_chos kyi bgro ba 'di nyid ston par mdzad do/_/de bzhin du lho 
[\[234b\]]
[\[234b.1\]]phyogs dang /_de bzhin du nub phyogs dang /_de bzhin du byang phyogs dang /_de bzhin du 'og gi phyogs dang /_de bzhin du steng gi phyogs dang /_de bzhin du phyogs bcu dag na de bzhin gshegs pa grangs med dpag tu med pa dag kyang sangs rgyas kyi bgro ba dang /_chos kyi bgro ba dang /_de bzhin 
[\[234b.2\]]gshegs pa'i bgro ba 'di nyid ston par mdzad de/_ngas yi ge gang gis bstan pa yi ge de nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa de dag kyang ston pa mdzad do/_/'jam dpal 'das pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis kyang sangs rgyas kyi bgro ba dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i bgro ba dang /_chos 
[\[234b.3\]]kyi bgro ba chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nam mkhas yongs su zin pa'i sa phyogs 'di nyid du yang dag par bsgrags so/_/'jam dpal ma 'ongs pa'i dus na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag 'byung bar 'gyur ba de dag kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i bgro ba dang /_sangs rgyas kyi bgro ba dang /_
[\[234b.4\]]chos kyi bgro ba chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nam mkhas yongs su zin pa'i sa phyogs 'di nyid du 'chad par 'gyur ro/_/'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa byams pas kyang sangs rgyas kyi bgro ba dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i bgro ba dang /_chos kyi bgro ba chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nam mkhas 
[\[234b.5\]]yongs su zin pa'i sa phyogs 'di nyid du yang dag par sgrogs par 'gyur ro/_/'jam dpal sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa'o zhes smra ba gang yin pa de ni yang dag par smra ba ste/_'jam dpal sangs rgyas kyi bgro ba dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i bgro ba dang /_chos kyi bgro ba'i 
[\[234b.6\]]chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa'o zhes smra ba gang yin pa de ni yang dag par smra ba'o/_/'jam dpal gzhan yang shar phyogs logs na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yan lag mchog ces bya ba des nga la 'di 
[\[234b.7\]]skad ces smras so/_/de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya'i rgyal po'i mchog shAkya thub pas gang la gnas te bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas/_de skad ces smras pa dang /_de la ngas 'di skad ces smras so/_/sgyu ma'i skyes bu rnam par 
[\[235a\]]
[\[235a.1\]]thar pa brgyad mngon par bsgrub pa gang la gnas pa de la gnas te kho bo bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/_/'jam dpal gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yan lag mchog 
[\[235a.2\]]ces bya ba de la ngas 'di skad ces smras so/_/de bzhin gshegs pa yan lag mchog gis gang la gnas te bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas/_de skad ces smras pa dang /_des nga la 'di skad ces smras so/_/de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub 
[\[235a.3\]]pas gang la gnas te phung po lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur/_de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das gang la gnas te phung po lhag ma ma mchis 
[\[235a.4\]]pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_'jam dpal sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i mtha'i yul la gnas te yongs su mya ngan las 'da'o/_/'jam 
[\[235a.5\]]dpal chos thams cad ni de lta bu la gnas pa ste/_de ni yid kyi yang dag par bgro ba'i dri ba'o/_/'jam dpal gzhan yang shar phyogs logs na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun tu gzigs zhes bya ba des nga la 'di skad ces smras 
[\[235a.6\]]so/_/de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya'i rgyal po'i mchog shAkya thub pas gang la gnas te bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas/_de skad ces smras pa dang /_de la ngas 'di skad ces smras so/_/de sangs rgyas kyi sprul pa gang la gnas 
[\[235a.7\]]pa de la gnas te/_kho bo bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/_/'jam dpal gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu gzigs zhes bya ba de la ngas 'di skad ces smras so/_/de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu gzigs kyis gang la gnas 
[\[235b\]]
[\[235b.1\]]te bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas/_de skad ces smras pa dang /_des nga la 'di skad ces smras so/_/mtha' gang kho na la gnas nas kho bo la 'dri ba de la gnas te kho bo bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas 
[\[235b.2\]]te/_de ni yid kyi yang dag par bgro ba'i dri ba'o/_/'jam dpal gzhan yang shar phyogs logs na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nam mkha' rnam dag mngon 'phags dpal gyi rgyal po zhes bya ba des nga la 'di skad ces smras so/_/de bzhin 
[\[235b.3\]]gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya'i rgyal po'i gtso bo shAkya thub pas gang la gnas te bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas/_de skad ces smras pa dang /_ngas de bzhin gshegs pa de la 'di skad ces smras 
[\[235b.4\]]so/_/byis pa so so'i skye bo'i chos rnams gang la gnas pa de la gnas te kho bo bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/_/'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das byis pa so so'i skye bo'i chos rnams gang la gnas 
[\[235b.5\]]lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_'jam dpal khyod kyis byis pa so so'i skye bo'i chos rnams yang dag par rjes su mthong ngam/_'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das byis pa 
[\[235b.6\]]so so'i skye bo'i chos rnams ni phyi dang nang na mi dmigs lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_'jam dpal 'di ltar phyi dang nang la mi gnas par ngas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/_/'jam dpal 
[\[235b.7\]]gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa de la ngas 'di skad ces smras so/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nam mkha' rnam dag mngon 'phags dpal gyi rgyal pos gang la gnas te bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par 
[\[236a\]]
[\[236a.1\]]rdzogs par sangs rgyas/_de skad ces smras pa dang /_des nga la 'di skad ces smras so/_/sgyu ma'i skyes bu rnam par thar pa brgyad mngon par sgrub pa gang la gnas pa de la gnas te kho bo bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/_/
[\[236a.2\]]de skad ces smras pa dang /_'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar sgyu ma'i skyes bu nyid ma mchis shing mi dmigs pa lags na/_de'i rnam par thar pa brgyad kyi sgo mngon par sgrub pa lta ga la mchis/_bcom ldan 
[\[236a.3\]]'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_'jam dpal 'di ji snyam du sems/_chos gang med cing mi dmigs pa de sgyu ma'i skyes bu yin nam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_'jam dpal 'di ji snyam du sems ci sgyu ma'i skyes 
[\[236a.4\]]bu yod dam/_'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_'jam dpal de bzhin du rnam par thar pa brgyad po de lta bu la gnas te nga bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs 
[\[236a.5\]]rgyas te/_de ni yid kyi yang dag par bgro ba'i dri ba'o/_/'jam dpal gzhan yang shar phyogs logs na de bzhin gshegs pa 'od kyi dkyil 'khor mngon par 'phags pa'i me tog dpal gyi gzi brjid rgyal po zhes bya ba de la ngas 'di skad ces smras so/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[236a.6\]]'od kyi dkyil 'khor mngon par 'phags pa'i me tog dpal gyi gzi brjid rgyal pos gang la gnas te bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas/_de skad ces smras pa dang /_des nga la 'di skad ces smras so/_/gzugs dang /_tshor ba 
[\[236a.7\]]dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams gang la gnas pa dang /_rnam par shes pa gang la gnas pa de la gnas te kho bo bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/_/'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[236b\]]
[\[236b.1\]]gzugs dang /_tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa dag gang na gnas lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_'jam dpal 'di ji snyam du sems/_phung po lnga ma gtogs par phung po lnga gang la gnas pa'i chos 'ga' zhig 'di na yod dam/_
[\[236b.2\]]'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_'jam dpal 'di ji snyam du sems/_gzugs kyi ngo bo nyid gang yin pa de gzugs la gnas pa yin nam/_'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[236b.3\]]de ni ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_'jam dpal 'di ji snyam du sems/_tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams gang dag yin pa dang /_rnam par shes pa'i ngo bo nyid gang yin pa de rnam par shes pa la gnas pa yin nam/_gsol pa/_
[\[236b.4\]]de ni ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_'jam dpal 'di ji snyam du sems/_gzugs dang /_tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa mi gnas pa yin nam/_'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta 
[\[236b.5\]]lags te/_bcom ldan 'das gzugs dang /_tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa ni mi gnas pa lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_'jam dpal de bzhin du rnam par rig pa'i ngo bo nyid gang yin pa de ni rnam 
[\[236b.6\]]par rig pa med pa yin la/_rnam par rig pa med pa gang yin pa de ni byang chub ste/_gzugs dang /_tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa yang de lta bu la gnas pa'o/_/'jam dpal gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa 'od kyi dkyil 'khor 
[\[236b.7\]]mngon par 'phags pa'i me tog dpal gyi gzi brjid rgyal po des nga la 'di skad ces smras so/_/de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya'i rgyal po'i gtso bo shAkya thub pas gang la gnas te bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas/_de skad ces 
[\[237a\]]
[\[237a.1\]]smras pa dang /_de la ngas 'di skad ces smras so/_/chos thams cad zad pa med pa/_nam mkha'i mtha' dang mnyam pa de ni byang chub ste/_de lta bu la gnas nas kho bo bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/_/chos thams cad ni 
[\[237a.2\]]de lta bu la gnas pa ste/_de ni yid kyi yang dag par bgro ba'i dri ba'o/_/bstan pa 'di bshad pa na stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rnam pa drug tu rab tu g.yos so/_/'gul to/_/ldeg go/_/'khrugs so/_/'ur 'ur ro/_/chem chem mo/_/thams cad dang ldan pa'i stong 
[\[237a.3\]]gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams snang ba chen pos khyab par gyur to/_/'jig rten gyi bar mun pa mun nag gang na nyi ma dang zla ba 'di gnyis 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul che ba/_'di ltar mthu che ba/_'di ltar gza brjid che ba'i 'od kyis snang bar ma nus pa dang /_gzi brjid kyis gzi 
[\[237a.4\]]byin can du ma nus pa dang /_snang bas snang bar ma nus pa dang /_gsal bas gsal zhing snang bar ma nus pa gang dag yin pa 'jig rten gyi bar de dag thams cad skad cig de nyid dang /_thang cig de nyid dang /_yud tsam de nyid la snang bas khyab par gyur to/_/de nas de'i tshe bcom 
[\[237a.5\]]ldan 'das 'dzum pa mdzad de/_'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams gang gi tshe 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i chos nyid de/_de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal gyi sgo nas 'od zer kha dog sna tshogs kha dog du ma 'di lta ste/_sngon po dang /_ser po dang /_dmar po dang /_dkar po dang /_
[\[237a.6\]]btsod ka dang /_shel dang /_dngul gyi kha dog lta bu dag byung nas/_de dag gis 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas mu med pa dag 'od kyis khyab par byas te/_tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar du song nas slar log ste/_bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas 
[\[237a.7\]]nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug tu mi snang bar gyur to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe g.yas phyogs logs su glang po che'i lta stangs kyis gzigs nas/_tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo 'khor 'di ni dag pa ste/_gtsang ba 
[\[237b\]]
[\[237b.1\]]snying po la gnas pa'o/_/kun dga' bo bstan pa 'di bshad pa na dge slong lnga brgya ni len pa med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol lo/_/kun dga' bo rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal 'di na dge slong ji snyed cig gnas pa kun dga' bo de dag gi nang nas chos 'di dag la gang the tsom za ba 
[\[237b.2\]]'am/_yid gnyis za ba'am/_som nyi za ba'i dge slong 'ga' yang ma byung ngo /_/byang chub sems dpa' lnga stong gis mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to/_/srog chags stong phrag du mas ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed de/_de dag thams cad 
[\[237b.3\]]kyang ma 'ongs pa'i dus na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun du brjod ces bya bar ming 'thun pa nyid du 'gyur ro zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis lung bstan to/_/de dag gi tshe'i tshad ni bskal pa gcig thub par 'gyur ro/_/de dag gi dam pa'i 
[\[237b.4\]]chos ni bskal pa phyed kyi bar du gnas par 'gyur ro/_/de nas yul ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal 'di snyam du sems par gyur to/_/bdag gis ni bcom ldan 'das yun ring zhig tu ma mthong bas/_bdag gis bcom ldan 'das la phyag bya ba dang /_blta ba dang /_bsnyen bkur 
[\[237b.5\]]bya ba'i phyir/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der 'gro bar bya'o snyam mo/_/de nas yul ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis de'i tshe sna chen po la gtogs pa dbyibs ring la smras pa/_bcom ldan 'das la phyag bya ba dang /_blta ba dang /_bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir 'dong dgos kyis nga'i 
[\[237b.6\]]shing rta bzhon pa bzang po dang ldan pa thog mar sbyor cig_/yang yul ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis de'i tshe sna chen po la gtogs pa dpal mchog la smras pa/_bcom ldan 'das la phyag bya ba dang /_blta ba dang /_bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir 'dong dgos kyis/_dpal 
[\[237b.7\]]mchog khyod song la yan lag bzhi pa'i dpung gi tshogs dag shoms shig ces bsgo shig_/yang yul ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis btsun mo dam pa la smras pa/_bcom ldan 'das la phyag bya ba dang /_blta ba dang /_bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir khyod kyang 'dong ngo zhes smras 
[\[238a\]]
[\[238a.1\]]so/_/yang yul ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis gzhon nu sa gso byin la smras pa/_gzhon nu sa gso byin khyod song la [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]'dzin gyi ma la rgyal po gsal rgyal na re bcom ldan 'das la phyag bya ba dang /_blta ba dang /_bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir 'dong dgos so zhes 
[\[238a.2\]]sbron cig_/de nas yul ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis sna chen po la gtogs pa rtsis pa sa ga bzang po la smras pa/_sa ga bzang po khyod song la grong khyer chen po mnyan yod kyi mi de dag thams cad kyang char gzhug cing /_ljongs kyi mi dang /_grong rdal ba'i mi thams cad la yang 
[\[238a.3\]]rkang tang pas kyang rkang tang pa dang /_bzhi mdo bas kyang bzhi mdo ba dang /_sum mdo bas kyang sum mdo ba dang /_shing rta pas kyang shing rta pa la yul ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal na re/_bcom ldan 'das la phyag bya ba dang /_blta ba dang /_bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir 'dong dgos kyi cha 
[\[238a.4\]]rdzas gyis shig ces sbron cig_/sna chen po la gtogs pa thams cad la yang sbron cig_/khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin la yang sbron cig_/khyim bdag ded dpon bzang po la yang sbron cig_/khyim bdag sa ga la yang sbron cig_/khyim bdag klu dga' la yang sbron cig_/tshong pa dang /_
[\[238a.5\]]khyim bdag thams cad la yang sbron cig_/khyim bdag bsod nams dpal byung la yang sbron cig_/khyim bdag bsod nams dpal la yang sbron cig_/khyim bdag bsod nams dpal gyi snying po dang /_gces min gyis byin dang /[ {]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]'dzin dang /_'phel byed dang /_sa gso 
[\[238a.6\]]byin rnams la yang sbron cig_/khyim bdag dpa' bo dpal dang /_dpa' bo'i 'gros kyis 'gro ba dang /_dga' byed dang /_dag pa'i sems dang /_don grub dang /_kun 'dzin rnams la yang sbron cig_/khyim bdag bkod pa'i mchog la yang sbron cig_/khyim bdag rna gtsug 
[\[238a.7\]]la yang sbron cig_/khyim bdag rna cha can la yang sbron cig_/khyim bdag me tog rna can la yang sbron cig_/bcom ldan 'das la phyag bya ba dang /_blta ba dang /_bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir 'dong dgos kyis/_yul ko sa la'i rgyal pos bka' stsal pa bzhin de ltar go ma 
[\[238b\]]
[\[238b.1\]]thag tu grogs po dag deng shig_/grogs po dag deng shig_/de ltar sna chen po la gtogs pa rtsis pa sa ga bzang pos kyang rgyal po chen po'i ltar mnyan nas rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis ji skad bsgo ba bzhin bsgrags so/_/de nas btsun mo phreng thogs kyis bran mo dpal bzang mo dang /_
[\[238b.2\]]bran mo me tog dpal dang /_bran mo dpal dga' mo rnams la smras pa/_khyod deng la nga na re khyim bdag gi chung ma rab tu rtog byed la/_bcom ldan 'das la phyag bya ba dang /_blta ba dang /_bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir 'dong dgos so zhes sbron cig_/nga'i tshig gis khyim bdag gi chung ma zla ba 
[\[238b.3\]]dang /_dri med dang /_bde dpal dang /_'phags ma dang /_kun shes dang /_dpe med dpal dang /_bkod mchog ma dang /_zla [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]ma dang /_dri med ldan rnams la yang sbron cig_/gnang chen mo de dag gis jo mo legs so zhes jo mo'i ltar mnyan nas ji skad bsgo ba bzhin sbran to/_/
[\[238b.4\]]de nas sna chen po la gtogs pa dbyibs ring gis rgyal po gsal rgyal gyi bzhon pa bzang po bshams so/_/bshams nas kyang yul ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal ga la ba der song ste phyin nas 'di skad ces smras so/_/lha'i bcibs pa bzang po ni bshams lags so/_/de nas yul 
[\[238b.5\]]ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis/_bcom ldan 'das la phyag bya ba dang /_blta ba dang /_bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir bzhon pa bzang po la zhon te/_rgyal po chen po'i mthu dang /_rgyal po chen po'i rdzu 'phrul gyis btsun mo'i 'khor gyi nang na gnas shing /_btsun mo'i 'khor 
[\[238b.6\]]gyis mdun gyis ni bltas/_ljongs kyi mi dang /_grong rdal bas ni bskor/_yan lag bzhi pa'i dpung gi tshogs kyis ni mdun gyis bltas/_me tog dang /_me tog phreng dang /_bdug pa dang /_dri dang /_phreng ba dang /_byug pa dang /_phye ma dang /_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_
[\[238b.7\]]ba dan dang /_gos dag ni thogs/_rin po che'i gos rin tang med pa dag ni khyer/_rin po che'i gos rgya che zhing yangs pa dag ni bgos/_shing rta stong phrag drug khri dang /_khyogs pa stong phrag drug khri dang /_rkang tang pa stong phrag drug khris ni bskor/_ba dan stong phrag drug khri 
[\[239a\]]
[\[239a.1\]]ni bsgreng /_rol mo'i sgra stong phrag drug khri dang /_rnga bo che dang /_sil snyan gyi sgra du ma dag ni sgrogs shing /_rgyal po chen po de'i mthus grong khyer chen po mnyan yod du dong ngo /_/de nas yul ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal bzhon pa la ji srid bzhon du rung ba de srid du bzhon pas 
[\[239a.2\]]song ste/_bzhon pa las babs nas yul na mthu dang /_brtson 'grus thob pa/_rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur bas rgyal po'i rtags lnga po gang dag yin pa 'di lta ste/_ral gri rin po che dang /_gdugs rin po che dang /_cod pan rin po che dang /_bsil yab rin po che dang mchil 
[\[239a.3\]]lham nor bu rin po che las byas pa ste/_de dag thams cad phud cing bzhag nas rkang pas rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal du song ngo /_/de nas ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal na sgra chung bar rig nas sna chen po la gtogs pa dbyibs ring la smras pa/_dbyibs ring 
[\[239a.4\]]'di ltar 'di ni bsam gtan pa gnas med pa rnams kyi gnas so/_/rnal 'byor pa dben pa la dga' ba rnams dang /_stong pa nyid la gnas pa rnams dang /_mtshan ma med pa la gnas pa rnams dang /_smon pa med pa la gnas pa rnams kyi gnas so/_/bsam gtan pa mi gnas 
[\[239a.5\]]pa rnams kyi gnas te/_phas kyi rgol ba rnams kyis kyang stong la gnas pa rnam pa de lta bu de dag dang /_sgra chung ba dang /_dben pa 'dis gnas so/_/de nas yul ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis sa ga gzhon nu dpal la smras pa/_sa ga gzhon nu dpal nga'i 'khor rnams 
[\[239a.6\]]gcom bskyungs shig_/de nas yul ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis/_bcom ldan 'das thams cad mkhyen pa/_thams cad gzigs pa/_rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal na dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis bskor te/_dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis mdun gyis bltas shing /_lha'i 
[\[239a.7\]]'khor mang pos bskor nas mdun gyis bltas pa la chos ston cing bzhugs pa mthong ngo /_/de nas yul ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal dga' ba dang /_mchog tu dga' ba skyes nas de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsol to/_/snang zhing gsal bar mdzad pa 'od mdzad pa/_/
[\[239b\]]
[\[239b.1\]]phas kyi rgol ba kun gyis mi g.yos shing /_/'khor gyi nang na zla ba nya ba ltar/_/gang zag dam pa rnam par lam mer bzhugs/_/chos kyi dam pa ston par mdzad pa na/_/phyogs bcu kun tu khyod ni tha le zhing /_/bdud kyi sde dpon ma lus rab bcom nas/_/gser gyi ri bo 'phags bzhin lam mer gda'/_/
[\[239b.2\]]klu yi bdag po mi g.yos gnas pa ltar/_/gau ta ma'i nyan thos mi pham lags/_/zhi gnas dgyes kyi sras rnams zhi gnas dga'/_/de dag nang na rgyal ba gsung tshe mdzes/_/yon tan yang dag ston pa 'jig rten grags/_/de ltar rgyal ba shAka thub lam mer bzhugs/_/ji ltar ri rab rgya mtsho'i nang 
[\[239b.3\]]'phags shing /_/rin chen sna tshogs rnams kyis mdzes pa ltar/_/de bzhin shAkya khyu mchog 'jig rten 'phags/_/sems can kun las khyod 'phags lam mer bzhugs/_/ji ltar pad ma chus ni mi gos ltar/_/de bzhin 'jig rten dag na ma gos bzhugs/_/ji ltar ri rab rtag tu 
[\[239b.4\]]brgyan pa ltar/_/khyod ni yang dag 'phags pas kun tu mdzes/_/de ltar rgyal ba mkhas pa rnams kyis bskor/_/lha dang bcas pa'i 'khor nang mngon par 'phags/_/sum cu rtsa gsum gnas na yongs 'du shing /_/me tog legs chas 'phags mdzes lhag ge ltar/_/de bzhin lha 
[\[239b.5\]]dang bcas pa'i 'khor nang na/_/shAkya khyu mchog mtshan gyis rnam par mdzes/_/'od gsal zur brgyad nor bu bai dUr+ya/_/du gul ka shi gos kyi steng bzhag na/_/kun gyis mi gos lta bur dgra bcom rnams/_/me long bzhin du sems dag dri ma med/_/khyod kyi nyan thos de dag ni/_/
[\[239b.6\]]byams pa shin tu bsgoms nas gnas/_/nyan thos brtan rnams ye shes dga'/_/nyon mongs ma mchis gdams ngag ston/_/rgyal po 'dir ni mchis pa yang /_/de dag rnams kyis ma tshor lags/_/gang gi nyan thos de dag ni/_/zhi zhing chos kun mi gnas pa/_/cang mkhyen khyod la 
[\[239b.7\]]phyag 'tshal lo/_/skyes mchog khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/_/ye shes kyis ni sku bsgoms shing /_/ye shes sku yis zhugs pa lags/_/ye shes sku yis rdzogs sangs rgyas/_/sku yis zla ba gsum du bzhugs/_/rdzogs sangs rgyas pa smra rnams mchog_/ye shes ldan pa 
[\[240a\]]
[\[240a.1\]]rtag tu mdzes/_/phyi ma'i dus na ye shes las/_/nyams 'gyur dge slong rnams kyang 'byung /_/rgod cing dbang po phal pa dang /_/rgod pa'i dge slong mkhyen nas ni/_/bsod snyoms gcig gis zla gsum du/_/rgyal ba ting nge 'dzin la bzhugs/_/phyi ma'i dus na zang zing la/_/brkam 
[\[240a.2\]]chags dge slong rnams 'byung bas/_/bsod snyoms gcig gis zla gsum du/_/rgyal ba ting nge 'dzin la bzhugs/_/phyi ma'i dus kyi dge slong phyir/_/khyod kyis de skad bka' stsal te/_/de tshe gang dag dad pa rnams/_/bstan pa 'di la bslabs pa 'byung /_/sems can gang dag ma dad pa/_/chos 'di dag 
[\[240a.3\]]ni thos nas kyang /_/de dag dga' bar mi 'gyur bas/_/de dag bskul phyir 'di mdzad do//_//bam po gnyis pa/_de nas yul ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_bcom ldan 'das la dang ba'i sems 
[\[240a.4\]]kyis yang bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_dang ba'i sems kyis bcom ldan 'das mthong nas/_yang bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag ni yul ko sa 
[\[240a.5\]]la'i rgyal po lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag ni yul ko sa la'i rgyal po lags te/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal lags so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yul ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal la bka' stsal pa/_rgyal po chen pos bkur sti byas 
[\[240a.6\]]pa dang /_ri mo byas pa dang /_mchod pa byas pas chog gis longs shig_/longs la rgyal po chen po rang gi stan la 'dug shig_/de nas yul ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal spyan snga na 'dug cing /_bcom ldan 'das la mig mi 'dzums pas bltas so/_/bltas nas kyang rin po che'i 
[\[240a.7\]]gos rin tang med pa lag na thogs thogs pa dang /_rang gi lus la gos gyon gyon pa gang yin pa de lus las phud de bcom ldan 'das la phul lo/_/phul nas kyang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag gi gos rin po che 'di ni sngon gyi las kyi rnam par 
[\[240b\]]
[\[240b.1\]]smin pa las grub pa/_ma smad pa/_bzang ba/_kha na ma tho ba ma mchis pa/_rang gi lus la 'tshal 'tshal ba lags te/_'di bdag gi dbang phyug gis su las phrogs pa yang ma mchis kyi/_sngon legs par spyad pa las mngon par grub pa lags na/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bzhes su gsol/_
[\[240b.2\]]de nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin 'di snyam du sems par gyur te/_'di ltar yul ko sa la'i rgyal po 'dis gos rin po che yongs su spyad spyad pa 'di bcom ldan 'das la phul lo snyam mo/_/de nas yul ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal bcom ldan 'das kyi mthus khyim bdag mgon med 
[\[240b.3\]]zas sbyin gyi sems kyi rtog pa sems kyis shes nas/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag gi gos rin po che 'di snga nas bcom ldan 'das la dbul lo snyam pa'i sems de lta bu ni ma skyes lags kyi/_bcom ldan 'das mthong nas ni sems skyes 
[\[240b.4\]]lags na thugs brtse ba'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis gos rin po che 'di bzhes su gsol/_bcom ldan 'das sems 'di ni myur du 'gyur ba lags la/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa de dag ni rnyed par dka' ste/_u dum ba ra'i me tog bzhin du mchog tu rnyed par 
[\[240b.5\]]dka' bas dbul lo snyam pa de skyes lags so/_/bdag gis bcom ldan 'das mnyes par bgyis nas de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsol to/_/khyod ni rkang gnyis gtso bo ste/_/bsod nams gzi brjid kun tu 'phags/_/nyon mongs can sems ma gtogs par/_/mthong 
[\[240b.6\]]na dga' ba su mi skyed/_/sems can ma rungs gang dag gis/_/thub dbang ma mchod de dag brlag_/u dum ba ra'i me tog ltar/_/gsal mdzad 'jig rten dag na dkon/_/shAkya seng ge mi yi mchog_/mgon po bdag gis deng mnyes kyis/_/ye shes la ni bdag smon pas/_/
[\[240b.7\]]khyod la deng ni mchod pa bgyid/_/byang chub ye shes gang 'dod pa/_/sangs rgyas rnams la mchod 'di lags/_/sangs rgyas ye shes ched kyi phyir/_/mi mchog la ni mchod bgyid na/_/mgon po bdag gis bzhes su gsol/_/rgyal ba bdag gis bzhes su gsol/_/sems 
[\[241a\]]
[\[241a.1\]]can kun gyi don slad du/_/khyod la bdag ni na bza' 'bul/_/bdag gis sems ni tshar bcad cing /_/bdag gis ser sna bcom pas na/_/chos rnams bskyed pa'i ched kyi phyir/_/bdag gis sems la gtong ba skyes/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yul ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal 
[\[241a.2\]]rgyal gyis na bza' phul ba bzhes nas rgyal po gsal rgyal la bka' stsal pa/_rgyal po chen po khyod kyis sems bskyed pa rgya chen po skyes pa legs so legs so/_/rgyal po chen po de'i phyir chos bzhi po dag la brtson par bya ste/_bzhi gang zhe na/_rgyal po chen po 'di lta ste/_rgyal po rgyal 
[\[241a.3\]]rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba yul na mthu dang brtson 'grus thob pas dge sbyong dang /_bram ze tshul khrims dang ldan pa'i thad du 'gro bar bya zhing yongs su dri bar bya ba dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa bsrung ba dang bskyab pa'i phyir bsgrub par bya ba dang /_zab mo la mos pas chos btsal bar bya 
[\[241a.4\]]ba'i phyir spro bar bya ba dang /_log par lta ba dang bral bas yang dag pa nyid du nges par bya ba'i phyir spro bar bya ba ste/_rgyal po chen po chos bzhi po de dag la brtson par bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_bde bar gshegs pas de skad gsungs te/_ston pas 
[\[241a.5\]]gzhan yang 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/dge slong tshul khrims ldan rnams la/_/gus pa dag ni rtag byed cing /_/dngos po kun gyis 'dri byed pa/_/des ni shes rab rnam par 'phel/_/dge slong rnams la gus pa dag_/byas pa'i las ni dge ba yi/_/ji ltar dag pa de bzhin du/_/
[\[241a.6\]]de yi sems ni dag par 'gyur/_/bstan pa bsrung ba byas pa ni/_/rtag tu kun nas bsrung ba yin/_/yan lag dang po 'di yis ni/_/lus ni nges par dag par 'gyur/_/rgyal rigs dag gis zab mo'i chos/_/rtag tu nyan cing 'dug byed na/_/phyir zhing thos par 'dod 'gyur zhing /_/yang 
[\[241a.7\]]dang yang du tshol bar 'gyur/_/zab mo'i chos ni thos nas kyang /_/log pa dag ni spyod mi byed/_/rgyal po log par lta bral zhing /_/yang dag chos ni shes par 'gyur/_/zab mo'i chos ni shes nas kyang /_/de ni log par mi spyod cing /_/sdig pa kun dang bral bas na/_/des na rgyal po khyad 
[\[241b\]]
[\[241b.1\]]par 'phags/_/chos kyi dam pa bzhi po la/_/rgyal rigs bzhi po rtag par ni/_/'gro ba ngan par de mi 'gro/_/de la bde 'gro rnyed mi dka'/_/sangs rgyas myur du mthong 'gyur zhing /_/de las chos kyang nyan byed la/_/rdzogs sangs rgyas kyis bshad pa yi/_/zab mo'i chos ni shes par 
[\[241b.2\]]'gyur/_/chos bzhi dag la rten byed cing /_/sems kyis byang chub sngo byed na/_/yar gyi ngo yi zla ba ltar/_/de yi ye shes 'phel bar 'gyur/_/sems kyis byang chub sngo byed cing /_/chos mchog dag ni tshol byed na/_/rkang gnyis dam pa rdzogs sangs rgyas/_/'jig rten dam par de 'os so/_/
[\[241b.3\]]chos nams kun gyi dam pa ste/_/chos mchog dag ni ston pa po/_/de la mchod pa byas nas ni/_/theg pa mchog tu nges par 'gyur/_/rgyal po rgyal rigs gang zhig ni/_/chos kyi dam pa tshol 'dod pa/_/yang dang yang du chos kyi mchog_/chos bzhi po la sten par byos/_/rgyal po chen 
[\[241b.4\]]po gzhan yang mchog 'os ni sems can rnams kyi phyir chos kyi mchog rnam par 'byed do/_/rgyal po chen po chos kyi mchog gang zhe na/_rgyal po chen po chos kyi mchog ni chos thams cad gzung bar bya ba ma yin pa'o/_/sus gzung bar bya ba ma yin zhe na/_/rgyal po chen po sus kyang mi 
[\[241b.5\]]'dzin pa de'i phyir chos thams cad gzung bar bya ba ma yin no zhes bya'o/_/rgyal po chen po chos thams cad chos thams cad ces bya ba ji lta bu zhe na/_rgyal po chen po chos de dag thams cad ni chos ma yin te/_des na chos thams cad chos thams cad ces bya'o/_/de dag chos ma yin 
[\[241b.6\]]pa ji lta bu zhe na/_rgyal po chen po gang ji tsam du spyod pa de tsam du chos kyi 'du shes ma yin no/_/rgyal po chen po chos kyi 'du shes ma yin pa zhes bya ba ni mi shes pa 'byung ba'o/_/gal te 'du shes su dmigs na 'du shes ma yin par 'gyur ro/_/rgyal po chen po 'du shes gzhan du gyur 
[\[241b.7\]]na 'du shes ma yin par 'gyur te/_rgyal po chen po 'du shes zhes bya ba 'di ni brda'o/_/rgyal po chen po 'du shes zhes bya ba 'di ni chags pa'o/_/rgyal po chen po 'du shes yod na byis pa zhes bya'o/_/rgyal po chen po byis pa zhes bya ba ni byis pa gnas par byed pa'o/_/ci'i phyir 
[\[242a\]]
[\[242a.1\]]byis pa gnas par byed pa zhes bya zhe na/_byis pa gnas par byed pa'i phyir ro/_/ci nas gnas par byed ce na/_'du shes gnas par byed do/_/'du shes de gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_bdag tu 'du shes pa dang /_srid par 'du shes pa dang /_sems can du 'du shes pa 
[\[242a.2\]]dang /_gzugs su 'du shes pa nas rnam par shes par 'du shes pa'i bar dang /_mig tu 'du shes pa dang /_rna bar 'du shes pa dang /_snar 'du shes pa dang /_lcer 'du shes pa dang /_lus su 'du shes pa dang /_yid du 'du shes pa nas 'du shes thams cad kyi bar du gnas par 
[\[242a.3\]]byed cing /_tha na mya ngan las 'das par 'du shes par yang gnas par byed do/_/rgyal po chen po mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bya ba ci'i phyir mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bya zhe na/_mya ngan las 'das par 'du shes pa ste/_rgyal po chen po mya ngan las 'das par 'du shes pa ni med pa'o/_/rgyal 
[\[242a.4\]]po chen po byis pa mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bya ba ni 'khor lo'i tshul dang /_chu klung 'khyil pa'i tshul gyis so/_/rgyal po chen po tshul zhes bya ba ci'i phyir tshul zhe na/_spyod yul ma yin pa ste/_gang na su'i spyod yul yang ma yin pa'o/_/su'i spyod yul yang ma yin pa ni 'du shes kyi 
[\[242a.5\]]spyod yul ma yin pa'o/_/rgyal po chen po spyod yul zhes bya ba ci'i phyir spyod yul zhes bya zhe na/_sems de dang /_spyod pa chen po de dang /_yang dag pa ma yin pa'i spyod pa sbed par byed pa'o/_/yang dag pa ma yin pa gang zhe na/_gang de kho na ma yin pa ni yang dag pa ma yin pa'o/_/de la yod 
[\[242a.6\]]pa ma yin pa zhes brjod pa ni thams cad yang dag pa ma yin pa ste/_des na yod pa ma yin pa zhes bya'o/_/rgyal po chen po yod pa ma yin pa zhes bya ba ci'i phyir yod pa ma yin pa zhes bya zhe na/_rgyal po chen po dngos po med do/_/yang dag pa ma yin pa ci'i phyir dngos po med ce na/_yang dag pa 
[\[242a.7\]]ma yin pa ni mi rtag pa'o/_/yang dag pa ma yin pa ni mi sdug pa'o/_/yang dag pa ma yin pa ni bdag med pa'o/_/yang dag pa ma yin pa ni srid pa mi gtsang ba'o/_/gang mi dben pa de ni yang dag pa ma yin pa'o/_/rgyal po chen po de bzhin du de ni phyin ci log yin no/_/ci'i phyir phyin ci log ces 
[\[242b\]]
[\[242b.1\]]bya zhe na/_rgyal po chen po phyin ci log ni tshu rol na yang med/_pha rol na yang med/_gnyi ga'i bar na yang med na/_rgyal po chen po de ni 'du shes lta ga la yod/_'du shes de gang zhe na/_mi rtag par 'du shes pa dang /_sdug bsngal bar 'du shes pa dang /_bdag med par 'du shes pa dang /_mi 
[\[242b.2\]]sdug par 'du shes pa'o/_/rgyal po chen po ci'i phyir 'du shes tshu rol na yang med/_pha rol na yang med/_gnyi ga'i bar na yang med ce na/_mi rtag par 'du shes pa ni rtag pa kho nar 'du shes par ltos shig_/rgyal po chen po ji skad du bstan par 'gyur zhe na/_gnyi ga'i bar zhes bya ba ci'i phyir gnyi ga'i bar
