[\[262a.4\]]pa/_gzhon nu pad ma dpal gyi snying pos bstan pa 'di bshad pa na srog chags sum khri byang chub kyi phyir yang dag par zhugs so/_/kun dga' bo deng bstan pa 'di'i dbang du byas nas nga'i thad nas byang chub kyi phyir zhugs pa dag khyod kyis mthong ngam/_khyim bdag 'di rnams ni 'di 
[\[262a.5\]]nas shi 'phos ma thag tu sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams su skye bar 'gyur ro/_/de dag de nas shi 'phos nas kyang phyi ma'i dus lnga brgya pa tha ma la de dag 'dzam bu'i gling du mi rnams dang skal ba mnyam par skye bar 'gyur ro/_/de dag 'dzam bu'i gling du skyes pa'i mod la chos kyi 
[\[262a.6\]]rnam grangs 'di yang nyan par 'gyur ro/_/de nas srog chags sum khri po de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bdag cag gis kyang slad ma'i tshe slad ma'i dus na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad par bgyi'o/_/de'i tshe de'i dus na 'khor de nyid na dge slong lnga brgya 
[\[262a.7\]]tsam zhig 'dus shing 'dug par gyur pa de dag thams cad stan las langs te/_bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di byin gyis brlab tu gsol/_bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis kyang slad ma'i tshe slad ma'i dus na chos kyi rnam 
[\[262b\]]
[\[262b.1\]]grangs 'di rgyas par bgyi'o/_/de'i tshe de'i dus na lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang /_mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang /_rgyal po chen po bzhi dag 'dus shing 'dug par gyur te/_de dag gis kyang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis chos kyi rnam 
[\[262b.2\]]grangs 'di byin gyis brlab tu gsol/_bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis ni chos smra ba de dag bsrung zhing bskyab par bgyi'o/_/brtson par bgyi'o/_/kun tu bsrung bar bgyi'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das nyid kyi sku las 'od phyung ste/_'od re re las kyang sprul pa dag sprul to/_/
[\[262b.3\]]sprul pa re re pos kyang dge slong de dag la me tog dang /_spos rnam pa sna tshogs kyis gtor to/_/mngon par gtor to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yang rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du mdzad pa 'di lta bu mngon par 'du mdzad de/_khyim bdag gi bu bzang skyong dang /_ded dpon bzang 
[\[262b.4\]]po dang /_phug sbas dang /_sdong bus byin dang /_chu lha dang /_dbang pos byin dang /_rigs kyi bu mis byin dang /_skyes bu dam pa brgyad po de dag thams cad kyis shar phyogs logs na gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dang mnyam pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mthong bar 
[\[262b.5\]]'gyur ba de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du mdzad pa dag mngon par 'du mdzad do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs rgya chen po 'di bstan cing bshad pa na/_
[\[262b.6\]]khyim bdag brgyad po de dag gis kun tu snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin thos nas rab tu sgrogs par 'gyur ro/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to/_/kun dga' khyod kyis 'di dag na/_/dge slong brgyad po nga'i mdun na/_/ye 
[\[262b.7\]]shes chen po byin brlab gsol/_/thub pa chen po byin brlab gsol/_/mgon po bdag cag slad dus tshe/_/'di 'dra'i chos dag bshad bgyi zhes/_/thal mo sbyar nas chos kyi phyir/_/gsol ba 'debs pa mthong gyur tam/_/gang dang thabs cig bgro mdzad cing /_/
[\[263a\]]
[\[263a.1\]]gang na sangs rgyas gang sgrogs rnams/_/gang dag mdo 'di 'dzin byed pa/_/de la thams cad srung bar mdzad/_/gang dag blta dka' chos spyod pas/_/sangs rgyas de dag dang mi 'bral/_/gang zhig 'di ni lung nod pa/_/de bzhin nyid la gnas par 
[\[263a.2\]]'gyur/_/nga yis bgro ba bshad pa 'di/_/gang dag lung nod 'gyur ba rnams/_/de dag gi ni mdun na yang /_/sangs rgyas bzhugs shing zhal yang ston/_/sangs rgyas bgro ba gsungs 'di ni/_/gang dag lung nod 'gyur ba yi/_/dge slong de dang de dag 
[\[263a.3\]]rnams/_/nga yi chos srung skyong bar 'gyur/_/nga yis bgro ba bshad pa 'di/_/gang dag lung nod 'gyur ba rnams/_/de dag gis ni byang chub bzung /_/sangs rgyas rnams kyi mtha' yas mdzad/_/sangs rgyas bgro ba dam pa 'di/_/gang dag lung nod 'gyur ba 
[\[263a.4\]]rnams/_/sangs rgyas ye shes bla med la/_/de dag thams cad nges par gnas/_/sangs rgyas bgro ba dam pa 'di/_/gang dag lung nod 'gyur ba rnams/_/de dag gis ni bdud btul cing /_/byang chub snying por gnas pa yin/_/sangs rgyas bgro ba de bzhin nyid/_/'di 
[\[263a.5\]]ni gang dag lung nod pa/_/de dag gis ni bdud btul cing /_/byang chub snying por gnas pa yin/_/bstan pa de yang gzungs de yin/_/ting nge 'dzin kyang bstan pa yin/_/sems can de dag 'di dag bstan/_/sangs rgyas bden pa gzhan mi 'gyur/_/gang gis 
[\[263a.6\]]byang chub dag gi phyir/_/sangs rgyas 'di dag kun 'dod pa/_/des ni nga yis bshad pa yi/_/bgro ba 'di ni lung mnod bya/_/mi gang 'das pa'i rdzogs sangs rgyas/_/de dag lta bar 'dod pas ni/_/chos nyid ye shes chen po yi/_/bgro ba myur du lung mnod bya/_/
[\[263a.7\]]kha cig mdo 'di tshul la ni/_/spro bar byed pa de dag la/_/phyi dus tshe na nga yis ni/_/'di 'dra ba yi chos bshad bya/_/nga yi chos ni 'di 'dra dag_/thos nas bzung ste mang du thos/_/de dag gis ni ting nge 'dzin/_/snang byed ces bya de ring thob/_/phyi ma'i dus na de dag 
[\[263b\]]
[\[263b.1\]]gis/_/ting nge 'dzin la gnas nas ni/_/srog chags kun la phan pa'i phyir/_/nga yi chos ni 'dzin par 'gyur/_/de tshe gang dag kha cig gis/_/mdo 'di 'dzin 'gyur nga yis ni/_/de bzhin gshegs pa ma mthong zhes/_/the tsom dag ni bskyed mi bya/_/phyi dus ngan 'gro chen po ste/_/
[\[263b.2\]]de tshe gang dag mi rnams kyis/_/ting 'dzin ming ni nyan byed pa/_/thams cad nga yi mdun na 'khod/_/mdo 'di dag ni bsgrags pa yis/_/nga yi sras ni 'dir yod rnams/_/phyi dus dam chos 'jig pa'i tshe/_/de dag chos ni skyong bar 'gyur/_/gang dag kha cig mdo 'di ni/_/thob par 
[\[263b.3\]]bya phyir de tshe brtson/_/kun dga' de dag thams cad ni/_/sangs rgyas spyan gyis ngas mthong ngo /_/kun dga' de phyir khyod la ni/_/byang chub mchog ma gtad bya ste/_/srog chags rnams la bshad pa ltar/_/khyod la 'di ni gzhag par bya/_/kha cig mdo 'di bsrung ba'i phyir/_/
[\[263b.4\]]de tshe brtson par byed pa dag_/de dag gis ni nga bsrungs pas/_/sangs rgyas bsrungs pa'ang mtha' yas so/_/de ltar chos bsrungs byas pas ni/_/mi de dag ni bsrung bar 'gyur/_/mdo 'di phyogs bzhir de dag gis/_/btsal kyang rnyed par ma gyur la/_/ngas bstan pa 
[\[263b.5\]]yi sangs rgyas gang /_/phyogs bcu dag na gang rnams dag_/de ltar sangs rgyas de dag la/_/sbyin pa bsam mi khyab pa phul/_/rnam smin de dag ji snyed pa/_/ngas bshad pa ni mnyan par gyis/_/mdo 'di rnyed par ma gyur pa/_/rnyed par gyur na smos ci dgos/_/sangs rgyas 
[\[263b.6\]]zhing 'di thams cad dag_/ma lus par ni mi zhig gis/_/ji ltar bye mas byur bur ni/_/rab tu bkang bar gyur pa dag_/skyes bu la las de dag kun/_/shar phyogs logs su de dag 'dor/_/bye ma'i rdul ni re re nas/_/lag pa gcig gis blangs nas kyang /_/'jig rten khams 
[\[263b.7\]]dag mtha' yas pa'i/_/'jig rten khams ni de dag tu/_/bye ma'i rdul ni ji snyed nyid/_/ma lus par ni 'jog byed pa/_/de bzhin du ni sbyar byas pa/_/mkhas pa gang gis mi shes na/_/bye ma dag gi rdul gyur pa/_/'jig rten khams su bgrang bya ste/_/de bzhin lho phyogs dag tu yang /_/mi 
[\[264a\]]
[\[264a.1\]]dag gis ni 'dor bar byed/_/bye ma'i phung po ji snyed de/_/gang dag nga yis sngar bstan pa/_/de bzhin phyogs bzhi dag tu yang /_/mi yis bye ma 'dor bar byed/_/sngar ni ji snyed bstan pa yi/_/de snyed bye mar gyur pa dang /_/ji snyed bstan pa'i bye ma snyed/_/de snyed 'jig rten khams 
[\[264a.2\]]de dag_/'dir ni de dag thams cad kyang /_/grong khyer gru bzhi gcig gyur la/_/skyes bu la la byung bas ni/_/grong khyer brtsigs pa de dag tu/_/rin po che yis bkang byas te/_/skyob pa sangs rgyas rnams la phul/_/sbyin de de dag la phul bas/_/'jig rten mgon po bsam mi khyab/_/rkang 
[\[264a.3\]]gnyis gtso bor gyur cig ces/_/byang chub mchog tu smon par byed/_/de ni byang chub nyid tshol la/_/mdo 'di dag ni mi tshol te/_/ngas bshad pa yi bgro ba dag_/mdo 'di dag ni rnyed mi 'gyur/_/gang zhig mdo 'di tshol byed pa/_/de snyed bsod nams 'phel bar 'gyur/_/mang du thos pa 
[\[264a.4\]]kun dga' bo/_/'di las byang chub lhag par ni/_/bgro mdzad de bzhin dge slong dang /_/dge slong ma dag ngas lung bstan/_/ngas bshad pa yi bgro ba 'di/_/gang dag tshol byed de dag gis/_/nga sngon bram ze khye'u de'i tshe/_/gang gis byang chub phyir lung bstan/_/de tshe thog mar byang chub 
[\[264a.5\]]phyir/_/gang la bsod nams ngas bskrun pa/_/mar me zhes bya bsam mi khyab/_/ye shes ldan chen mthong ba yin/_/gang dag 'di lung nod de dag_/rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de mthong ngo /_/rtag par sems can kun bde phyir/_/grangs med bdun brgya rdzogs pa ste/_/gcig kyang ma 
[\[264a.6\]]tshang med par ni/_/byang chub ched du ngas btsal lo/_/mang thos nga dang lhan cig tu/_/de dag gis kyang bsod nams bskyed/_/gang dag 'di ni lung nod cing /_/byang chub mchog mar smon byed pa/_/de dag byang chub mi nyams shing /_/de dag byang chub dkon pa med/_/gang dag ngas bshad 
[\[264a.7\]]pa yi mdo/_/'di ni gang dag lung nod pa/_/de dag sangs rgyas byang chub rgyu/_/nga yin te ni the tshom med/_/gang dag phyi ma'i dus de tshe/_/mi rnams kyis ni tshul 'di mthong /_/phyi ma'i dus na dge slong dag_/sangs rgyas bya ba byed par 'gyur/_/ngas bstan pa yi bgro ba dag_/'di ni gang dag 
[\[264b\]]
[\[264b.1\]]'dzin 'gyur ba/_/kun dga'i de phyir de la ni/_/'di 'dra'i mdo dag ngas gtad bya/_/sangs rgyas kyis bshad bgro ba dag_/yul phyogs gang du 'di gsung ba/_/sa yi phyogs ni de dag tu/_/de tshe gnod sbyin mdangs 'phrogs pas/_/sems can rnams kyi mdangs mi 'phrog_/mang thos de ltar shes par 
[\[264b.2\]]gyis/_/gang dag dug dang bcas pa'i lus/_/yul phyogs su ni bskur bya ste/_/de na de dag dug med par/_/'gyur ba la ni the tshom med/_/sangs rgyas kyis bshad bgro ba dag_/mdo 'di gang du gsungs pa yi/_/sa phyogs de ni kun dga' bo/_/mchod rten gyur par shes par gyis/_/sngon gyi 
[\[264b.3\]]mgon po 'das pa ste/_/'jig rten snang byed gang dag gis/_/sa yi phyogs ni 'di nyid du/_/mdo 'di dag ni rab tu bshad/_/sems can mya ngan 'jigs byed pa/_/da ltar rdzogs sangs rgyas ngas kyang /_/sa yi phyogs ni 'di nyid du/_/mdo mchog dag ni bshad par bya/_/'jig rten mgon po bsam 
[\[264b.4\]]mi khyab/_/rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas byams pas kyang /_/sa yi phyogs ni 'di nyid du/_/mdo sde 'di ni 'chad par 'gyur/_/mang thos byams pa 'di yis ni/_/mdo 'di ston par byed pa na/_/ther 'bum brgyad cu tshang ba dag_/byang chub tu yang lung ston 'gyur/_/bdag ni gang gis yongs smin 
[\[264b.5\]]byas/_/kye ma'o sangs rgyas shAka thub ces/_/skad cig de la nga yi ming /_/rdzogs sangs rgyas kyis brjod par 'gyur/_/byams pa yi ni thang dag nas/_/srog chags bye ba grangs med pas/_/nga yi ming ni thos nas kyang /_/byang chub mchog tu smon par byed/_/skad cig de la sangs rgyas la/_/de 
[\[264b.6\]]bzhin gshegs pa byams pa yang /_/'dzum pa dag ni mdzad 'gyur zhing /_/de ni cho 'phrul bsam mi khyab/_/phyi ma'i dus na gang kha cig_/tshul 'di dag ni tshol byed pa/_/kun dga' de ni de yi tshe/_/byams dang phrad par lung bstan bya/_/shAkya seng ge de yis ni/_/mdo 'di bshad pa de mod la/_/srog 
[\[264b.7\]]chags stong phrag brgyad cu gang /_/byang chub la ni mngon par zhugs/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo dge slong chos bzhi dang ldan na sangs rgyas kyi byang chub spong bar byed de/_bzhi gang zhe na/_kun dga' bo 'di la dge slong lhag pa'i 
[\[265a\]]
[\[265a.1\]]nga rgyal can yin te/_lhag pa'i nga rgyal can des lhag pa'i nga rgyal med pa'i chos thos na skrag cing dngang la rab tu dngang bar 'gyur ro/_/g.yang sa chen por yang ltung bar 'gyur ro/_/des gting dpag med pa yang spong bar byed cing mi 'thun par smra la kun nas khro bar byed do/_/kun dga' bo 
[\[265a.2\]]gzhan yang dge slong de ni bdag tu mngon par zhen cing mtshams dral ba yin te kun dga' bo chos gnyis po 'di dang ldan pa'i dge slong ni sangs rgyas kyi byang chub spong bar byed cing mi 'thun par smra la kun nas khro bar byed do/_/kun dga' bo gzhan yang dge slong tshul khrims 'chal pa cho ga la log par 
[\[265a.3\]]zhugs pa yin te de tshul khrims 'chal pa dang ldan pas tshul khrims kyi gtam thos na zhum par 'gyur te kun dga' bo chos gsum po 'di dang ldan pa'i dge slong ni sangs rgyas kyi byang chub spong bar byed cing mi 'thun par smra la kun nas khro bar byed do/_/kun dga' bo gzhan yang dge slong dmigs par lta 
[\[265a.4\]]ba can bdag tu smra ba yin te des stong pa nyid kyi gtam thos na chags pa med pa la skrag cing dngang la rab tu dngang bar 'gyur te kun dga' bo chos bzhi po 'di dag dang ldan pa'i dge slong ni sangs rgyas kyi byang chub ni spong bar byed cing mi 'thun par smra la kun nas khro bar byed do/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de 
[\[265a.5\]]skad ces bka' stsal nas/_bde bar gshegs pas de skad gsungs te ston pas gzhan yang 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/dge slong lhag pa'i nga rgyal can/_/ma thob thob pa'i 'du shes can/_/de ni des na ngas bstan pa'i/_/zab pa'i chos ni spong bar byed/_/'jig rten rgyang pan 'dres pa yi/_/dge 
[\[265a.6\]]slong chos smra gang yin pas/_/ngas bstan pa yi mdo zab pa/_/'di ni rab tu spong bar byed/_/bdag tu smra ba'i dge slong gang /_/dmigs pa la ni rab gnas pas/_/bdag med chos dag thos nas kyang /_/nga yi bstan pa spong bar byed/_/dge slong tshul khrims 'chal pa gang /_/sdig pa'i chos can mi 
[\[265a.7\]]sdom pas/_/yo byad bsnyungs pa'i chos thos na/_/nga yi bstan pa spong bar byed/_/skyob pa shAkya seng ge nga'i/_/bstan pa shes rab 'chal pa yis/_/spangs nas kyang ni lus zhig nas/_/ngan 'gro rnams su skye bar 'gyur/_/kun dga' bo chos bzhi dang ldan pa'i dge slong gis de bzhin 
[\[265b\]]
[\[265b.1\]]gshegs pas thugs su chud pa'i chos 'dul ba dag thos na dga' ba dang mchog tu dga' ba rgya chen po dag rab tu thob par 'gyur ro/_/kun dga' bo 'di la bzhi gang zhe na/_dge slong lhag pa'i nga rgyal med pa can yin no/_/'jig rten rgyang pan pa dang ma 'dres pa yin no/_/gzhan dag la chos dag 
[\[265b.2\]]pa ston pa yin no/_/dmigs pa dang ldan pa ma yin no/_/bdag tu mngon par zhen pa ma yin no/_/dge ba'i chos can tshul khrims dang ldan pa yin no/_/kun dga' bo chos bzhi po 'di dag dang ldan pa'i dge slong gis de bzhin gshegs pas thugs su chud pa'i chos 'dul ba dag thos na dga' ba 
[\[265b.3\]]dang mchog tu dga' ba rgya chen po dag rab tu thob par 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_bde bar gshegs pas de skad gsungs te/_ston pas gzhan yang 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/dge slong nga rgyal med pa gang /_/yang dag chos la rab gnas des/_/
[\[265b.4\]]zab pa'i chos dag thos nas ni/_/dga' ba mtshungs med des 'thob bo/_/chos nyid zab pa thob nas kyang /_/yang dag chos la rab gnas pas/_/dman pa 'di ni rab bsgrags te/_/'jig rten rgyang pan sten mi byed/_/bdag med chos dag thos nas kyang /_/gcig tu myur bar zhum mi 
[\[265b.5\]]'gyur/_/zla ba yar gyi ngo ltar ni/_/de yi ye shes rnam par 'phel/_/bdag med chos dag thos nas kyang /_/gang gi the tshom yod min zhing /_/zla ba yar gyi ngo ltar ni/_/de yi ye shes rnam par 'phel/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_dge slong de dag dang /_lha dang /_mi dang /_
[\[265b.6\]]lha ma yin dang /_dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la yi rangs te mngon par bstod do//_//de bzhin gshegs pa bgro ba zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs sto//_//rgya gar gyi mkhan po dz+nyA na gar b+ha dang /_
[\[265b.7\]]lo ts+tsha ba ban de dpal gyi dbyangs kyis bsgyur cing /_zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban de dpal brtsegs kyis zhus te gtan la phab pa//_//
[\[266a\]]
[\[266a.1\]{D230}]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_ma hA san ni pA tAd ma hA yA na sU trAtata thA ga ta shrI sa ma ya na nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/_bod skad du/_'dus pa chen po theg pa chen po'i mdo sde las de bzhin gshegs pa'i dpal gyi dam tshig ces bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/_bam po dang po/_sangs rgyas 
[\[266a.2\]]dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das tshangs pa chen po'i phur bu mtha' yas mu med pa lung bstan pa/_drang srong rnams kyi gnas thub pa'i rten ri ther sgra la nyan thos kyi dge 'dun chen po la 'di lta ste/_bcom 
[\[266a.3\]]ldan 'das kyi nyan thos bgrang ba las 'das pa dag dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun chen po 'di lta ste/_phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad nas der 'dus pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bgrang ba las 'das pa dag dang thabs cig tu bzhugs so/_/de'i tshe 'khor 
[\[266a.4\]]'dus pa chen po de na dpal lha mo chen mo chos nyan pa'i phyir/_bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar thag mi ring ba zhig na 'dug go/_/de nas dpal lha mo chen mo stan las langs te/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun 
[\[266a.5\]]pa bcom ldan 'das 'di ni sbyin pa las byung ba'i bsod nams bgyi ba'i dngos po'i gzings kyis skye ba'i rgya mtsho las sgrol bar mi bgyid pa dag mchis lags so/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing nyon mongs pa can snyigs ma lnga dang ldan pa 'di na sems can bsod nams su gdags pa dang 
[\[266a.6\]]bral ba dag phal che lags te/_rgyu de dang rkyen des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag 'dir sems can rnams la snying rje chen po dag bskyed par bgyid lags so/_/'di na sems can rnams gang gis na rgyu ma mchis par smra zhing longs spyod dang bral la/_tshol khros sdug 
[\[266a.7\]]bsngal zhing nyam thag pa dang /_don ma mchis par 'bad pa de dag ni sbyin pa rnam par bged pa ma mchis par yongs su smin par bgyid pa'i rngo mi thogs te/_de lta bas na bdag cag gis sbyin pa'i go bgos te/_brtson 'grus brtsam par bgyi zhing /_'di ltar bdag cag gis sbyin 
[\[266b\]]
[\[266b.1\]]pa'i gzings kyis skye ba'i rgya mtsho las bsgral bar bgyi'o zhes byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag sbyin pa las byung ba'i bsod nams kun tu spyod par bgyi ba'i dngos pos/_sangs rgyas kyi ye shes kyi rgya mtsho bla na ma mchis pa la 'jug par bgyid pa nas chos kyi rgyal po bla na ma 
[\[266b.2\]]mchis par dbang bskur ba rab tu thob par bgyid pa'i bar du'o/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das 'di na sems can rtag par smra ba 'di dag longs spyod dang /_nye bar spyod pa rgya chen po dang bral la tshol khros sdug bsngal zhing nyam thag pa dag mchis te/_de dag tshul khrims rnam par 
[\[266b.3\]]bged pa ma mchis par yongs su smin par bgyid par rngo mi thogs pas/_'dir sems can rtag par smra ba rnams la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag snying rje chen po dag skyed par bgyid cing /_tshul khrims kyi go bgos pa'i gzings kyis sems can rtag par 
[\[266b.4\]]smra ba 'di dag skye ba'i rgya mtsho 'di las bsgral bar bgyi'o zhes byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag tshul khrims las byung ba'i bsod nams kun tu spyod par bgyid pa'i dngos pos sems can rnams dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam gyis yongs su smin par bgyid pa dang /_sangs 
[\[266b.5\]]rgyas kyi ye shes kyi rgya mtsho bla na ma mchis pa la 'jug par bgyid pa nas chos kyi rgyal po bla na ma mchis par dbang bskur ba rab tu thob par bgyid pa'i bar du'o/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das 'di na sems can gang dag phra ma dang /_tshig rtsub po dang /_chags sems dang /_gnod 
[\[266b.6\]]sems kun du spyod pa'i yid kyis de dag 'jig tshogs la lta ba dang ldan zhing longs spyod dang /_nye bar spyod pa dang bral la tshol khros sdug bsngal zhing nyam thag pa dag mchis te/_sems can de dag rab tu 'byung ba'i tshul khrims dang /_sdom pa ma mchis par yongs su 
[\[266b.7\]]smin par bgyid par rngo mi thogs pas sems can phra ma dang /_tshig rtsub po dang /_chags sems dang /_gnod sems kun tu spyod cing /_'jig tshogs la lta ba dang ldan pa yang ba spyod pa de dag la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag snying rje chen po dag skyed par bgyid 
[\[267a\]]
[\[267a.1\]]de/_bcom ldan 'das sems can de dag mi rtag pa'i tshul gyis bstan pa la 'jug par bgyid pa dang /_rab tu 'byung ba'i sdom pas sems can rnams yongs su smin par bgyid pa yang bdag cag gis bzod pa dang /_brtson 'grus brtsams nas bdag cag gis rab tu 
[\[267a.2\]]'byung ba'i sdom pa'i gzings kyis skye ba'i rgya mtsho las bsgral bar bgyi'o zhes byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag tshul khrims las byung ba'i bsod nams bgyi ba'i dngos po rtag pa'i tshul gyis sems can rnams rab tu 'byung ba'i tshul khrims dang /_sdom pas yongs su smin par 
[\[267a.3\]]bgyid de/_des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag sangs rgyas kyi ye shes kyi rgya mtsho bla na ma mchis par 'jug par bgyid pa nas chos kyi rgyal po bla na ma mchis par dbang bskur ba thob par bgyid pa'i bar du'o/_/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' 
[\[267a.4\]]chen po dag bsam gtan dang po'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su sbyong zhing slob pa na bsam gtan gyi yan lag rnams 'tshal ba dang /_'dod pa'i khams las yang dag par 'da' ba dang /_yan lag lnga dang ldan zhing yan lag lnga spangs pa dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhis rnam par 
[\[267a.5\]]rtse ba mngon par 'tshal ba dang /_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag thams cad la mchod pa dang /_bkur sti bgyi ba dang /_dam pa'i chos mnyan pa'i slad du sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du glog lta bu'i shugs kyis mchi ba la mkhas pa dang /_sems can rnams kyi lam 
[\[267a.6\]]gsum mo/_/gsum 'di lta ste/_las kyi lam dang /_nyon mongs pa'i lam dang /_sdug bsngal gyi lam dag skems par bgyid pa dang /_bsgoms pa las byung ba'i bsod nams bgyi ba'i dngos po rdzogs par bgyid pa dag ji lta bu lags/_de bzhin du bsam gtan gyi pha 
[\[267a.7\]]rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bgyid pa ji lta bu lags/_de'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug po yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba dang /_myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba dag ji lta bu lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_
[\[267b\]]
[\[267b.1\]]dpal cho ga shes legs so legs so/_/dpal cho ga shes khyod kyis gang gi tshe chos bzhi po 'di la yongs su rdzogs par spyad cing goms par byas kyang khyod kyis sems can gzhan dang /_gang zag gzhan dag gi don du de bzhin gshegs pa la don 'di 'dri bar sems pa/_dpal cho ga 
[\[267b.2\]]shes de'i phyir legs par nyon la rab tu yid la zung zhig dang bshad do/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das de ltar 'tshal lo zhes bya ba nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to zhes bya ba'i bar du'o/_/dpal cho ga shes byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag 
[\[267b.3\]]bsam gtan dang po'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su sbyong zhing slob pa na bsam gtan gyi yan lag rnams shes pa dang /_'dod pa'i khams las yang dag par 'da' ba dang /_yan lag lnga dang ldan zhing yan lag lnga spangs pa dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhis rtse ba mngon par shes 
[\[267b.4\]]pa dang /_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag thams cad la mchod pa dang /_bkur sti bya ba dang /_dam pa'i chos mnyan pa'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du glog lta bu'i shugs kyis 'gro ba la mkhas pa dang /_sems can rnams kyi lam gsum po las kyi lam dang /_nyon 
[\[267b.5\]]mongs pa'i lam dang /_sdug bsngal gyi lam dag bskams pa dang /_bsgoms pa las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po rdzogs par byed pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang /_de'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug po yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba 
[\[267b.6\]]dang /_myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba dag ji lta bu yin zhe na/_dpal cho ga shes 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag thams cad kyi dang por dbugs rngub pa dang /_dbugs 'byung ba'i mtshan ma'i 
[\[267b.7\]]dmigs pa thams cad la sems gtod par byed de/_de g.yeng ba med pa'i sems kyis dbugs rngub par byed do/_/dbugs 'byung bar byed do/_/de dang por dbugs rngub pa'i sems kyis sel bar byed pa de dag ni de'i rnam par rtog pa yin no/_/de nges par 'byung ba na dbugs 
[\[268a\]]
[\[268a.1\]]'byung ba'i sems kyis sel ba de dag ni de'i rnam par dpyod pa yin no/_/de la dga' zhing tshim pa gang yin pa dang /_sems rtse gcig pa nyid gang yin pa dang /_g.yeng ba med pa gang yin pa des na de nges par 'byung ba la gnas shing rnam par rtog pa dang /_rnam par dpyod pa 
[\[268a.2\]]spong ba'i sems dang ldan pa yin no/_/de ltar na der des rnam par rtog pa dang /_rnam par dpyod pa dang bcas pa'i bsam gtan dang po thob pa yin no/_/de la mtshan ma 'di dag 'byung ste/_de'i lus thams cad g.yo bar 'gyur ro/_/dro bar 'gyur ro/_/der de 'dod pa'i 'dun pa'i sgrib 
[\[268a.3\]]pa spong ba yin no/_/de mi dge ba'i chos thams cad gnon par byed do/_/de gang gi tshe brtson pa drag pos yid la byed cing gnas pa des na de rnam par rtog pa dang /_rnam par dpyod pa nye bar zhi ba yin te/_des na rnam par rtog pa dang /_rnam par dpyod pa med pa'i bsam 
[\[268a.4\]]gtan gnyis pa thob pa yin no/_/de ltar de'i lus thams cad shin tu sim pa dang /_bde ba dang /_tshim par 'gyur ba ni dper na'o ma 'jam tsam gyis lus la cig car blugs na bde ba myong ba bzhin no/_/des bdag ni 'di ltar gyur par shes te/_des zang zing med pa'i dga' ba dang 
[\[268a.5\]]bde ba de lta bu dang ldan no snyam du shes so/_/byang chub sems dpa' des dkon mchog gsum la dad pa thob nas/_de 'di snyam du bdag gis ni sems can thams cad kyi don du go cha chen po bgos nas/_bsam gtan la yang mngon par brtson par bya zhing /_bdag gis ci 
[\[268a.6\]]nas kyang lus dang sems kyi bde ba yang dor bar bya'o snyam du sems so/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dbugs rngub pa dang /_dbugs 'byung ba goms par bya ba sems kyi dmigs pa dag 'dor bar byed do/_/de sna'i rtse mor sems gtod par byed de gang 
[\[268a.7\]]gis 'jug pa dang /_nges par 'byung ba dbugs rngub pa dang /_dbugs 'byung ba la gnas pa'i sems kyis nye bar rtog par byed do/_/de sems de'i skad cig ma la zhig pa dang /_skye ba dang /_'jig pa nye bar rtog par byed de/_sems dang /_yid dang /_rnam par 
[\[268b\]]
[\[268b.1\]]shes pa dang /_phung po dang /_khams dang /_skye mched thams cad la chu zla dang /_mig yor dang /_smig rgyu lta bu dang /_glog lta bu dang /_bdag po med pa dang /_thams cad skad cig ma 'jig pa dang ldan par rtogs te/_de de ltar dga' ba dang /_bde ba rab tu gtong bar byed de/_des 
[\[268b.2\]]der bsam gtan gsum pa yang thob pa yin no/_/gang du chos de dag 'phel bzhin du 'gog pa yid la byed pa'i sems kyis bsam gtan bzhi pa rdzogs par byas te gnas pa de la mtshan ma 'di dag 'byung ste/_des mig gnyis ka btsums kyang nyi ma'i snang ba chen po lta bur snang ba dag 
[\[268b.3\]]yang dag par lta bar byed pa na/_de 'di snyam du mtshan ma'i stobs snang ba'i rkyen las sems can thams cad kyi phung po dang /_khams dang /_skye mched dang /_nyon mongs pa dang /_nye ba'i nyon mongs pa rnam par 'phel zhing 'bar bas bdag gis ci nas kyang /_yid la byed pa'i sems kyi 
[\[268b.4\]]dmigs pa'i snang ba dag dor bar bya'o snyam du sems so/_/de der de'i tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_sems pa dang /_reg pa gang yin pa yid la byed pa kun 'byung ba dag skye zhing 'jig pa dang /_'gog pa'i tshul gyis rab tu zhi bar byed la/_'gog pa'i grong khyer shin tu 
[\[268b.5\]]yongs su dag par 'jug par yang byed do/_/de lus dang /_ngag dang /_yid la byed pa shin tu sbyangs pa la gnas so/_/yang de las kyang ldang ngo /_/yang na dbugs rngub pa dang /_dbugs 'byung ba'i mtshan ma dag 'dzin par byed la/_reg pa yid la byed pas mtshan ma la nye 
[\[268b.6\]]bar rtog par yang byed do/_/yang stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin la 'jug par yang byed la/_yang na dbugs rngub pa dang /_dbugs 'byung ba'i skye ba dang /_'jig pa'i mtshan ma'i dmigs pa dag yang dag par lta bar yang byed do/_/smon pa'i ting nge 'dzin de la yang gnas la yang 
[\[268b.7\]]na dbugs rngub pa dang /_dbugs 'byung ba'i zhi ba dang /_'gog pa la yang dag par lta bar yang byed do/_/mtshan ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas pa de bzhin du dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi bsgom pa yang yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/_/de la rnam par thar pa gsum bsgom 
[\[269a\]]
[\[269a.1\]]pa yongs su rdzogs par yang 'gyur la/_yang na dbugs rngub pa dang /_dbugs 'byung bar mi smod cing 'jig pa'i tshul gyis dmigs pas nye bar rtog par yang byed do/_/de la yang dag pa'i spong ba bzhi bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par yang 'gyur la/_yang na dbugs rngub 
[\[269a.2\]]pa dang /_dbugs 'byung ba'i skye ba dang /_nub pa'i mtshan ma la nye bar rtogs par yang byed do/_/de rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par yang 'gyur la/_yang na dbugs rngub pa dang /_dbugs 'byung ba'i mtshan ma la dmigs pas nyi zer gyi rdul dang 'dra bar phye mar 
[\[269a.3\]]rlags pa bzhin du rang gi lus la nye bar rtog par yang byed do/_/de dbang po lnga bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par yang 'gyur la/_yang na dbugs rngub pa dang /_dbugs 'byung ba skye ba dang /_nub pa'i tshul gyis 'du byed gsum la nye bar rtog par yang byed do/_/de stobs lnga bsgom 
[\[269a.4\]]pa yongs su rdzogs par yang 'gyur la/_yang na dbugs rngub pa dang /_dbugs 'byung ba'i tshor ba'i mtshan ma gsal ba'i tshul gyis phung po dag la zhi ba dang nye bar zhi bar rtog par yang byed do/_/de bzhin du byang chub kyi yan lag bdun bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par yang 'gyur la/_
[\[269a.5\]]yang na dbugs rngub pa dang /_dbugs 'byung ba'i rlung gi rnal 'byor yid la byed pas sa'i khams gzugs su snang ba thams cad rdul du rlags te gtor nas mtshan ma med pa/_lus pa med pa/_brjod du med pa/_mtshan nyid med pa/_rnam par rig pa med pa/_'du byed gsum zhi ba/_
[\[269a.6\]]nye bar zhi ba/_'gags pa/_dmigs pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dag rab tu thob bo/_/bsam gtan la rnam par rtse ba'i ting nge 'dzin de lta bu de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su sbyong ba thun mong ba yin la/_bsam gtan 
[\[269a.7\]]gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su sbyong ba ni nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yang thun mong yin no/_/gang dag kha cig de la gnas na rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la gnas pa yin no/_/brtson 'grus zhan pa kha cig ni nyan thos kyi chos rnams la 'phel lo/_/kha cig ni dgra 
[\[269b\]]
[\[269b.1\]]bcom pa'i 'bras bu la gnas pa'i bar du'o/_/gang dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po dang ldan pa/_'bad pa brtan pa/_sems can thams cad la lta la/_bsod nams dang /_ye shes kyi tshogs dpag tu med pa goms par byas te/_bsam gtan yongs 
[\[269b.2\]]su sbyong bas rnam par rtse ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rnal 'byor de lta bu de la gnas nas rnam par ldog par yang mi byed la/_nyan thos kyi nges pa la 'jug par yang mi byed do/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag go cha chen po bgos nas bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_so so 
[\[269b.3\]]yang dag par rig pa la sbyor ba yongs su sbyong ba la gnas pa nas bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang /_de'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug po yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba'i bar du'o/_/dpal cho ga shes yul 'khor de na dge slong dang /_dge slong ma dang /_dge bsnyen 
[\[269b.4\]]dang /_dge bsnyen ma dang /_nyan thos kyi theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa dang /_theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo dag bsam gtan yongs su sbyong bas rnam par rtse ba yid la byed pa 
[\[269b.5\]]de lta bu dag gis gnas pa nas yul 'khor de lha'i dbang po thams cad kyis legs par bsrungs par 'gyur ro/_/yul 'khor de klu'i dbang po dang /_gnod sbyin gyi dbang po dang /_lha ma yin gyi dbang po dang /_nam mkha' lding gi dbang po dang /_mi 'am ci'i dbang po dang /_lto 
[\[269b.6\]]'phye chen po'i dbang po dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]kyi dbang po dang /_sha za'i dbang po thams cad kyis legs par bsrungs par 'gyur ro/_/de na ting nge 'dzin de lta bu dang ldan pa'i sbyin gnas dag 'khod pa'i bar du'o/_/yul 'khor de'i rgyal po yang yid dang 'thad pa'i chos bcu thob par 
[\[269b.7\]]'gyur te/_bcu gang zhe na/_nad med pa dang /_nad thams cad rab tu zhi ba dang /_tshe ring ba dang /_gzugs bzang ba dang /_mdog bzang po dang ldan pa dang /_yan lag dang nying lag sdug pa dang /_'khor skye bo bzang ba dang /_las kyi mtha' legs par spyad pa spyod pa dang /_byams 
[\[270a\]]
[\[270a.1\]]pa dang /_snying rje la sbyor ba dang /_snyan par grags pa dag ste/_ting nge 'dzin de lta bu dag dang ldan pa'i sbyin gnas snod du gyur pa/_mtho ris su 'gro ba'i yul 'khor de ni yon tan dang /_phan yon chen po bcu po de dag gis rgyas par 'gyur ro/_/rang gi dpung dang /_gzhan gyi 
[\[270a.2\]]dpung dang /_chom rkun dang /_mi rgod dang /[ {]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]dang /_stag dang /_sbrang ma dang /_sha sbrang dang /_phye ma leb dang /_char ches pa dang /_than ches pa dang /_dus ma yin pa'i rlung dang /_lhags pa dang /_nyi mas gdungs pa dang /_tsha ba'i reg pa dag gis gnod par mi 'gyur ro/_/
[\[270a.3\]]yul 'khor de sa gzhi mnyam ste/_dgon pa dang gcong rong med do/_/tsha ba dang kha ba med do/_/de na sa bon sna tshogs dag 'phel lo/_/'bru dang /_sman dang /_rtswa dang /_shing dang /_shing ljon pa dang /_chu dag phun sum tshogs shing chud mi za bar 'byung ngo /_/de na me tog dang /_sman 
[\[270a.4\]]dang /_'bru dang /_ro rnams chud mi za bar phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ro/_/yul 'khor der yid du mi 'ong ba'i sgra dang /_phyi dgra dang /_nang 'khrug gi dpung dag dang /_lo nyes dang /_nad dang /_dus ma yin pa'i nad dang /_'chi ba dag mi 'byung ngo /_/de na sems can rnams tshe 
[\[270a.5\]]ring zhing kha dog dang ldan no/_/bde ba mang zhing sems la rnyog ma med do/_/rtse dga' dang mtshungs par ldan zhing chos spyod la mtho ris dag la gzhol lo/_/yul 'khor de na sbyin gnas snod du gyur pa dag rnal 'byor yid la byed pa dang 'thun par mngon par dga' ba dang 
[\[270a.6\]]bcas pas gnas so/_/de na bza' btung gi longs spyod ma tshang ba med do/_/'byung ba chen po yid du 'ong ba dag gis brtan to/_/dbang po dang khams dag rgyas shing mi 'thun pa med do/_/yul 'khor de na mi rnams dpa' zhing dran pa dang ldan la/_byams pa dang /_snying rje dang 
[\[270a.7\]]ldan zhing mtho ris dag la gzhol lo/_/dpal cho ga shes yul 'khor de chos bcu po de dag gis legs par brgyan pa yin no/_/dpal cho ga shes byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi las kyi sgrib pa ni 'di yin te/_theg pa chen po gtong ba dang /_slu zhing nyan thos kyi sa la 
[\[270b\]]
[\[270b.1\]]'jog par byed pa'o/_/sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir nyan thos kyi bsam gtan dang /_ting nge 'dzin gyis rnam par rtse ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni de lta bu yin no/_/nyan thos gang dag gi bsam gtan gyi yan lag yongs su rdzogs par mi shes pa de dag ni khams 
[\[270b.2\]]gsum gyi btson ra'i gnas kyi yan lag lnga ma spangs shing yan lag lnga dang ldan pa yin no/_/gang dag khams gsum las yang dag par 'das pa/_mi slob pa'i sa la rab tu gnas pa/_rnam par thar pa brgyad la bsam gtan pas rnam par rtse ba/_mngon par shes pa pha rol 
[\[270b.3\]]tu phyin pa thob pa/_bskal pas nges par 'byung ba/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyi zhal nas skyes pa/_chos dang ldan zhing chos kyi sprul pa de dag gis ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dag la mchod pa dang /_bkur sti bya ba dang /_chos mnyan pa'i phyir sangs 
[\[270b.4\]]rgyas kyi zhing gzhan dag tu 'gro bar yang mi nus la sems can gzhan dag dang /_gang zag gzhan dag gi lam gsum po dag kyang bskam par mi nus so/_/gang na nyan thos bsam gtan gyis rnam par rtse ba mngon par shes pa dag ni de lta bu yin la/_yul 'khor de'i yon tan 
[\[270b.5\]]dang phan yon ni de lta bu yin te/_sngar ji skad gsungs pa lta bu'o/_/'dus pa chen po theg pa chen po'i mdo bco lnga pa ri'i snying po'i le'u las/_nyan thos mtshon pa ste dang po rdzogs so//_//dpal cho ga shes de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams 
[\[270b.6\]]dang /_nyan thos dang /_rang rgyal thams cad kyi bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su sbyong ba thun mong du gzhag pa dang /_gang gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag pha rol tu phyin pa lhag ma lnga po 'di dag yongs su rdzogs par byed ce na/_dpal cho ga shes byang chub 
[\[270b.7\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di dag dbugs rngub pa dang /_dbugs 'byung ba thams cad du nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga po dag gi skye ba dang 'jig pa la rtog par byed de/_des na sred pa dang /_chags pa dag skems par yang byed la nges pa la 'jug par yang mi byed do/_/rdzu 
[\[271a\]]
[\[271a.1\]]'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhis rnam par rtse ba mngon par shes pa yang yin no/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag thams cad la mchod pa dang /_bkur sti bya ba dang /_dam pa'i chos mnyan pa'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du glog lta bu'i shugs kyis 'gro ba la mkhas pa 
[\[271a.2\]]yang yin no/_/sems can rnams kyi lam gsum po/_las kyi lam dang /_nyon mongs pa'i lam dang /_sdug bsngal gyi lam dag skems par yang byed do/_/'dod pa'i khams las yang dag par 'da' bar yang byed la/_'dod pa'i khams dag gtong bar yang mi byed do/_/sems 
[\[271a.3\]]can thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir 'gro ba sna tshogs kyi skye ba'i sa dag ston par yang byed la/_mngal gyi nyes pas gos par yang mi byed do/_/sems can rnams kyi nyon mongs pa'i dra ba gcod par yang byed la/_sems can rnams dmigs par yang mi byed do/_/dpal 
[\[271a.4\]]cho ga shes 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag dbugs rngub pa dang /_dbugs 'byung ba phan tshun mi 'dra ba la ji lta ba bzhin rtog par yang byed la/_'phral 'phral du de shes par yang mi byed do/_/dbugs rngub pa dang /_dbugs 'byung ba'i gzugs nye bar len pa'i 
[\[271a.5\]]phung po dang /_de bzhin du tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_de bzhin du dbugs rngub pa dang /_dbugs 'byung ba'i rnam par shes pa nye bar len pa'i phung po dag la ji lta ba bzhin du yang rab tu shes shing dbugs rngub pa yang gzhan la/_dbugs 'byung ba yang gzhan no/_/
[\[271a.6\]]dbugs rngub pa so so yang dag par rig pa yang gzhan la/_dbugs 'byung ba so so yang dag par rig pa yang gzhan no/_/dbugs rngub pa'i tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_sems pa yid la byed pa yang gzhan la dbugs 'byung ba'i tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_
[\[271a.7\]]sems pa yid la byed pa yang gzhan no/_/dbugs rngub pa'i sems pa yang gzhan la/_dbugs 'byung ba yang gzhan no/_/gang gi tshe dbugs rngub pa so so yang dag par rig pa de'i tshe dbugs 'byung ba so so yang dag par rig pa ma yin no/_/gang gi tshe dbugs 'byung 
[\[271b\]]
[\[271b.1\]]ba so so yang dag par rig pa de'i tshe dbugs rngub pa so so yang dag par rig pa ma yin no/_/'khor ba'i 'khor lo dum bu gsum par tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_sems pa yid la byed pa yang de lta bu yin te/_'jug pa'i rgyus na/_bar chad med par/_skye ba'i rgya mtshor 
[\[271b.2\]]bdas shing thar bar yang mi byed do/_/yang dang yang skye bar byed do/_/rga bar byed do/_/'chi bar byed do/_/yang skye bar yang byed do/_/chos gang 'di dag mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa des na rga shi las nges par 'byung ba dag yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu shes 
[\[271b.3\]]so/_/de dag dbugs rngub pa dang /_dbugs 'byung ba yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin nye bar rtog par mi byed do/_/'di ltar srid pa'i rgya mtsho'i sgo dag gi dbugs rngub pa dang /_dbugs 'byung ba 'jug pa dang /_nges par 'byung bar yang byed do/_/de bzhin du ba spu'i khung bu'i sgo 'bum phrag 
[\[271b.4\]]khrag khrig dgu bcu rtsa dgu snyed thams cad kyi dbugs rngub pa dang /_dbugs 'byung ba 'jug pa dang /_nges par 'byung bar byed kyang ba spu'i khung bu'i sgo 'bum phrag khrag khrig dgu bcu rtsa dgu de dag nyams par yang mi mngon no/_/rgyas par yang mi mngon no/_/sngon gyi mtha' dang /_
[\[271b.5\]]phyi ma'i mtha' dang /_thog ma dang /_bar ma dang /_tha ma yang mi mngon no/_/'jug pa dang 'byung ba yang mi mngon no/_/de 'di snyam du bdag gis ci nas kyang ba spu'i khung bu thams cad kyi dbugs rngub pa dang /_dbugs 'byung ba de la skye ba dang /_'jig pa'i tshul gyis skye 'jig gi 
[\[271b.6\]]mtshan nyid la brtson pa dang ldan par gnas par bya'o snyam du sems te/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de rma'i sgo dgu'i dbugs rngub pa dang /_dbugs 'byung ba'i skye ba dang /_'jig pa la sbyor zhing so sor rtog par byed do/_/de bzhin du ba spu'i khung bu'i sgo 
[\[271b.7\]]'bum phrag khrag khrig dgu bcu rtsa dgu snyed re re'i ba spu'i khung bu'i dbugs rngub pa dang /_dbugs 'byung ba'i skye ba dang /_'jig pa'i mtshan nyid la brtson pa dang ldan par gnas par byed do/_/yang na de ba spu'i khung bu'i sgo skra'i nyag ma tsam du chung bar rtog na yang der dbugs 
[\[272a\]]
[\[272a.1\]]rngub pa dang /_dbugs 'byung ba rgyu ba de dag la chung bar yang mthong ngo /_/yang na che bar rtog na yang yungs 'bru chen po tsam du yang dag par rjes su mthong ngo /_/yang na skyu ru ra tsam du rtog na yang skyu ru ra tsam du mthong ngo /_/yang na ba spu'i khung bu'i khung bu re re la bil ba'i 'bras bu 
[\[272a.2\]]tsam du rtog na yang bil ba'i 'bras bu tsam du mthong ngo /_/yang na dpag tshad stong tsam du rtog na yang dpag tshad stong tsam du mthong ngo /_/yang na gling bzhi pa gcig tsam du rtog na yang gling bzhi pa gcig tsam du mthong ngo /_/yang na ba spu'i khung bu re re la rgya che bar rtog na yang rgya che bar yang dag 
[\[272a.3\]]par rjes su mthong ngo /_/de bzhin du mig gi tshad la yang sbyar bar bya'o/_/gang du rga shi dang 'brel ba'i sems can dag bar chad med par 'khor ba'i chu bor bdas pas sdug bsngal rnam pa sna tshogs dag nyams su myong ba na/_de 'di snyam du bdag gis ci nas kyang rnam pa thams cad du 
[\[272a.4\]]gzugs kyi 'du shes dag dor bar bya'o snyam du sems te/_de rlung gi khams la sems nye bar gtong bar byed do/_/de rnam pa thams cad du gzugs kyi 'du shes dag spong bas des brjod du med pa'i ting nge 'dzin rab tu thob ste/_de ni nyan thos dang /_rang rgyal ba thams cad kyi 
[\[272a.5\]]sa ma yin no/_/de la sa'i khams mi dmigs so/_/chu'i khams mi dmigs so/_/me'i khams mi dmigs so/_/rlung gi khams mi dmigs so/_/nam mkha'i khams mi dmigs so/_/rnam par shes pa'i khams mi dmigs so/_/phung po dang /_khams dang /_
[\[272a.6\]]skye mched rnams rgyu ba mi dmigs so/_/sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs so/_/phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs so/_/'jig rten 'di mi dmigs so/_/'jig rten pha rol mi dmigs so/_/legs par spyad pa dang /_nyes par spyad pa'i las rnams kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa mi 
[\[272a.7\]]dmigs so/_/skye ba mi dmigs so/_/'jig pa mi dmigs so/_/kun nas nyon mongs pa mi dmigs so/_/rnam par byang ba mi dmigs so/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de zhi ba la gnas pa de dag gis gnas so/_/gal te chos thams 
[\[272b\]]
[\[272b.1\]]cad stong pa nyid brjod du med pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'dis bskal pa tshad med par byin gyis rlob par 'dod na yang /_de bzhin du ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs kyis byin gyis rlob bo/_/de chos thams cad stong pa nyid brjod du med pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'dis bskal pa tshad med par gnas par 'dod na yang de 
[\[272b.2\]]bzhin du gnas par byed do/_/'di ltar sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par byed de/_dper na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa'i snying po bzhin no/_/dpal cho ga shes byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gis 
[\[272b.3\]]chos thams cad stong pa nyid brjod du med pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la dbang thob par gyur pa/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de gang gi tshe ting nge 'dzin 'di la 'jug par 'dod pa de'i tshe/_des dang po kho nar sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir bsod 
[\[272b.4\]]nams dang /_shes rab kyi stobs kyis smon lam 'di lta bur 'debs par byed de/_'di ltar bdag yun ji srid du ting nge 'dzin las ma langs pa de srid kyi bar du yul 'di nyid dang /_gling bzhi pa 'di nyid ces bya ba nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nyid kyi sems can zhes bya ba'i 
[\[272b.5\]]bar gyi sems can rnams longs spyod dang /_yongs su spyod pa dang /_yo byad rnam pa sna tshogs dag phun sum tshogs par gyur cig 'di lta ste/_de na sems can rnams kyi gnas dang /_lus dang /_lus kyi dbyibs mdog dang /_yan lag dang /_nying lag dang /_
[\[272b.6\]]rgyan dang /_lhab lhub dang /_phyang phrul dang /_phreng ba dang /_mal cha dang /_gos dang /_bza' ba dang /_btung ba dang /_gzugs dang /_sgra dang /_dri dang /_ro dang /_reg pa yid du 'ong ba ci dang ci 'dod pa dang /_ji lta bu zhig 'dod pa dang /_ji snyed cig 'dod pa rnams 
[\[272b.7\]]'byung bar gyur cig ces smon lam btab nas/_de'i rjes la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ting nge 'dzin de la 'jug par byed do/_/ting nge 'dzin la zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ji srid du snyoms par zhugs pa de srid kyi bar du de na sems 
[\[273a\]]
[\[273a.1\]]can rnams kyi longs spyod dang /_yo byad de lta bu dag 'byung ba ni sngar ji skad gsungs pa yin no/_/gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de smon lam 'di lta bur 'debs par byed de/_'di ltar bdag yun ji srid du ting nge 'dzin de lta bu dang ldan pa de srid kyi 
[\[273a.2\]]bar du tshad bzung ste/_sems can rnams kyi lus kyi nad rlung las gyur pa dang /_mkhris pa las gyur pa dang /_bad kan las gyur pa dang /_'dus pa las gyur pa dang /_de bzhin du sems kyi nad 'dod chags dang /_zhe sdang dang /_gti mug la sogs pa dag rab tu zhi bar gyur cig_/
[\[273a.3\]]mi dang mi ma yin pa'i gnod pa las 'byung ba'i nad dag rab tu zhi bar gyur cig_/dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dag la gnas par gyur cig ces smon lam btab nas/_de'i rjes la ting nge 'dzin la 'jug par byed do/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de 'di ltar yun ji srid 
[\[273a.4\]]du ting nge 'dzin de lta bu dang ldan pa de srid kyi bar du tshad bzung ba'i sems can rnams kyi lus dang /_sems kyi sdug bsngal gyi nad de lta bu dag rab tu zhi bar byed do/_/gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po da smon lam 'di lta bur 'debs par byed de/_bdag yun ji srid 
[\[273a.5\]]du ting nge 'dzin de lta bu dang ldan par gnas pa de srid kyi bar du sems can dmyal ba rnams dang /_dud 'gro rnams dang /_gshin rje'i 'jig rten pa rnams kyi sdug bsngal dang /_bkres pa dang /_skom pa dang /_tsha ba dang /_grang ba dang /_mi sdug pa dang phrad pa dang /_sdug pa dang bral ba dang /_ngal 
[\[273a.6\]]ba'i sdug bsngal dang /_tshol khro'i sdug bsngal dag rab tu zhi bar gyur cig_/yun ji srid du ting nge 'dzin de lta bu dang ldan pa de srid kyi bar du sems can rnams brtson 'grus dang ldan par gyur cig_/dge ba'i chos thams cad dang bral ba rnams dge ba'i chos thams cad la brtson par 
[\[273a.7\]]gyur cig_/yun ji srid du ting nge 'dzin de lta bu dang ldan pa de srid kyi bar du sems can rnams sems can gzhan dag la byams pa'i sems dang ldan pa dang /_phan pa'i sems dang ldan pa dang /_mi 'khrugs pa'i sems dang ldan pa dang /_khon med pa'i sems dang ldan pa dang /_
[\[273b\]]
[\[273b.1\]]rnyog pa med pa'i sems dang ldan pa dang /_snying rje'i sems dang ldan pa dang /_snying brtse ba'i sems dang ldan pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi sems dang ldan pa dang /_snyoms par 'jug pa la mkhas par gnas pa'i sems dang ldan pa dang /_'khrul pa med pa'i sems dang ldan par gyur cig_/
[\[273b.2\]]ji srid du ting nge 'dzin de lta bu dang ldan pa de srid kyi bar du sems can rnams kyi gti mug gi mun pa dang /_rtag pa dang chad par lta ba dag rab tu zhi bar gyur cig_/dus thams cad du lta bar 'dzin pa rnams rab tu zhi bar gyur cig_/yun ji srid du ting nge 'dzin de lta bu dang ldan pa de srid kyi bar 
[\[273b.3\]]du sems can rnams dkon mchog gsum la blo 'jug cing zhe sa dang ri mo byed par gyur cig_/phyin ci log bzhi dang bral zhing bden pa bzhi'i rnam pa la gnas pa'i sems dang ldan par gyur cig_/'phags pa don dam pa'i bden pa la rnam par gnas pa'i sems dang ldan par gyur cig_/
[\[273b.4\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir gang gi tshe ting nge 'dzin la 'jug par 'dod pa de'i tshe/_'di ltar shes rab dang /_bsod nams kyi stobs dang /_thabs kyi stobs kyis 'di lta bur byin gyis rlob par byed de/_bdag yun 
[\[273b.5\]]ji srid du ting nge 'dzin las ma langs pa de srid kyi bar du yul 'di nyid dang /_gling bzhi pa 'di nyid ces bya ba nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nyid kyi sems can zhes bya ba'i bar dag ji ltar tshad bzung ba rnams la 'di ltar bde bar sbyar bar byin gyis rlob par byed do/_/de'i rjes la chos thams cad 
[\[273b.6\]]stong pa nyid brjod du med pa'i ting nge 'dzin de lta bu la 'jug par byed do/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snyoms par zhugs ma thag pa des ji ltar sems can rnams tshad bzung ba de bzhin du/_byang chub sems dpa' ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs kyis bde bar 
[\[273b.7\]]sbyar ba yon tan sna tshogs de lta bu dag gis sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed de/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag chos thams cad stong pa nyid brjod du med pa'i ting nge 'dzin las de srid du ldang bar mi byed do/_/de ltar byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[274a\]]
[\[274a.1\]]sems dpa' chen po snyoms par zhugs pa de'i lus la gnod pa dang 'gyur ba mi 'byung ngo /_/bkres pa dang skom pa'i gnod pa mi 'byung ngo /_/me'i gnod pa mi 'byung ngo /_/bskal pa'i mes tshig par mi 'gyur ba nas me phal pas tshig par mi 'gyur ro/_/chus khyer bar mi 'gyur 
[\[274a.2\]]ro/_/nad kyi bskal pas zad par mi 'gyur ro/_/mu ge'i dgon par gyur pa'i bskal pas zad par mi 'gyur ro/_/bsam bzhin du tshe'i 'du byed 'dor ba la la ma gtogs par tshe'i 'du byed dang /_srog gi dbang po yongs su zad par mi 'gyur ro/_/lus dang /_srog la mi dang /_
[\[274a.3\]]mi ma yin pa dang /_rlung dang /_nyi mas gdungs pa dag gis gnod par mi 'gyur te/_de lta bu ni snyoms par zhugs pa yin no/_/ting nge 'dzin de las langs nas kyang 'dod na skra'i rtse mo gcig gi nang du sangs rgyas kyi zhing dpag tu med pa dag gzhug par nus so/_/'dod na 
[\[274a.4\]]sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'khor dang bcas pa thams cad dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'khor dang bcas pa thams cad gcig tu bsdoms pa ma lus pa dag sor mo gcig gi sen mo'i nang du blta bar yang nus so/_/'dod na skra'i rtse mo gcig gi nang du 
[\[274a.5\]]sems can dpag tu med pa thams cad gzhug par yang nus la/_de na de sems can re re'i rang rang gi yul dang spyod yul dag yangs par yang mthong ngo /_/'dod na sangs rgyas kyi zhing mtha' yas mu med pa dag gi rlung gi khams thams cad skra'i rtse mo gcig gi nang du 
[\[274a.6\]]bcug ste der nam mkha'i gtos yangs pa bzhin du spyod par byed kyang de che bar yang mi mngon no/_/chung bar yang mi mngon no/_/'dod na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi chu'i khams thams cad mon sran sde'u'i 'brum bu gcig gi nang 
[\[274a.7\]]du bcug ste/_der nam mkha'i gtos yangs pa bzhin du spyod par byed kyang de che bar yang mi mngon no/_/chung bar yang mi mngon no/_/byang chub sems dpa' de rang gi smon lam gyi stobs ma gtogs par yang dang yang mngal gyi gnas su skye bar mi 'gyur ro/_/ngan 'gror skye 
[\[274b\]]
[\[274b.1\]]bar mi 'gyur ro/_/bud med du mi 'gyur ro/_/skye ba dman pa 'thob par mi 'gyur ro/_/yan lag nyams par mi 'gyur ro/_/lus dang /_ngag dang /_yid kyi spyod pa la 'khrul par mi 'gyur ro/_/sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir rang gi smon lam gyi stobs ma 
[\[274b.2\]]gtogs par sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong pa dag tu skye bar mi 'gyur ro/_/de rtag par sangs rgyas blta ba dang /_chos mnyan pa dang /_dge 'dun la bkur sti bya ba dang mi 'bral ba yin no/_/de shes rab dang /_bsod nams dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_thabs mkhas pa dag gis 
[\[274b.3\]]sems can yongs su smin par byed pa nas yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa bla na med pa'i bar la 'jigs pa med pa dang ma bral ba yin no/_/dpal cho ga shes byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos go cha chen po de lta bu bgos nas bsam gtan dang po'i pha rol tu phyin pa 
[\[274b.4\]]yongs su sbyong zhing slob pa na 'dod pa'i khams las yang dag par 'da' bar byed do/_/de bzhin du bsam gtan gyi yan lag rnams kyang shes par byed do/_/yan lag lnga dang ldan zhing yan lag lnga rnam par spangs pa yin no/_/de bzhin du rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhis rtse ba 
[\[274b.5\]]mngon par shes pa yin no/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag thams cad la mchod pa dang /_bkur sti bya ba dang /_dam pa'i chos mnyan pa'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du glog lta bu'i shugs kyis 'gro ba la mkhas pa yin no/_/gang gis na sems can thams 
[\[274b.6\]]cad kyi lam gsum po las kyi lam dang /_nyon mongs pa'i lam dang /_sdug bsngal gyi lam dag skems par byed pa yin no/_/byang chub sems dpa' de ltar skems par byed pa'i phyir bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/de bzhin du 
[\[274b.7\]]de'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur zhing myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/_/yang bcom ldan 'das kyis bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bstan pa na/_'khor de na sems 
[\[275a\]]
[\[275a.1\]]can lnga khri po gang dag gis sngon chos bzhi po 'di dag goms par byas pa de dag gis mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa rab tu thob pa dang ldan no/_/de na srog chags brgyad khri bzhi stong dag gis ni dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin rab tu thob par gyur to/_/de na srog 
[\[275a.2\]]chags khrag khrig stong phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu dag gis ni bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs pa rab tu thob par gyur to/_/de na sems can sngon byang chub tu sems ma bskyed pa khrag khrig 'bum phrag dpag tu med pa dag gis ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i 
[\[275a.3\]]byang chub tu sems bskyed nas/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gyur to/_/'dus pa chen po theg pa chen po'i mdo bco lnga pa ri'i snying po'i le'u las bsam gtan mtshon pa ste gnyis pa rdzogs so//_//de nas de nyid du byang chub 
[\[275a.4\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa'i snying pos dpal lha mo chen mo la 'di skad ces smras so/_/dpal cho ga shes gling chen po bzhi pa 'di byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag thams cad kyis yun ring por shin tu mchod pa cher bya ba dang /_rjes su bsrung bar bya 
[\[275a.5\]]ba dang /_rjes su dran par bya ba dang /_phyag bya bar 'os pa dag ji tsam pa ni da ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag thams cad kyi 'dus pa chen po de lta bu dag bsdus 
[\[275a.6\]]pa dang /_byang chub kyi lam mtha' dag la 'jug pa dang /_phyir mi ldog pa'i 'khor lo'i thabs mkhas pa'i pha rol du 'gro ba dang /_sangs rgyas su dbang bskur ba'i sa rab tu bsgrags pa de lta bu dag ltos shig_/khyod phyir mi ldog pa'i 'khor lo yongs su rdzogs par byas te/_
[\[275a.7\]]sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dag la yang dag par mngon du zhen nas khyod kyis sbyin gnas de lta bu dag la bza' ba dang /_btung ba'i yo byad dag 'byor par byas pa yin te/_khyod brtson pa des na myur du pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par byed dam/_rnam pa thams cad 
[\[275b\]]
[\[275b.1\]]mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes la gnas par byed dam/_de la dpal lha mo chen mos 'di skad ces smras so/_/skyes bu chen po dam pas ji skad smras pa de ltar lags te/_sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus bskal pa dpag tu med pa dag 'das pa na gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' shAkya thub pa de byang 
[\[275b.2\]]chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na/_'di ltar bdag dang gcig la gcig dam tshig bcas pa gang gi tshe khyod bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba de'i tshe/_bdag gling chen po bzhi pa der dpal lha mo chen mo'i go 'phang thob par shog shig pa dang /_
[\[275b.3\]]de na sems can rnams la bza' ba dang /_btung ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis sbyin pa byed par 'gyur bar bgyis lags so/_/rigs kyi bu khyod bdag las gson cig dang /_sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus bskal pa dpag tu med pa 'das pa gang de'i tshe de'i dus na de bzhin gshegs 
[\[275b.4\]]pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dbang po'i tog gi rgyal mtshan rgyal po zhes bya ba zhig byung bar gyur to/_/skye dgu'i tshe lo stong zhes bya ba nas de'i tshe de'i dus na dge bsnyen skar ma dri med dpal zhes bya ba dul ba/_gsal ba/_'jigs pa med pa/_thos pa mang ba/_'khor 
[\[275b.5\]]bzhi po dag la chos ston pa/_'khor mang ba/_'khor phun sum tshogs pa zhig byung bar gyur to zhes bya ba'i bar du ste/_de'i bu thu bo dri med dpal zhes bya ba zhig byung ba des rang gi pha la tshigs su bcad pas smras pa/_yab cig ci slad rang gi lus srog btang nas kyang /_/zhum pa 
[\[275b.6\]]med pa'i sems kyis brtson zhing rtsol bar mdzad/_/yab cig tshe 'dis mya ngan 'das par mi gshegs par/_/sems can rnams la mchog tu srung mdzad shin tu brtson/_/des rang gi bu dri med dpal la tshigs su bcad pas lan smras pa/_sems can 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal 
[\[275b.7\]]dag gis rmongs pa dang /_/lam ngan zhugs shing nyon mongs pa yi me 'bar ba/_/rtag tu sdug bsngal dag gis nyon mongs ngas mthong nas/_/nyon mongs pa yi me dag gsad phyir nga brtson byed/_/shes rab rnam par nyams shing mtha' las 'das pa dang /_/lam las 
[\[276a\]]
[\[276a.1\]]rab tu nyams shing ngan song 'gro ba dang /_/'khor ba shin tu bzod rlag chu bor ltung ba rnams/_/rab tu bsgral ba'i phyir ni nga yang spyod par byed/_/sbyin dang dul dang sdom pa rnam par spangs pa dang /_/lha dang mi yi bde las rtag tu nyams pa dang /_/dge ba'i 
[\[276a.2\]]bshes gnyen dag dang rtag tu bral ba rnams/_/de dag la ni bdag gis lam ston 'gyur bar bya/_/sems can nyon mongs pa yis btson rar rtag bcings pa/_/mgon med gyur pa mig ni rnam par nyams gyur cing /_/lta ngan dag la chags pa sha dang khrag za ba/_/de 
[\[276a.3\]]dag dag par bya phyir nga ni spyod par byed/_/sems can re re'i don du mnar med spyod byed pa/_/de 'dra'i snying rje sems can rnams la bskyed par bya/_/ji ltar sems can re re de dag thar bya'i phyir/_/sdug bsngal bzod rlag bzod dka' bdag gis dang du blang /_/bu cig nga yis byang 
[\[276a.4\]]chub spyod mchog spyad par bya/_/nyan thos dag gi shes pa btsal bar mi bya zhing /_/rang sangs rgyas kyi shes pa'ang btsal bar mi bya ste/_/bla na med pa'i ye shes dag ni btsal bar bya/_/ji srid gang gA'i bye snyed sems can du ma dag_/sdug bsngal dag las thar bar 
[\[276a.5\]]byas par ma gyur par/_/de srid byang chub mchog rab 'dir ni 'tshang mi rgya/_/phyi nas byang chub mchog rab de la reg par bya/_/bu cig khyod kyis sems can rnams la mtshungs par ni/_/snying rje 'di lta bu dag bskyed par byas nas kyang /_/khyod kyis dge dang rtag tu ldan 
[\[276a.6\]]par byas pa rnams/_/byang chub mchog rab 'phags pa dag tu bsngo bar gyis/_/sems can nyon mongs me las rab tu thar bya'i phyir/_/sdug bsngal bzod rlag bzod dka' ba dag dang du long /_/sbyin dang dul dang sdom pa dag la legs spyod cig_/rdzogs sangs 
[\[276a.7\]]rgyas par 'gyur ba 'di ni the tshom med/_/gang tshe nga ni byang chub mchog ma thob pa na/_/de tshe khyod ni sems can rnams kyi sbyin por 'gyur/_/nga yis khyod ni byang chub mchog tu lung bstan nas/_/'di la dam bcas brtan por legs par gnas pa yin/_/rigs kyi 
[\[276b\]]
[\[276b.1\]]bu de'i tshe bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa dbang po'i tog gi rgyal mtshan rgyal po'i spyan sngar 'di lta bur dam bcas te/_bdag yun ji srid du 'khor ba na 'khor ba de srid kyi bar du brtul zhugs dang /_dka' thub dang /_dka' ba spyad pa dang /_sbyin pa dang /_dul ba dang /_sdom 
[\[276b.2\]]pa dang /_bsam gtan dang /_thos pa dang /_gtong ba dang /_zhal ta sna tshogs dag la goms par bgyi'o/_/dka' ba spyad pa dang /_yongs su gtong ba rnam pa sna tshogs dag la goms par bgyi'o/_/gang gi tshe skye dgu'i tshe lo brgya pa'i tshe nyon mongs pa dang /_nyon mongs 
[\[276b.3\]]pa'i rnyog pa dag gis kun tu rmongs par gyur pa'i zhing dag tu bdag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba'i zhing der bdag gis kyang dpal gyi go 'phang gi bdag po bla na med pa dag bstan par bgyi'o/_/de'i bstan pa la bza' ba dang /_
[\[276b.4\]]btung ba'i yo byad bla na med pa'i sbyin pa por 'gyur bar bgyi'o/_/de na de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa 'khor dang bcas pa dag la bdag gis zhal zas dang /_btung ba sna tshogs dag gis rim gro bgyi'o/_/der de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas mngon sum du bdag 
[\[276b.5\]]bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa thob par bgyi'o/_/der sems can gang dag ma rungs pa/_rtsub pa/_snying mi brtse ba/_byas pa mi gzo ba/_mi mnyam pa/_yang bar spyod pa/_sdig pa'i sems dang ldan pa dag 'byung bar 'gyur ba de dag 
[\[276b.6\]]gis dus ma yin pa'i rdzi char dang /_tsha ba dang /_grang ba dang /_char mo che dag 'bebs par byed pas gang dag sems can rnams kyi 'bru dang /_'bras bu dang /_lo tog dang /_sman dang /_ljon shing dang /_ro dag ma rung bar byed pa/_mdangs 'phrog pa/_sems can 
[\[276b.7\]]rnams kyi longs spyod dang /_yongs su spyod pa dag chud gzon par byed pa/_mun gnag tu byed pa de dag thams cad bdag gis bsod nams kyi mthu dang shes rab kyi stobs kyis bzlog par bgyi'o/_/dad par bgyi'o//_//bam po gnyis pa/_gang gi 
[\[277a\]]
[\[277a.1\]]tshe sems can de dag longs spyod dang /_nye bar spyod pa dang bral bas sems can de dag mi dge ba bcu la spyod par byed do/_/dge ba bcu'i chos rnams yongs su nyams par byed do/_/'di ltar de ra bcom ldan 'das kyi gdul bya rnams bstan pa dang /_dkon 
[\[277a.2\]]mchog gsum gyi gdung dang /_yo byad dag dang mi ldan pas grags pa med par 'gyur te/_des na der bdag gis longs spyod dang /_nye bar spyod pa'i yo byad phun sum tshogs pa'i rgyu dag gis sems can rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su 
[\[277a.3\]]smin par bgyi'o/_/gang gi tshe 'di ltar bdag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar smon lam btab pas ma 'ongs pa'i dus na de ltar bdag gis bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par byas pa de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das des legs so zhes bya ba gnang ste/_de'i tshe ji ltar smon lam 
[\[277a.4\]]btab pa bzhin bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par byas pas rigs kyi bu de ltar smon lam btab pa legs so legs so zhes de bzhin gshegs pa dbang po'i tog gi rgyal mtshan rgyal pos legs so zhes bya ba gnang ba yin no/_/rigs kyi bu khyod la bdag gis 'byor 
[\[277a.5\]]byed chu khyim snying po zhes bya ba'i gzungs sbyin gyis/_khyod kyis gzungs kyi snying po 'dis de lta bur sems can rnams shin tu yongs su smin par byed nus sam/_sems can tshad med pa dag longs spyod dang /_nye bar spyod pa'i yo byad phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan pa dag gis 
[\[277a.6\]]nyon mongs pa'i chu bo las sgrol bar byed do/_/tad ya thA/_dza lam b+ha/_ma hA dza lam b+ha/_anu dza lam b+ha/_sarba dza lam b+ha/_o ga dza lam b+ha/_yak+Sha bri dza lam b+ha/_nA ga bri dza lam b+ha/_u ga ra bri dza lam b+ha/_hasti bri dza lam b+ha/_a dza lam b+ha/_dza lam b+ha/_
[\[277a.7\]]man DU ka bri dza lam b+ha/_kha mu bri dza lam b+ha/_pad ka bri dza lam b+ha/_a ma bri dza lam b+ha/_sU ci mu kha bri dza lam b+ha/_ba mra ba mra/_dza la ba mra/_bi dza b+han da/_prata tra puSh+pa pha lam b+ha/_mu k+Shan ri b+hanas/_d+harma/_ya dz+nyA/_briSh+Ti so/_hri lam b+ha/_sha shastu da la/_gung gung 
[\[277b\]]
[\[277b.1\]]sa ra gun tsi/_dung gung /_ba ra dza bai swA hA/_'byor byed chu khyim snying po zhes bya ba'i gzungs ni de yin te/_gzungs kyi snying po 'dis de lta bur sems can rnams shin tu yongs su smin par byed nus sam/_rigs kyi bu der bdag gis ni de bzhin gshegs pa dbang po'i tog gi 
[\[277b.2\]]rgyal mtshan rgyal po de las 'byor byed chu khyim snying po zhes bya ba'i gzungs 'di mnos so/_/mnos nas kyang de bzhin gshegs pa de la bdag gis mchod pa dang /_rim gro rnam pa sna tshogs 'di dag byas te/_tshul khrims dang /_thos pa dang /_brtul zhugs dag kyang 
[\[277b.3\]]spyad do/_/de'i 'og tu yang sangs rgyas khri snyed la de lta bu'i smon lam dag btab pa des na bdag gis da ltar bskal pa bzang po 'di la dpal chen po'i go 'phang thob pa yin no/_/da ltar bdag 'dir don chen po de lta bu bgyid pa'i tshe mi nyal ba de ci'i slad du zhe na/_de tshun chad klu khro bo 
[\[277b.4\]]phal mo che dag byung ba dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_srin po dang /_lha ma yin dang /_grul bum dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]dang /_sha za ma rungs pa rtsub pa/_ma dad pa/_snying rje med pa/_snying brtse ba med par zhugs pa phal mo che dag lhags pas srog chags su gyur pa rnams la gnod pa dang /_
[\[277b.5\]]ya nga bar spyod pa de dag gis dus ma yin pa'i rlung dang /_char mo che dang /_than chen dang /_ser drag 'bebs pa dang /_tsha ba dang /_grang ba dag 'byin par byed do/_/phyi dgra dang /_nang 'khrug dang /_phung bar 'gyur ba dang /_phas kyi dmag tshogs kyi gnod pa dang /_thab mo 
[\[277b.6\]]dang /_nyi mas gdungs pa dang /_rlung dmar dag gtong bar byed do/_/de dag kyang sngon gyi rgyal bas byin gyis ma brlabs la/_de dag 'jig rten pha rol la yang mi lta bas 'byor byed chu khyim snying po zhes bya ba'i gzungs 'di la ri mo mi byed de/_de dag sems can rnams kyi sa 
[\[277b.7\]]bon dang /_myu gu dang /_'dab ma dang /_me tog dang /_'bras bu dang /_ro dang /_'bru dang /_sman dang /_longs spyod dang /_nye bar spyod pa dag chud gzon par byed do/_/'jig par byed do/_/mdangs 'phrog par byed do/_/de dag sa'i bcud rnams la dbugs gtong bar byed 
[\[278a\]]
[\[278a.1\]]de/_de dag gis sa'i bcud rnams skyon dang bcas pa dang /_snyigs ma dang bcas pa dang /_nad dang bcas pa dang /_ldam ldum gyis 'gags pa dang /_rtsub pa dang /_ro med pa dang /_sra ba dang /_dri mi zhim pa dag tu byed de/_de dag gis sems can rnams mngon par 
[\[278a.2\]]dga' bar mi byed do/_/sems can gang dag sa'i bcud 'di la rten pa rnams/_sa bon dang /_sdong bu dang /_lo ma dang /_me tog dang /_'bras bu dang /_ro dang /_'bru dang /_sman dang /_longs spyod dang /_nye bar spyod pa dag la spyod par byed pas de dag gis sems 'jig rten 
[\[278a.3\]]pha rol la mi lta zhing sems can rnams la sems rtsub pa dang /_zhe 'gras pa dang /_gdug pa dang /_sdang ba dang /_snying rje med pa dang /_snying brtse ba med par zhugs pa yin no/_/nad sna tshogs kyis gzir cing gzugs mi sdug la lus rtsub pa/_nyon mongs pa dang /_nang du 
[\[278a.4\]]mas nyams smad pa/_lta ba ngan par zhugs pa/_skyabs ngan pa la rten pa yin no/_/de dag ces bya ba nas [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]dang bya dag gi bar du dkon mchog gsum la dad pa dang /_dang ba dang /_dga' ba dang /_bla ma dang /_zhe sa dang /_ri mo byed pa'i sems dag ma thob pa yin te/_de 
[\[278a.5\]]dag nad sna tshogs dang /_lta ba ngan pas zin cing ngan g.yo can khar bros pas dkon mchog gsum la lus dang /_ngag yid 'khrul par spyod pa yin no/_/sdig pa'i sems dang ldan pa/_tshul khrims 'chal pa sdom pa ma yin pa la spyod pa de dag dge slong tshul khrims dang 
[\[278a.6\]]ldan zhing yon tan gyis phyug pa/_spobs pa grol ba dang ldan pa de dag gis spong bar byed do/_/da ltar 'di na sems can dag_/gshe ba dang /_spyo ba dang /_smod pa dang /_bshung ba dang /_nyams par byed pa dang /_brnyas pa dang /_'drid pa dang /_bsdigs pa 
[\[278a.7\]]dang /_grags pa ma yin par spyod pa dang /_ngo tsha shes pa dang khrel yod pa spangs pa dang /_mi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rnams la mngon par dga' ba'i sems dang ldan pa dang /_dge ba thams cad la spyod pa spangs pa'i sems dang ldan pa dang /_bsod nams 
[\[278b\]]
[\[278b.1\]]dang shes rab dang bral ba dang /_tshe thung zhing ngan song du 'gro ba des na sems can 'di dag thams cad de dag gis ni longs spyod dang /_nye bar spyod pa thams cad kyis tshim par byed kyang mi nus/_yongs su smin par byed kyang mi nus so/_/'di ltar skyes bu dam pa khyod ni sangs rgyas 
[\[278b.2\]]thams cad kyi chos la rag ma lus par shes shing mkhas pa khyod ni ting nge 'dzin dang /_gzungs dang /_bzod pa thams cad la rnam par spyod pa la mkhas pa'i pha rol tu son pa/_snying rje dang snying brtse bas brgyan pa mkhas pa chen po shes pa'i pha rol tu son pa khyod ni byang chub sems 
[\[278b.3\]]dpa'i tshogs thams cad kyi nang na rgyal mtshan gyi mchog tu gyur pa sems can thams cad yongs su smin par byed pa yin pas da khyod kyis gling bzhi pa 'dir snying rje dang snying brtse ba dag skyed cig_/gling bzhi pa 'di na klu khro bo dag ji ltar bzlog par nus pa dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_srin 
[\[278b.4\]]po dang /_lha ma yin dang /_grul bum dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]dang /_sha za khro bo dang /_lus srul po khro bo dag ji ltar bzlog par nus pa dang /_de dag ci nas kyang dus su char 'bebs shing chu 'byin par 'gyur ba dang /_lo tog phun sum tshogs pa sgrub par 'gyur ba dang /_tsha ba 
[\[278b.5\]]dang /_grang ba dus su sbyor bar 'gyur ba dag blos rtogs shig dang /_gzhi des sems can rnams kyi longs spyod dang /_nye bar spyod pa mi nyams la sa'i bcud thams cad la yang skyon med pa dang /_nad med pa dang /_snying po dang ldan pa dang /_dran pa'i rgyu rkyen dang /_zhim pa 
[\[278b.6\]]dang /_dri zhim pa dang /_ro zhim po phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ro/_/sa'i bcud 'di la rten pa'i sems can gang dag gi longs spyod dang /_nye bar spyod pa la longs spyod pa de dag ni nad med pa dang /_dran pa dang ldan pa dang zhes bya ba'i bar du sngar ji skad gsungs pa 
[\[278b.7\]]yin no/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa'i snying pos dpal lha mo chen mo de la 'di skad ces smras so/_/dpal cho ga shes bdag gis ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di thams cad kyi 'byung ba chen po ma lus pa dag lha'i bde bar sprul nas 'dir sems 
[\[279a\]]
[\[279a.1\]]can rnams bskal pa 'bum phrag snyed kyi bar du longs spyod par bya bar nus kyang /_'dir sems can rnams kyis longs spyod par mi nus so/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_sems can 'di dag ni bsod nams dang bral ba ste/_longs spyod dang nye bar spyod pa rgya chen po 
[\[279a.2\]]dag la longs spyod pa'i snod ma yin no/_/bdag gis ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed 'di thams cad lha'i gzhal med khang rgya chen por sprul pa dang /_lha'i gnas mal dang /_rgyan dang /_gos dang /_lhab lhub dang /_spos dang /_me tog dang /_phreng ba dang /_'bras 
[\[279a.3\]]bu dang /_shing ljon pa dang /_rol mo'i sgra dang /_sil snyan dang /_glu dbyangs dang /_rin po che sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa dag tu sprul par nus kyang /_'dir sems can de dag bsod nams dang bral bas snod du ma gyur pa'i phyir longs spyod par mi nus te/_de bzhin gshegs 
[\[279a.4\]]pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa bcu pa de dag dang /_dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin la dbang thob pa dag longs spyad par spyod pa ni ma gtogs so/_/bdag gis sems can gyi khams ma lus pa 
[\[279a.5\]]dag bsam gtan bzhi la snyoms par zhugs par gzhag par nus na/_'di na klu khro bo zhes bya ba nas lus srul po khro bo zhes bya ba'i bar dag zhi bar bya ba lta smos kyang ci dgos/_'di ltar bdag ni de bzhin gshegs pas ma gnang bar bdag gis rdzu 'phrul gyi yul 
[\[279a.6\]]dag bstan pa ni tshul dang 'thun pa ma yin te/_dper na 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal pos ma gnang bar blon po rin po che dang /_khyim bdag rin po che dag gis dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa shom pa de ni gnas med do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_byang chub sems 
[\[279a.7\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po ma lus pa de dag thams cad ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sras thugs las skyes pa/_gsung las skyes pa/_chos las byung zhing chos kyis sprul pa ste/_de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pas ma gnang bar rdzu 'phrul gyi yul bstan par ni 
[\[279b\]]
[\[279b.1\]]sus kyang mi nus so/_/dpal cho ga shes 'on kyang chu klung nor bu'i gzhal med khang zhes bya ba'i gzungs kyi tshogs kyi rig sngags dang /_gsang sngags kyi tshig mdor bsdus pa dang /_dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag thams cad kyi dkon mchog gsum 
[\[279b.2\]]gyi gdung gi byin gyi rlabs kyis rnam par 'phrul pa dag yod kyis/_dpal cho ga shes da de bzhin gshegs pa de la tshig dag zhus shig dang /_da de bzhin gshegs pas khyod la chu klung nor bu'i gzhal med khang zhes bya ba'i gzungs kyi tshogs kyi rig sngags dang /_gsang sngags 
[\[279b.3\]]kyi tshig mdor bsdus pa dag ston par 'gyur te/_bdag kyang rjes su yi rang ngo /_/khyod kyis kyang bsam pa thams cad rdzogs par gyis shig_/de nas dpal lha mo chen mo dang /_lha mo chen mo dbyangs can dang /_lha mo chen mo brtan ma dang /_lha mo chen mo 'od byed dang /_
[\[279b.4\]]lha mo chen mo gzi brjid can dang /_lha mo chen mo dge ldan dang /_lha mo chen mo ta ma la'i snying po dang /_lha mo chen mo nyi ma bdag dang /_lha mo chen mo shel can dang /_de dag la sogs pa lha gzhan khrag khrig 'bum phrag brgyad cu snyed kyis yongs su bskor cing 
[\[279b.5\]]mdun du bdar nas stan las langs te/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas dpal lha mo chen mos de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pas gsol pa/_spyod pa rnam dag dri ma'i dri med pa/_/nyi mas nyon mongs rnyog sel bstan du gsol/_/
[\[279b.6\]]chu klung gzungs kyis bdag cag skom lags na/_/bde gshegs gzungs tshogs zhi bgyid bstan du gsol/_/chu klung rig sngags gsang sngags tshig rab mchog_/thub pa rin po che yis bstan du gsol/_/des na rnyog ldan klung dag dad 'gyur bas/_/sa yi bcud 
[\[279b.7\]]rnams slan chad chab mi 'tshal/_/dus min rlung dang nyi mas gdungs pa dang /_/rdul dang than chen chen po zhi bgyid la/_/lo tog 'bras bu sus kyang mdangs mi 'phrog_/gang dag srung bar 'gyur ba bstan du gsol/_/des na nad med dran dang ldan pa dang /_/
[\[280a\]]
[\[280a.1\]]dge ba dag la spyod par gyur nas kyang /_/rgyal ba'i bstan la lta ba ngan pa po/_/ya nga ba dag rnam par spong bar 'gyur/_/rgyal bas bdag gi snying la mya ngan dang /_/nyon mongs sel bgyid mdangs ni 'grub pa dang /_/gang gis bdag ni sems can 
[\[280a.2\]]thams cad dag_/yongs smin bgyid par rngo thogs bstan du gsol/_/thub pa'i thad na lha rnams 'di dag gsol 'debs pa/_/theg pa chen po zab mo'i lam la gzhug tu gsol/_/sems can yon tan phyug po 'bras bcas 'dus pa po/_/phyogs bcu'i byang 
[\[280a.3\]]chub sems dpa' khyod la bsngags pa brjod/_/chu bo legs 'bab lo tog mi nyams bgyi slad du/_/sdig can klu rnams bzlog phyir 'di dag bstan du gsol/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dpal cho ga shes 'dus pa rnams kyi mdun du de bzhin 
[\[280a.4\]]gshegs pa ni dus su byin gyis rlob par mdzad la/_de bzhin gshegs pa da ni 'dus pa rnams kyi nang du dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa/_'byor byed chu khyim snying po zhes bya ba'i gzungs ston to/_/phyogs 
[\[280a.5\]]bcu nas 'dir lhags pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag gis de thos nas kyang phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing snyigs ma lnga can stong pa de na sems can rnams la 'byor byed chu khyim snying po zhes bya ba'i gzungs 'di rab tu ston par byed do/_/gzungs kyi 
[\[280a.6\]]rgyu des na der dus ma yin pa'i rlung dang /_nyi mas gdungs pa dang /_grang ba dang /_tsha ba dang /_char mo che dang /_than chen dag rab tu zhi bar byed do/_/des na der 'jig rten pha rol la mi lta ba'i lha dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_srin po dang /_lha ma yin dang /_grul bum dang /_
[\[280a.7\]{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]dang /_sha za dang /_srul po dang /_lus srul po dang /_mi dang /_mi ma yin pa dang /_tha na [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]dang /_bya ma rungs pa/_gtum pa/_sems can rnams la snying brtse ba med pa dang /_snying rje med par zhugs pa dag dad pa can du 'gyur ro/_/sems 
[\[280b\]]
[\[280b.1\]]'jam par 'gyur ro/_/dge ba dran par 'gyur ro/_/chos tshol ba la 'dod par 'gyur ro/_/chos srung bar 'gyur ro/_/dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung 'bar ba byed par 'gyur ro/_/gzungs 'di'i mthus de na sems can rnams tshe ring bar 'gyur ro/_/kha dog 'phel 
[\[280b.2\]]bar 'gyur ro/_/lo tog 'phel bar 'gyur ro/_/longs spyod 'phel bar 'gyur ro/_/bde ba 'phel bar 'gyur ro/_/nad med pa 'phel bar 'gyur ro/_/grags pa 'phel bar 'gyur ro/_/tshul khrims 'phel bar 'gyur ro/_/thos pa 'phel bar 'gyur ro/_/gtong 
[\[280b.3\]]ba 'phel bar 'gyur ro/_/byams pa 'phel bar 'gyur ro/_/snying rje 'phel bar 'gyur ro/_/shes rab 'phel bar 'gyur ro/_/thabs 'phel bar 'gyur ro/_/ting nge 'dzin 'phel bar 'gyur ro/_/gzungs 'phel bar 'gyur ro/_/sa rnam par dpyod pa 'phel bar 
[\[280b.4\]]'gyur ro/_/rnam par spong ba 'phel bar 'gyur ro/_/sems can yongs su smin par byed pa 'phel bar 'gyur ro/_/theg pa chen po'i bsngags pa yongs su 'phel bar 'gyur ro/_/smon lam gyi khyad par 'phel bar 'gyur ro/_/sa nas sar 'phar ba 'phel bar 'gyur 
[\[280b.5\]]ro/_/phung po dang /_khams dang /_skye mched lhag par mthong ba 'phel bar 'gyur ro/_/ngo tsha shes pa dang khrel yod pa 'phel bar 'gyur ro/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa rab tu 'dzin pa 'phel bar 'gyur ro/_/phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 
[\[280b.6\]]'das thams cad rtag par dus su dgongs pa 'phel bar 'gyur ro/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag la rtag tu dge ba'i bshes gnyen yin par 'dzin pa 'phel bar 'gyur ro/_/rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pas rnam 
[\[280b.7\]]par rtse ba 'phel bar 'gyur ro/_/nyon mongs pa thams cad skye zhing 'phel ba dang /_las 'phel ba dag las kun nas sgrol bar byed do/_/mya ngan las 'das pa bla na med pa la thug pa'i bar du dge ba'i chos thams cad kyis nyams par mi 'gyur ro/_/yongs su 
[\[281a\]]
[\[281a.1\]]nyams par mi 'gyur ro/_/tad ya thA/_swa ra bra te/_na ya bra ti/_biSh+Tha tsha ti/_a na ya bra ti/_shAstA ra bra ti/_shA ra Na bra ti/_ku mu da bra ti/_san tsI ra bra ti/_tshe da sa la bra ti/_sa ra bra te/_sa ra pa ri hA re/_sa ra bra ta pa ri hA re/_nA ya na pra ta ba ri hA re/_bi bi 
[\[281a.2\]]d+he ka pa ri hA re/_yadz+nyA pa ri hA re/_bin+du pa ri ha re/_dza la pa ri hA re/_k+She tra pa ri hA re/_dak+Sha pa ri hA re/_sa na sa pa ri hU re/_shra ba bA ng+rai/_go ma ya ba Ne/_ma da sa khe/_su na yA b+ha dra dza me la/_ban de a ra Na dzU She/_kha ra ba dzA b+he/_nA rA ya Na bi dza b+he/_u ra ga_/a ni mi She/_
[\[281a.3\]]ku dza ra b+he me/_dza ha ni ma b+he/_karma bi ra le/_shra ma sa li lai/_kha Da ga sha me/_a si nA me/_ag+ni b+ha dre/_nang+ga tum+pu re/_bA ya be/_ba ru Ne/_kan+Tha ni bra/_sha kra dz+nyA ye/_a nA tshe bye nr-I na ya/_ni le trai yad+d+ha/_bud+d+ha ad+hi Sh+Thi te swA hA/_nA rA ya ni nI la ye swA hA/_tsakra 
[\[281a.4\]]brta kra me swA hA/_bcom ldan 'das kyis 'byor byed chu khyim snying po zhes bya ba'i gzungs 'di bstan ma thag tu de nas de'i mod la sa chen po g.yos par gyur te/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed thams cad kyi sa rnam pa drug tu g.yos par gyur to/_/thams cad dang ldan pa'i 
[\[281a.5\]]'khor ji snyed lhags pa rnams kyang 'dar shig shig ste/_'khrugs shing skyo ba skyes nas sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo zhes 'dzer to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dpal lha mo chen mo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/dpal cho ga shes 
[\[281a.6\]]khyod kyis 'byor byed chu khyim snying po zhes bya ba'i gzungs ni de lta bu yin te/_de'i mthus rtsod pa dang /_'thab mo thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed do/_/klu khro bo dang /_ma rungs pa thams cad zhi bar byed do/_/gnod sbyin dang /_mi dang /_mi ma yin pa dang /_tha na ri 
[\[281a.7\]]dgas dang /_bya khro bo dang /_ma rungs pa thams cad kyang zhi bar byed do/_/dus ma yin pa'i rlung dang /_nyi mas gdungs pa dang /_grang ba dang /_tsha ba dang /_than chen thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed do/_/lo tog thams cad 'phel zhing 'grub par byed do/_/sems can 
[\[281b\]]
[\[281b.1\]]rnams tshe ring bar byed do/_/longs spyod 'phel bar byed do/_/las 'phel ba sgrol bar byed pa'i bar du byed do/_/mya ngan las 'das pa bla na med pa la thug gi bar du dge ba'i chos thams cad kyis nyams par mi 'gyur ro/_/yongs su nyams par mi 'gyur ro/_/la la zhig gzungs 
[\[281b.2\]]chen po 'di nyan tam/_klog gam/_sgrub par byed na de phyis 'gal ba med pa'i chos dang /_sdom pa gsum la gnas par 'gyur ro/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sa'i snying pos gsol pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das 'dir bdag gis kyang mtshon cha'i stobs zhes bgyi ba'i 
[\[281b.3\]]gzungs chen po bshad par bgyi'o/_/mtshon cha'i stobs zhes bgyi ba'i gzungs des sems can rnams kyi longs spyod dang /_yongs su spyod pa thams cad kyi ched du sa'i bcud thams cad nyams par mi 'gyur lags so/_/yongs su nyams par mi 'gyur lags so/_/
[\[281b.4\]]sa'i bcud kyi mdangs rnams gang gis kyang dbrog par rngo mi thogs lags so/_/dbugs gdug pa gtong ba'am/_bskam par yang rngo mi thogs lags so/_/rtsub pa dang /_ro ma mchis par bgyi bar rngo mi thogs lags so/_/nyams pa dang ma mchis par bgyi bar 
[\[281b.5\]]rngo mi thogs lags so/_/dog sa las lo thog mi 'khrung bar bgyi bar rngo mi thogs lags so/_/rtsub pa dang /_ro ma mchis par bgyi bar rngo mi thogs lags so/_/lo tog gi sa bon dang /_myu gu dang /_'dab ma dang /_me tog dang /_'bras bu dang /_'bru 
[\[281b.6\]]dang /_sman rnams kyi mdangs 'phrog par rngo mi thogs lags so/_/de la dbugs gdug pa gtong ba'am/_bskam par yang rngo mi thogs lags so/_/rtsub pa'am/_ro ma mchis par bgyi ba yang rngo mi thogs lags so/_/ma smin pa rnams chab stsal bar 
[\[281b.7\]]yang rngo mi thogs lags so/_/lhags pa dang /_tsha ba dag gis tshig pa dang /_'tshal du mi rung bar bgyi bar rngo mi thogs lags so/_/'tshal ba tsam gyis sems can la la'i lus la dbugs gdug pa gtang bar rngo mi thogs lags so/_/gzhi de lta bu las 
[\[282a\]]
[\[282a.1\]]sems can rnams kyis zas 'tshol ba slon nas lta bro 'tshal ba dang /_yan lag dang nying lag bro 'tshal cing 'khums par bgyi bar rngo mi thogs lags so/_/rims nad dang /_brjed byed dang /_sems g.yengs pa dang /_dran pa nyams par bgyid par rngo mi 
[\[282a.2\]]thogs lags so/_/phan tshun thab mo dang dmag bgyid par rngo mi thogs lags so/_/kha cig srog gcod pa dang /_ma byin par len pa la mi sbyor ba nas log par lta ba la mi sbyor ba'i bar gyi chos de dag gis sems can rnams kyi sems la sbyor la/_lha dang /_klu 
[\[282a.3\]]dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_srin po dang /_grul bum dang /_mi 'am ci dang /_dri za dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]dang /_sha za dang /_srul po dang /_lus srul po dang /_mi dang mi ma yin pa dag gis kyang sems can rnams la gnod pa de lta bu dag bgyi bar rngo mi thogs lags so/_/
[\[282a.4\]]tad ya thA/_nA bi/_ma hA nA bi/_k+Shu k+Sha ra nA be/_a bing gu/_nA be/_sang sho Sha Na/_nA be/_ni rA dza kha be/_a ba ra mu ni/_ta ru Na ru he/_na rA pad tre/_dza ba pra me/_mA su ra tre/_ti mi ra pad tre/_khaN Da ni ra hA re/_tsak+Sho b+ha se/_ga Na bi me/_k+Shi ti/_two ye swA hA/_ang
