[\[282a.5\]]gu rak+She swA hA/_puSh+pa ma ye swA hA/_pha la ni ma b+he swA hA/_na mo to ye swA hA/_sha rI ra na ba kra ma bI Sha swA hA/_dpal cho ga shes khyod kyi mtshon cha'i stobs zhes bya ba'i gzungs chen po ni de yin te/_mtshon cha'i stobs zhes bya ba'i gzungs chen po'i mthu des ni sems can 
[\[282a.6\]]rnams la de lta bur rgyas par byed do/_/bde ba chen po skyed par byed do/_/rgyu des na des sems can rnams myur du 'dul bar 'gyur ro/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa'i snying po de la thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor lhags pa rnams kyis kyang legs so 
[\[282a.7\]]zhes bya ba byin zhing /_bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang legs so zhes bya ba gnang ste/_rigs kyi bu legs so legs so/_/rigs kyi bu khyod ni sems can rnams kyi rtsi sman yin zhing sems can rnams kyi sman par gyur pa'o/_/'di ltar gling bzhi pa 'di'i sems can 
[\[282b\]]
[\[282b.1\]]thams cad kyi 'bru dang /_rtsi sman yin zhing sdug bsngal thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa'o/_/bde bar sbyar ba thams cad sbyin par byed do/_/snying rje chen po kun nas slong ba dang mtshungs par ldan pa'o/_/mtshon cha'i stobs zhes bya ba'i gzungs chen po shin tu zab pa de lta bu ston 
[\[282b.2\]]pa yin no/_/gzungs chen po des ni 'di na sems can rnams kyi sa'i bcud kyi mdangs dang /_sa bon dang /_myu gu dang /_'dab ma dang /_me tog dang /_ro dang /_'bru dang /_sman rnams mi nyams shing skyon med la 'phel zhing 'byor par byed do/_/sems can gang dag 
[\[282b.3\]]gis zos pa de dag gi rgyud la rtsod pa'i rnyog pa thams cad zhi bar byed do/_/'dir sems can rnams dge ba'i chos thams cad la spyod par 'gyur ro/_/gling bzhi pa 'dir dus ma yin pa'i rlung dang /_nyi mas gdungs pa dang /_tsha ba dang /_grang ba dang /_char mo che dang /_
[\[282b.4\]]than chen dang /_zla ba dang /_nyi ma dang /_gza' dang /_rgyu skar dang /_nyin mtshan dang /_zla ba dang /_zla ba phyed pa dang /_lo dang /_dus tshigs log pa thams cad nye bar zhi bar byed do/_/gzungs chen po bstan pa des ni nga'i dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung dang /_chos kyi 
[\[282b.5\]]tshul yun ring du gnas par 'gyur ro/_/gal te 'dir mun pa can skal ba chung ba/_rgyags pa dang /_dregs pas khengs shing dge ba'i rtsa ba ma bskyed pa/_rgyal rigs gdol pa dang /_blon po gdol pa dag gis 'di ltar nga'i bstan pa dka' bas bsgrubs pa dang /_nga'i 
[\[282b.6\]]dge slong dang /_dge slong ma dang /_dge bsnyen dang /_dge bsnyen ma dag la 'tshe bar byed pa nas rgyu des na lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dag 'khrug par mi byed pa'i bar du'o/_/de bzhin du sems can rnams la bde bar sbyar ba thams cad 'byung ba ni sngar ji skad gsungs pa bzhin no/_/'dus 
[\[282b.7\]]pa chen po theg pa chen po'i mdo bco lnga pa ri'i snying po'i le'u las than chen rab tu zhi bar byed pa'i mtshon pa ste gsum pa rdzogs so//_//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dpal lha mo chen mo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/dpal lha mo cho ga shes sngon de bzhin 
[\[283a\]]
[\[283a.1\]]gshegs pa dbang po'i tog gi rgyal mtshan rgyal po'i spyan sngar bdag cag gnyis kyis phan tshun dam bcas pa de bzhin du/_bdag cag gnyis kyi bsam pa yongs su rdzogs shing grub bo/_/de nas dpal lha mo chen mos 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bcom 
[\[283a.2\]]ldan 'das de lta lags so/_/btsun pa bde bar gshegs pa de lta lags te/_skol gyi bsam pa rdzogs lags so/_/sngon skol gyis de bzhin gshegs pa dbang po'i tog gi rgyal mtshan rgyal po'i spyan sngar phan tshun dam bcas pa bzhin 'di ltar skol gyi bsam pa 
[\[283a.3\]]yongs su grub ste/_da ltar khyod nyid ni de bzhin gshegs pa ste 'jig rten du byung la/_da ltar bdag gis ni dpal gyi go 'phang thob pa lags so/_/da ltar bdag gis sems can rnams la sems can yongs su smin par rngo mi thogs par gyur pa de ci'i slad du zhe na/_'di 
[\[283a.4\]]na klu glang po che lta bu dang /_klu rta lta bu dang /_klu sbrul lta bu dang /_klu nya lta bu dang /_klu sbal pa lta bu de dag dus 'dir yang bsgrub par bgyid lags so/_/bdag gis 'jig rten snang bar byed pa zab mo dag bstan pa na gang dag dus ma lags pa'i lhags pa dang /_tsha ba 
[\[283a.5\]]dang /_sprin dang /_khug rna dang /_rdzi char dang /_char mo che dang /_than chen dag 'byung bar bgyid pa/_sems can rnams kyi lo tog dang /_lo ma dang /_me tog dang /_'bras bu dang /_'bru dang /_sman rnams ma rung bar bgyid pa'i klu dang /_klu chen po de dag ma 
[\[283a.6\]]bskrad lags so/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das dus 'dir da ltar gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na klu dang /_klu chen po dang /_klu'i 'khor dang /_skyes pa dang /_bud med dang /_khye'u dang /_bu mo dang /_gling bzhi pa 'di na gang kha cig klu'i skye gnas pa 
[\[283a.7\]]de dag thams cad da ltar 'dir mchis pa rnams dang /_phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag da ltar 'dus pa chen po 'dir mchis pa rnams dang /_da ltar 'dir lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_srin 
[\[283b\]]
[\[283b.1\]]po dang /_dri za dang /_mi 'am ci dang /_lha ma yin dang /_lto 'phye chen po dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]dang /_sha za dang /_srul po dang /_lus srul po 'dus pa thams cad dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos dang /_mi dang mi ma yin pa de dag da ltar 'dus pa chen po 'dir 
[\[283b.2\]]chos nyan pa'i slad du/_bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar mchis pa'i sems can de dag thams cad zas bzhi la rten cing 'tsho bar bgyid lags so/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das da lta'i dus su klu khro bo phung bar bgyid pa dag zhi bar mdzad du gsol/_gang dag klu khro 
[\[283b.3\]]bo rnams ni bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' la mngon par ma dad pas rtag par yang sgrub par bgyid pa/_sems can rnams la tho 'tshams pa/_sems can rnams kyi longs spyod pa dang nye bar spyod pa dag ma rung bar bgyid pa/_'jig rten pha rol la mi lta ba/_sems can 
[\[283b.4\]]rnams la snying brtse ba ma mchis shing snying rje ma mchis par zhugs pa/_sdang ba/_rtsub pa lags te/_bdag sems can yongs su smin par bgyid pa la bar chad bgyid pa lags pas/_de dag gi don du bcom ldan 'das kyis thugs rje chen po bskyed du gsol/_
[\[283b.5\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis de dag gi sdig pa de thams cad zhi bar mdzad du gsol/_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis klu'i gnas na gnas pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ri'i snying po la bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa mar 
[\[283b.6\]]me mdzad kyi spyan sngar klu yongs su smin par brtson pas smon lam btab pa ci 'dra zhe na/_sngon dang /_da ltar dang /_ma 'ongs pa'i dus kyi klu dang /_klu chen po klu khro bo skye gnas bzhi pa dag dbugs gdug pa dang /_klu rnams kyi mig gdug pa dang /_reg pa gdug pa dang /_
[\[283b.7\]]lce gdug pa dang /_'dod chags kyi dug dang /_zhe sdang gi dug dang /_gti mug gi dug dang /_klu khro bo rnams kyi sdig pa'i chos dag ci nas kyang chos dang ldan pas bsal bar nus par bya'o/_/ci nas kyang klu khro bo de dag gis sems can rnams kyi longs spyod dang /_
[\[284a\]]
[\[284a.1\]]nye bar spyod pa dang /_yo byad sna tshogs dang ldan pa rnams la gnod par mi 'gyur bar bya'o/_/dkon mchog gsum po de dag la dad pa dang /_dang ba dang /_dga' ba thob par bya'o/_/'jig rten pha rol la lta ba dang bcas shing sdig pa'i chos rnams dang 'bral bar 
[\[284a.2\]]'gyur bar bya'o zhes smon lam btab bo/_/de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ri'i snying pos bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag gis gang dag klu khro bo de dag ni gnas der zhugs te mchis 
[\[284a.3\]]nas klu rnam par bsgyings pa'i gnas zhes bgyi ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas gnas par bgyi lags so/_/ting nge 'dzin gyi mthus bdag gis de dag gi khro ba dang /_nga rgyal dang /_dregs pa dang /_'dod chags de dag nye bar zhi bar bgyi lags so/_/de dag 'jam 
[\[284a.4\]]pa dang /_snod du rung ba dang /_sems zhi bar 'gyur ba dang /_sems 'jig rten pha rol la lta bar 'gyur ba dang /_sems can thams cad la sems byams pa dang /_snying rje ba dang /_snying brtse ba dang /_sems brtse ba can du 'gyur bar bgyi lags so/_/klu khro bo dang /_
[\[284a.5\]]klu ma rungs pa rnams dad par 'gyur bar bgyi lags so/_/sems can thams cad la mi 'tshe zhing snying brtse ba can gyi sems kyi sa la gnas par bgyi lags so/_/gzhan yang gang dag rdzi char dang /_char mo che dang /_than chen dang /_sprin dang /_sprin chen dang /_
[\[284a.6\]]lhags pa dang /_tsha ba dag gis gnod par gyur pa'i sems can de dag gis thal mo sbyar te/_bdag gi ming brjod nas 'di skad du ri'i snying po thugs rje rgya che ba/_klu yongs su smin par mdzad pa/_bdag cag dran lags so/_/dran lags so/_/bla na med pa'i byang chub 
[\[284a.7\]]la spyod par mdzad pa/_thabs dang ye shes sna tshogs la brtson pas mi spyod lags sam/_bdag cag sdug bsngal las thar bar mdzad du gsol/_yongs su bskyab tu gsol zhes smra ba dag gis 'di skad du brjod par bgyi'o/_/tad+ya thA/_stam b+ha b+hu dza/_bi re Du b+hu dza/_
[\[284b\]]
[\[284b.1\]]go g+ha bi re dzra b+hu dza/_me ru b+hu dza/_ga tu ba b+hu dza/_hUM hUM/_a ne ba b+hu dza/_sma ra b+hu dza/_sma ra a brta b+hu dza/_ni ma ba b+hu dza swA hA/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das sems can gang kha cig klu khro bo de dag gi rgyus gnod pa dag gis gnod pa bgyis par gyur pa de lta bu de dag gis bdag 
[\[284b.2\]]gi ming nas brjod par bgyi zhing /_klu khro bo/_nga rgyal can/_dregs pa/_phrag dog dang /_'dod chags kyi sems zhi bar bgyi ba'i slad du gsang sngags 'don pa na bdag gis lha'i rna ba rnam par dag pa mi las 'das pas thos nas skye gnas bzhi pa'i klu dang /_klu chen po 
[\[284b.3\]]dang /_klu rgan po dang /_klu'i bu dang /_klu'i 'khor rnams dad par ma bgyis sam/_dus ma lags par don ched ya nga ba la zhugs pa dag ma bzlog gam/_de'i tshe dus ma lags pa'i char mo che dang /_than chen dang /_dus ma lags pa'i lhags pa dang /_tsha ba 
[\[284b.4\]]dang /_rlung dang /_sprin dang /_'khrug pa dag rab tu zhi bar ma bgyis sam/_bdag gis bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis sems can de dag gi bsam pa dag yongs su rdzogs par ma bgyis na/_bdag gis dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams 
[\[284b.5\]]cad bslus par gyur cig_/bdag nyid kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar ma gyur cig_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag gis sngon 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa mar me mdzad 'khor tshogs pa dang bcas 
[\[284b.6\]]pa'i spyan sngar sems can yongs su smin par bgyi ba'i slad du smon lam brtan por btab ste/_shin tu gnas par gyur lags so/_/de'i 'og tu yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag snyed 'tsho zhing gzhes pa 'khor tshogs 
[\[284b.7\]]pa dang bcas pa'i spyan sngar smon lam brtan po 'di lta bu dag btab ste/_bdag gis der rtag par sems can yongs su smin par bgyi ba'i slad du pha rol gnon pa'i brtson 'grus chen pos shin tu brtan par gnas par bgyi'o zhes brtson par bgyis lags so/_/da ltar 
[\[285a\]]
[\[285a.1\]]bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar yang klu khro bo rnams yongs su smin par bgyi ba'i slad du rtsol ba brtan por bgyis la/_bdag gis de lta bu'i rtsol ba brtan pos brtson 'grus brtsams pa ni bskal pa grangs ma mchis par skad cig tsam yang btang ma myong 
[\[285a.2\]]lags so/_/bdag gis rtag par pha rol gnon pa'i rtsol ba dang /_brtson pa brtan pos sems can yongs su smin par bgyis lags pa rnams kyang yang yongs su smin par bgyi lags so/_/gzhan yang bdag gis klu'i dbang po dag theg pa chen po'i spyod pa 
[\[285a.3\]]la brtson par bgyis lags te/_klu glang po che rnams kyi bdag po klu'i rgyal po shin tu rab gnas 'di dang /_klu sbrul rnams kyi bdag po klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang /_bsnyen dga' bo 'di gnyis dang /_klu rta rnams kyi bdag po klu'i rgyal po ma dros pa 'di dang /_klu 
[\[285a.4\]]nya rnams kyi bdag po klu'i rgyal po chu lha dang /_klu sbal pa rnams kyi bdag po klu'i rgyal po yid [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]'di rnams te/_klu de lta bu dag ni sems can rnams la gnod pa bgyid par rngo thogs pa dag go/_/klu'i rgyal po gzhan de lta bu de dag kyang rang rang gi mthus 
[\[285a.5\]]sems can rnams la de lta bur gnod pa bgyid par rngo thogs pa dag go/_/'di ltar theg pa chen po la rab tu zhugs pa'i rgyal po chen po de dag thams cad kyis kyang so so rang rang gi 'khor dang /_dpung gi tshogs rnams dus ma lags par de lta bur ya nga ba bsgrubs pas 
[\[285a.6\]]rang rang gi 'khor rnams bskyod par bgyid lags so/_/'di ltar 'dir bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa chos sgron ma dang /_dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung myur du mi 'chad par bgyi ba'i slad du 'khor der mchis pa rnams kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen 
[\[285a.7\]]po ri'i snying po klu'i drang srong la legs sa zhes bgyi ba stsal to/_/de'i tshe klu'i rgyal po shin tu rab gnas stan las langs te/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag la rten 
[\[285b\]]
[\[285b.1\]]pa'i klu dang /_klu'i rgyal po gang dag sgo nga las skye ba dang /_mngal nas skye ba dang /_drod dang gsher las skye ba dang /_rdzus te skye ba'i klu de dag gang na bcom ldan 'das kyi 'khor nyan thos rnams dang /_'khor byang chub sems dpa' de dag la phan tshun byams pa'i sems dang 
[\[285b.2\]]ldan pa dang /_yul 'khor der sha khon ma mchis pa'i sems kyis gnas par 'gyur lags so/_/gnod sems ma mchis pa dang /_sems mnyam pas gnas par 'gyur lags so/_/gang dag yul 'khor de'i rgyal po de dag kyang /_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[285b.3\]]kyi bstan pa la sems shin tu dad par 'gyur lags so/_/de dag bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa yang 'dzin par 'gyur lags so/_/dbang phyug gis rgyags pa dang dregs pas bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa 'jig par mi 'gyur lags so/_/dge slong dang /_dge slong ma 
[\[285b.4\]]dang /_dge bsnyen dang /_dge bsnyen ma dag la 'tshe bar mi 'gyur lags so/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi slad du rab tu byung nas skra bregs te gos ngur smrig bgos pa/_snod du gyur pa dang /_snod du ma gyur pa lhag pa'i bsam pa can rnams kyang bcom ldan 'das 
[\[285b.5\]]kyi bstan pa 'dzin par bgyid lags so/_/gzhan yang yul 'khor de na gang dag mi rnams bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa de'i tsher mar gyur pa de dag chos dang ldan pas skrod par bgyid lags so/_/de nas yul 'khor der dge sbyong dang /_bram ze bsod snyoms pa 
[\[285b.6\]]rnams la sngon gyi rgyal po dag gis sngon lhag pa'i bsam pas sbyin pa phul ba rnams rgyal rigs dge bas 'phrog par mi bgyid la/_rgyal rigs dge ba blon po dang /_mdun na 'don dang /_skye bo dmag mi rnams dang bcas pas tshogs sbyor ba ni don ched la brtson pa 
[\[285b.7\]]lags so/_/snying po blangs pa lags so/_/lag brkyang nas lhug par gtong ba lags te/_rgyal rigs dge ba de yul 'khor dang bcas par srung bar bgyi lags so/_/yongs su bskyang bar bgyi lags so/_/de'i yul phyogs na rtsod pa'i rnyog pa thams cad 
[\[286a\]]
[\[286a.1\]]dang /_so so'i 'khor dag sngar ji skad bstan pa bzhin bskrad par bgyi lags so/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_chos gos ngur smrig kha bsgyur ba 'di ni sngon gyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa lags so/_/byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[286a.2\]]rnams kyi rgyal mtshan lags so/_/mya ngan las 'das par mchi ba rnams kyi lam lags so/_/nyon mongs pa rnams kyi ral gri lags so/_/mya ngan las 'das pa'i sa bon lags so/_/lam las rab tu nyams pa rnams kyi sgron ma lags so/_/phung po rnams 
[\[286a.3\]]kyi sman lags so/_/ma rig pa'i mun pa'i rlung lags so/_/ngan 'gro rnams kyi srog shing lags so/_/nyon mongs pa'i skyon gyis nyams par gyur pa rnams kyi skyug sman lags so/_/dgra rnams kyi rdo rje lags so/_/dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyi gter lags 
[\[286a.4\]]so/_/sdig pas gos pa rnams kyi chab lags so/_/nongs pa bgyid pa rnams kyi me long lags so/_/sems g.yengs pa rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin lags so/_/ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi za ma tog lags so/_/pha rol tu phyin pa rnams kyi sa gzhi lags so/_/
[\[286a.5\]]gzungs rnams kyi nor bu lags so/_/bzod pa rnams kyi khyim lags so/_/sa rnams kyi snod lags so/_/phas kyi rgol ba rnams kyi mkhar lags so/_/nad pa rnams kyi sman pa lags so/_/bslab pa rnams kyi ri lags so/_/nyon mongs pas kun 
[\[286a.6\]]nas gdungs pa rnams kyi zla ba lags so/_/lta ba ngan par ltung ba rnams kyi nyi ma lags so/_/ye shes kyi rgya mtsho lags so/_/byang chub kyi phyogs pa rnams kyi phreng bar gyur pa lags so/_/thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi bum pa bzang po lags so/_/
[\[286a.7\]]chos gos ngur smrig 'di ni yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che dang 'dra ba lags so/_/chos gos ngur smrig 'di ni sems can rnams la chos kyi char dbab pa'i don gyi slad du sangs rgyas thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa lags so/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar 
[\[286b\]]
[\[286b.1\]]gang dag rgyal rigs gdol pa de dag ni/_bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa 'jig par bgyid cing dge slong dag la tho 'tshams par bgyid pa nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi slad du rab tu byung ba snod du gyur pa dang /_snod du ma gyur pa'i lus la gnod pa bgyid pa dang /_
[\[286b.2\]]nor 'phrog pa dang /_srog gi bar chad dag bgyid pa'i bar du'o/_/yul 'khor der gang dag sangs rgyas la dad pa'i lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_srin po dang /_lha ma yin dang /_grul bum dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]mthu bo che de dag thams cad kyang rgyal 
[\[286b.3\]]rigs gdol pa la gshe bar 'gyur te/_de dag gis de'i yul 'khor du thab mo dang /_rtsod pa dang /_lo nyes dang /_nad dang /_pha rol gyi dmag tshogs dag 'byung bar bgyid lags so/_/dus ma lags pa'i char mo che dang /_than chen dang /_lhags 
[\[286b.4\]]pa dang /_tsha ba dang /_rlung dang /_nyi mas gdungs pa dag gis sa bon dang /_myu gu dang /_'dab ma dang /_me tog dang /_'bras bu dang /_'bru dang /_sman dang /_ro rnams ma rung bar bgyid kyang de na klu rnams la skyon ni ma mchis lags te/_de na klu rnams 
[\[286b.5\]]rgyu des na grags pa ma lags pas ni gos par 'gyur lags so/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das dper bgyi na yul gyi bud med bzang mos zas ngan pa 'tshal na dbugs dri mi bda' bar 'gyur lags so/_/de bzhin du rgyal rigs gdol pas kyang rgyal 
[\[286b.6\]]rigs kyi chos rnams spangs nas dmangs rigs kyi chos rnams spyod par bgyid na/_yul phyogs thams cad srung ba'i lha nas [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]mthu bo che dag gi bar du khros par 'gyur te/_de dag gis yul 'khor ma rung bar bgyid la/_klu dang klu chen po rnams 
[\[286b.7\]]grags pa ma lags pas kyang gos par 'gyur lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_klu'i bdag po rgyal po rnams rgyal po'i bslab pa'i gzhi gnas par bstan pa de dang de dag mtho ris dang /_mya ngan las 'das pa'i bde ba la brtson pa 
[\[287a\]]
[\[287a.1\]]yin no/_/gang dag rgyal rigs gdol pa rgyal rigs kyi bslab pa la mi gnas pa de dag ni sems can dmyal ba mnar med pa'i bar la gzhol ba yin no/_/klu'i bdag po nga rang gi 'khor bslab pa las mi 'da' bar bstan pa des na de dag da ltar gyi dus dang /_ma 
[\[287a.2\]]'ongs pa'i dus su nga'i bstan pa dang /_dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung med par mi byed par 'gyur ro/_/gsol pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das de lta lags so/_/btsun pa bde bar gshegs pa de lta lags so/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das yul 'khor gang dang gang 
[\[287a.3\]]dag na grong dang /_grong khyer dang /_grong rdal dang /_ljongs dang /_ri brags kyi gnas yul 'khor de na bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos tshul khrims dang ldan zhing thos pa mang po sbyin gnas de lta bu dag gnas shing mchis pa der bdag gi 'khor gang dag klu dang /_klu mo dang /_klu rgan 
[\[287a.4\]]po dang /_klu rgan mo dang /_klu'i bu pho dang /_klu'i bu mo dang /_klu'i 'khor pho dang /_klu'i 'khor mo rnams dus ma lags par rdzi char dang /_ser drag dang /_char mo che dang /_than chen dag gtong bar bgyid dam/_lhags mo che dang /_shin tu tsha ba dang /_nyi mas gdungs 
[\[287a.5\]]pa dag 'byung bar bgyid dam/_sems can rnams kyi lo tog dang /_me tog dang /_'bras bu dang /_'bru dang /_sman gyi ro dang /_longs spyod dang /_yongs su spyod pa dag chab 'tshal bar bgyid na klu de dag gis bdag bslus pas de'i lus thams cad 'khums par gyur cig_/
[\[287a.6\]]de dag rdzu 'phrul dang bral nas 'gro mi nus par gyur cig_/rims nad kyis gdungs par gyur cig_/longs spyod thams cad dang bral bar gyur cig_/spobs pa med par gyur cig_/don byed mi nus par gyur cig ces mnas bsgag par bgyi'o/_/tad+ya thA/_nA ga dzan du 
[\[287a.7\]]she/_nA ga me ne/_nA ga d+ha ra gU g+h+ra gU g+h+ra/_dza la gU g+h+ra/_a bi mA ra ge/_sa ha sra mu khe/_ka la ti ma pu se/_nA ga stam b+ha ri/_dza ya ba pha le/_bi mu sha krai swA hA/_thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor gyis de nyid du legs so zhes bya ba byin no/_/de nyid kyi tshe thams cad dang ldan pa'i 
[\[287b\]]
[\[287b.1\]]klu'i 'khor rnams shugs drag por 'khrugs shing dngangs par gyur to/_/de'i tshe klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang /_bsnyen dga' bo gnyis stan las langs te/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das da ltar 
[\[287b.2\]]dang /_ma 'ongs pa'i dus su rgyal rigs gdol pa de dag gzhan la sbyin par ma dad cing bdag nyid longs spyod par 'tshal la/_'jungs pa longs spyod la sems kun du 'dzin cing lag mi rkyong bas dge sbyong dang /_bram ze dang /_bkren pa dang /_phongs pa dang /_'gron po 
[\[287b.3\]]slong ba rnams kun nas tshim par mi bgyid lags so/_/pho brang 'khor dang /_ljongs kyi mi dang /_'khor rnams yang dag pa'i bde bas tshim par mi bgyid lags so/_/rgyal rigs gdol pa de dag la yul phyogs srung ba'i lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_srin po 
[\[287b.4\]]dang /_lha ma yin dang /_grul bum dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]mthu bo che de dag thams cad kyang khros par gyur te/_de dag gi yul 'khor du thab mo dang /_rtsod pa dang /_mu ge dang /_nad dang /_pha rol gyi dmag tshogs dag kun du 'byung bar bgyid lags so/_/'bru dang sman gyi 
[\[287b.5\]]bar gyi ro rnams ma rung bar bgyid kyang de na klu dang /_klu chen po rnams la skyon ni ma mchis lags te/_de na klu rnams rgyu des na grags pa ma lags pas ni gos par 'gyur lags so/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das dper bgyi na phyi sa khung gi dri mi bda' ba bser 
[\[287b.6\]]mas 'tshal na dri mi bda' bar 'gyur ba de bzhin du/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das rgyal rigs gdol pa rnams kyis kyang yul phyogs thams cad srung ba dag khros par gyur te/_yul 'khor de ma rung bar bgyid lags so/_/klu rnams kyang grags pa ma lags pas 
[\[287b.7\]]gos par 'gyur lags so//_//bam po gsum pa ste tha ma/_yang na klu thams cad bdag gi bslab pa las mi 'da' bar bdag gis lung dbog par bgyi ste/_yul 'khor gang dang gang dag na grong dang /_grong khyer dang /_grong rdal dang /_ljongs dang /_
[\[288a\]]
[\[288a.1\]]ri brags kyi gnas yul 'khor de na da ltar dang ma 'ongs pa'i dus su bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos tshul khrims dang ldan zhing thos pa mang po sbyin gnas de lta bu dag gnas shing mchis pa der bdag gi 'khor gang dag klu dang /_klu mo dang /_klu rgan pho dang /_klu 
[\[288a.2\]]rgan mo dang /_klu'i bu pho dang /_klu'i bu mo dang /_klu'i 'khor pho dang /_klu'i 'khor mo sgo nga las skye ba dang /_mngal nas skye ba dang /_drod gsher las skye ba dang /_rdzus te skye ba dag dus ma lags par ra rdzi char dang /_ser drag dang /_char mo che dang /_than chen dag gtong bar 
[\[288a.3\]]bgyid dam/_lhags mo che dang /_shin tu tsha ba dang /_nyi mas gdungs pa dag 'byung bar bgyid dam/_sems can rnams kyi lo tog dang /_me tog dang /_'bras bu dang /_'bru dang /_sman dang /_ro dang /_longs spyod dang /_yongs su spyod pa dag chab 'tshal bar bgyid 
[\[288a.4\]]na klu de dag gis bdag bslus pas de'i lus thams cad 'khums par gyur cig_/de dag rdzu 'phrul dang bral nas 'gro mi nus par gyur cig_/rims nad kyis gdungs par gyur cig_/longs spyod thams cad dang bral bar gyur cig_/spobs pa med par gyur cig_/
[\[288a.5\]]don byed mi nus par gyur cig ces mnas bsgag par bgyi'o/_/tad+ya thA/_karna gU me/_kum b+ha rak+She/_bar ma gu Ne/_A ka la k+She/_bai sha ne/_bi mArga k+She/_ku na bi ra ge/_a ta sa le/_na yan tu ma b+he/_kA la ku she/_nang gu pra b+he/_gan d+har pa se swA hA/_de 
[\[288a.6\]]nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor des legs so/_/zhes bgyi ba stsal lags so/_/de nas klu'i rgyal po ma dros pa zhes bya ba nas sngar ji skad gsungs pa'i bar du'o/_/tad+ya thA/_na ba b+hi she/_na ba na ma b+hi she/_A no k+She/_na ba kuny+dza b+hi k+She/_kha ga bai kha/_
[\[288a.7\]]sa ra tro na n+ya/_pA pA ya si le/_na rA ya Na gu Ne/_bi na ste le/_da sha kra mai/_a k+Shu d+hA nye se/_A ni sa be swA hA/_klu'i rgyal po chu lha zhes bya ba nas sngar ji skad gsungs pa'i bar du'o/_/tad+ya thA/_hi ma be me/_pa li k+Shi Na gu Ne/_ru Na bin du tri Nai/_tsa rak+Sha d+ha re/_
[\[288b\]]
[\[288b.1\]]me g+ha sang kra me/_bya pu Tu ke she/_dru mo de/_mA ye ta na ku se/_tsa ra ma hi ke_/tsa lang ge/_nA nA dat+te/_ka Tu ka tU le swA hA/_sngar ji skad gsungs pa'i bar du'o/_/de'i tshe klu'i rgyal po yid [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]stan las langs te/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba 
[\[288b.2\]]btud nas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag la rten pa'i klu dang /_klu chen po de dag ni sgo nga las skye ba dang /_mngal nas skye ba dang /_drod gsher las skye ba dang /_rdzus te skye ba dag lags so/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das da ltar dang ma 'ongs 
[\[288b.3\]]pa'i dus su rgyal rigs gdol pa de dag gis rgyal rigs kyi chos spangs nas dmangs rigs kyi chos rnams spyod par bgyid de/_sems can dmyal ba mnar ma mchis pa'i bar dag la gzhol ba lags so/_/rgyal rigs gdol pa de dag gi skyon gyis klu rnams ma 
[\[288b.4\]]nongs bzhin du grags pa ma lags pas gos par 'gyur lags so/_/rgyu des na klu rnams las kyi sgrib pa dag bgyid par 'gyur lags so/_/de lta lags pas bdag cag gis ni bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' la bkur sti bgyi zhing gzung bar bgyi ste/_dper 
[\[288b.5\]]bgyi na 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po des yul gyi bud med bzang mo khrus legs par bgyis te spos kyis byugs nas gos mchog tu bzang ba bskon te/_yan lag gi dam pa mgo bo la rin po che sna bdun las grub pa'i phreng ba mang po dag btags shing dpung rgyan dang /_
[\[288b.6\]]gser skud dang /_sor gdub dang /_lag rgyan dang /_rkang rgyan dag gis brgyan nas glang po che'i bzhon pa la bskyon te/_'khor phal mo che dang lhan cig khrid pa de bzhin du da ltar 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po chos dang ldan pa/_de bzhin gshegs pas kyang 
[\[288b.7\]]bdag cag klu rnams dud 'gro'i skye gnas su bsdus pa'i lus ma snad ma nyams la/_mchog tu khro ba dang /_nga rgyal dang /_dregs pa'i dri mas bsgos pa/_bdag cag klu thams cad rgyags pas myos pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi chus bkrus lags so/_/
[\[289a\]]
[\[289a.1\]]bdag cag la ngo tsha shes pa dang /_khrel yod pa'i gos bskon lags so/_/byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun gyi phreng bas bcings lags so/_/bdag cag gi sems dang /_yid dang /_rnam par shes pa dag bzod pa dang /_gzungs dang /_sa 
[\[289a.2\]]rnam pa sna tshogs kyis legs par brgyan lags so/_/theg pa chen po'i shing rta dag gis bteg lags so/_/gang na sangs rgyas kyi zhing snyigs ma lnga dang bral ba shin tu yongs su dag par sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs yongs su dag pas 
[\[289a.3\]]bskor nas theg pa chen po'i chos kyi gtam dag pa dag ston pa der bdag cag mchi lags so/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_da ltar bdag cag bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' la bkur sti bgyid cing 'dzin par bgyid lags so/_/de lta lags pas bdag cag 'khor dang bcas pa 
[\[289a.4\]]bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' la shin tu gnas par bgyid lags so/_/grong dang /_grong khyer dang /_grong rdal dang /_ljongs dang /_ri brags kyi gnas gang dang gang na sems can nyan thos kyi theg pa pa dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa dang /_theg pa chen po pa dag khyim 
[\[289a.5\]]na gnas pa'am/_rab tu byung ba'am/_tshul khrims dang ldan pa'am/_tshul khrims 'chal pa'am/_thos pa mang ba'am/_thos pa nyung ba'am/_brtson 'grus brtsams pa'am/_le lo can nam/_mnyam par gzhag pa'am/_mnyam par ma gzhag pa'am/_dran 
[\[289a.6\]]pa dang ldan pa'am/_dran pa nyams pa rnams bcom ldan 'das dang /_chos dang /_dge 'dun dang /_'phags pa dgyes pa'i tshul khrims dag la dga' zhing dad pa dang /_bkur sti dang /_bla mar bgyid pa dang /_ri mo bgyid pa dang /_byang chub rnam gsum gang yang rung ba dag 
[\[289a.7\]]la rab tu zhugs pa/_bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos sbyin gnas de lta bu dag gnas shing mchis pa de dang der bdag cag yid kyis dga' zhing dad pa dang /_bkur sti dang /_bla mar bgyi ba dang /_ri mo dag gis gnas par bgyi lags so/_/yul 'khor de dang de'i grong dang /_grong 
[\[289b\]]
[\[289b.1\]]khyer dang /_grong rdal dang /_ljongs dang /_ri brags der bdag gi 'khor klu dang /_klu mo dang /_klu rgan pho dang /_klu rgan mo dang /_klu'i bu dang /_klu'i bu mo dang /_klu'i 'khor pho dang /_klu'i 'khor mo dag dus ma lags par rdzi char dang /_ser drag dang /_char mo che dang /_than chen dag gtong bar 
[\[289b.2\]]bgyid dam/_lhags mo che dang /_shin tu tsha ba dag 'byung bar bgyid dam/_sems can rnams kyi lo tog dang /_lo ma dang /_me tog dang /_'bras bu dang /_'bru dang /_sman gyi ro dang /_longs spyod dang /_yongs su spyod pa dag chab 'tshal bar bgyid na klu de dag gis bdag bslus pas de dag 
[\[289b.3\]]thams cad kyi lus 'khums par gyur cig_/de dag rdzu 'phrul nyams nas 'gro mi nus par gyur cig_/rims nad kyis kun tu gdungs par gyur cig_/dbang po thams cad ma tshang bar gyur cig_/longs spyod dang yongs su spyod pa thams cad dang bral bar gyur cig_/las byed 
[\[289b.4\]]mi nus par gyur cig_/tad+ya thA/_bud+ha dza ye/_bA la k+She/_a ma ni me/_b+hu ta sa li le/_a na mang d+h+ye/_pra t+ya ni le/_a ba ni la me/_khi la sho me/_nastu pi pA le/_dzi sa dzi hA/_skan d+ha pA le/_b+ha ra ni kri ye swA hA/_der thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor ji snyed lhags pa rnams bzhin 
[\[289b.5\]]dang mig yid du 'ong bas shin tu dgod cing thal mo sbyar nas legs so zhes bya ba byin te/_'di skad du skyes bu dam pa khyod sems can thams cad la phan par 'dod pa yin te/_skyes bu dam pa khyod kyis de ltar bya ba ni legs so legs so zhes smras nas/_thams cad dang ldan 
[\[289b.6\]]pa'i klu'i 'khor de dag shugs drag pos 'khrugs shing dngangs la kun tu 'gul zhing mngon par mi dga' ba dang kun tu 'khor bar gyur to/_/de'i tshe dri za'i drang srong dga' bar 'byung ba zhes bya ba stan las langs te/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud 
[\[289b.7\]]nas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor dang bcas pa bdag la dgongs su gsol/_da ltar dang ma 'ongs pa'i dus su gang dag rgyal rigs gdol pa blun po mkhas so snyam pa'i nga rgyal can nga rgyal dang rgyags pas nyams pa/_'jig rten pha rol la mi lta 
[\[290a\]]
[\[290a.1\]]ba/_g.yo sgyu can/_snying rje ma mchis pa/_dge slong la tho 'tshams par bgyid pa nas tha na bcom ldan 'das kyi slad du skyabs su mchis nas nye bar gnas pa/_skra bregs te gos ngur smrig bgos pa la tho 'tshams pa dag 'byung ste/_bcom ldan 'das kyi slad du 
[\[290a.2\]]rab tu byung ba sangs rgyas thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa/_dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung 'bar bar bgyid pa dag la tho 'tshams pa'i rgyal rigs gdol pa de dag ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang gis mnas bsgag par bgyi ba ni longs spyod kyis 'khrugs par gyur cig_/
[\[290a.3\]]rgyal phran gyis 'khrugs par gyur cig_/rgyal pos 'khrugs par gyur cig_/nang dmag dang /_pha rol gyi dmag tshogs dag gis 'khrugs par gyur cig_/chu med pas 'khrugs par gyur cig_/nad kyis 'khrugs par gyur cig_/gzas 'khrugs par gyur cig_/
[\[290a.4\]]bya ma rtas 'khrugs par gyur cig_/rtse dgas 'khrugs par gyur cig_/pha tshan gyis 'khrugs par gyur cig_/'khor gyis 'khrugs par gyur cig_/'byung ba chen pos 'khrugs par gyur cig_/[{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]mthu bo ches 'khrugs par gyur cig ces bgyi ba nas/_
[\[290a.5\]]rgyal rigs kyis 'khrugs par gyur cig_/bram ze dang /_dmangs rigs dang /_bud med dang /_seng ge dang /_stag dang /_spyang ki dag gis 'khrugs par gyur cig ces bgyi ba'i bar du rgyal rigs gdol pa de dag mnas bsgag par bgyi lags so/_/tad+ya thA/_ba ne ya 
[\[290a.6\]]ba na pa le/_ma hA brta na trai/_dru ma ts+tsha te/_ku su ma/_ba ra Te/_yu ga te/_sam b+hA k+She/_b+hI ma dri bA k+She/_sa lo pa nA ya/_pa ri bA rai/_b+hU ma dru kra me/_nai ran ta na/_dza si la me na trai/_bai ma ba ta/_ma shrA khA dze/_na ya na hing ku le/_pi bad tsha/_b+h+ri se/_d+ha na mu tse/_sang ga byo k+Shai/_pa la min d+ha da lai/_
[\[290a.7\]]b+hU mi paSh+Te/_ro ma da lai/_ba na ga dzai/_tU Ta pa Te/_A pa Te D+ha/_na ya dri Sh+Ti/_dzi hwA kra ne/_u ta rak+She/_gan d+har b+he si mi swA hA/_gang dag rgyal rigs gdol pa 'jig rten pha rol la mi lta zhing /_bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos rnams la tho 'tshams pa de dag de ltar gyur cig_/de'i tshe 
[\[290b\]]
[\[290b.1\]]thams cad dang ldan pa'i dri za'i 'khor rnams kyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la tho 'tshams par bgyid pa'i rgyal rigs gdol pa de dag la bdag cag ci dgar bgyid du stsal du gsol/_bdag cag rang rang gi gnas na rtsed mo la chags shing 
[\[290b.2\]]yongs su spyod par bgyid dam/_dga' skyid nyams su myong bar bgyid na bdag cag kyang mna'i khongs su gtogs par gyur cig_/de'i tshe thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor ji snyed lhags pa rnams kyis legs so zhes bya ba byin no/_/de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[290b.3\]]dpa' chen po sa'i snying pos bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang ting nge 'dzin thams cad la rnam par rtse ba mngon par shes pa'i rgyal mtshan gyi srog shing zhes bya ba'i gzungs kyi sgo 
[\[290b.4\]]chen po bshad par bgyi ste/_rgyal mtshan gyi srog shing zhes bya ba'i gzungs chen po'i sgo gang gi rna lam du grag pa de'i rna ba'i nad dag rab tu zhi bar bgyid do/_/de'i 'dod chags dang /_zhe sdang dang /_gti mug la sogs pa nyon mongs pa rnams rab tu zhi bar bgyid do/_/gal 
[\[290b.5\]]te na bsrabs par 'gyur ro/_/rgya mtsho'i shun pa man dza na la gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di lan 'bum bzlas brjod bgyis nas rgyal rigs kyi rnga la bskus nas rnga de'i sgra gang dang gang gi rna lam du grag pa de dang de'i 'dod chags dang /_zhe sdang dang /_gti mug la sogs pa nyon mongs pa 
[\[290b.6\]]rnams bsrabs par 'gyur ro/_/de dang de dag bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la shin tu dga' zhing bkur sti dang /_bla mar byed pa dang /_ri mor byed pa dag rab tu 'thob par 'gyur ro/_/chos kyi rjes su 'brang bas 'jug par 'gyur ro/_/'jig rten pha rol la lta ba dang /_longs 
[\[290b.7\]]spyod dang yongs su spyod pa dang mi 'bral la sems can thams cad kyi mig tu 'ong ba dang /_snying du sdug par 'gyur ro/_/tad+ya thA/_pUrba mArga a ma lo ma ti/_k+Shit+ti la/_b+h+ru bai pra na kha na/_Dai durma khi lai/_mat+sa tU lai/_gau ra san+d+hai na k+Shu ba ra mai/_bud+d+ha ra sh+m+yi ping+ga la g+h+ri me/_lo ho tA ra b+he/_
[\[291a\]]
[\[291a.1\]]nang+ga la sU r+ye/_b+ha ga ba ri Ne/_an d+harba u re/_ka ra hru dze/_ke sha lo hi/_sa mA d+hi d+hu re swA hA/_de nas de nyid du bcom ldan 'das kyis legs so zhes bya ba gnang ngo /_/thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor des kyang legs so zhes bya ba byin no/_/de'i tshe byang chub 
[\[291a.2\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros mi zad pas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsung dbyangs dang /_sgra brjod par bgyid pa/_gdugs dang rgyal mtshan gyi smon lam gyi tshul zhes bgyi ba'i gzungs chen po de bshad 
[\[291a.3\]]par 'tshal gyis/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'khor dang bcas pa rnams bdag la rjes su yi rang bar mdzad du gsol/_de ni mthu che zhing stobs che la pha rol gnon pa snang bar bgyid pa chen po lags te/_bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos rnams kyi thos pa 
[\[291a.4\]]yongs su rdzogs par bgyid pa'i gter dang /_ye shes yongs su rdzogs par bgyid pa'i gter du 'gyur ba lags so/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bcom ldan 'das kyi slad du ji srid 'tsho'i bar du sdom pa la gnas pa 'di lta ste/_dge bsnyen gyi sdom pa dang /_dge 
[\[291a.5\]]sbyong gi sdom pa dang /_bsnyen par rdzogs pa'i sdom pa la gnas pa snod du gyur pa dang /_snod du ma gyur pa dag gis gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan gyi smon lam gyi tshul zhes bgyi ba'i gzungs chen po 'di lhag mthong gi sbyor bas nyin mtshan bdun gyi bar du klog na phyir zhing 
[\[291a.6\]]nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga po dag la rtog par 'gyur ro/_/nyin mtshan bdun 'das nas gdugs dang rgyal mtshan gyi smon lam zhes bgyi ba'i gzungs chen po lan 'bum snyed du yang dang yang dran par bgyid pa de ni rgyal rigs rnams dang /_bram ze'i rigs rnams dang /_
[\[291a.7\]]rje'u rigs rnams dang /_dmangs rigs rnams dad par bgyid pa nas sems can thams cad kyi bar du shin tu mngon par dad par bgyid pa lags so/_/thams cad longs spyod pa dang /_yongs su spyod pa rgya chen po mchog dang mi 'bral zhing mtho ris la gzhol bar 
[\[291b\]]
[\[291b.1\]]'gyur lags so/_/de sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa rnams dang skal ba mnyam par skye bar 'gyur lags so/_/tad+ya thA/_tri Ni sang nyi ke/_bi tri Na bi ma be/_ka ra prA k+She/_b+hu ta sU me tsa/_pa ra dzi me/_a b+ha k+She/_a k+Sha ya lo be/_ad+h+yad ma/_ni mi re/_shrI 
[\[291b.2\]]ta bi sta re/_ang gu dza d+ha dz+nyA/_dza dza ra no sai a na sa shud+d+he/_mr-i ga g+h+rik+She/_ku la ba Te/_ma ga bA bA/_k+She b+hau ba swa re/_a b+hi ti mab+hu re/_swa ra kha dze smr-iti mo ni swA hA/_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' blo gros mi zad pa la legs so zhes bya ba gnang ste/_
[\[291b.3\]]skyes bu dam pa khyod kyis gdugs dang rgyal mtshan gyi smon lam gyi tshul zhes bya ba'i gzungs chen po 'di bshad pas sems can dpag tu med pa rnams kyi thos pa'i mig kun tu ston par byed la/_nga'i bstan pa yang rton par byed pa ni legs so legs so/_/de 
[\[291b.4\]]nas de nyid du thams cad dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyis kyang byang chub sems dpa' blo gros mi zad pa la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/_'di skad du skyes bu dam pa khyod kyis gdugs dang rgyal mtshan gyi smon lam zhes bya ba'i gzungs chen po 'di rdzogs 
[\[291b.5\]]par bshad pas da ltar dang ma 'ongs pa'i dus su theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i sems can de dag thams cad kyi thos pa mang po'i tshogs rgyas par byed pa dang ston pa ni skyes bu dam pa legs so legs so/_/de'i tshe 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa stan las 
[\[291b.6\]]langs te/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang gling bzhi pa 'di'i me tog dang /_'bras bu dang /_shing dang /_'bru dang /_sman dang /_lo tog dag 
[\[291b.7\]]bsrung bar 'tshal lo/_/sems can rnams kyi longs spyod dang /_yongs su spyod pa dang /_rtswa dang /_'dab ma dang /_lo ma sa la rten pa rnams bsrung bar 'tshal lo/_/bcom ldan 'das nang gu dpal rdul zhes bgyi ba'i gzungs chen po de da ltar 
[\[292a\]]
[\[292a.1\]]'dir gling bzhi pa de dag gis sngon ma thos ma mthong bas 'di ltar ngo mtshar rmad du byung bar gyur te/_'dus pa chen po de lta bu dag byung bar bgyis lags so/_/nang gu dpal rdul zhes bya ba'i gzungs chen po 'di ni mthu che bas lo tog thams cad 'phel bar bgyid 
[\[292a.2\]]pa lags so/_/sa bon dang /_myu gu dang /_sdong bu dang /_'dab ma dang /_me tog dang /_'bras bu dang /_shing dang /_'bru dang /_sman dang /_ro rnams skyed par bgyid pa dang /_'phel bar bgyid pa dang /_snum mchis par bgyid pa dang /_'jam par bgyid pa dang /_mang por 
[\[292a.3\]]bgyid pa lags so/_/sems can thams cad dad par bgyid pa dang /_tshul khrims can du bgyid pa dang /_thos par bgyid pa dang /_shes par bgyid pa dang /_byams pa dang /_snying rje can du bgyid pa dang /_thabs dang ldan par bgyid pa nas byang chub kyi 
[\[292a.4\]]phyogs kyi chos thams cad kyi bar du ston par bgyid pa lags so/_/tad+ya thA/_a na n+ya b+hu mi/_ga bAk+Sha bi dze/_gu lo tsa lo me/_phaT k+Sha lo me/_shrI yak+Sha ku su me/_na ba ku mun De/_rA dza bar me/_tsa Ta na ba/_ba ma Te/_bi Shu lang ge_/a ba b+ha su 
[\[292a.5\]]ne/_ha sa ga b+ha k+She/_lo ma b+hu dza k+She/_gam b+hi ra pa su me/_a no ma ya sa re/_pa lA sha to ye swA hA/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das nang gu dpal rdul zhes bgyi ba'i gzungs chen po 'di rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo la btags te sgreng bar bgyid dam/_skad chen 
[\[292a.6\]]por sgrog gam/_gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di chu la lan stong gi bar du bzlas brjod bgyis nas/_zhing dang /_shing dang /_lo tog sna tshogs la gtor tam/_rnga dang /_rdza rnga dang /_dung dag la bsngags nas/_de dag gi sgra gang du thos pa'i lo ma dang /_
[\[292a.7\]]me tog dang /_'bras bu dang /_'bru dang /_sman gyi ro dang /_sa la rten pa'i lo tog thams cad sems can rnams kyi sngon gyi las kyi sgrib pa'i rgyu lus pa ma gtogs par lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]mthu bo che dang /_bdud dang /_
[\[292b\]]
[\[292b.1\]]bdud kyi bu dang /_bdud kyi 'khor gyi tshogs gang gis kyang gnod par bgyi ba'am/_chud gzon pa'am/_tshig par bgyi ba'am/_bskam pa'am/_mdangs 'phrog pa'am/_mthu chung bar bgyi ba'am/_ma mchis par bgyi ba dag tu rngo mi thogs na sems can dang /_
[\[292b.2\]]sems can gyi grangs su gtogs pa gzhan dag gis lta smos kyang ci 'tshal/_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa de la legs so zhes bya ba gnang ste/_rigs kyi bu khyod gling bzhi pa 'dir sbyin pa chen po'i dpal gyi shing rta la zhon nas/_rigs 
[\[292b.3\]]kyi bu 'dir bla na med pa'i byang chub kyi lam du sems can dpag tu med pa rnams rton par byed pa ni rigs kyi bu khyod legs so legs so/_/de nas de nyid du byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor thams cad kyis kyang 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/_rigs kyi 
[\[292b.4\]]bu khyod kyis de ltar byas pa ni legs so legs so/_/de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis byang chub sems dpa' byams pa la 'di skad ces smras so/_/byams pa khyod la bdag gis dpal me tog sar pa zhes bya ba'i 
[\[292b.5\]]gzungs chen po [(]sgyin [,]sbyin [)]gyis/_gzungs chen po des na rigs kyi bu khyod kyis byams pa chen po'i go bgos nas/_'dir sems can rnams la tshig gis chos ston na ting nge 'dzin gyi rnam par 'phrul pa'i stobs bskyed pa'i chos de dag sems can gang dag gis thos pa'i 
[\[292b.6\]]sdig pa'i sems dang /_sdig pa'i lta ba dag spong bar byed do/_/sdig pa'i grogs po dang /_sdig pa'i bshes gnyen dag spong bar byed do/_/sems kyis byams pa dang /_snying rje dang /_dge ba'i rtsa ba dag yid la byed par 'gyur ro/_/sems can thams 
[\[292b.7\]]cad la snying brtse ba dang /_sems 'jig rten pha rol la lta ba can du 'gyur ro/_/sems mi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dag las ldog par 'gyur ro/_/sems dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dag la rnam par gnas par 'gyur ro/_/sems sems can 
[\[293a\]]
[\[293a.1\]]thams cad la mngon par dga' bar 'gyur ro/_/gzungs chen po 'di ni/_sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'i phyir chos kyi char 'bebs par byed pa'o/_/dgra thams cad rab tu dad par byed cing bshes gnyen thams 
[\[293a.2\]]cad mngon par 'phel bar byed pa'o/_/tad+ya thA/_li ba ta swa re/_kA shA ya/_bar me/_sa me bag g+he/_dwA rang ga dza le/_su to k+She/_su ma hA b+ha k+Sha re/_su ha bung ge_/gau a ba lo ka da le/_sid d+hi b+hi ba k+She/_d+h+ya nan bI ba re/_a bi na d+ha lung be/_so 
[\[293a.3\]]tsa ra tsa la/_a ba b+ha sa re/_ba rA ha shat+te/_e ka hA da to ye/_sa mA d+hi ka ra Ne/_bA la dza bi ti/_ma hA dA b+hu ta ku se/_a ra Na ni le/_mA lA ma sha me/_ni la ku su me swA hA/_dpal me tog ser po zhes bya ba'i gzungs 'di ni byang chub sems 
[\[293a.4\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po khyod kyis byams pa chen po'i go bgos nas sems can rnams la chos ston na/_de'i sgra tha na sems can srog chags su gyur pa phra mo chung ngu gang dag gi rna lam du grag pa de dag gi sems kyi rnyog pa nye bar zhi bar byed pa dang /_de 
[\[293a.5\]]dag gi sems dge ba'i rtsa ba la gnas par yang 'gyur na mir gyur pa rnams la lta smos kyang ci dgos/_sems can la la dag gis char dbab pa'i phyir dri za dang /_klu'i gnas dag tu gzungs chen po 'di bzlas brjod byas te/_na le sham gyi phye ma 
[\[293a.6\]]dang /_e raN Da'i mar du bsres pa la des lan stong du bsngags nas/_gos kyi mtha' mar phur ma byas te khron par bcug na/_des na de la klu rnams dga' bar 'gyur te/_char gyi rgyun chen po yang 'bebs par byed do/_/de'i tshe yul der 
[\[293a.7\]]'dus pa'i klu dang /_klu chen po rnams kyis dpal me tog sar pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs chen po 'di thos nas sems rangs pa dang /_sdang sems med pa dang /_sems rab tu dga' ba dang /_sems byams pa dang ldan pa dang /_sems 'jig 
[\[293b\]]
[\[293b.1\]]rten pha rol la lta bar gnas par gyur to/_/sems dkon mchog gsum la dad cing /_bkur sti dang /_bla mar byed pa dang /_ri mor byed pa dag thob par gyur to/_/sems dud 'gror skye ba'i rang gi sdig pa'i las dag rab tu 'chags pa dang /_sems theg pa 
[\[293b.2\]]chen po bla na med pa la 'jug par gnas par gyur to/_/klu dang /_klu chen po de dag thams cad kyi nang nas mthu ci yod pa dang /_ci nus pa dag gis de na bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir/_kha cig ni gser mang po'i char mngon par 'bebs so/_/kha 
[\[293b.3\]]cig ni dngul dang /_a ga ru dang /_rgya spos dang /_go shir+Sha dang /_tsan dan sbrul gyi snying po'i phye ma dang /_ta ma la'i lo ma'i char dag mngon par 'bebs pa nas/_kha cig ni ut+pa la dang /_me tog sna tshogs dang /_ras bcos bu sna tshogs dang /_gdugs 
[\[293b.4\]]dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan sna tshogs dang /_gser skud dang /_mu tig gi do shal gyi bar dag gi char mngon par 'bebs so/_/de nas klu dang /_klu chen po de dag thams cad kyis bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas 
[\[293b.5\]]tshig 'thun par 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das da ltar bdag cag ni dkon mchog gsum la sems shin tu legs par rab tu zhugs pa lags so/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar bdag cag 'di rnams kyis dam bca' bar bgyi 
[\[293b.6\]]ba ni btsun pa bcom ldan 'das grong dang /_grong khyer dang /_grong rdal dang /_ljongs gang dang gang dag na dpal me tog sar pa zhes bgyi ba'i gzungs chen po 'di rab tu sgrogs pa dang /_de bzhin du gzungs lhag ma chu khyim snying po zhes bgyi ba dang /_mtshon 
[\[293b.7\]]cha'i stobs zhes bgyi ba dang /_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan gyi smon lam gyi tshul zhes bgyi ba dang /_nang gu dpal rdul zhes bgyi ba dang /_dpal me tog sar pa zhes bgyi ba'i gzungs chen po rnams dang /_rgyal po chen po bzhis bshad pa'i gzungs 
[\[294a\]]
[\[294a.1\]]de dag dang /_klu'i snying po bzhi po dag grong dang /_grong khyer dang /_grong rdal dang /_ljongs dang /_ri brags kyi gnas gang dang gang dag tu re re tsam yang ston tam/_'chad dam/_rab tu sgrogs sam/_dran par bgyid pa de dang de dag tu bdag cag 
[\[294a.2\]]gis dus dus su char dbab pa dang /_gdugs dang /_bser ma dag gtong bar bgyi'o/_/dus ma lags par ni ma lags so/_/de dang der bdag cag gis phyi dgra dang /_nang 'khrug dang /_thab mo dang /_rtsod pa dang /_gnod sems dang /_nad 
[\[294a.3\]]dang /_mi ngas dang /_mu ge dag rab tu zhi bar bgyi lags so/_/de dang der bdag cag gis skyid pa dang /_lo legs pa dang /_dga' bar 'gyur ba dag bsgrub par bgyi lags so/_/de dang der sems can rnams kyi sa bon dang /_myu gu dang /_sdong bu dang /_
[\[294a.4\]]'dab ma dang /_me tog dang /_'bras bu dang /_shing dang /_'bru dang /_sman dang /_ro dag mi nyams par 'phel bar bgyi lags so/_/longs spyod dang /_yongs su spyod pa phal cher dri zhim pa dang /_ro zhim pa dang /_snum pa dang /_'jam pa dag tu 
[\[294a.5\]]bsgrub par bgyi lags so/_/bdag cag gis 'dzam bu'i gling 'di'i rgyal po rnams kyang gcig la gcig byams pa'i sems dang /_phan pa'i sems dang /_'khon ma mchis pa'i sems dang /_rtsod pa ma mchis pa'i sems su bsgrub par bgyi lags so/_/de 
[\[294a.6\]]bzhin du bram ze'i rigs dang /_rje'u rigs dang /_dmangs rigs dang /_gnod sbyin rnams nas dge bsnyen dag gi bar dag tu byams pa'i sems dang ldan par bsgrub par bgyi lags so/_/gang na gzungs chen po 'di rab tu sgrogs pa der ni phan tshun sems 
[\[294a.7\]]'thun par bsgrub par bgyi lags so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis klu de dag thams cad la legs so legs so zhes bya ba gnang ngo /_/thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor ji snyed lhags pa rnams kyis kyang legs so zhes bya ba byin no/_/de nas byang chub sems 
[\[294b\]]
[\[294b.1\]]dpa' ri'i snying pos kyang legs so zhes bya ba byin no/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dpal lha mo chen mo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/dpal cho ga shes khyod la snying brtse ba'i grogs 'di dag yod na 'dir sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir da dung du ci'i phyir 
[\[294b.2\]]gdul ba'i tshogs rnams gzhug par mi nus/_dpal lha mo chen mos gsol pa/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni smon lam gyi khyad par gyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing snyigs ma lnga dang ldan pa thams cad du de lta bur skye ba len cing grogs dge ba'i bshes 
[\[294b.3\]]gnyen 'thun pa de lta bu dag dang phrad pa thob lags so/_/da ltar bdag kyang grogs dge ba'i bshes gnyen 'thun pa khyod lta bu dang phrad pa lags so/_/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang de'i lag tu thob ste/_de'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug kyang brjod 
[\[294b.4\]]par bgyi lags so/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su zin pa/_brtson 'grus brtsams pa ni thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la shin tu gnas par blta bar bgyi lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' 
[\[294b.5\]]stsal pa/_dpal cho ga shes khyod kyis ji skad smras pa de ltar yin te/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni smon lam gyi khyad par gyis sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi zhing snyigs ma lnga dang ldan pa thams cad du de lta bur skye 
[\[294b.6\]]ba len la/_bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi po dag la brtson zhing der brtson pa brtan pa dang /_brtson 'grus brtsams pa yin no/_/grogs dge ba'i bshes gnyen de lta bus yongs su zin pa yin no/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes de'i lag tu thob pa yin te/_
[\[294b.7\]]de'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs pa yang brjod par bya'o/_/des rnam par gnon pa yang brjod par bya'o/_/mngal gyi skyon las thar bar yang brjod par bya'o/_/mi slob pa'i sa la gnas pas zag pa zad par yang brjod par bya'o/_/de sangs rgyas bcom ldan 
[\[295a\]]
[\[295a.1\]]'das thams cad kyis dgongs pa dang /_byin gyis brlabs par yang brjod par bya'o/_/'dod chags dang bral ba'i sa la shin tu gnas par yang brjod par bya'o/_/de nas brgya byin gzi brjid dri ma med pa bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba 
[\[295a.2\]]btud nas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du 'tsho ba'i 'jig rten 'dir klu dang /_klu chen po rnams sems can rnams kyi longs spyod dang /_yongs su spyod pa dag la gnod par bgyid lags/_bka' stsal pa/_lha'i dbang po rgyu dang /_
[\[295a.3\]]rkyen gnyis kyis 'tsho ba'i 'jig rten 'dir klu dang /_klu chen po rnams sems can rnams kyi longs spyod dang /_yongs su spyod pa dag la gnod par byed do/_/gnyis gang zhe na/_'dod chags kyi dbang dang /_khro ba'i dbang gis dus ma yin pa'i sprin dag 
[\[295a.4\]]'byung bar byed cing rdzi char dang /_ser drag dag 'bebs par byed do/_/lhags pa dang /_tsha ba dag 'byung bar byed do/_/des na 'dir sems can rnams kyi sa bon dang /_myu gu dang /_'dab ma dang /_me tog dang /_'bras bu dang /_'bru dang /_sman dang /_ro 
[\[295a.5\]]dag tshig par byed do/_/skems par byed do/_/'brul bar byed do/_/ma rungs par byed do/_/des na sems can rnams longs spyod dang /_yongs su spyod pa dang mi ldan pas lus dang /_ngag dang /_yid kyis sdig pa'i las mi bzad pa rnam pa sna 
[\[295a.6\]]tshogs dag kun tu spyod par byed do/_/las kyi sgrib pa mi bzad pa des na sngon dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa thams cad kyang sreg par byed do/_/skems par byed do/_/thal bar rlog par byed do/_/dge ba'i bshes gnyen dag spong zhing ngan song gsum po dag 
[\[295a.7\]]la gzhol bar byed do/_/kha cig gos dang /_bza' ba dang /_btung ba tsam gyi phyir tshe gcig gis de lta bur sdig pa'i las mtshams med pa dag gi bar du kun tu spyod par byed de/_de bskal pa mang po zhig gi bar du phyir mir skye ba 'thob par mi 'gyur 
[\[295b\]]
[\[295b.1\]]ro/_/gal te de dag yun ring po 'das nas brgya la brgya lam na mi'i lus thob na yang kha cig ni yan lag nyams par 'gyur ro/_/kha cig ni dran pa nyams par 'gyur ro/_/gdol pa'i rigs su yang skye bar 'gyur ro/_/g.yung po'i rigs dang /_smyig ma mkhan gyi rigs 
[\[295b.2\]]dang /_bkren pa dbul po'i rigs rnams su yang skye bar 'gyur ro/_/bza' ba dang btung ba'i longs spyod dang /_yongs su spyod pa dag dang yang bral bar 'gyur la/_yang rgyu des na dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang bral nas lus dang /_ngag dang /_yid kyi las kyi sgrib 
[\[295b.3\]]pa mi bzad pa dag kun tu spyod par byed do/_/yang kha cig ngan song gsum po dang /_mnar med pa dag tu yang gzhol bar 'gyur ro/_/rigs kyi bu de ltar longs spyod dang /_nye bar spyod pa dang mi ldan pa'i sems can rnams 'khor bar yun ring du nyam thag par 'gyur ro/_/
[\[295b.4\]]ngan song gsum po dag tu sdug bsngal mi bzad pa sna tshogs dag nyams su myong bar 'gyur ro/_/gsol pa/_sdug bsngal gang cung zad ci byung ba thams cad ni zas kyi rkyen las gyur pa lags te/_zas ma mchis na sdug bsngal 'byung ba yang ma mchis lags 
[\[295b.5\]]so/_/de nas de'i tshe brgya byin gzi brjid dri ma med pas tshigs su bcad de 'di skad ces gsol to/_/sred pa'i dug gis bsgyur bas na/_/ngu ba dang ni dgod par bgyid/_/nye bar gnas shing ltung bar bgyid/_/kun tu spyod cing rnam par rgyug_/sa gzhi dag la 
[\[295b.6\]]til brdungs ltar/_/sdug bsngal 'khrul 'khor gnod par bgyid/_/lhar bcas 'jig rten thams cad la/_/de ltar sred pas gnod par bgyid/_/kye ma srid pa'i zhags pa yis/_/srid pa'i rtse mo'i mthar gtugs pas/_/de ltar zhags 'di rgya che ba/_/
[\[295b.7\]]kha zas dag gi rgyu las byung /_/so so'i skye bo rgyu gnyis kyi/_/sred pa'i rdul gyis yan lag bcings/_/[{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]zhags pas bcings pa ltar/_/'bros pa dag tu nus ma lags/_/lhar bcas 'jig rten sems can dag_/sred pas gar bgyid rtsol 
[\[296a\]]
[\[296a.1\]]ba ltar/_/gar gzhung dag la gar mkhan brgyas/_/de ni gar bgyid rtsol mi nus/_/sred pa'i dug gis bsgyur bas na/_/ji ltar skye bo myos pa ltar/_/btung ba myos bgyid bslad pa yis/_/myos pa dag tu mi bgyid do/_/sred pa'i gnod sbyin gdon dag 
[\[296a.2\]]gis/_/skye bo brlams nas 'khyal ba ltar/_/'byung po'i gdon gyis myos pa dag_/'khyal ba dag tu mi bgyid do/_/nor 'dzin de dag 'dzin pa btang /_/sred pa'i 'jigs pa rnam par spangs/_/gang gis sred pa bskams nas kyang /_/de dag 'khor bar mi 
[\[296a.3\]]gnas so/_/byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis kyang 'di skad ces gsol to/_/zhe sdang khro bas skye dgu brlams/_/sems kyang g.yeng 'gyur de yis na/_/dge ba thams cad mi 'tshal zhing /_/bzod rlag las la spyod par bgyid/_/mi 
[\[296a.4\]]dge ba la gnas bgyid pa/_/pha ma dag la rim gro chung /_/gang dag mtshams ma mchis bgyis pa/_/dkon mchog gsum la brnyas par bgyid/_/snying brtse snying rje ma mchis pa/_/'jigs bgyid gtum po drag shul can/_/khro sems dbang gis de dag ni/_/
[\[296a.5\]]sems dmyal mnar ma mchis par gnas/_/sems can 'di dag khro ba'i rgyus/_/gcig la gcig ni za bar bgyid/_/yang dang yang ni ngan song du/_/sdug bsngal du mas rab tu gzir/_/sdig pa'i sems kyis brid gyur cing /_/dge ba'i bshes gnyen spangs 
[\[296a.6\]]nas kyang /_/srid pa'i mtshor ni ltung ba ste/_/mun pa mun gnag gzhol ba po/_/de 'dra'i sems can don slad du/_/byang chub sems dpa' snying brtse ba'i/_/bsam pas bdag bde btang nas kyang /_/sems can sdig pa bsal slad du/_/byang chub spyad pa spyod pa na/_/bsod nams 
[\[296a.7\]]bgyi ba'i dngos sum gyis/_/sdig pa'i sems can grol bgyid cing /_/chos kyi rgyal mtshan bsgreng bar bgyid/_/sems can 'ga' yi don slad du/_/lus dang srog dag btang nas kyang /_/dka' thub brtul zhugs spyad ldan pa/_/dka' ba dag ni mang du spyad/_/gang tshe sems can 
[\[296b\]]
[\[296b.1\]]'ga' slad du/_/bskal brgyar sdug bsngal sel bgyid na/_/sems can rnams slad yun ring du/_/'khor bar sdug bsngal bzod par bgyi/_/sems can yongs su smin slad gnas/_/de 'dra'i bsam dang ldan pa yis/_/sems can srid pa'i bsam pa can/_/sems ni byang chub bsngo bgyid stsal/_/
[\[296b.2\]]de nas dpal lha mo chen mos byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bre bo lo tog gis bkang ba de phul nas smras pa/_gling bzhi pa 'di'i sems can rnams kyi longs spyod dang yongs su spyod pa dag gi rgyur sa bon dang /_lo tog thams cad 'phel 
[\[296b.3\]]bar bgyi ba dang /_grub par bgyi ba'i slad du skyes bu dam pa khyod la lhung bzed dbul lo/_/des na dge ba'i rtsa ba yang dag par chad pa/_ma rungs pa/_gtum po/_drag shul can kun sdug bsngal thams cad las bsgral ba dang /_byang chub kyi sa bon la bzhag par rngo thogs 
[\[296b.4\]]so/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis bre bo lo tog gis bkang ba de blangs nas phyogs bcur bltas te 'di skad ces smras so/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'khor dang 
[\[296b.5\]]bcas pa thams cad dgongs su gsol/_gang gis gling bzhi pa 'dir sa bon dang /_myu gu dang /_'dab ma dang /_me tog dang /_'bras bu dang /_'bru dang /_sman dang /_ro dang /_sa'i bcud dang /_gzi byin dang /_sems can gyi gzi byin dang /_dam pa'i chos kyi ro dang /_snying gu 
[\[296b.6\]]dang /_gzi byin dag mi nyams shing 'phel bar bgyid pa dang /_dam pa'i chos kyi sgron ma dang /_dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung rgyun mi gcad par bgyid pa dang /_gang gi de longs spyod pa dang /_nye bar spyod pa thams cad kyis sems can rnams yongs su smin par bgyid pa dang /_
[\[296b.7\]]sdig pa las zlog par bgyid pa dang /_byang chub kyi sems la dgod par rngo thogs pa dang /_gang gis 'dir sems can de dag thams cad kyis ngan song rnams yongs su spangs nas mtho ris la gzhol bar 'gyur ba dang /_gang gis dpal lha mo chen mo de'i bsam pa yongs su rdzogs 
[\[297a\]]
[\[297a.1\]]par 'gyur ba de ltar phyogs bcu na gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa ma lus par bzhugs shing 'tsho la gzhes pa thams cad 'dir dgongs su gsol/_tad+ya thA/_mu ni shi ba/_mu ni na tre/_mu ni pa la/_mu ni sa le/_san ta u sa k+Shi ti/_k+Sha nu pra Na nI la ba ya ba sarba bI dza ba sti la li swA hA/_de nas bcom 
[\[297a.2\]]ldan 'das kyis legs so zhes bya ba gnang nas dpal lha mo chen mo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/dpal cho ga shes khyod kyis gling bzhi pa 'dir sa bon dang /_myu gu dang /_lo tog 'phel bar bya ba dang /_sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir khyod ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 
[\[297a.3\]]'khor tshogs pa dang bcas pa ma lus pa thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs so/_/de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin kau shi kas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming ci lags/_chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ji ltar gzung bar bgyi lags/_
[\[297a.4\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i dpal gyi dam tshig ces bya'o/_/ri'i snying pos zhus pa zhes bya'o/_/gzungs kyi za ma tog ces bya'o/_/sa'i bcud 'phel bar byed pa zhes bya'o/_/ting nge 'dzin gyi rnal 'byor sems can yongs su 
[\[297a.5\]]smin par byed pa zhes bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_dpal lha mo chen mo dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ri'i snying po dang /_thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor rnams/_bcom ldan 'das kyis 
[\[297a.6\]]gsungs pa la yi rangs te mngon par bstod do//_//'dus pa chen po theg pa chen po'i mdo sde las de bzhin gshegs pa'i dpal gyi dam tshig ces bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so//_//rgya gar gyi mkhan po sarba dz+nyA de ba dang /_zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba ban 
[\[297a.7\]]de dpal brtsegs kyis bsgyur cing zhus nas gtan la phab pa//_//ye d+harmA he tu pra b+ha bA he tun+te ShAn+ta thA ga to h+ya ba drata/_te ShAny+tsa yo ni ro d+ha e baM bA dI ma hA shra ma NaH/_mang+ga laM//_//
